2a1(rgyud): Ar+ya a mo ga pA sha
2a2(rgyud): ka la pa rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags
2a3(rgyud): pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhi ba
2b1(rgyud): mo'i rgyal po// bam po dang po// // sangs rgyas dang / byang
2b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
2b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
2b4(rgyud): phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
3a1(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das ri bo po ta la na/ spyan
3a2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang / shing sa la dang / ta ma lA dang /
3a3(rgyud): pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / a ti mug ta ka sna tshogs mang po'i legs
3a4(rgyud): par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub sems
3b1(rgyud): dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
3b2(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma rigs kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing / mdun gyis ltas pa na/
3b3(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad
3b4(rgyud): nas chos ston pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
4a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos
4a2(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyor ba
4a3(rgyud): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'ad
4a4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/
4a5(rgyud): bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol du 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par lta bar/ de bzhin
4b1(rgyud): gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
4b2(rgyud): po la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
4b3(rgyud): byang chub tu 'dzin du stsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin brgya
4b4(rgyud): stong phrag bcu thob par bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs
4b5(rgyud): de/ dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu khri nyis stong bsrung ba dang / sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par
4b6(rgyud): bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na chos yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di/ spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten
5a1(rgyud): du bskur bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig ste
5a2(rgyud): phrag brgya la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid na/ bcom
5a3(rgyud): ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa 'am/ 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa'am/ dam pa'i chos
5a4(rgyud): spong ba 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham
5a5(rgyud): cad spong ba de 'gyod par 'gyur zhing / ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das re shig de nyid kyis/
5a6(rgyud): zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang / gtugs pa dang bsal bar
5b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de bzhin du ris
5b2(rgyud): nyin bdun pa dang / mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sna nad dang / so dang mchu'i nad dam/ lce dang rkan gyi nad dam/ snying
5b3(rgyud): nad dam/ lto nad dam/ ro rgyab dang / skyed pa'i nad dam/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'brum 'am// /
5b4(rgyud): ba'i nad dam/ tshad pa 'am/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i nad dam/ glad pa'i nad dam/ sha skra chen po 'am/ sha gzi gu'am/
5b5(rgyud): mdze'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ mtshan mar rdol pa 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ byang
5b6(rgyud): dam/ gzhan gyi bgyis pa'i gsod pa dang / 'chi ba dang / rdeg pa dang / bskyod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas bskur pa
6a1(rgyud): 'debs pa 'am/ bcom 'das mdor na lus kyi gdungs pa 'am/ sems kyi gdungs pa 'am/ rmi lam ngan
6a2(rgyud): pa'i las de yongs su gdugs par 'gyur na/ sems can dag lhag par dad pa rnams kyi/ yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
6a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am/ rigs bzhi las gang dag g.yo dang rgyus/ bdag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan pa
6a4(rgyud): bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir bcug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/
6a5(rgyud): sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing / tha na dud 'gro'i gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi sna khung du gtad de/ rnam par
6a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ bskur ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang /
6a7(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos
6b1(rgyud): pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran
6b2(rgyud): pa bsgom par bgyid na/ de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing / nongs pa 'chags pa la sogs pa
6b3(rgyud): rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis te/ khyim na 'chang bar bgyid na/ rje dpon gyi sgrags pas sam/ bdag gi ngor ram/ bzhad
6b4(rgyud): gang tsam gyi rgyus nyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus/ de dag gi rna
6b5(rgyud): khung du sgra de grags par lags par 'tshal bar bgyi yi/ bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes pa 'ga' zhig gis/ tsan dan nam/ ga
6b6(rgyud): bur ram/ bla rtsi zhig la khros sam/ yongs su smad/ de rdo la btags nas bdag nyid la yongs su byugs na/ tsan dan nam/ ga
6b7(rgyud): bur ram/ bla rtsi de 'di snyam du/ 'dis bdag la khros sam yongs su smad pas dra ba snam par mi bgyi'o// snyam du mi sems kyi//
7a1(rgyud): gzhan du na de nyid la dri dga' bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ bdag gi don/
7a2(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung bas/ bzhad dgad tsam gyis zhes sbyor ro// bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang rgyus
7a3(rgyud): mchod pa bgyid na yang de nyid sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshul
7a4(rgyud): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri gda' bar bgyid
7a5(rgyud): lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa la
7a6(rgyud): 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du/ yar gyi ngo'i tshes
7a7(rgyud): brgyad la/ smyung ba bgyis te gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe 'di nyid
7b1(rgyud): mang phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la wa
7b2(rgyud): kyi dbang gi nad rnams byung na yang / myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus la lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang /
7b3(rgyud): dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro// de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don 'grub pa yang chom rkun gyi mi 'phrog te zhugs kyis mi tshig chab kyi mi 'tshal/ rgyal
7b4(rgyud): po'i mthus dbrog pa rngo mi thog par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te ser bas ma lags so// chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang
7b5(rgyud): char gyi 'jigs pas ma lags so// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ zhing gi phyogs 'tshams dang /
7b6(rgyud): steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na/ gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// gzi brjid dang mdangs 'phrog par rngo ma thog par 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad
7b7(rgyud): kyi snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung na yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la mi ma
8a1(rgyud): lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byad kyis 'jigs pas ma lags so// mkha'agro ma'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/
8a2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang mtshon dang dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la yang lha rnams kyi rtag
8a3(rgyud): tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
8a4(rgyud): snyoms dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ de phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang chos brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/
8a5(rgyud): 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// /
8a6(rgyud): lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa mi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa mi g.yob pa dang / bshang ci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i stengs su 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro//
8a7(rgyud): dran pa shin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// khas phub du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro// de yang sangs
8a8(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
8b1(rgyud): chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / rgog skya dang / 'dres pa dang / ldag rol dang 'di rnams khyab par don du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
8b2(rgyud): snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang / sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis pa 'tshal bar bgyis nas bklag par bgyid do// slob dpon gyi
8b3(rgyud): dpe 'khyud mi bgyi'o// 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing phra dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i srad
8b4(rgyud): du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du rtogs so// byang chub zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab lags la/ sems
8b5(rgyud): dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du kho nas thob pa lags so// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
8b6(rgyud): la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag gi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan yang sdig pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde
8b7(rgyud): ba'i slad du bsgrags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
8b8(rgyud): sems can dag bdag de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yid rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ byang chub
9a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la/ pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
9a2(rgyud): mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
9a3(rgyud): 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo mang po la tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol//
9a4(rgyud): dus gsum du gshegs pas bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge
9a5(rgyud): 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// /
9a6(rgyud): sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin
9a7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
9a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ a
9b1(rgyud): ma \u0f7fka rbanaM// ra gying/ thor mi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mahAka rba ne ka/ sarbas tsi ra/ zar ba / b+hai d+hi ra~M/ ma tab ma hata/ kal ka sa
9b2(rgyud): ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha sad tA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ ka na ka na/ ki ni ki ni/ ku nu ku nu/ ba ra ma shud d+ha sad tA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru
9b3(rgyud): ku ru/ ma hasta ma/ pra ba ta/ tsa la tsa la/ san tsa la san tsa la/ b+hi tsa la/ e Da Da/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ya hi ma ha ka ru ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be/
9b4(rgyud): sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi/ hu hu hu hu/ oM ka ra pram+ba b+he/ sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/
9b5(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+ha ra d+ha ya ka/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti ma na ti ta/ sha ri ra/ dz+wa la dzA la/ ta ba ta pa/ b+ha ga ban/ so ma/ a di ta ya/
9b6(rgyud): sam ga ru/ ku be+e ra/ pra snyen dra ri ni/ de ba ga he/ a bya/ tsi ta tsa ra na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ san d+ha ku ma ra/ rung tra ba sa ba tiSh+ThaH
9b7(rgyud): nad/ de ba ri shi na ka/ b+ha tu bi bi d+ha/ be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra b+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ lA ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/
9b8(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ b+ha ra d+ha ya/ ka sa man ta/ a ba lo ki te/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ki shwa ra/ ma hA shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/
10a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams
10a2(rgyud): cad dang / nod mche ba thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las srungs cig srungs cig/ bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po
10a3(rgyud): dang / me dang chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongasu thar par mdzad pa/ ka na ka na/ ki ni ki ni/ ku nu ku nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in tri ya/ ba la b+hod d+hang ga/ tsa du ra/
10a4(rgyud): ar+ya sad d+ha/ sam pra ka sha ka na/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma ha ta mon d+ha ka re ma ha ta mon d+ha ka ra bi ma na shad/ ba ri mi/
10a5(rgyud): ta pa ri bu ra ka/ mi li mi li/ tra Da Da Da Da/ Tha Sha Tha Tha/ Di Di Di Di/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ e ne ya tsa ra ma kri ta/ sa ri ka ra/ e h+ye h+yaM/ i shwa ra ma he shwa ra/
10a6(rgyud): ma hA b+hud ta/ ga na ban dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ ba ra ba ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Da ka Da/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud d+ha/ bi shud ya bA sa~Msi na na ma hA ka ru ni ka/ shwe ta yang
10a7(rgyud): so ba bI ta rad na mo ku Ta mA la/ d+ha ra sarban/ shi ris kr-i ta ma kuT/ ma la d+hA ra/ ma ha dar/ ma ha dar/ ma hung nu ta ka mA la/ kri tA kar ta la/ d+hen
10a8(rgyud): sa ma d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha/ a pra ka ma bya/ ba hud sad tA san ta/ ti pi ri pa tsa ka/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ sarba karma a ba ra na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba b+hA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka
10b1(rgyud): sarba a sha pa ri pra ka/ sarba sa twa sa ma shra sa ra ka ra/ na ma stu te swA hA/ klags pas las thams cad 'grub pa yin no// dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyid na/
10b2(rgyud): 'tshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur zhing / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par bgyid do// mtshams bcad pa la ni/ a ka ru'i bdug pa 'am/ thal ba
10b3(rgyud): 'am/ chab pam/ yu bas kar dang seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so// rims thams cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar la
10b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor bar bgyi'o// byad dgrol ba la ni tshon gyis so// lto na pa la ni srung ba'i skud pas sam tshwa chus so// dug bsad pa la ni sa 'am
10b5(rgyud): chab kyis so// mig nad la ni skud pa dkar pos rna bar btags par bgyi'o// so na ba la ni shing ka ra bi ri'i so shing gis so// 'tshams bcad pa la ni tshon sna
10b6(rgyud): lnga'i skud pa la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas/ phyogs bzhir gzugs pa bgyis na/ 'tshams chen po
10b7(rgyud): bcings par 'gyur ro// thams cad bsrung ba ni skud pa 'am chab pa ma thal bas so// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so// rims thams cad la ni
10b8(rgyud): skud pa dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang / khyi rdo dang / lhog pa dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling bsregs pas so//
11a1(rgyud): mig nad la ni dri 'am shing pa la sha'i chu 'am shing dngar gyi chu so// rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyiso/ 'thab pa dang /
11a2(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / bskur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha bshal bar bgyi'o//
11a3(rgyud): dpung dang yul dang rgyal srid dang yul 'khor rnams bsrung ba la ni/ bum pa gang ba bzhag la gtsang ma'i bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis
11a4(rgyud): nas/ klags pa bgyis ni zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// des yang chab kyis gtor ba bgyis te/ sems can thams cad la bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyu ro//
11a5(rgyud): yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / grags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
11a6(rgyud): brjod bgyis te/ snying kar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad byang bar bgyi ba la ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim
11a7(rgyud): bsrung ba la ni pad ma'i sbyin bsregs kyis so// sems can thams cad bsrung zhing bskyang ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / gnon thams cad las
11a8(rgyud): bsrung ba la ni tsan dan gyi skyon bsreg so/ dza ya dang bi dza ya dang / na gu li dang / g+han d+ha na gu li dang / ba ru ni tse'i dra ba ru Ni dang / a ba ya ba Ni dang /
11b1(rgyud): in d+hA ba Ni dang / g+han d+ha bri yang ku dang rgya spos dang / tsag kra dang ma ha tsag kra dang bi b+hU ta dang / so ma ra tsa dang / su nand rnams la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
11b2(rgyud): bgyis nas nor bur bgyis na/ spyi bo 'am dpung pa la gdags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la ni mgul par ro// bu mo rnams la ni ste zur nas ste/ dpal
11b3(rgyud): dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel nas/ thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang mes mi tshugs
11b4(rgyud): lags so// dug gis gnod pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro// skye na yang gnod pa bskyed par mi bgyid cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro//
11b5(rgyud): rlung dang 'brug dang ser ba bcad pa dang char gyi rgyun dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma ste/ las thams cad bgyid par/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
11b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lag so// de nas bsgrub par 'tshal na/ cho ga ni ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis
11b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e na ya'i lpags pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba
11b8(rgyud): brgyan thams cad kyi brgyan babri' bgyi b+he/ chom pa khan gso sbyong can 'dring rtsal bar bgyir/ de nas bsgrub pa thos su gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyis
12a1(rgyud): 'khor bgyi ste/ me tog dkar ba'i sil ma bkras la/ spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bgyi'o// sna brgyad pa'am drug cu rtsa
12a2(rgyud): pa 'am/ gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang khrag ma 'dres pa/ bsham shing drangs la/ a ke ru'i bdug pas bdug ste/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// nyin
12a3(rgyud): zhag gcig gam nyin zhag gsum du sbyang ba bgyis nas/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal te dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/ gos gtsang ma gos na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
12a4(rgyud): dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// ldong ros sam mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ mig la bskus na de nas mi gda'
12a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur nas/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dag
12a6(rgyud): dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po'i bu rnams yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/
12a7(rgyud): don yod zhags pa rdzogs s+ho// // de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'od
12b1(rgyud): zer ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ zhal gyi dkyil
12b2(rgyud): 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthus yid la byed pas/ rigs pozhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang
12b3(rgyud): snying brtse bas/ don thams cad 'grub pa/ rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis/ bla na med pa de kho na nyid grub pa/ mchog sbyin thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom
12b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad ma rgya chen po'o//
12b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po'i snying pos 'phags pa'i snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid grub pa/ dam pa dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang /
12b6(rgyud): snying po rim par phyi ba/ gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / bsgrub pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrags par bgyi'o//
12b7(rgyud): lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po'i mdun dang / rigs sngags grub pa'i
12b8(rgyud): lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrags par bgyi'o/ gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / wA dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha
12b9(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i
13a1(rgyud): dang lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / rigs sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun
13a2(rgyud): du 'khod na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub bsgrub pa/ klags pas 'grub pa dang / bsgom pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
13a3(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po/ gsang ba dam pa bsgrubs shing bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan
13a4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par spras pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu
13a5(rgyud): 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
13a6(rgyud): phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas/ blad pa la byugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// sems can dag pa dam pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod spros shig de bzhin
13a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig spros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yid rangs zhing
13a8(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa gang ga'i klung gi 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rabs snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang / byin gyis brlabs shing
13b1(rgyud): rjes su yid rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/
13b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad ma ha sta ma ha a mo gA pa sha sa d+ha ya sa ma ya hri hUM/
13b3(rgyud): ya na tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gsang
13b4(rgyud): ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta la 'di zag dang nags tshal rtsi shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab 'khor sug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnam pa
13b5(rgyud): drag tu rab du g.yos shing / lha'i gnas rnams ldeg par 'gyur te thams cad 'dar 'dar por gyur to// klu'i gnas dang gnod sbyin dang srin mo'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrugs
13b6(rgyud): par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// chu gter rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
13b7(rgyud): brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa/ don yod pa gsang ba'i snying po grags
13b8(rgyud): pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa'
14a1(rgyud): dag pa khyod kyis gsang sngags klags pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid bsgrub pa rgyas pa mchog dang bcas pa smos shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
14a2(rgyud): phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas/ ga ga klung sa ya bye ma
14a3(rgyud): snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste/ spyi bo la bzhag nas legaso zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mdado la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags
14a4(rgyud): pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid cing zhig par bgyid do// sdig pa thams cad dang nad thams cad de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar gyid do// sdig pa dang sems can gdug pa
14a5(rgyud): rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de 'di la the tshom mi bgyid/ rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin
14a6(rgyud): lha 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// rigs sngags 'di'i cho ga bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin du khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma
14a7(rgyud): bgo bar bgyi'o// byams pa dang snying rje yid la bgyid pas 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs
14a8(rgyud): la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang mar me dang dbul bar bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcwo lnga la bsgrub pa'i
14b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi tshig bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas/ don yod pa'i nags pa'i ming po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
14b2(rgyud): cho ga gzhan mi smra bar khro bos rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag brgya bcing bar bgyi'o// lan
14b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bcing bar bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyi dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i
14b4(rgyud): dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod ston pa tsam gyis de'i modo la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ khro bo rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum
14b5(rgyud): 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang /
14b6(rgyud): phyug gi lus la 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rigs sngags 'chang snying dga'
14b7(rgyud): ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bsgrub pa'i rtags dang legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byin te/ don yod
14b8(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang / las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la grub par 'gyur ro//
15a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas ya bye ba brgya stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam phyag gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par ma
15a2(rgyud): lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin du dri ma dang bral zhing / yongs su dag pas dri ma meng ba'i bdag
15a3(rgyud): nyid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ mchog thams cad du grub pa brtsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib ma'i
15a4(rgyud): phyag rgya grub pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar snying la skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma thob kyi bar du yongasu sbyong bar bgyid de/ de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams
15a5(rgyud): bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag/ yongasu rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa
15a6(rgyud): na/ khang pa rtseg ma legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la/ 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs shing chos ston
15a7(rgyud): pa lta bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus ste/ gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma 'gos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la/ byams pa'i sems
15a8(rgyud): dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa gus pas dang ba dang / zhe sa dang bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor pa'i me tog
15b1(rgyud): dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi
15b2(rgyud): bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang
15b3(rgyud): tshig gzhan mi slu bar/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du
15b4(rgyud): mchis la nyal bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang / yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// a ru ra dang tsan dan dang du ru ka dang / gu gul me tog khu ba dang bcas
15b5(rgyud): pa/ bla rtsi dang / lhan cig bsres nas blang bar bgyi'o// 'gug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ don yod khams gsum rnam par grags/
15b6(rgyud): bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ gang phyir gdugs pa tsam gyis ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu//
15b7(rgyud): bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang
15b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la/ dri chen po'i mchod pa dang /
16a1(rgyud): bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs
16a2(rgyud): pa'i sems can gang dag gis/ bdug pa'i dri tshor na de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu gdugs par 'gyur ro//
16a3(rgyud): 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrugs pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams kyi
16a4(rgyud): nad dang gnod pa dang 'che ba dang gdub pa dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad dang nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang ser ba dang / grang ba dang
16a5(rgyud): tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byad dang g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /
16a6(rgyud): dug dang dbyig par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o//
16a7(rgyud): 'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyu'o// ri mo'i
16a8(rgyud): mdun du zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ dri dang mchis la nyal
16a9(rgyud): wa ma dam ma ma kyi ma
16b1(rgyud): bar bgyis ste/ rmi lam du dbyig dug gi dug mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas pa/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas rdzing dang
16b2(rgyud): bcas/ gnas dang bcas khang pa brtsegs ma dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/
16b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / khengs pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs la/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri
16b4(rgyud): za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
16b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang rigs sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / legs so zhes bgyi ba yang brtsol
16b6(rgyud): bar mdzad de/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rigs sngags 'chang gi skyes bu byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin
16b7(rgyud): ba byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnams par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / tshang yang brgyan pad/ gsang sngags rnam par phye
16b8(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po bsgrub pa ni/ grub zin te legs so legaso/ khyod rigs sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur te/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal
17a1(rgyud): gyi skye ba blangs te/ tshe rjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
17a2(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes phyag g.yas pa klad pa'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad brtsol cing /
17a3(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ bsgrib pa thams cad dang bral
17a4(rgyud): zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sran ras gzigs dbang phyuphyag bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa thams cad
17a5(rgyud): kyi mchog rtsol bar 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi ri mo de 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyuraro//
17a6(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// skye bo dang rgyal po dang / blon po dang bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur
17a7(rgyud): zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge slong dang bram ze rnams las den yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po bla na med pa yang thob par
17a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon
17b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i chos sgron stsal bar bgyil/ de nas bdag nyid longs spyod par 'argya'o// gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la sba ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
17b2(rgyud): la lta ba dang / lha rnams la lta bar 'tshal na de'i tshe 'dug pa'i rgyal po la 'gug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ sangs
17b3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas gdugs pa tsam gyis mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba 'am mi dge ba thams cad
17b4(rgyud): dam nyams pa 'am bri ba de thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// ci tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung pa 'am/ grong ba 'am 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro//
17b5(rgyud): de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i don dang las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad ma d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha dzA d+he/
17b6(rgyud): tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'o nye ba'i snying po'i gisang sngags so// oM pad ma pa b+ha d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha ba ra san tso d+ha ya hUM/
17b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang /
17b8(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'byo chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ gdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs na chab deng yungs
18a1(rgyud): par dang bsus la/ lan sa shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod kyis nas/ phyogs bcur gtong na thams cad bskul sa dkris par 'gyur /
18a2(rgyud): lok+Sha ya a ba ha na/ a mo g+ha ba sha/ pad ma bi lo ki ta/ a ya tu bu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru bi ma le hUM/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya
18a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa lags/ oM pad ma b+hu dza ma ha ba sha
18a4(rgyud): d+ha ra ni man tra yA ma/ a mo ga pa la yan tu bu ba sa mu ru mu ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
18a5(rgyud): dang dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba spyi blugs dang cha ba dang me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i
18a6(rgyud): rgyal pos gdugs te/ thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drangs pa'i gsang sngags so// oM pad ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a ti sh+ma na
18a7(rgyud): ku ru ku ru satAM/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing bste/ chab dang sungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sa la gtor na dpag tshad sum brgyas kunanas
18a8(rgyud): 'khor nas sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ de dag thams cad bsrung bas ni rdo rjesra pa'i sems su 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyis mi mthong
18b1(rgyud): kha pa gzigs dngas pa 'dre nga gan rgyu dang / sak+Sha da / kyad dung/ sa gA
18b2(rgyud): thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas dzes par 'gyur ro// oM a mAM b+ha ba sha bad mo tur sang ha san tu ti si ra~M si ra~Md+hi/ gdun rtogs
18b3(rgyud): sngags te/ yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na/ pad ma chen po'i gzhal med khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs pa 'gyur ro// de bzhin
18b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas/ legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis rang
18b5(rgyud): gis stan la chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bcu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor na/ rigs sngags 'chang grub pa'i pad ma'i gdan gsang ba'i gsang sngag so//
18b6(rgyud): oM mahA ka ruH pad ma a mo g+ha ba sha triH badz+ra a tiSh+Tha ta b+hu ru b+ha na d+ha re sAha/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag khyim dang nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang /
18b7(rgyud): bsti gnas dang / 'chags dang bug dang dgon pa dang / gnas gsar ba'i phyir dri chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi
18b8(rgyud): ste/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad gsang sngags mang po bgyis par 'gyur ro/ nyes pas bgyis pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang /
19a1(rgyud): srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/ gnas bsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM pad ma ha a mo b+ha pa sha na sa man ta/
19a2(rgyud): da sha pu tig shu ma sim b+han d+ha ya tu ru tu ru hU~M/ lcags kyi bur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sna lnga'i kud pas bkris te/ lan stong rtsa brgyang bzlas brjod bgyis nas/
19a3(rgyud): phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// lnga pa ni dbus kyi bzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar 'tshams bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur
19a4(rgyud): bu ma byung ba de srid du/ 'tshams chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha b+han d+ha la b+han d+ha ya/ sa man te na pad ma ma ha pad me d+hu ru d+hu ru sA hA/ dkyil
19a5(rgyud): 'khor bcing ba ste/ yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang steng du yang gtor te/ dkyil 'khor
19a6(rgyud): chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang logs 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang / shas 'chi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis//
19a7(rgyud): 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gdug pa dang / lha 'am klu 'am bdug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i
19a8(rgyud): bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa dang bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongasu spangs par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha ba ri shud d+he/ shod+ha
19b1(rgyud): ya sa man te na d+hi ri d+hi ri/ shud d+ha sad ta ma ha pad me hUM/ 'di pa'i rnam lnga lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag
19b2(rgyud): na gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ bya skyibs sam/ tshong tshing ngam/ 'chag sa 'am gnas sam/ tshal lam nags 'tshal lam/ bskyed mos
19b3(rgyud): tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brang ba 'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la sogs pa la gtor na/ stong pa 'am mi stong pa 'am/ 'dam rdzab dang mi gtsang
19b4(rgyud): ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas la sogs te/ rigs sngags thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag
19b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na bza' nyes pa dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / gnod ltas dang / gnod bsgribs kyi
19b6(rgyud): gnas ngan pa thams cad yongasu spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ba dag par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spong pa ma lags pa/
19b7(rgyud): tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams cad bsrung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sba ba
19b8(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus
20a1(rgyud): ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / bslab pa dang sba ba'i slang du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten thams cad/
20a2(rgyud): zhing du sdug pa dang mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshig brtsan par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ mchod pa la sogs
20a3(rgyud): pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir kun du gtor nas 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang mu ge
20a4(rgyud): dang / mi nges dang yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin bdag nyid la dbang bskur
20a5(rgyud): ba 'am reg par bgyis na/ rigs sngags dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi rim par byed pa dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen
20a6(rgyud): po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der mchod par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis mi bzlog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig gzhal med khang rgya
20a7(rgyud): chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du mchod pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /
20a8(rgyud): rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang / bzlas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro//
20b1(rgyud): rtag tu gcang sa spyod pa gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro/ rtag par dus kun du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ 'dod pa thams
20b2(rgyud): cad kyi mchog brtsol bar 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 'di dpag tu med pa rmi lam mthong shing shi 'thob
20b3(rgyud): nas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad me sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya saH/ gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi
20b4(rgyud): gsang sngag so// oM bi bu la pad ma a mo gsar pra bi shi tu ku ru ku ru swAhA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so/ oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad ma b+ha ra d+hu re hUM/
20b5(rgyud): slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad ma sha khyaM tu ru tu ru tiSh+Tha badz+ra pa ne d+he swA hA/ spyi gtsug bcing ba'i sngags ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo
20b6(rgyud): ga bad me dza lod kle b+haM b+hi ri b+hi ri hUM/ chab bteg pa'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+hA b+hi ka tra saM ba ra pad ma/ a pa ne dza la
20b7(rgyud): hi b+ha ku ru ku ru hU~M/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad ma pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le ba ra ba ra swA hA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi
20b8(rgyud): gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo ga pad su me pad me/ da bu na ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi me le swA hA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags te/
21a1(rgyud): @lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang /
21a2(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo dang / bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing / las thams cad du bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha bi ma le/ 'jib ha rba
21a3(rgyud): sang shwa d+ha ni pad ma go ma la 'dzi ba ha/ sang sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra bi ma le swA hA/ lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/ dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
21a4(rgyud): brjod bgyis te/ kha ba shal na lce'i dri ma thams cad dag par 'gyur ro// pad ma dang ku mu ta'i 'dab dang 'dra bar lce gnyen par 'gyur ro// so dang
21a5(rgyud): rkan dang mgul ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha gan d+ha pa Ni su ru su ru/ pra b+hA ru di bya g+han d+ha pad ma pra b+he swa hA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar
21a6(rgyud): brtsal ba'i ri lu tsan dan dang / na la dang spyi ka dang / ud pa la dang / gur gum dang / bla rtsi la lan gcig gsang ba bgyis lA zhib mor btags la/
21a7(rgyud): ri lu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la/ gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ zangs kyi snod du brtsal nas bzlas
21a8(rgyud): brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar brtsal nas/ skad gcig tsam zhig bsdad par bgyid na/ rtag tu kha nas ud dpal gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags
21b1(rgyud): tsam du the tshom med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang dges 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon pa
21b2(rgyud): mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po// / bam po gnyis pa//
21b3(rgyud): bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur bas// don yod rig pa bla na med// rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyis pas// dus kun rul dri spangs par bgyi// mgrin pa bad
21b4(rgyud): kan snabs dag dang // de bzhin kun 'jigs myur du ni// kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung // su la tshig dag smras pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang du
21b5(rgyud): mchis pa dang // bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lha de bzhin du// tshangs pa khyabs 'jug dbang phyug che// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang //
21b6(rgyud): zla ba nyim nyid dag dang // thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// 'di nA kha na myur bgyid na// tshig ldan lce rtse la mchis pas// tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur rtag tu/
21b7(rgyud): mi ma yin pa'i dbyangs 'gyur te// dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs// tshig bcang stong ni grags pa dang // sngon klags pa ni nyams mi 'gyur// rmu gas bgyis pas
21b8(rgyud): kun dang // lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis// phaT zhes bgyis pas gdug pa dang // bgegs dang lag 'dren rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin mang po sha za dang /
22a1(rgyud): sa kya byung ba ga / mas ca ba sa rgyal bag/
22a2(rgyud): dus kun du ni mkhas par 'gyur/ grub pa myur du thob gyur te// thams cad du yang che ring 'gyur// tshig gan 'a ma ning kun par 'gyur/ mthu 'di ni ltung ba
22a3(rgyud): na// don yod pad ma dri ma med// ri lu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la byi ka d+he pad ma bi ba re// san tsa ra ba tsa re swA hA/ a mo g+ha sid d+he shra d+ha ya hUM/ na ga pus
22a4(rgyud): pa'i shun pa dang / u shi ra dang tsan dan dang / pad ma ga sar dang / li shi dang ka ko la dang / spang spos dang rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / pun ta ri ka dang / e la dang /
22a5(rgyud): sa ma g+ha dang / u kra dang / su g+hAn d+hi ka/ 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhi ba du btags nas// gsang sngags lan stong du bzlas nas/ char pa'i chab dang bsres
22a6(rgyud): pas khrus bgyi zhing 'tshal lam/ chab dron pos khrus bgyi/ 'tshal pas shin du khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma dag pas/ bag tsha ba ma mchis par bton pa tsam gyis
22a7(rgyud): sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang / gdon rnams kun 'joms 'grub pa dang / nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi
22a8(rgyud): mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// dri ma kun gi sam ni med// dpal gyi lha'i bzhin du 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/
22b1(rgyud): gzi brjid phung po rtog tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pas na// lus ni lha'i bzhin du 'gyur// mi btsang ba ni btsung da
22b2(rgyud): 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur//
22b3(rgyud): mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang // rtag tu bro nad ma mchis 'gyur// lus la lha'i dri rnams 'byung // pad ma ku mu mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi dri ni rab
22b4(rgyud): spangs te// lha yi tsan dan dri dag gi/ mda' rgyangs gang du som nyi med// rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang // bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin
22b5(rgyud): srin po 'byung po dang // lha min 'dug pa log 'dren dang // bdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur// mi zad dgra rnams kyis kyang min// lus nyid
22b6(rgyud): sbyang ba bgyis nas su// bzlas brjod pa yis bsgrub par bgyi// legs par bsgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur//
22b7(rgyud): rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de'i mdo la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas par myur du mchi//
22b8(rgyud): ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yi// rtag tu don yod 'grub par 'gyur// thog mar lus sbyang cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad/
23a1(rgyud): oM a mo ga pad ma can dbi ba tiSh+Tha ba ri shud d+he/ su ru su ru pad ma a kak+Sha b+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man ta bya ba le ga na swahA/
23a2(rgyud): ldong ros g+hi wa nga rgya 'tsho'i sgru ba sa ha dza ud basbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la/ gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di de bzhin
23a3(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs so// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis kun pas bkra shis shing / 'di mig nad kun 'joms par
23a4(rgyud): bgyid de// g.yar lam bzang po che// yid du mi mchi ba nyid du mthong mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par lta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ gtum po 'jom pa gtum
23a5(rgyud): po dang // lhag ma lpags pa 'gom nyes dang // bza' nyes gnod sgribs gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dang // thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag du// mi snang bar
23a6(rgyud): ni the tshom med// mig gis bzang po mthong ba dang // rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig ni yongs su
23a7(rgyud): spang ba'o// oM bud d+ha ya b+hud d+ha bi bud d+he/ pad mo a mo ga ma khi ba ra ba ra ba ra d+he swA hA/ rigs sngags 'dis b+h+rUM wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don
23a8(rgyud): sod pa'i nags pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyida'o// snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
23b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe/ sang 'di grags te/ dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan gcig bgyis pas/ dpral ba'i steng na skar ma'i dbyibs
23b2(rgyud): lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang // srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid// thams
23b3(rgyud): cad 'jigs 'gyur the tshom med// sems can bdug pas bdug bsam kyang // phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te//
23b4(rgyud): me la phye ma leb bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas// 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang mdun na 'don// btsun mo tshogs bcas
23b5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag/ thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur// rgyal rigs rmongs rigs nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchi
23b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i mchod par 'gyur// rigs sngags lha ni thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil 'khol gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam
23b7(rgyud): tshig gis// rjes su bsgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bsrung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa bla med rtsol// thig le 'di bgyis grogs med
23b8(rgyud): rgyu bdag/ com rkun dang ni tshim po g.yon can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun las sbal bar 'gyur te som nyi med// seng ge
24a1(rgyud): stag dang dom dang ni// glang chen khro ba mi bzad dang // wa dang bdug bcas srog chags dang // so bdug sbrul kun mgo nas ni// gang
24a2(rgyud): dag srog chags bdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te// ser ba me dang tshig pa dang // char pa mi bzad mtshan chu byed// mkhas pa thig le 'chang
24a3(rgyud): ba'i lus// khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur// ranam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mkhas pa rigs sngags 'chang ba'i don// thams cad 'di'i bgyid par 'gyur//
24a4(rgyud): shin du ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom me// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'chang gis bdag dran par bgyid cing don yod pa'i
24a5(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na// bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rigs sngags 'chang de'i mdun na bdag mchis nas yid la bsam pa yongs su
24a6(rgyud): rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin rtsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// don yod
24a7(rgyud): ba 'grub pa rjes su rtsal bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su brkyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rigs sngags 'chang
24a8(rgyud): gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su
24b1(rgyud): gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal tI rigs sngags 'chang bsgrubs pa dang bral bar gyur na/
24b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma nongs so// de lta bas na rigs sngags 'chang gis ji skang gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa bas/ gsang
24b3(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/
24b4(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha ko sha ra sa ra pra sa ra hUM/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/ gzhon nu mas bskal ba'i srung ba'i lan brgya rtsa brgyad
24b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ mdud pa gsum bor bar bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha b+he ba ra na mu ru mu ru ri di ba bya/ ka shi ka ma sam b+ha ba tu raM ta ra swa hA/
24b6(rgyud): gos kyi gsang sngags ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM a mo ga pra ba tra nud shi sa mi b+ho d+ha ni pad me swA hA/ gos bteg pa'i gsang sngags
24b7(rgyud): te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dbyi b+h+yo tA ka sam bu ta a mo g+ha/ b+ha run tsA re bi shin tsu de hUM/ khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//
24b8(rgyud): oM a mri ta ya ma g+ha/ pad ma a pa ne na tshe shi na/ tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ reg gi sngags ti len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM ya mo g+ha rak+Shan
25a1(rgyud): ku ru ku ru swAhA/ bdag bsrungs de yungs kar dang chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro//
25a2(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya ma ha/ pad me ti b+h+ra ti sh+na hAM/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa b+ha d+hA tra a mo g+ha pa ti shwA
25a3(rgyud): rak+Sha hUM/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa bsrung ba ste thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas/ dpral brar thig le bgyi'o// oM tre lok+ka pad ma
25a4(rgyud): a me g+ha kra ma ne mi li swA hA/ gom pa dor ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad me mu ha pad+ma me sa ra sa ra man
25a5(rgyud): d+he na pa ra b+h+r-i b+ha ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha she na hu ru hu ru swA hA/ tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas ste/ dkri bar bgyi'o// au pi tsing tra a ma
25a6(rgyud): g+hA sa ta na re gi b+hi shud d+ha ya/ Shi ki ni ki Ni hUM/ ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// au a mo g+ha sha ra badz+ra tu na da
25a7(rgyud): tha ra tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ri ba shud d+he si ri si ri swA hA/ rta babs kyi gsang
25a8(rgyud): sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// su dag der zhugs na mtho rigs kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs
25b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ oM na na bi ri tsa tra a mo g+ha b+ha b+hus pa ba la la/ ta ki na pu ra ya sa ra sa ra hUM/ bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so//
25b2(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha rad na byi ma na g+ha tad tsha/ a tish+tsa dib bya gan to// dza la swa ra na sa man te na dza la dza la swA hA/ pog por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so//
25b3(rgyud): oM dza la ba ti ra da na g+ha ta/ sa ra ni tu ti sa hu sa hu/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM da bi bya ba tsa na a mo ga pad ma pa re bu
25b4(rgyud): ra ya hUM/ kham bor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo b+ha bas ma bu ra ni dro na g+ha na d+ha ba ti swA hA/ thig le'i gsang sngags lan bdun
25b5(rgyud): bzlas so// oM sa ra ni sa ra ya a mo g+ha b+ha dza ma de ni hUM/ ril pa mgrin rings kyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// oM rad na d+hi ba bya rad na kum b+ha ba
25b6(rgyud): ti sa ga ra sa ma b+hu ra ni swA hA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ oM b+hi tsa di to dza ra ga b+hi b+ha ga ta yang saM sho ha yu tu ti swA hA/ tshon rtsi'i gsang sngags
25b7(rgyud): te lan bdun bzlas so// oM b+hed d+ha a ba lo ki ni b+hi d+ha dza ya tu sa man te na sa ma ra ni swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig te zlas brjod bgyis te/ so sor dbye ba bgyi'o//
25b8(rgyud): oMn na pra ha ra na a mo g+ha mud ta dza la dza la swA hA/ phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rad na bu tra d+ha re ki rik+Shi ri swAhA/ thig skud kyi gas
26a1(rgyud): sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor ram ri mo bri ba'i ras sam/ gzhan gzhi ci yang rung ba las
26a2(rgyud): gdab par bgyi'o// oM bi pu la ba re pra be sha ya a mo g+ha pad me hUM/ sgo re re la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM su b+ha ga ti su mang b+ha la dar ba bin d+hi/
26a3(rgyud): oM di'i bya ba dza na a mo g+ha pa shan na ba re gi ri gi ri t+yaM/ oM sa b+hun/ rub bya b+ha dza ni/ a mo g+ha pad me swA hA/ mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te/ lan 'dun
26a4(rgyud): bzlas so// oM g+han d+ha pa ra ni sa man ta a mo g+ha pra yu ra hU~M/ dri yi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ni ri ma la ka ya sho d+ha ni de'i bya g+han d+ha/ pra bu
26a5(rgyud): ra ni pu ra ya hU~M/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM g+han d+ha tsurna pra bu tsin tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ dri'i bye ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//
26a6(rgyud): oM sa ra sa ra sa ti sarba byi sta ta saM pu ra ya hUM/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM da bi b+hu b+ho tsa na sum bu ra ya bi bu la b+he swA hA/ kha zas
26a7(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ oM tri shug kra b+ho dza na ba li bi phu la ya sa g+ha sa te su ra pra su ra hUM/ zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma 'am/ gzhan la yang lan nyi shu
26a8(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM b+ha la ba ti sa ra byi ti da bi bya ba na sra ti ta ra ta ra tu ni swA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM da'i bya ku su mod pa lan na pus shwa bi ri sha ni
26b1(rgyud): b+ha ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM b+ha da la ta pa shu pa kun thib nas shu ti e ha ra sam bu rda kum b+he swA hA/ me togs gtog pa'i gsang sngags
26b2(rgyud): te lan bzlas so// oM maha d+ha pa me g+ha sa ta la san tsa d+ha sa sa men te na hUM hUM swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso/ oM ya tha rad pa ni dzi la de mu khe swAhA/
26b3(rgyud): me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM bI d+hi ma ni ka na rad no dza la byA sha Na ma ni ma ni a mo g+ha ma ni swA hA/ 'chang zhing brgyan pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so//
26b4(rgyud): oM pad me ka re bi ma la na kha ang g+hu li sa ma sa ma sarba ta thA ga tA a ti b+hU ti swA hA/ thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM sarba gU no pran ta
26b5(rgyud): shi ro b+han d+ha na ya na ma ska ro mi mi li mi li du ri ni swAhA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM d+ha sha d+hi shi a bi ba na da na pra sa ra da hUM/ bskor ba'i gsang
26b6(rgyud): sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha su da dzi la ta ba ni pra dz+wa la pra s+phu ra hUM/ thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM da bi bya a
26b7(rgyud): mo g+ha b+hi pu la s+pha ra ma d+ha ra na ri g+ha sha d+hA te na ra na ra hUM/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do/ oM rash+mi dzi la sa man te na a
26b8(rgyud): b+ha b+ha sa ma ya ma ha ma ni rad na shi khe swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM d+ha ru d+hu ru/ a ba ha ma shi gra dza be hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/
27a1(rgyud): gu gul gyi dud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM dush+ma sad ta b+hi b+ho d+ha na sa ma sa ma ya be re swA hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
27a2(rgyud): bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra ma ni bi bu la pra bar ti ni hUM/ bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra rad no// dza la da'i bya ku su ma sa re pu shwa ra
27a3(rgyud): ti swA hA/ me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ oM dbi byA lo tsa ni/ a mo g+ha pra ba re sarba d+ya a Sh+NI ti sid+d+hi shud+d+ha bi lo gi te swA hA/ dgug pa'i gsang
27a4(rgyud): sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad me sa na man te te shud b+ha ne ta ra ta ra/ gad tsha sa ba ba na ma swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te/
27a5(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dbi byas ma bu ra na/ na ga bi lo ki ni hUM/ mkhar sil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad tra pu ra ni pu ra ya a
27a6(rgyud): mo g+ha ba ti/ sa man tra b+he swA hA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ oM d+hu b+ha sang b+ha ra byid d+he/ oM tiSh+Thi ta pra sa ra/ pu ru pu ri shi bu tsi te swAhA/ rtswa gting
27a7(rgyud): ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dza la du ma shi khi rash+ma g+ha b+he swA hA/ sbyin bsregs gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad mi ni pad mas
27a8(rgyud): ne ba ra pra ba re na ga b+hu b+ha ne swA hA/ oM/ kha cig tsi ra ni ga ya ya pa d+ha pra tsa ri ni hUM/ lan pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM sarbad tra a mo g+ha b+hi she ka ma ha tsu
27b1(rgyud): tra bi ma le/ a bi shin tsa tu man pra ba ra pra ni b+hu dze pad ma dA dze swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig sngags 'chang gis gsang
27b2(rgyud): sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga bsgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas/ cho ga bsgrub na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang /
27b3(rgyud): bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen por 'byung bar 'gyur/ lha'i me tog dang /
27b4(rgyud): bdug pa dang / ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gter bzang po rnam
27b5(rgyud): ba sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gzhal med khang ji
27b6(rgyud): lta bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / ma 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye
27b7(rgyud): chen po rnams dang / so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyis khang pa ji lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar
27b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid bsgrub pa ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang gsang sngags bsgrub pa rnams bgyi'o//
28a1(rgyud): @de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang gis las
28a2(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag/ ring gi gzugs
28a3(rgyud): kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyi'o// yongasu dag
28a4(rgyud): pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam
28a5(rgyud): par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad bskul bar bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang
28a6(rgyud): bskur bar bgyi'o// de kho na nyid yang dag par bsgrub pa'i grub pa bskul bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
28a7(rgyud): 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po bstsal bar 'gyi'o// shin du rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po'i 'jig rten thams
28a8(rgyud): cad kyi mchog khyad par 'phags shing / nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing / dngos
28b1(rgyud): po gzhan du yid la mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson
28b2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// bu cag pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang bden pa la dga' ba dang / snyan par
28b3(rgyud): smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang /
28b4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas rjes
28b5(rgyud): su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas/
28b6(rgyud): mngon sum du spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtsa'i gding ba gting nas/ dkyil mo
28b7(rgyud): dkrung bcas te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas par bgyis te/ 'di ni gsang sngags de kho na nyid bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas phyab rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o//
28b8(rgyud): bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa/ sems dpa' dag pa lag
29a1(rgyud): na pad ma sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ byin gyis brlabs pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun
29a2(rgyud): dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin mo lha min gsang ba pa// 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang // drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang //
29a3(rgyud): drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang // de bzhin dbang phyug chen po dag/ phyag rgya bcing ba tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur//
29a4(rgyud): sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang // mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin pad ma gar dbang dang // rnam par rgyal ba nyid dang ni// lcags
29a5(rgyud): sgrogs rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// lha mo khro gnyer ma ma ki/ dpe med pho nya mo dang ni// 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad ma ko ti ud pa la// pad ma'i so can de bzhin
29a6(rgyud): du// ti sa'i ni rtse mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung po'i mi ngag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen de bzhin rigs 'dzin dbang // rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du// bcu gsun
29a7(rgyud): lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum bcu gnyis gnas lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
29a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do// de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog brtsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mgon
29b1(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan stong pa/ phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ bram ze cha lus don yod/
29b2(rgyud): zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te sem nyi med// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho gling dang ni// mgon po zhal ni bcug cig dang // de bzhin zhal
29b3(rgyud): ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge
29b4(rgyud): 'dzin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mgon po'i thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag med// /
29b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshegs bskor ba// mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag ni// chu bo g+ha ga'i bye ma dang ni
29b6(rgyud): mnyam pa yi// de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongasu bskor// mgon po phyag rgya bcings pa
29b7(rgyud): tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam pa gzhan mthong ste// nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje gdan//
29b8(rgyud): de dag rmi lam snang bar mthong bar 'gyur// de la yid gnyis som nyi the tshom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshung ba 'am mtshams med lnga// mgon po/
30a1(rgyud): che la bdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la/ kha zer nyid dang dam chos slu ba dang // rgyal bas
30a2(rgyud): gsungs yongs mnar med gzhol ba dang // mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang // skal pa 'bum phrag stong po thams cad 'grol// phyag rgya gsang sngags
30a3(rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyis sam// thos sam mthong ngam mi ni bzung bas kyang // sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang /
30a4(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang ga yi// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por
30a5(rgyud): gtogs pa thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du mtshungs// don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen
30a6(rgyud): gyi// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i tshe yang rnam par 'phel 'gyur bas// de ni dpag tu med par som nyi med// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba
30a7(rgyud): gtsang gyur nas// gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang // yo byed bsgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang // rtag tu yang dag spos na sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs
30a8(rgyud): bdug pa rab du bdug bgyis shing // dpung pa lag pa lha'i spos kyis byugs// gtsang ma'i phyogs su gtsang ma'i stan bshams par// dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas
30b1(rgyud): byams sems dang // snying rje'i bsam pa de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // shin du 'jig rten dbang la phyag
30b2(rgyud): bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson// shin tu rigs pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar// shin du rigs pas bsrung ba'i cho ga bgyi// shin du bkra shis bla
30b3(rgyud): med de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes su mthun pA ra gyur nas// phyag rgya 'di sa bcing
30b4(rgyud): bar bgyi ste// lag pa pad ma'i tshul du bzhag nas// sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings ste/ mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying khar bzhag go/ phyag rgya 'di ni don
30b5(rgyud): yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rtsol bar bgyid do// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do//
30b6(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha bi ta sa man ta a ba lo ga ya man ste sa da tra/ a dIsh+ma ta a mo g+ha pad me tsa rU sran tsa ra hUM hUM/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa rgyas
30b7(rgyud): pa pad ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos/ shin du phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing mang
30b8(rgyud): bo mtha' dag cher g.yog par 'gyur ro/ dus gsum du gshegs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skul 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya steng du ma dag byung nas/
31a1(rgyud): de bzhin gsheg pa de dag thams cad rab du dgyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi yid la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos/ phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas/
31a2(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// grub pa dam pa'i don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
31a3(rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa/ lha rnams bsrung ba dang / skyobs
31a4(rgyud): pa dang / spad par bgyid par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jig pa brgyad rnams dang / gnod pa thams cad las yongs
31a5(rgyud): su thar par 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lag so// don yod dam tshig mchog
31a6(rgyud): grags pad ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing / 'dzub mo gung mo rnams pad ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la sen mo mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
31a7(rgyud): rtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha pad me ku sha sa ma yan grin grin d+ha d+ha ra ma ha sang ta hUM/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu 'am/ bzung ba tsam
31a8(rgyud): gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dges pa dang /
31b1(rgyud): mnyes pa dang / rab du dges pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dges pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyal po'i snying po grub pa dam pa rtsol bar
31b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yang nas yang du mthong ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa brtsol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs
31b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'dzin pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug
31b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig brtsal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos
31b5(rgyud): ba'i gsang sngags grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag 'thil pad ma ltar bgyis la/
31b6(rgyud): 'dzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing / 'the'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ pad ma chang la bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang // phye ma byeg pa phye ma dang // ba dan
31b7(rgyud): gos dang rgyan dang ni// gtor ma mchod yon rab du 'bul// bum pa gang ba dri sogs dang // mtshon srung sna lnga tshon phye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyag rgya
31b8(rgyud): 'di ni kun la mchog/ 'di ni 'bul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// thams cad du ni don yong mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ pad ma'i phyag gis byin gyis 'arlabs//
32a1(rgyud): gung mo nar bus sgris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni/ bag tsha ba med pa'i pad ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni
32a2(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha pad ma ma ha sata a ya tu ma ha man d+ha la bi ri bi ri bi ri pad ma pU dzi swA hA// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags te/ byang chub
32a3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyag na pad ma gsol gdab dgug/ lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor kun gyi lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs
32a4(rgyud): bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min de bzhin du// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po nyid
32a5(rgyud): dag ste// de kun ska cig 'du 'gyur zhing // bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhal// lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i 'tshams su byas te/ gung mo rnams
32a6(rgyud): yid tsam bskams pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang // dkyil 'khor bcings par bgyi ba yi// bsrung ba 'di la bag tsha med// phyag rgya 'di ni bcing
32a7(rgyud): tsam dang / gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni 'khor yug tu// mtshams bcings dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // bsrung ba'i las ni bgyis par
32a8(rgyud): 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dri d+ha pad ma b+han d+ha sa man te na/ ma hA si man ngag tu man/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can sman pa dang // don
32b1(rgyud): yod pa'i phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par bzhag ste/ srin lag kha dengs sor mo rnams yid
32b2(rgyud): bskum pa ni/ don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi// pad ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang // 'jug pa'i las ni sbar ba dang // dkyil 'khor
32b3(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang // gsang sngags dam pas bsrung bgyis nas// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gshegs/
32b4(rgyud): pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM badz+re badz+re a d+ha thi ta pad me bi sha ru pa d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bra bi shi tu s+t+rai yad d+ha ga ta na d+hi ra t+ye ti sA hA/
32b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid 'grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu// g.yo bar 'gyur bar som nyi med// phyag na pad ma'i lus
32b6(rgyud): 'bar nas// mgul pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin bgyis// rtag du lta zhing mdun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyis ni zhing kun dang //
32b7(rgyud): mtho ris mgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas sgo nas// gnas
32b8(rgyud): pa thams cad sgo 'byed do// bde can 'jig rten khams dag gi/ sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// gnas kun du ni 'jig par 'gyur/
33a1(rgyud): phyag rgyas sdig pa thams cad 'phrogaganye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jig
33a2(rgyud): par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mi zad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid//
33a3(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur// mi zad 'jigs las sgrol bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las
33a4(rgyud): rnam par thar// sems can kun las rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis brlob// phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/ gung mos pa da
33a5(rgyud): ma'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis te/ spyi bo'i rel pa la bzhag pa ni pad ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i lag pa zhes bya ba grags te/ sems can thams cad la
33a6(rgyud): sman pa'i srad du/ gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha pad me dze le byi sho d+ha ya hUM/ b+hi ri b+hi ri ma le swAhA/ phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis/
33a7(rgyud): bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su/ phyag rgya gsang sngags dog med pas// rtag tu bkrus pa'i mdo tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang
33a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang // tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung pos lha bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma
33b1(rgyud): bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub/ grub pa don yod zhags pa yi// don yod de nyid grub par 'gyur// lha rnams
33b2(rgyud): kun ni 'du 'gyur te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// sems dpa' mchog sprin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyun du thams
33b3(rgyud): cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur// de bzhin drung rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad du ni las grub ste// gnod pa kun las
33b4(rgyud): rnam par grol// sgrib pa rnams las rnam par thar// thams cad du ni bkra shis shog/ khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no// lan
33b5(rgyud): gnyis gasdams la 'og tu bstan// srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskums pa ni// pad ma'i nor bu lags te// kun nas kyang ni mnyam par bzhag/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin
33b6(rgyud): lha bu 'di// dkyil mo dkrung bcas mchis nas su// phyag rgya 'di dag bcing bgyi zhing // mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas// bcings pa tsam gyi mod la ni//
33b7(rgyud): dkyil mo rdo rje lha mnyam 'gyur// kun go char gyur nas ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // gnod sbyin srin mo 'byung por bcas// lha min mkha' lding
