33b8(rgyud): gis mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams rnams dag tu// de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros// bgegs med pa ni las grub pa// bzlas pa'i las la som
34a1(rgyud): som nyi med// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra tri d+ha pad me sha ra hUM/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la// 'dzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas// mthe bong pad
34a2(rgyud): ma ltar kha phye bar bgyi ste// don yod dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du// gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o//
34a3(rgyud): oM pad me sha ra a mo g+ha b+ha d+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri swA hA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
34a4(rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa' bsam pa rtse gcig pas brjod par gyi'o// lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum
34a5(rgyud): phrag brgya stong gang ga'i glang gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rig
34a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do// mgon po
34a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongasu
34a8(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol du phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres bcwo brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
34b1(rgyud): stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod
34b2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po'i snying po dran pa bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la// yon tan dang phan yon rnams thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya tsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pa
34b3(rgyud): nas/ zhag gcig bskyang ba bgyis te bzlas brjod kyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'tshang la
34b4(rgyud): legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol te/ rig sngags 'chang leg so leg so// 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no// zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig
34b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas/ dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang / sbyin no khyod rjes su bzung zhing / byin gyis brlabs
34b6(rgyud): pas nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi mthu bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'tshang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po grub pas/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par
34b7(rgyud): dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la bstan par gyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la dgongs par gyis shig/ khyod 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du
34b8(rgyud): 'dug nas shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khas bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// khyod pad ma'i nang du skyes te skyes nas rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan cing / mtshan dang dpe byad kyis
35a1(rgyud): rab du brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas blagyis te/
35a2(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang na nam mkha' la mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
35a3(rgyud): 'chang gi 'bum phrag bye ba stong phrag brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ tshe dpag tu mchis par 'gyur ro/ don yod rgya chen snang ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur to//
35a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis/ mtsho zhing slar ldog par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis
35a5(rgyud): la phyag rgya stong bcings na/ tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa/ don yod pa'i mig yongs
35a6(rgyud): su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang gshin
35a7(rgyud): rje dang / chu lha dang lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sems
35a8(rgyud): can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/ de lta de lta bur gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten bzlas brjod bsgrub pa 'bul lags so// 'bum bzlas brjod 'jig rten las
35b1(rgyud): 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon gsum du snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las lung bstan
35b2(rgyud): pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyis brlabs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ phyag rgya bcings te dkyil mo dkrung bcas
35b3(rgyud): nas/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang / byams pa dang / snying rje chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod
35b4(rgyud): bgyis ma thag kho na ra/ lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / dran pa dang bre gros
35b5(rgyud): dang / gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs de la yang 'od zer
35b6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad brtsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i
35b7(rgyud): lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba dang / btugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro//
35b8(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po//
36a1(rgyud): bam po gsum pa// / thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la/ rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste/ khar gtad la srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed
36a2(rgyud): cing / gung mo pad ma ltar bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do/ oM tu ru tu ru pad me a mo g+ha sid d+hi hU~M/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod 'grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi// 'di ni bcings
36a3(rgyud): pa bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur// myur du ston brtsol 'gyur te// snyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog kun rab du ston par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das
36a4(rgyud): pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol// bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel// bkra shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lha rnams rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur//
36a5(rgyud): rdo rje bcing ba shin du bcing // rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi// 'dzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas// snying po dag ni rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
36a6(rgyud): snying po gsungs pa dang / pad ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang / don thams cad bsgrub pa'i sngags de dag gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha
36a7(rgyud): hri da ya/ pad me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad ma d+ha ra/ ma ha man d+ha la hri d+ha ya hUM/ snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// pad ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi// grub pa nyid yang dag
36a8(rgyud): som nyi med// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// shin du gsang ba'i phyir ni phyag rgya bzung // shin du gsang sngags bzlas
36b1(rgyud): byas nas// shin du bkrus pas gos gtsang bgo/ gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la brtser gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par bsgom//
36b2(rgyud): rtag tu shin du dang bgyi zhing // pad ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi// myur du las grub myur du ni// pad ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas thob// myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug thob//
36b3(rgyud): myur du sems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang tsam gyis// khar pad ma'i tshul du gzhag la lag pa bsgyur nas// 'dzub mo gyen du sgreng the bong yid tsam bkug la//
36b4(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo rnams pad ma'i tshul du bzhug la/ mthe bong yid tsam bkug ste/ gung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni/ don yod
36b5(rgyud): pa zhi ba chen po'i mig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM pa shu pa ti b+he/
36b6(rgyud): sha d+ha ra sha d+ha ra sha ta sa ha pra rash+li pra ti man ti ta ka ya a ka ra sha ni san tso d+ha ni/ b+hu ru b+hu ru a mo g+ha pa sha sid d+he hUM// phyag rgya 'dis gastang sngags lan nyi shu rtsu
36b7(rgyud): gcig bzlas so// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du brdeg cing slar yang rang gi gnas
36b8(rgyud): su bzung zhing / gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ lan 'dun du yang bdeg go// don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni/ bsam pa mchog tu dag las bgyi/ bzlas/
37a1(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la ni// don chen zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang // mod la sangs rgyas nyid du
37a2(rgyud): 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin// mod la grub pa bla med dang // mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
37a3(rgyud): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min na mkha' lding // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// gsang sngags 'chang ba blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de'i
37a4(rgyud): mod la 'du// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de nyid gzigs pa'i gzigs par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la phyag bya'i phyir// byang chub/
37a5(rgyud): sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag par bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin
37a6(rgyud): mod la ston par 'gyur// gang dag mnar med song ba dang // sems can mtshams med lnga bgyid cing // gang dag 'phags pa skur 'debs dang // gang dag/
37a7(rgyud): dam chos spong ba dang // phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug gam// bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong // phyag rgya bcings
37a8(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// rjes su bzlos par bgyid pa dang // rigs sngags 'chang ba
37b1(rgyud): mthong ba de// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon par mthong ba lta bar bya// tshe rabs rgyud mar bskal pa ni// brgyad stong du ni bsagasas pa yis// /
37b2(rgyud): sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa dang // phyag rgya bcings sam mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byung 'gyur som nyi med// thal mo lhan cig dam sbar te// mkhas pas pad ma'i
37b3(rgyud): tshul du bgyis// 'dzub mo nor bur bgyis te/ gung mo ying tsam zhig bkub pa ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/ lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas/ spyi bor
37b4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba brtsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// au/ s+thi yang d+he nu g+ha ta a b+hi shin tsa tu sarba tre yad d+ha/ a bi She kAM pad ma ma ni su pad me/ a mo g+he sarba ta tha ga ta
37b5(rgyud): a d+hiSh+Thi ti hUM/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
37b6(rgyud): phyug gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rig snga 'chang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rigs sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
37b7(rgyud): dag par 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor gcig pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// spyi gtsug rdo rje pad ma bcings// rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo rkyang // 'dzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul
37b8(rgyud): du bgyi// rang gi gdong gi khro gnyer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun bsgrub par bgyid pa yi// thams cad 'grub bgyid phyag rgya ste// kun 'grub dam pa'i gsang/
38a1(rgyud): sngags pas// 'di kun grub pa kun gyi mchog/ oM kro d+ha ra dze ma ha ya mo g+ha/ ha na ha na sarba duSh+TA na hUM/ phya rgya 'dri ba tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen
38a2(rgyud): po na gisang sngags kyis// kun ni rab du rnams 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni bsnyil bar bgyi// phyag rgya bcing ba bgyis pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid//
38a3(rgyud): sems can gdug dang gdug pa yi// klu bges log par 'dren pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad dbang du 'gyur
38a4(rgyud): nas mchis// lha dang mi dang dge slong dang // bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa// thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni// mchis par gyur par som nyi med// rgyud ni rtag
38a5(rgyud): tu mnyam bzhag la// 'the bo mnyam du bteg nas ni// gung mo nyid ni gung mo nyid// yid tsam bkug nas sgreng bar bgyid// 'di ni pad ma chen po yi// lha mo sgrol
38a6(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa bla na med pa yi// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mos pad ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la// mthe'u chung
38a7(rgyud): yid tsam bkug pa ni// dkar sham chen mo'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni kun grub bla na med// rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyar dam bcings shing // shes rab can gyis g.yas
38a8(rgyud): pa'i lag sgyur la// khro nyer bzhin ni de bzhin khro ba dang // phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab du sbyin// lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar brkyang nas ni// gsang
38b1(rgyud): ba de brkyang gung mo snyam nas su// mthe'u chung brkyang nas lcags sgrog pad ma'i tshul du snying kha'i gnas su bgug par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// phyag rgya 'di ni
38b2(rgyud): bcings pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun gnas lha dag dang // dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis bsrung
38b3(rgyud): bgyid som nyi med// phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni// thal sbyar pad ma'i tshul bzhin byas pa te// snying khar bzhag pa'i gnod sbyin pho nya mo'i/
38b4(rgyud): 'di ni phyag rgya legs par bsgrags// dang po rdo rje'i khu tshur legs bcing pa la gung mo lhag ma bskums zhing mthe bo bzhag/ pad ma'i tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol bdun gyis/
38b5(rgyud): grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing // nyon mongs nad kun nye bar zhi bar so nyi med// don yod grub pa bla na med// cho ga zhib mo thams cad
38b6(rgyud): 'grugag lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje tshul du pad ma bcing // 'dzub mo bskum par bgyis nas ni// mthe bo yang ni dgug par bgyi// 'di ni rta mgrin phyag
38b7(rgyud): rgya ste/ cho ga zhib mo'i dam pa lags// pad ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// 'dzub mo 'khyud la gung mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi// don yod zhags pa'i/
38b8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di// rgya mtsho klong gi kha lta bu// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'di ni las rnams bgyid pa po// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// phyag rgya 'di ni 'dzub mo mthe bo
39a1(rgyud): rnams// lcags sgrog lhag ma bskums nas ni// pad ma'i tshul du snying kha'i gnas// su bzhag pa ni mgrin sngon gyi// 'di na dogs
39a2(rgyud): med phyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad ma'i khu tshur te// g.yas g.yon du ni bzhag nas su// kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du bzhag/ byams pa'i mi gnyis
39a3(rgyud): bgyis pa ni// zhal ni bcug phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyis mi thub pa'i// mthe bo mnyam par ma nyam bgyis la// sor mo rtse mor bskum pa dang /
39a4(rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis ni pad ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i tshul du 'dzub mo skum// g.yon pa brkyang
39a5(rgyud): ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni// lag pa gnyis pa brkyang nas kyang // snying khar bzhag pa'i phyag
39a6(rgyud): rgya ste// 'di ni rgyun du gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// sor mo spang ba'i thor to bkug/ g.yas pa snying khar bzhag nas su// mthe bo dang
39a7(rgyud): mthe'u chung bgug/ 'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun 'gug pa mchog lags so// lags pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis la// sor mo phying ka log tu bsgreng /
39a8(rgyud): g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dang / snying kha'i gnas su bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan bgyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid// lag pa g.yas pa
39b1(rgyud): spyi bor yang // mthe bor 'dzub mo bkug bgyis la// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// 'dzub mo gyen du bsgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste/
39b2(rgyud): thams du ni las bsgrub pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung ni bkug bgyis te// drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis so//
39b3(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la// blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha min thams cad 'gums pa yi// khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa byi tsa bu
39b4(rgyud): rar bgyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi// mthe bong the chung bskum pa ni// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa// 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas khu
39b5(rgyud): tshur bcangs nas su// 'dzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// skar bstan khu tshur bcangs nas bzhag/ sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi// drag po rgyan du lha bgyid la/
39b6(rgyud): de bzhin lha'i sde dpon gyis// gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// gyen du lag gnyis bsgrengs nas su// sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyis pa'o// lag pa
39b7(rgyud): mthe bong 'dzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid ser mo gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis
39b8(rgyud): ka bkyang // skar ma'i tshogs kyi mdzes gyur pa// 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub
40a1(rgyud): bar bgyid// sdig pa thams cad spongs zhing nyon mongs kun// nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad sbyang // las kun zad par
40a2(rgyud): bgyid cing ni// las sgrub don yod grub par 'gyur// oM pad me ta ra ya// pad ma b+hu dze hUM/ oM ma ha pad me she tang ge hA ru hU rA sA hA/ oM b+hi ku Ti pad me ta ra ta ra
40a3(rgyud): hUM/ oM pad me paN Da ra ba si ni/ kun Ta kun Da sA hA/ oM a mo g+ha bad ma ba ra d+hi sid+hi sid+d+ha N+ya nAM/ oM sarbad tra g+ha mi no/ oM ba ha ya re'u Ti ni d+hu/ oM a mo g+ha
40a4(rgyud): Na ta re ta ra ya/ pad ma b+hu dze hU/ oM d+ha ru ta ru la/ bad me ya mo g+ha ts+tsha/ oM b+ha te mu khe ni kr-in ta ya d+hu shA na hUM/ oM mo pad me ni ni la kan She shro ra/ bu ru pu ru hUM/
40a5(rgyud): au so'u mya ba d+ha ne pra bi d+ha sha sa ya hUM/ oM pad ma sha ri sa d+ha ya hUM/ au a mo g+ha sha ri hUM/ oM yag kra d+hi pa ti/ mu ru mu ru nU/ oM a mo g+ha bram me re hUM/
40a6(rgyud): au ri shi bi ra te/ a g+ha bu dze hUM/ au a mo g+ha ra dza pad ma na b+he/ sa ra sa ra sa man ta/ bu dze hU/ rud ta ru da ti mi li swA hA/ au sha ga ti da re/ a mo ga ba ti
40a7(rgyud): swA hA/ ru tri swAhA/ oM so ma pra b+he hUM/ de bzhin phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs pa yang // phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad bsgrub// gsang sngags 'chang gis
40a8(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i las// rtag tu kun bgyid mdor na thams cad bgyid// gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas//
40b1(rgyud): dri zhim dri'i dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nas su// phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings
40b2(rgyud): pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mo la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum// phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings par
40b3(rgyud): bgyis pa na// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro//
40b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis legs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas cig pur 'gyur ro// 'jig
40b5(rgyud): rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rim par phye ba dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu man
40b6(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rig sngags 'chang grub par 'gyur ro// tshig brtan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// blo gros
40b7(rgyud): thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dam pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu
40b8(rgyud): dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bdug pa dang rab du 'dug pa thams cad 'pham par bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar/
41a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams
41a2(rgyud): cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur
41a3(rgyud): nas mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gtso bor gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro//
41a4(rgyud): skyon gyi dri ma dang // ser sna dang / phra dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// legs par dran zhing lus shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mchi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs
41a5(rgyud): pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyis dbus 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu tshur khyod 'jig rten
41a6(rgyud): gyi khams bde ba can du song shig/ ces shin du dran pa nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thugs gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
41a7(rgyud): kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa'i phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par bgyis/ khru gang kho na'i tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham pa bri bar 'gyur/
41a8(rgyud): gang zhig mthong ba'i mdo tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las grol ba dang // de nyid dag gi 'grub par 'gyur// rgyun du gang gi cho ga yis//
41b1(rgyud): / rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur// go cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu brtsol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste// gsang sngags bla med thams cad grub
41b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'byed par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis gnod kun kyang // rtag tu legs par bgyid pa ni// rtag tu gnod las
41b3(rgyud): srung ba dang // dus kun du yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang rnams bod bgyid phyir// ra 'as par gyur mam kyi med// nod ba kun las rgol 'gyur te/ nang kun du yang las kyang de bzhin mo// kha lob nga
41b4(rgyud): dngang byung bag mdus gyun pas/ de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ dgos pa kun gyi rjes 'thun par/
41b5(rgyud): gang dang gang du dgod pa dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad ma kha bye zhes bgyi ba// pad ma 'dab mas mdzes pa dang // kun nas 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phreng // rnam
41b6(rgyud): rab rtog pa med par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung // 'di dag thams cad 'bras bu rtsol// rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje 'da'// dkyil 'khor pad ma rdo rje dang // pad ma'i/
41b7(rgyud): phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad ma rab gnas pad ma gnyis// rtag tu pad ma legs par bgyis// pad ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du// pad ma'i 'dzub mo pad ma bsgyings//
41b8(rgyud): pad ma'i lcags kyu thal mo sbyar/ pad ma'i lcags sgrog pad ma'i gzeb// rtag tu pad ma sems dpa' dang / nor bu pad ma rdo rjer gsungs// don yod pad ma de bzhin du/
42a1(rgyud): / pad ma'i ral gri pad ma'i tshul/ rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang / nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa bdun 'dzin dang /
42a2(rgyud): chu srin 'dzin dung 'khor lo byed/ bi dza bu ra rtag tu seru// zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang // tho ba 'dzin dang tshems 'dzin dang // me tog phur ma bgrang 'phreng dang //
42a3(rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga don yod zhags// don yod grub pa de dag ste// thams cad pad ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag
42a4(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham// 'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor bu'i rgyan gyis klub par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni//
42a5(rgyud): rab 'am rtsig par bgyis pa 'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis ni// rtag tu sdig pa thams cad spong // mnar med gnas su gtogs pa
42a6(rgyud): dang // mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid de// thams cad ska gcig gis 'byung // sems can dag pa dran bgyid ni// phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// sems dpa' sa
42a7(rgyud): bcu rab du gnas// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa yi// gnas lags dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin ni// rtag par rgyun du spyi bo
42a8(rgyud): lag na thogs gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang // rtag tu mngon gsum mthong ba'i// de dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// gsang
42b1(rgyud): sngags sum bcu rtsa lnga'i tshig/ rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de'i dus rnams kun du yang // ngan 'gro 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam grol dkyil 'khor myur mthong ba//
42b2(rgyud): myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi sras po yis// mthu bor 'gyur bar the tshom med// 'jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas// skyes sras rtag tu mthu
42b3(rgyud): bor 'gyur// 'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang // chos las skyes pa lung ston 'gyur// gang ga'i klung gi sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang // mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
42b4(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po thob
42b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// gang gi sug par phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par 'gyur na// phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yin mang po nga che ba mchis par bsgrags so//
42b6(rgyud): de la gsang sngags ni// oM a mo g+ha man dza li/ mi li tsi li hUM/ oM a sha swa a krA na// byi ka te hUM/ oM ba ya ba ra d+he ti hUM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta/ a \u0f7f
42b7(rgyud): sh+tsi te/ d+hi ri d+hi ri hUM/ pad ma hr-i d+hA ya mu sh+tsi hUM/ oM bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sarba ma lan ta ra dza ya/ oM sad g+hu sha/ a mo g+ha ya ka ri kag sa hUM/ oM ka ba tsa ya tu ru tu ru hU/
42b8(rgyud): oM lam thag na'i mam tshayin/ oM ma mo tha ci rnam mi rgya ba tsu rar+tha/ ma mas rnamam khyi ma tsi li hU~M/ oM bang tu tsa rtsi letshwa oM a ma ba
43a1(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ shud d+ha sad ta dzA/ oM go sha ba te/ tsi ti tsi nU/ oM bying d+ha ya khad g+ha tsin d+ha ya shun tu na hUM/ oM ma la ba ri shud b+he b+ha
43a2(rgyud): tri bidi tri hU~M/ oM su ru su rba tsu/ oM min mi Ni hU~M/ oM bu shra pa ti dza ye hU~M/ oM b+hi ti tsi te pa sha/ d+hA ra d+ha ra hU~M/ oM pad ma pa sha b+hi shud d+hedzA/ oM badz+ra ba she ba bat+ta/
43a3(rgyud): mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM tsani ta ma ne pa sha ba ra d+hen+tu/ oM tsakra pa sha sa nir g+ha ta g+ha/ d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM/ oM tri shu li b+ha sha/ bi lo ka ya ta ra ya ma hUM/ oM pa sha b+han d+ha ya/
43a4(rgyud): kan d+hu d+hu thAn glan pa sha sa ta ya hU~M/ oM dza long ba ba da ra da ra ya hUM/ oM tsan tra be ma le she d+ha ya/ an d+ha ka ra rash+mi ba re tsu// oM shas d+ha ya dz+nyA/ oM oM bi dza sa
43a5(rgyud): bu rno pa re hUM/ oM pha lod b+ha ba~M tu re hUM/ oM bu rna man Da le dza ye nAM/ oM sa ha pra rash+mi ki ra na dzA/ oM sarba d+hA shAn/ pra ha sha sa ya/ oM ma ni bi sho d+ha ya/
43a6(rgyud): mA la bi ma le hU/ oM push+ma pa ti su g+han sa re hUM/ oM sha ta sa ta pra g+hu ti ni/ krA na krAn hU/ oM badz+rod k+Sha sa pu tsi mu kha tsa Ti tsi Ta hUM/ oM a mo g+ha pa pra ti
43a7(rgyud): he Ta ba sha ha te hU~M/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+h+ya ya hU~M// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang // de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag/ lan cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni/
43a8(rgyud): phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kyang // sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub// don yod zhags pa rnam
43b1(rgyud): grol bdakyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag brgya ni// nor bu rin po che dang / me tog dang pad ma dang / ril ba spyi thugs dang / nor bu'i phreng
43b2(rgyud): ba dang / bgrang phreng dang / dud dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug tho dang / mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum pa dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / mtshon
43b3(rgyud): ti ga dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang /
43b4(rgyud): be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / ba ru dang / dgra
43b5(rgyud): sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yu ba sbom po dang / lag pa dang / gtsug phud dang / nor bu sgron ma dang / 'od dang 'od zer dang / gtun dang / 'phyang mo myag
43b6(rgyud): pa dang / dgra sta dang / snod zlum po dang / bum pa dang / brag dang / ri dang / lhun po dang / sbrul 'khyil ba dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang /
43b7(rgyud): ka dang / rus sbal dang / g.yung rung 'khyil ba dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / 'khor lo dang /
43b8(rgyud): ral gri dang / gri dang / pad ma'i phreng ba dang / rtse gsum pa dang / mu sun d+hi dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi pa dang / zlum po dang / dung dang
44a1(rgyud): pad mi 'dung dang
44a2(rgyud): / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / u rda dang / gos dang / seng ge'i
44a3(rgyud): gdong dang / shang shang de'u dang / ka la bing ka dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i phyug pa dang / gdong bzhi dang / dkyil
44a4(rgyud): 'khor bzhi dang / rtse gsum dang / bum pa gang dang / zla ba pad ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / glegs bam dang /
44a5(rgyud): ri dgas kyi g.yang bzhi dang / rdo rje dang / lcags sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mkhar sil dang / so mangs dang / kha khyer
44a6(rgyud): dang / ska rags dang / gtsug phud dang / mchod phyir thogs pa dang / phreng ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje ste/ phyag rgya mtshon cha 'di dag ni//
44a7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran// ras sam gos sam rtsig pa 'am// ci yang
44a8(rgyud): rung la 'dri bgyid pas// dogs med legs gsal legs 'byor pas// mtshon gsal kun ka pad mar bzhag/ phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams cad srog
44a9(rgyud): las byung bas na// don rnams las rnams kun rtsol cing // phyag rgya mod la sdig par 'phrog/ de ni mdo la 'bras bu ste// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag
44b1(rgyud): rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// sadra rgyas kun dang shAkya'i// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta bas na mkhas pas su// rtag tu kun nas bcings nas/
44b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni dges 'gyur te// sras kyi mthu bor som nyi med// phyag rgya rim phye dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi mthu bor 'gyur// don yod zhags
44b3(rgyud): pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na med// phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod
44b4(rgyud): ba las thams cad dang // rjes su 'thun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste// de nyid bsgrub pas ji lta bu'i// cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tshal
44b5(rgyud): ba yi// de dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi// de nyid bsgrub pas ji lta bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ci bzhin pa// de nyid bsgrub pas zhags pa ni// skud pa lnga las grub 'gyur te//
44b6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni/ 'grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// ras skud pad ma'i skud pa dang / skad pa shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud par 'di dag bkal nas ni// /
44b7(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas/ zhags pa ras skud kyi rgyu las blangs te/ tshad bzhin bkal nas/ rtag tu snyung ba bgyis pa/ legs par khrus pa gos
44b8(rgyud): gsang ma can/ tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan
44b9(rgyud): arba kha ce dar dag ni//
45a1(rgyud): pas/ dran par bgyi'o// de nas shin du mnyam par bzhag nas/ brgyad bsgril du bskal te/ don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas/ pad ma kha
45a2(rgyud): bye ba thogs pa/ ral pa'i thor phyugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i phyed pa sor bzhi'i tshad bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/
45a3(rgyud): des pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang / khro bo rgyal po'i gzugs dang / dngul lan gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa/ zhags
45a4(rgyud): pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje gsum pa dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcwo lnga 'am/ tshes brgyad la legs
45a5(rgyud): par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ zhag gcig mchis te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig gzhan mi
45a6(rgyud): smra bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhags pa bzhag par bgyi'o//
45a7(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la
45a8(rgyud): sogs pas/ mchod pa bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// me yang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
45b1(rgyud): yungs kar la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la yang /
45b2(rgyud): ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ ma 'khrugs pa'i gdug rtse'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas
45b3(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod re re bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing / stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba'i bar du/ gdugs re re mchis par bgyis ste/ rdo rje
45b4(rgyud): thogs pas gdugs rtse bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod pa bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa spang bar bgyi'o// lhag ma dang 'babs pa spang bar bgyi'o// gos gtsang ma bgo
45b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i 'grub na ni/ me'i kha dog du 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rten las
45b6(rgyud): 'das pa'i 'grub na ni/ kha dog sna tshogs par 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chad
45b7(rgyud): legs so// legs so// khyod kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa khug
45b8(rgyud): shig/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / pha rol du phyin pa bcu'i khongs su rtogs pa/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shig/ 'on te 'jig rten pa'i bsgrub na ni/ yid bzhin
46a1(rgyud): gyi nor bu bsam ci lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji lta ba yid la bsams shing smon pa bzhin du// lag pa 'phags nas/ gsang
46a2(rgyud): sngags thams cad bsgrub par bgyid de// thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// phyogs gang dang gang du 'phags pa de logs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun
46a3(rgyud): bzlas par bgyi ste/ mod la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa'am/ mnar med par mchi ba zhig na yang de'i legs par
46a4(rgyud): 'grub pa 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lham
46a5(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis mthun du mchi bar 'gyur zhing //
46a6(rgyud): ji srid mtsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi
46a7(rgyud): cher mchod par 'gyur ro// gang gis don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na 'bang bar 'gyi'o//
46a8(rgyud): 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na/ lo 'am/
46b1(rgyud): lo brgya 'am/ stong ngam bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byams pa dang snying rje bskyed nas/ de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
46b2(rgyud): po lan bdun bzlas na phyir grol bar 'gyur ro// dpung gi nang du 'phangs na/ dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs
46b3(rgyud): na/ mtshon dang / go mtshon dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / btun shing dang / mun sun di dang / 'khor lo dang / thag mdung dang / mtshon
46b4(rgyud): cha thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lad thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor na grol bar 'gyuraro//
46b5(rgyud): zhags pa la gdugs pa ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang gi don du bsam pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// /
46b6(rgyud): 'on te mi snang bar bsgrub par 'tshal na/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te g.yas pa dang g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung
46b7(rgyud): nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na na mkha' la 'gro bar
46b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum bgyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo bye/
47a1(rgyud): bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ba cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// char
47a2(rgyud): pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na/ ji ltar gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches 'gags pa'i slad du/ mchod pa bgyis char pa 'gags
47a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// yangs kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / mi nges thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas/ rig sngags 'chang
47a4(rgyud): legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ lag par zhags pa'i blangs te/ gnas 'thon por 'dzegs nas/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya dang /
47a5(rgyud): zhags pas bcings ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas/ zhags pa 'phangs nas de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /
47a6(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang gi dpung pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi 'dza' ba thams cad rab du zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa
47a7(rgyud): dang / yams nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen po dang / mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab du zhi bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches pa dang /
47a8(rgyud): dus ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa rnams rab du zhi bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'khor yug tu 'tshams chen po//
47b1(rgyud): bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
47b2(rgyud): gsol ba yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la/ thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o// /
47b3(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// las bgyis pa tsam gyis mdado la/ skad cig tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba
47b4(rgyud): dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o//
47b5(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o// mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang mar bgyi zhing /
47b6(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid kyi cho ga bsgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bu byang chub 'gugs par bgyi'o// /
47b7(rgyud): de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga bsgrub par bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid kyi cho ga bsgrub pa/ phug tu 'jug pa'i bsgrub pas thams cad kyi mchog
47b8(rgyud): zug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / nam
48a1(rgyud): mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su
48a2(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / thang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / ri la rgyu ba dang / 'bab rgya chen
48a3(rgyud): por 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga tsheg chung ngu dang / rtsol ba chung ngus
48a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas/ legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma
48a5(rgyud): bgos nas/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal bas/ gtsang ma de kho na nyid las gus nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam
48a6(rgyud): par bzhag nas/ snying rjes bsam pa dag pa'i yid yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas brtsam nas zla ba nyi shu'i bar du gsal ba/ shin du bkra shis pa dus gsum du 'byor
48a7(rgyud): ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis la// rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yis// dus gsum rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi// zhin par dus su lan gsum ste// mtshan mo'i
48a8(rgyud): dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'khor lo zhags pa bla med ni// skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyis te/ ras skud pad ma'i skud pa dang / arga'i skud pa gsum 'gyur du//
48b1(rgyud): de ni legs par tshad bzhin du// khru ni sum bcu rtsa drug tu// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum du bgyis// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i tshad lags te// snying por bcas shing mu/
48b2(rgyud): khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dang // gser dngul zangs las bgyis pa yis// chos brten legs par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i bstan la bzhag
48b3(rgyud): bar bgyi// spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa gang // de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du ni// chos
48b4(rgyud): kyi gdan bshams pa bgyis pa'i steng du// 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste/ mchod pa bgyis la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad
48b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas tshes bcwo lnga'i zla ba nya'i zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas/ tshig gzhan mi smra bar/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
48b6(rgyud): gi ri mo'i gzugs la chod pa bgyi/ bdug pa rnam pa gsum po/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun
48b7(rgyud): na chos kyi gdan mchis pa la/ mchod du phyogs te mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ yungs kar re re bzlas brjod
48b8(rgyud): bgyis pas/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar zhing / 'khor lo na mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar
49a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi stod dang / spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ri mo'i gzugs las leg so zhes bya ba'i
49a2(rgyud): sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga chen po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod
49a3(rgyud): pa rgya chen po bgyis la/ don yod pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pas blang bar bgyi'o//
49a4(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lo phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing / g.yas pazhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i tshul la rten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags
49a5(rgyud): pa'i snying po brjod nas/ phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi
49a6(rgyud): lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun bskor ba bgyi'o// de la phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang / 'khor lo bsgyur bas dbang bskur
49a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ rig sngags
49a8(rgyud): 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur ste/ rig sngags 'chang ci bka' stsal pa de bgyi'o// zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de thams
49b1(rgyud): cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas/
49b2(rgyud): 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par 'gyur bas zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i lag pas blang bar bgyi'o// phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o//
49b3(rgyud): don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mdo la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul
49b4(rgyud): 'khor dang / bstan pa dang / bug dang 'bab chu chen po dang / rtse ga ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam gyi bgegs thams cad gsal ba
49b5(rgyud): dang / bcom pa dang / bshig par 'gyur ro// bstan pa dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / lcags sgrogs rnams dum bu dum bur chad cing gyes par
49b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nyams par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur ro// shin du dag pa shin du dri ma med par shin du rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phrul pa dgu 'gyuraro//
49b7(rgyud): rin po che'i tshogs kyis bkrab/ rin po sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin pa tshe sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// me tog
49b8(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi ra ba shin du dri zhim po'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i
50a1(rgyud): @tshul mngon du bgyis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam
50a2(rgyud): kho nas/ gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba dang / g.yo ba dang / ldeg pa dang / 'ur 'ur chem chem ste/ lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po'i snang bar 'gyur ro//
50a3(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa'i rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i sman bud med kyi gzugs kyis lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
50a4(rgyud): lha'i gos kyi brgyan gyis klubs pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba b+hi dza bu ra/ thogs pa mchis par 'gyuraro//
50a5(rgyud): sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thams cad dang / brtson 'grus dang / stobs thams cad nye bar
50a6(rgyud): bsgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sdigs 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi'o// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs
50a7(rgyud): dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid nyams par 'gyur/ mthu chung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bud med de rgod pa dang / oM zhes bgyi bas gnan par bgyi'o//
50a8(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ kha phub du 'gyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chab de la reg par mi bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas par
50b1(rgyud): bgyis ste/ de nas mig tshugs kyis blta ba bgyid na/ rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ blang bar bgyi'o//
50b2(rgyud): kun du byug pa tsam gyis na mkha' la mchis par 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par bgyi'o// mig la byugs na phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs
50b3(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang / gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul
50b4(rgyud): pa dang / gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes la/ 'tsho ba dag ci ltar lag 'thil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das
50b5(rgyud): pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang dag da ltar byung ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing tshogs can
50b6(rgyud): ngag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor lo dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la kun nas byugs te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis
50b7(rgyud): lpags pa'i mdog lha'i gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skra sngo la cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// mig lha'i ud pa la sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i
50b8(rgyud): skal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'bum snyed brgya stong phrag bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo/
51a1(rgyud): brgya bzhi bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gang g+ha'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar
51a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang / yid la brnags pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i btung ba chen po bdud
51a3(rgyud): rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying por thug gi bar du 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong mdun nas rgyud par bgyid do// dgra thams cad dang /
51a4(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / btub pa dang / bshags pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / gyes pa dang / phye mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// /
51a5(rgyud): yang na sman gyi bu med de'i sgra kun bton te/ ska rags su bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o// gang du bcing ba de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba dang / zhugs
51a6(rgyud): pa thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad gnas 'chang bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / rigs sngags
51a7(rgyud): 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'khor de'i thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
51a8(rgyud): 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing slar yang bzlog par 'tshal na/ sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/ reg par mi bgyi bar lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i gnasu
51b1(rgyud): mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na snod par
51b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ kha cig gi lag na bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig gi lag na byugs pa'o// kha cig gi lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs so//
51b3(rgyud): kha cig ni dri'i dag go/ kha cig ni me tog dag go// kha cig ni phreng ba dag go// kha cig ni brgyan dang lhab lhub sna tshogs thogs so// kha cig ni byugs pa dag go//
51b4(rgyud): kha cig ni spos chu rin po che sna bdun gyis snod bkang ba dag go// kha cig ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ pad ma dang kun mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang /
51b5(rgyud): man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon
51b6(rgyud): ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / sna ma dang / yu ti dang / klu'i me tog dang / ko ta dang / b+han d+ha bar shi ka'i me tog dag thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i bdug
51b7(rgyud): pa tsan dan gor shi sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po'i bdug pa dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug thogs/ kha cig gi lag na ni rma bya'i bsil
51b8(rgyud): yab thog so// kha cig gi lag na ni ral gri'o// kha cig gi lag na ni mdung thung ngo // kha cig gi lag na ni rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang /
52a1(rgyud): mdung shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / bzod kha gnyis pa dag go/ kha cig ni go cha dang / ya lad bgos nas bsrung ba dang / kun nas
52a2(rgyud): 'du zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod dang / gser gyi snod dang / dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang /
52a3(rgyud): gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog bkang nas thogs te de dag thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis byams pa dang /
52a4(rgyud): snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas yid la bgyis pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa cha lugs 'chang ba yid
52a5(rgyud): la bgyi'o// mchog tu brtse ba yid la bgyis pas/ tshig gzhan mi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing / lam drang po nas 'jug par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i khri
52a6(rgyud): la mngon du mchis nas don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa thog mar seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i
52a7(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po// / de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas/ steng du gtogs
52a8(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o// des na dgra thams cad pham par bgyis
52b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ gal te 'og tu phyag bgyis nas 'khor los rigs sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag
52b2(rgyud): tu gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/ sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyur ro//
52b3(rgyud): nam mkha' lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen po nas/ dpung brgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyis
52b4(rgyud): mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi char dang / gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs
52b5(rgyud): kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mo rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du bdud rtsa'i bcud 'tshal te mchis na 'bul bar bgyid do/ rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas/ don
52b6(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis reg par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la/ lha'i lus rnam par
52b7(rgyud): dag pa thob nas/ lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skra lhag par sngo ba dang / mig ud pa la sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ tshe'i tshad skal pa 'bum
52b8(rgyud): phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro/ gal te phyir ldog par 'tshal na/ de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal na/ de'i bcud kyi len mchog la ci tsam 'tshal ba blangs te/
53a1(rgyud): lha'i cha ba tsan dan gyis dri dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la phug gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing / ci ltar dbang phyug
53a2(rgyud): chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong ba ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du/ rig sngags 'chang
53a3(rgyud): 'di yang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
53a4(rgyud): rtsig pa 'am/ ri 'am/ ka ba 'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa'am/ rdza bo 'am/ gos la reg na/ de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par
53a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ legs
53a6(rgyud): par khrus bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'am/ bcwo lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyung gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pe bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig gnas
53a7(rgyud): par bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi bstan bzang po'i steng du bzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong /
53a8(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis ba zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du
53a9(rgyud): yongs su 'khyil la 'khrolo ni gdengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gi zhags pa blangs te/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ mi 'am ci
53b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te/ gnas kyi nang du zhags
53b2(rgyud): pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ ji lta bu'i don yid la bsams pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas/ ji ltar bsams pa
53b3(rgyud): de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor 'am/ dbyig gam gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ shang ka
53b4(rgyud): shi la 'am/ byi ru 'am/ sa le sbra ma 'am/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgyan nam/ gzhan yang gzhal med khang ci lta bu 'byor pa can dag don du gnyer na/
53b5(rgyud): zhags pa 'chang bar bgyi ste/ de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// gang dang gang du 'phags pa de dang der ci ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid shin du gsal bar yongs
53b6(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dngos po gzhan du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/
53b7(rgyud): rje'u rigs kyi ci dang ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i ming nas brjod de/ zhags pa 'phang pa tsam
53b8(rgyud): gyi mong la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro// than ri dgas dang / bya dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he yang 'dren par bgyid//
54a1(rgyud): gang gi ming nas brjod de/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs nas/ de yang zhags pas bcings mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar bsams
54a2(rgyud): pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan
54a3(rgyud): bdun bzlas te/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i mngon gsum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang dran par bgyi'o// zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro//
54a4(rgyud): nam mkha' la babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar bsams pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par byed do// 'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i
54a5(rgyud): gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang / rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'phur
54a6(rgyud): nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i stan la ji srid 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing / slar bde ba dang / ma smad pa dang / ma smas pa dang / legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro//
54a7(rgyud): nags khung du 'jug par 'tshal na/ gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi zhing / nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
54a8(rgyud): brjod bgyis ste/ zhags pa 'phangs par bgyi'o// lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams cad rigs sngags 'chang /
54b1(rgyud): / bi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas/ rig sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shing ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig
54b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas te/ lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o// zhugs pa tsam gyi mod kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam
54b3(rgyud): pa drug tu g.yos par 'gyur zhing dbus kyi nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing / lha'i cha ba dang / rnyog pa ma mchis par dang / shin du gsal ba lha'i tsan dan gyi dri
54b4(rgyud): gsung dang ldan pa/ ha cang mi drang ha cang mi dro bar reg na bde ba ro dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod rgyal po'i snying po sungs kar la lan nyi
54b5(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo
54b6(rgyud): lus phyed byung nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing / rin po che sna bdun gyis bum pa gang ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing /
54b7(rgyud): spyi bo smad de 'dzem pa dang bcas pas rigs sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rig sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig rig sngags 'chang gi
54b8(rgyud): grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub ste/ bdag nyid kyi ma dang /
55a1(rgyud): sring mo dang / mngags zhugs ma zhes gang bde bar brjod la/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar gyi ste/ sring mo kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi
55a2(rgyud): don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de yang rig sngags 'chang khyod rang gi gnas su bsgoms te/ zhugs shig ces smras par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i
55a3(rgyud): phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so// de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi zhal med khang lha'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / gser
55a4(rgyud): dang gos sbyangs pa dang / dar gyi chun 'phyang rab du sbyangs par gang blang nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol gyi nor bu rin po che chen po
55a5(rgyud): bzhes shig ces 'bul bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gdan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su skyil te bstan du bting la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags
55a6(rgyud): pa'i steng du bzhag cing / me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// don yod pa rgyal po'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas
55a7(rgyud): te 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen po de las 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i cha ba de las blangs te/ sbyor chu lan bdun du rig par bgyi'o//
55a8(rgyud): 'o ma'i chab kyi reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis
55b1(rgyud): dra ba'i 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
55b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bus rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur zhing / shin du yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang
55b3(rgyud): ba/ rig sngags 'chang gis mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ rang gi rig sngags 'chang gi bu mthu bor khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs
55b4(rgyud): rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag par thob po// zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas/ thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba'i
55b5(rgyud): sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'on te sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid thob ste// grol ba'i lam zhes
55b6(rgyud): bya ba bsgrubs// 'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na// de'i tshe gser gyi me tog rtsol bar 'gyur te// blangs la bud me de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ oM zhes bgyi
55b7(rgyud): bas gnan par bgyi'o// oM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod nas// spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la// bu mo de'i mag mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ de nas rig
55b8(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyi'o// nye reg bgyis tsam gyis mod laM rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil cing lag pa
56a1(rgyud): na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te na mkha' la mchis par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro//
56a2(rgyud): tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing / skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// 'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga slong na de'i tshe/ 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ rig
56a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis bdag gis skra 'di snoms cig/ de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral pa bton nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la dbul ba na/ sgra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkug nas/ srad pu nyi shu
56a4(rgyud): gcig bkal te/ mgo la btags pa na ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// bden pa ji lta ba
56a5(rgyud): 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// mgul du btags pa ni/ mi gda' bar 'gyur nas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
56a6(rgyud): mi ma yin pa rnam dbang du gyur nas nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpral ba la btags nas ni/ lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa btags pas ni/
56a7(rgyud): glang po che bcu'i mthu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi 'dza' ba dang / bdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon
56a8(rgyud): bu la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing / bdag gi nor
56a9(rgyud): zur 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mos lan gsum brdabs na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa
56b1(rgyud): dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par
56b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya dang / gcan zan dang / ri dgas dang / gdugs pa dang / gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur
56b3(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// brla g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ tshal lam/ gser ram/ ri 'or ram/ phug gam/ dgon pa 'am/ gnas khang du zhugs te/ zhugs tsam gyi mad la/
56b4(rgyud): nor thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / lha thams cad rang gzugs su mngon sum du mchis par 'gyur ro// phyin pa g.yas pa dang / rkang pa la btags pas ni
56b5(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang 'gyur na/ klu chen po'i cheb kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ byin pa g.yon pa la brtags pas ni/ nyi ma re re bzhin dpag tshad
56b6(rgyud): brgyar phyin nas/ dub pa mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// brla g.yon pa la btags nas/ dur khrod chen por zhugs nas dur khrod thams kyad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams
56b7(rgyud): cang dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na/ rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pa bum pa gang ba bzung zhing / lag pa g.yas pa
56b8(rgyud): bung med de bzung nas gnas chen pa'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i dbus na/ rdzing me nyag ga tshal bar brtsam par 'gyis ste/ rdzing der gnyis gzus brtsi ning /
57a1(rgyud): chab kyi nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas 'khor rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyuraro//
57a2(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing / tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun
57a3(rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer na ni/ bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / chas dang /
57a4(rgyud): nor bu dang / mu tig dang byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su bsgrub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyis bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar 'gyur zhing / yan lag
57a5(rgyud): yong bar bgyid do// nyi ma re re zhing brgyan thams cad kyi klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchis par 'gyur/ lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang gzhal med khang
57a6(rgyud): stobs par bgyid do// mngag bzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni/ gang dang gang du mngag pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/
57a7(rgyud): srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mngag bzhug ma'i sgrub pa rnam pa stsogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
57a8(rgyud): / de nas rigs 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ gtsang mas khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ nags dben pa'i gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru
57b1(rgyud): bzhi bris la/ dri sna tshogs kyis byugs/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ a ka ru'i bdug pa bsregs te/ nub gsum du mchis nas/ 'khor lo zhags
57b2(rgyud): pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur
57b3(rgyud): te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na skyes pa nag po tshul mi sdug pa/ mche ba brtsigs pa skra gyen du bsgreng ba/ mgo 'bar ba/
57b4(rgyud): mig dmar ba/ mchu dang lce dmar ba/ sen mo dmar ba/ skra sngo ba/ dpung pa 'khrang zhing bstan pa/ gsus pa 'phyangs po/ mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/
57b5(rgyud): sbrul ltar lce sgyur ba/ stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag pa na dgra sta dang / dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam zhig byung nas/ phyogs bcur lta bar bgyid do// de nas
57b6(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyid de/ bstan par bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phags te/ mgo bo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang /
57b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad la byug par bgyid do// byug pa tsam gyi mod la bdag gi lus mi chod pa dang / mi shig pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro//
57b8(rgyud): mig gnyis phyung ba rang gi mig byis nas mig la bskus na/ lha'i mig tu 'gyur ro// rkang 'brus te byugs na/ tshe 'askal ba bcur 'gyur zhing / thos pa bsags pa'i brgya
58a1(rgyud): mtshor 'gyur/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// snying phyung ste 'tshal na/ nam mkha' la mchi'o// khrag gis/
58a2(rgyud): snying khar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lce bcad nas ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad brlag par bgyid do// gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po/
58a3(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang / 1de'i 'og tu theng gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs nas slar mchi zhing dgos pa bzhan thams cad bgyid
58a4(rgyud): pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na gyen du bltas nas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar
58a5(rgyud): la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bdag nyid la byugs te/ lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas su mchi bar
58a6(rgyud): 'tshal na/ lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul pa nas bcings par bgyi zhing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ldan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ lha bcing ba gang lags
58a7(rgyud): pa de'i ming brjod na/ lha dbabs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rigs sngags 'chang la rig sngags
58a8(rgyud): 'chang ci zhig gi don du gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis lha gnas su 'gro'o// zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gzhan bsam pa zhig
58a9(rgyud): 'tsho mo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhag pa gsang ba'i phyag gyi'i tshul gyis sa gdab par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo gdab pa dang
58b1(rgyud): mchis na/ mchog thams cad brtsol bar bgyid do// de nas lha'i gnas nas mchis pa na/ lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te/ na mkha' la mchis par 'gyur ro// ci srid 'tshal ba'i khyi'i
58b2(rgyud): gzhal med khang chen por longs smod par 'gyur ro// 'on te mi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas slar yang babs par 'gyur ro// gzhan ji ltar rang gi bla gos dang / yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa/
58b3(rgyud): thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing / thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ de la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig
58b4(rgyud): sngags 'chang pad ma'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal bas/ rig sngags 'chang des btsang ma legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gsum mchis sam/ nub lnga
58b5(rgyud): mchis sam/ nub drug mchis na/ rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bya ste/ ras kyi skud pa bai DUr+ya'i kha dog lta bu tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing / khru nyi shu rtsa gcig
58b6(rgyud): par bkal ste/ de la yang bad ma bgyis te/ rin po che sna gsum gyi 'dab ma kha bye ba sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi pad ma/ gser gyi 'dab ma dang / dngul gyi 'dab ma dang / bai dur+ya dang / in tra
58b7(rgyud): ni la 'am/ rin po che karka ti ka las bgyi zhing / mu tig gis bskor bgyis te/ de nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to gcig la pad ma'i 'dab ma'i phyag rgya gdags
58b8(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos kyi bstan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o// ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad ma bsam par bgyi zhing/
59a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyis gdan bshams la bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog sil ma bkram zhing / a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang /
59a2(rgyud): du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod kyang bzhag par bgyi'o// pad ma'i zhags pa de yang chos stan gyi steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
59a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rigs sngags 'chang gi dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/ bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor
59a4(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// lan khri rdzogs nas/ de nas tshes bcwo lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// zhags pa de la
59a5(rgyud): yang mchod par bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa
59a6(rgyud): brgyad bzlas te/ nyin mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas pad ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
59a7(rgyud): debs so legaso zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dab du phyag gis lus la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
59a8(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i dkyil mo dkrung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzum zhing / bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la byed pa bsgom par bgyi'o//
59b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdongasu bltas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lar gsum bzlas par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
59b2(rgyud): dab du phyag bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas/ legs so legs so zhes bgyib
59b3(rgyud): brtsol bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid ngo // rig sngags 'chang gi bu snying las skyes pa'i mthu bo/ bzlas brjod kyi chog chen po dang /
59b4(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjed kyi mchog dang / grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying
59b5(rgyud): po grub cing / khyod kyis pad ma'i zhags pa chen po grab kyis/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhir mchog khyer cig/ khyod kyis yid yid kyi gnags pa thams can
59b6(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs par rgya ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mi bzad pa'i 'jig rten las ni/
59b7(rgyud): zar/ khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ri yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzang ba'i sdug sngal gyi tshor ba brgyang las ni yongs su thar/ 'di
59b8(rgyud): nas phyi mar skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/ sdug lnga la mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi
60a1(rgyud): / khams bde ba can du pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyi gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgya bcu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
60a2(rgyud): rnams la/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ni ldan/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis/ lhag par bya ba mang po ni byes/ khyod rig sngags 'chad chen por ni
60a3(rgyud): lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang / sngon gyis las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis/ ci ltar yid la bsams bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci
60a4(rgyud): lhar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pa da ma'i zhags pa'i de blangs te/ gnas gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher
60a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// nam dgos pa de'i tshe zhags pa blang bar bgyi ste/ las thams cad bgyid par bgyi ste/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// pad ma ni 'phags pa spyan ras
60a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi lag par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa gzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sems can nam/ lha gang gi ming
60a7(rgyud): nas brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun na mchis nas/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
60a8(rgyud): 'chang byang chub du lung ston par don du gnyer bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyi ste/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis
60b1(rgyud): par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen por bgyis nas/ pad ma'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
60b2(rgyud): tu phul bar bgyi'o// nags pa'i thor to ya cig 'gul du btags la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad
60b3(rgyud): tshang ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du zhugs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin
60b4(rgyud): par mdzad/ lung ston par mdzad do// yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sgrib dang sdig pa tshe rabs stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs
60b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// lhag ma ma lus par btugs nas lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phra dog ser sna spangs par 'gyur ro// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i
60b6(rgyud): skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// mchod par 'os pa dang / bla ma'i
60b7(rgyud): gnas su yang 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
60b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// legs pa'i lam ston par yang 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
61a1(rgyud): mdun du mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing / lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do// lag pa g.yas nang du dran pa nye bar bzhag
61a2(rgyud): nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro// bor ba tsam gyi mod la bskal pa mnyam pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan
61a3(rgyud): dang dpe byad kyis spras pa'i lus pad ma las skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i
61a4(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par bye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar don du bgyis nas/ sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci
61a5(rgyud): log tu ma gyur pas/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam 'phrul chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas mchog dang / phyogs
61a6(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thugs gi bar du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig
61a7(rgyud): rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor
61a8(rgyud): gyi khyams sam/ 'chags 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ skyil po gtsang ma byi dor legs par bgyis pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'byes pa khru gang ba 'am/
61b1(rgyud): khru do pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi lham pa/ grwa kun nas cha 'byes pa/ sa dang sbyar bI lci bas shin du legs par byi dor bgyis la/ rtswa sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil
61b2(rgyud): 'khor mtha' dag go cha dbye bar thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po rol pad ma rgya chen po 'byes pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing /
61b3(rgyud): 'byes par bgyis la/ snying po ni rin po che kar ka ti ka las bgyi'o// pad ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/ grwa bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi'i tshad du bgyi'o// pad
61b4(rgyud): ma'i bar gyi zur zur du ud pa la sngon po legs par bris la/ kha khyer gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o// lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal
61b5(rgyud): med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la/ chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa/ bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha' ba/ ngang pa dang / gzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang /
