61b6(rgyud): shang shang de'u dang / ka la ping ka dang / byi'i tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar 'gyur ro// mtsho'i 'gram na
61b7(rgyud): rin po che'i ldan shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol nas lag
61b8(rgyud): pa dang thal mo'i phyag rgya bris/ sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor lo pad ma'i gdan bzang bshams ste/ de'i steng du bcom
62a1(rgyud): ldan 'das 'od dpag med/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen po thob bzhag par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa gang ba
62a2(rgyud): bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma dang / dri dang byug pa dang sung dbul bar bgyi'o// gdan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// gtor ma dbul bar bgyi'o//
62a3(rgyud): yon chab kyi snod dang mar me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o// pad ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag du dbul bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos par
62a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// legs par 'khrus bgyis nas pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la/ zla ba nya la nyin cig mchis par 'gyur bas/ kha shar phyogs su ltas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis te/ lag
62a5(rgyud): pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o// snying rjes mchog tu brtse bar 'gyur bas sems can thams
62a6(rgyud): cad la brtse bar bgyis pas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ ci tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag med 'bar bar gyur nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po de la yang 'od
62a7(rgyud): zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
62a8(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser srungs pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gi rig sngags 'chang gi
62b1(rgyud): mdun du bzhugs nas/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
62b2(rgyud): par mdzad nas/ mi gda' bar 'gyur ba dang / shin du rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bgyi ba nyid thob nas/ 'di ltar nyal ba tsama'am mig
62b3(rgyud): btsum pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal med khang na gnas dang / 'jig rten dang yul ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
62b4(rgyud): mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa yang mthong
62b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
62b6(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mngon par 'gyur lags so// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
62b7(rgyud): du skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba'i dran par 'gyur ro// skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa
62b8(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas na mkha' la 'phur 'gyur ro// lo 'khrir 'tshor bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa grub pa rnams
63a1(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pad ma'i
63a2(rgyud): zhags pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ shing shun dang / ras skud dang / kha cher dar gyi skad
63a3(rgyud): ba mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/ tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i mgo
63a4(rgyud): bo dang / sbrul gyi ska rags kyis bcings la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i dri ba'i phreng bas bkri bar bgyis nas/ zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o//
63a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas/ gong gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyi'o/ ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// rtswa'i stan gting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun
63a6(rgyud): du lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa mnan nas/ don yod pa'i snying po khri bzlas so// khro bo'i rgyal po stong bzlas so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de bzung na nam
63a7(rgyud): mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad
63a8(rgyud): mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi gnon par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig
63b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro// lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyis pa'i zhags pa steng
63b2(rgyud): ngam/ 'og gar 'phags par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas/ 'gug par bgyid do// phyogs bcur 'phangs ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas skyes pa 'am/ bud
63b3(rgyud): med dam gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gug bgyid de som nyir mi 'gro'o// gal te lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/
63b4(rgyud): lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ myur du 'gugs par bgyid de/ som nyi mi bgyi'o//
63b5(rgyud): zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mar ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mad
63b6(rgyud): la bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing / ji srid 'tsho'i
63b7(rgyud): bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal
63b8(rgyud): po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te/ dur khrod du zhugs nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad kyi sgra phye bar 'gyur ro// phug gi
64a1(rgyud): sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pa gdags nas/ phug thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing / 'khrul 'khor dang btan pa thams cad dum
64a2(rgyud): bur chag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang / mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang / chu ngan pa dang / dbugs gdug pa dang / srog chags gon
64a3(rgyud): sa dang / bdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ mi drang po dang / lam drang por ci ltar rang gi gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
64a4(rgyud): khang pa gzhan du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i zhags pa las thams cad bgyid par bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
64a5(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang de'i nor bu 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje 'am/ bai DUr+ya'am/ shel rang 'byung ngam/ mar gad
64a6(rgyud): dam/ in dra ni la sor me'i tshogs pa bas lhag ma/ shin du phyis pa/ shin du yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gi tshul du bkris pa/
64a7(rgyud): ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsi 'byes pas kha sbyar ba/ shin du tshad la bab par bkal ba khru nyi shu rtsa gcig par
64a8(rgyud): sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/ thor to tsagi shod du nor bu 'am/ gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu bdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang
64b1(rgyud): mas bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par bkrus nas/ ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la/
64b2(rgyud): grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing / pos phor gyi snod bshams nas/ a ka ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i gdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
64b3(rgyud): chos kyi bstan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / dri dang rol mo'i cha byad dag dgos par bgyi'o// rig
64b4(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'babs pa rnams spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po
64b5(rgyud): nyi khri cig stong bzlas nas/ lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la gnon no/ lan nyi khri cig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad
64b6(rgyud): tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs
64b7(rgyud): la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis tshes bcwo lnga'i
64b8(rgyud): nyal nyin nagacig sbyang ba bgyis te/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang drang ba de dag thams cad la re re la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa ri bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar
65a1(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan kun du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas brdeg
65a2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sa cher g.yos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri me'i gzugs las kyang / 'od zer khrog sna tshogs pa dag 'byung
65a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba tsam gyi modo la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu
65a4(rgyud): zhags pa blangs nas/ sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro//
65a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po sku gser gyi kha dog nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis
65a6(rgyud): bzhugs nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag
65a7(rgyud): nas/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa
65a8(rgyud): grub po// khyod kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgun bsgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phags
65b1(rgyud): yid la ci ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs la ltos shig/
65b2(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs so nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod
65b3(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par byed pa la ltos shi ge tsa/ rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten
65b4(rgyud): gyi khams bde ba can du song shig/ 'on te bde ba can blta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod pa 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod sbyin
65b5(rgyud): gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / gos
65b6(rgyud): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyis par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul lo// yid bzhin
65b7(rgyud): gyi nor bu chen po// mdon yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
65b8(rgyud): gtsugs te/ 'di lta bu'i yid la bgyid pa chen pos ci lta bu'i bsam pas yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o// yid bzhin
65b9(rgyud): gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di bzlas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan brgya brtsa brgyad bzlas pa bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs
66a1(rgyud): @#pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la/ mchog brtse ba bgyis nas/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i
66a2(rgyud): rgyal po// / bam po/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad
66a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang /
66a4(rgyud): yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas kyi mchogs dga' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa tshogs dang
66a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchog la phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
66a6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang
66a7(rgyud): phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha'i bu'i gzugs la sogs pa mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad ma tshin+d+ra ma ni/ ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo//
66a8(rgyud): b+h+ra ma Ni/ pu sa Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a lang ka ma ha a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra san tsa ra/ Ni sha tsa re/ shwa ra ma hA pad ma b+han dza ba ra ba/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ ma byi shwa ru pa d+ha ra/ pra ba
66b1(rgyud): / ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ pad ma d+har pad ma/ a pan pad ma ma ku ta/ ma la d+ha ra/ pad ma go'u ra/ pad ma a lang kri taN+Da/ saha pra su/ sa ha pran taM/ nanang+ga pu ta/ pra ha
66b2(rgyud): ra na/ mud ta b+hi b+ha Shi/ ta sa ha pra b+hu dza dza ya dza ya/ sha ta sa ha pra rash+li pra ti man Di ta sha ri ra/ b+ha ra b+hi ra b+hi tsa di ta/ a ba ra na d+ha ra ma Ni ka na ka/ badz+ra b+he dur+ya/ ma ra
66b3(rgyud): ka ta/ in Ta ni la pad ma ra ga b+hU ta sha shi ri ra/ tsa ro tsi ri b+hi tsi ta tsa ra na/ ma ha b+ho d+hi sid ta ba ra ta prab+ha/ b+hi snA ma he sha ra nu b+ha d+ha ra/ pad me shwa re/ lo ki shwa ra ya/ ya ma
66b4(rgyud): ba ru/ ku b+he ra ri shi ga Na/ ku mu ra/ se na pa ti be shra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ ma hA b+hud ta be sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta tha ga tA/ a b+hi shi g+ha ta/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra
66b5(rgyud): b+ha ga ban/ phu ra ya ma/ shan ta ra ya ba ra na/ sha sa ya sad tan/ ta ra dza ya/ d+hu b+ha na/ ba ta ya bi ga nan ma ra/ ya tri d+hi sha ma lam/ sa ra sa ra ba bam/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT
66b6(rgyud): phaT phaT/ sid d+he sid d+ha/ ma ha tsan d+ha ma ni/ a mo ga pa sha d+ha ra/ sa d+ha ya sa ha ya/ bi la bu sid d+hi/ ma ma pra yad tsha maha ka ru ni/ !k+Sha NaM b+hud d+hu b+hUd d+ha/ b+ho d+ha b+ho d+ha/ saM bo
66b7(rgyud): d+has bod+d+ha mahA pa shu pa ti be sha d+ha ra/ a nan bi ku ban/ ring d+hi san d+hA ri sha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ tar ta ra/ g+ha ga ne b+hi bu la g+hi ma no/ sen d+ha ri sha ka/ nam stu ti'i bul
66b8(rgyud): bud d+ha la/ kog d+har ma nyam mo d+ha ming d+ha nu n+tu/ a b+hi n+tu tu man/ baM bul ki d+ha ka re sa?sa?/ b+hub swA hA/ bus thub sahA/ a mo g+ha'i bu le sAs/ mang ni rna man ming rgya
67a1(rgyud): swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi ba ra d+he swA hA/ oM bi bu le lo gi shwa ra/ ma hA tshin+da ma ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM phaT swAhA/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i zhags pa 'di lan
67a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag pas mnan na/ na mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro//
67a3(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra bar rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
67a4(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag
67a5(rgyud): du mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med pa'i mthu'i mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa de
67a6(rgyud): dag thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba brtsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de dag kyang sgra de dag
67a7(rgyud): thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la babs par 'tshal na de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis babs
67a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na na mkha' 'grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yodang rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor
67b1(rgyud): los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po brgya bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro//
67b2(rgyud): 'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang / gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur//
67b3(rgyud): lha rnams kyang babs nas/ rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa mchog chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro//
67b4(rgyud): mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems
67b5(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
67b6(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod par bgyid pa 'tshal ba 'am/
67b7(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am/
67b8(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyi lan gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'
68a1(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la stobs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/
68a2(rgyud): nyin re bzhin mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des/ legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor bzhi bgyis
68a3(rgyud): la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de
68a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod pa bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun
68a5(rgyud): bzlas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyi ba yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
68a6(rgyud): dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan/ ba dan dang / gos dang / brgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'chad dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba dang /
68a7(rgyud): rin po che'i ldan shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / dpag bsam gyi ljon shing dang / yid la bgyis ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas/ ci ltar yid la bsams shing / don du
68a8(rgyud): gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phags nas/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'kho ba'i yo byad
68b1(rgyud): thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
68b2(rgyud): du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen po don yod pa la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas
68b3(rgyud): shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin cig bzhin du nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du bzlas par bgyi'o// des na rigs
68b4(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis par
68b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po tshogs chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor
68b6(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid rtsol bar
68b7(rgyud): mdzad do// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// 'phags
68b8(rgyud): pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa/
69a1(rgyud): 'jig su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang sdang ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyi gnod par mi 'gyur ste/ rims kyi ma lags/ dug gis ma lags//
69a2(rgyud): du sbyar mas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/ chus ma lags ste/ lus las ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol
69a3(rgyud): gyi dpung gis 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol gyi sdes 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/
69a4(rgyud): klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang /
69a5(rgyud): 'dod dgur sbyar ba dang / sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad du bzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por bros par yang 'gyur ba yin te//
69a6(rgyud): de la bdegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/ 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa'am/
69a7(rgyud): dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su
69a8(rgyud): gtugs par 'gyur ro// yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyid cing / smyung ba lan cig bgyid de/ bzlas brjod
69b1(rgyud): bzlas nas/ de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi bzlas brjod phyir snga ma rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong
69b2(rgyud): du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang nyams par 'gyur ro// 'khor nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis bden pa bzhin du gos par
69b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// brten pa tsam mamacho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro//
69b4(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol du phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchis par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa
69b5(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ mthong ba'i chos la kun du bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya
69b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rig
69b7(rgyud): sngags 'chang bsams pa tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du bzhugs nas gum
69b8(rgyud): pa'i rus pa 'am/ sha 'am/ gum pa'i ro rul pa 'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang gi de'i grib mas phog par
70a1(rgyud): gyur na/ sems can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba de dang de nas mod la thar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
70a2(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lha mos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu
70a3(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig/ gzungs 'di 'chang bar
70a4(rgyud): bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ bsgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir bcug
70a5(rgyud): par bgyid na/ des nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po thob par
70a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par
70a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyid na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgon pa mang pos grims par 'gying ba lha mos
70a8(rgyud): kyang ci 'tshalade nas rig sngags 'chang don yod pa'i de bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas/ yid la bsams te/ bsam pa'i las thams cad bgyis nas thams
70b1(rgyud): cad grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa dang bgyid pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag mchog srin mngon sum mthong nas/ lung bstan pa
70b2(rgyud): bzhin du don yod pa'i nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin du 'bar bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis sa su mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la/
70b3(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs nas mi gda' bar gyur nas gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyis
70b4(rgyud): snang bas/ nyin par ci blta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci'i
70b5(rgyud): gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri'i sul gyi phug dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / thang gi sgo rnams dbye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas
70b6(rgyud): slar yang ldog par 'gyur zhing / ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i skyon thams
70b7(rgyud): cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o// gtsang
70b8(rgyud): mas dgos par bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam/ phyogasu ba'i lci ba ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyar bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil
71a1(rgyud): bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing / spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i bdug pa bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas
71a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bstan bzang po bshams te/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul skyil ba'i tshul du zlum por bskyil nas bzhag par
71a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// dbus su nor bu bzhags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro bo'i
71a4(rgyud): rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ru dang / du ru
71a5(rgyud): ka'i bdugs pa dbul zhing nor bu la rtag pa bgyi ste/ zhags pa dang de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas dga' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa brda ba 'am/ byang chub sems
71a6(rgyud): dpa' brda ba 'am/ lha brda' ba 'am/ klu brda' ba 'am/ gnod sbyin brda' ba 'am/ srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci brda' ba 'am/
71a7(rgyud): 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po brda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa brda' ba'am/ tshe ring ba brda' ba 'am/ tshe nyams pa brda' ba'am/ tshe 'phos pa brda ba'am/ rgyal srid
71a8(rgyud): brdang ba 'am/ grong thob pa'am/ yul thob pa'am/ grong khyer thob pa 'am/ dbyig dang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang /
71b1(rgyud): byi ru dang / sa le sbrang dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lha lhub dang / brgyan brda' ba 'am/ nor bu sgru ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ gter smra ba'am/
71b2(rgyud): 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud med 'phrog pa 'am/ las 'grub pa'am/ gsang sngags 'grub pa'am/ dbang du bgyi ba'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na brda' bar 'gyur
71b3(rgyud): zhing / dge ba'am mi dge ba de dag thams cad brda' bar 'gyur ro// lo 'am/ lo phyed dam/ gnod pa 'am/ mtshe ba 'am/ yangs sam/ mi ngas sam/ mi ngas chen po 'am/ phyugs
71b4(rgyud): ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ci lnga
71b5(rgyud): ba de bzhin du brda' bar 'gyur lags so// gang bsams zhing gnyer ba 'grub pa'am/ mi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba thams cad brda' bar 'gyur ba ste/ de la the
71b6(rgyud): com dang yid gnyis dang / som nyi mi bgyid ste/ dngos po don gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhag na/ ci tsam 'tshal bar gyi rgyun 'bab
71b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na/ nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na/ char chen po chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char kar nyi ma la babs nas/ mchog thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro//
71b8(rgyud): zla ba tshes pa la bstan na/ zla ba ches sa la babs nas/ 'dod dgur thams cad kyi mchog rtsol bar bgyid do// chu klung chen por bstan na/ rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
72a1(rgyud): / nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na sman 'bar bar
72a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o// 'bru'i phung po la bstan na/ 'bru thams cad du 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma me'i gnas sam/
72a3(rgyud): nag po chen po la bstan te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag na/ nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang /
72a4(rgyud): las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na/ yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang gser dang / nor bu
72a5(rgyud): dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / brgyan chang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du
72a6(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du bsnyen bskur bgyid par 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs
72a7(rgyud): bzlas nas/ ci ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang 'phar bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor gzhag ste/
72a8(rgyud): rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur la/ khyim gyi steng ngam/ khyams su bzhag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kyi bstan gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse
72b1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid
72b2(rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang stod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad nas ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin char 'bab par 'gyur ro// nor
72b3(rgyud): dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhu ba la sogs pa'i me tog gi dang / 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed
72b4(rgyud): pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus mi 'bab par 'gyur/ nad thams
72b5(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa brtsal bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs po dang sha kho na thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gdug pa nas
72b6(rgyud): gcan zan khro bo'i thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yid kyi brnag pa thams
72b7(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa chen po'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa
72b8(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las/ ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la/ lag gzugs kyis dngo'/ dngul las gyis ste/
73a1(rgyud): gser gyi 'bar bzi'o// shing shun gyi srung ba dang / ana'i srung ba dang kha che dar gyi srung ba lhan cig du khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu chang la ba' bar bkrus pa/
73a2(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang mas bgos te/ zhags
73a3(rgyud): ba dang ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste bzung bar bgyi'o// zos pa'i khro gnyer gyi gzhin gyis dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ 'phags pa
73a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / ral gri 'bar bar
73a5(rgyud): 'gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la phur bar 'gyur ro// ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo// 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi mthus
73a6(rgyud): zil gyis mnon par mi 'gyur ro/ lo khri brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung la/ g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ khros pas hUM zhes bgyis
73a7(rgyud): bas mnanan mi dga' bar 'gyur nas/ mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang ral gyi grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bor rgyal po// 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro//
73a8(rgyud): tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro/ 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral bskor na/ 'gegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdug pa thams cad dang / 'byung ba
73b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// gsul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe mtshon cha thams cad btubs par 'gyur/ rengs
73b2(rgyud): par bgyis par te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs
73b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad stong par 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor bskor na/ 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro// gtan pa
73b4(rgyud): thams cad btubs par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyis pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur// thal bar klags par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos
73b5(rgyud): ba thams rnam pa thams cad du ci ltar 'tshal bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// ral gri bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa
73b6(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las bsgrubs te/ tshon rtsis kha sbyar ba'i skud pa chad bzhin du btubs la bsgrub par sha ni 'os pa las
73b7(rgyud): sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ldong ros dang / pad ma ge ser dang / na ga pus pa dang / shing arga'i 'o ma lhan
73b8(rgyud): cig sbyar ba der btsal rtsal te/ dus cig tu lhan cig mnyam du btags shing / spyi bor legs par bslus te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/
74a1(rgyud): bya/ brjod bgyis nas/ sbrul 'khyil pa po gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongasu 'khril pa gser gyis g.yogs pa/ legs par sbrel pa ni zhags pa'i
74a2(rgyud): mchog lags so// rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/
74a3(rgyud): dris mchod par bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// ba dan gyi kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su stan bzang
74a4(rgyud): po bshams te/ de'i steng du krung zhags pa dkyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o// sbrul gyi mgo bo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogasu bstan no// dkar gsum gyi
74a5(rgyud): gtor ma gzhag par gyi'o// mchod yon dkar por gnod dang / gdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka rnams sreg go// 'bras yos
74a6(rgyud): dang yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag mngon sum du dmigs la mchod rgya chen por bgyis ste/ rigs sngags
74a7(rgyud): 'chang gis dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o// thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
74a8(rgyud): nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo bo la gtor bar bgyi'o// bsgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ rgyun du
74b1(rgyud): sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur// stan la zhags pa g.yo ba ni// sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam tu// stan las gyen du 'phang bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngags
74b2(rgyud): 'chang gi bzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas/ klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i gnas su mchis na/ klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams dbye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
74b3(rgyud): 'chang gis zhugs te/ don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/ sbrul gyi zhags pas lan gsum bskor bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang
74b4(rgyud): bcas pa mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du rig sngags 'chang zhugs shing ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi
74b5(rgyud): zhags pa bzung ste/ skor nas 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas r-ig sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo
74b6(rgyud): glegs dang / gtan pa thams cad gtabs shing bcag par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs mdzes ma bzang mo// rgyan thams cad
74b7(rgyud): kyis klubs pa la mdzes ma mchis nas/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gris blangs nas spyi bor
74b8(rgyud): bzhag ste/ bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo na mkha' la 'phur nas/ nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bgyi ste/ tshe lo nyi khri thub/
75a1(rgyud): / par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar
75a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po'i pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra
75a3(rgyud): bi ra'i lcug ma la bzlas brjod byas te/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas/ mod du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi
75a4(rgyud): zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bab bo// char ha cang chen po'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por
75a5(rgyud): bzhag na/ char ha cang che ba las chad par 'gyur ro// grang ba'i rlung ngam ser ba 'beb pa'i dus su nang par snga dro klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na dpag tshad brgya khor
75a6(rgyud): yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// grang ba'i rlung dang ser ba drag po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lo khrud kong tshad par 'tshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro//
75a7(rgyud): nyin cig bzhin don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas brtsegs la lag pa g.yon pas bskrad par bgyis nas//
75a8(rgyud): nyin cig bzhin zhal zas btud pa 'gyed pa thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas/ skye bo stong stong gi tshal rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags
75b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pas bzungs pa la lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/ dpyid dam/ ston ka 'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la
75b2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ nam mkha' la 'phangs na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa dang / kha zas
75b3(rgyud): shin tu bzang po thams cad na mkha'i ngos las sa la babs par 'gyur ro// gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la/ 'khor lo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i
75b4(rgyud): gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la babs par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
75b5(rgyud): las lhag par bskor cing / khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i tshe klu'i 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro// gal te
75b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa bzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
75b7(rgyud): bgyis nas/ bsnun la de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te/ rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas
75b8(rgyud): ba dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na//
76a1(rgyud): sbrul bdug pa mig smad pa lce bsgyur ba mig me bdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi modo la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang
76a2(rgyud): ldan pa phyogs bcur 'byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci lta ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa bsgrub
76a3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i rtsid pa chen po lhan cig bkal ba dang / lcags mdung rtse gsum pa sor
76a4(rgyud): bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag cig mchis legs
76a5(rgyud): par khrus bgyis/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma go bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag cig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdus rtse gsum pa'i zhags
76a6(rgyud): pa blangs te/ 'byung po dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad
76a7(rgyud): kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// zhags pa lag par thogs nas dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// khyod ci dga' bar zhugs
76a8(rgyud): shig ces ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// ro'i mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na de nas ro longs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing ci sgo ba de bgyid par 'gyu ro//
76b1(rgyud): dkrol na mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la 'khros pas drangs nas/ gnod sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas rig sngags
76b2(rgyud): 'chang rje btsun bka' brtsol cag dang thams cad bgyi'o// zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du kho bo mngag bzhug pa'i las gyikyis
76b3(rgyud): shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ de nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin cig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul
76b4(rgyud): tu btugs te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing rigs
76b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang / ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis khro bo la ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum
76b6(rgyud): byos shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// gal te ma zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su skyong bar
76b7(rgyud): bgyid do// chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang / bdag por bgyid cing de dang lhag par dga' bar brtse bar byi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro//
76b8(rgyud): gal te sring mo zhig du bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad rgyug cing
77a1(rgyud): slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / brgyan rnams yo rtsol bar bgyid do// nyin cig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag
77a2(rgyud): rtsod mo'i don du 'gug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te/ khros pas drangs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de rnam thos mchis nas nyin cig bzhin drod
77a3(rgyud): tshe stong rtsol bar 'gyur ro// gser stong rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de nyin cig bzhin sbyin pa yang rtsol bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags nas/ khro bo'i
77a4(rgyud): rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i tha lcag gis brdegs par bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i sgra phyung nas rig sngags 'chang bsgrag par bgyi bar slar yang 'khros
77a5(rgyud): brdebs par bgyid do// de nas mchi ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma zed de thig le bgyis na/ mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig
77a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis yang thal mos 'debs par bgyi ste/ de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyug pa rig sngags 'chang gis byugs na/ na mkha' la mchis nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyuraro//
77a7(rgyud): gu gul gyi bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad brtsol bar bgyid cing / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa
77a8(rgyud): thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyis pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// mdung rtse gsum pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas zhags
77b1(rgyud): pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid bsgrub pa'i cho ga/ bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i// rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa/
77b2(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pa stong dang mig stong dang // mtha' yas pa'i phyag rgya bstan// rnam pa dag na sna tshogs gzugs// khams
77b3(rgyud): gsum dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya 'dul phyir gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di'i gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig sngags grub pa bla na med//
77b4(rgyud): de nyid zhags pas bsgrub phyir ro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba
77b5(rgyud): dang // bde ba can blta 'tshal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa'i// 'jig rten dbang mgon mthong 'tshal na// mchog tu gus par bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal
77b6(rgyud): po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par dad pa dang // shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyis// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la// sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan te// sna tshogs thabs
77b7(rgyud): kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga mchog/ don yong grub pa 'jig rten 'das// don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod kun tu grub pa thob// sangs rgyas
77b8(rgyud): kun gyis byin gyis 'chabs/ ngan yod 'jig rten mgon/ 'jig cen dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// den yod 'jig rten ci ci 'tshal ba// mchog 'tshal ba ni grub
78a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad// de lta bas na kun bsgrims te/ bdag nyid yongs
78a2(rgyud): su dag bgyis nas// ci lta cho ga bkod pa bzhin// rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing // zhags pa gzugs ni sna tshogs dang //
78a3(rgyud): de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang // sbyin bsregs rlung lha chu lha dang // khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang //
78a4(rgyud): lha dang klung yang ston pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang // nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu//
78a5(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni// dbang phyug chen
78a6(rgyud): po nyi ma dang // zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs lha// 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal
78a7(rgyud): bus// gdul bya'i don du grol ba'i lam// sems can rnams la bstan pas na// de bas so ma ci nyid mi bgyi// mchog tu dang par bgyi ba lags// ji lta mthun
78a8(rgyud): ba'i dgos pa rnams// ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du bsgrub// ji ltar mthun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs// ji ltar 'thun pa'i zhags pa bsgrub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa
78b1(rgyud): dang // gnas du sems ni dgar 'gyur ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang // gang gis dkyil 'khor char dbye ba// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
78b2(rgyud): mgon// kun tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso// don yod 'bras bu stsol bas so// don yod pa'i grub pa thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // thub pa'i chos
78b3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo ni// mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas don yod pa'i las dang // dgos pa bsgrub
78b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sbyin bsregs gi chos ga bshad par bgyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mo la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms
78b5(rgyud): ga 'gyegs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu
78b6(rgyud): drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi zad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi bzad pa rnams 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa'i mchog/ nad thams cad
78b7(rgyud): 'joms pa/ mo la thams cad dang 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgying ba/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa/
78b8(rgyud): lha'i bde ba 'dzin par bgyid pa'i mchog/ de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas bsgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa/ sems
79a1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi mthun mongs du/ mchog sbyin shin tu brnyed dka' ba lha rnams rtags tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu rnams dga' bar 'thob par 'gyur ba de
79a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs pa som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar gyur pa/ dus kun tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ 'jig rten
79a3(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa srung ba'i don du/ thams cad du rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur
79a4(rgyud): lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas/ sbyin bsregs bgyis te/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs sam/ ca com mchis dbyer par na/
79a5(rgyud): zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / grag shul spod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms// rgyas pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur te// thams cad
79a6(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren du ga pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba las// gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang // bkrag pas sdig pa drag shul spyod//
79a7(rgyud): gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i sbyin bsreg ste// gsang sngags bsgrub pa bla na med// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol phyin// sbyin bsreg gyi ni las bgyi'o// me lha lha dang klu dag dang // de bzhin
79a8(rgyud): rig pa 'jig par 'ang 'dug/ khung dgos de la pad+ma'i tshul// pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi// cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi/ pad ma la ni ge sar gyi// gru bzhi'i ni zlum po ste// de lta bu ni brko bar/
79b1(rgyud): bgyi// legs par phyugs shing shin du gnas// shin tu sbas shin tshang la dbab// tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag kyang // shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyis// bkra shis phyag rgya
79b2(rgyud): chen po yi// bzang po gtor ma'i las bgyi'o// gdug pa me tog la sogs pa// bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// thog mar me lha bkug nas ni// de nas sbyin bsregs
79b3(rgyud): las rnams bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa// legs bkrus btsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi// de la 'tshams kyang bcing bar
79b4(rgyud): bgyi// bdag bsrung gtsug gtor bcing ba dang // gzhan bsrung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang // rgyun tu arga'i shing sbar te// dri'i shing rnams nyid dag
79b5(rgyud): dang // mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul ston bgyi// de nas me lha bgug go// oM na ma a ga ni dza la/ ma ha dza la/ dz+yed/ sna ma ha ma na Da/
79b6(rgyud): sarba bid a hUM ti/ pra hU~M ti/ rag ni rang d+hu naM dza la/ d+hu ma sha sa la/ a rtsi sha mu kha ti shwA/ rasmi d+ha ba a ga ni shwa bi ru/ sha na mu khan te/ sarba d+he ba na/ sarba yak+Sha ma hA
79b7(rgyud): r+ya ma ha dza pa/ ma ha pa la nir/ ma rin shan/ sarba d+ha ha na pra phul la/ a ka sha sa mug ga tu gras shA/ a ba bra sang ka shan man Da la bu dzi to// ma ni ta sarba di ba bya ru pa/ ba sha rad/
79b8(rgyud): a ba ha na/ sarbad tra gan/ de ba h+ya ta/ shan hu ta/ ma si bi d+ha ma ka na/ an d+ha ka ran mug ta ra/ shrI na pri yang gu gan d+ha ba la ha ra/ ra sa ra sa/ a gra dza/ bug s+phu mu ti b+ha
80a1(rgyud): sh+na sh+tsa/ s+thi ta ban dzi bi na/ pri yo b+ha sh+ma sush+ma b+ha ste bash+ma ba sta ni/ se ba kam/ b+ha sma ban tsad+ha na di/ t+ya na d+hu ma ma gu la/ dza ya se/ pra ka srid d+ha ra/ sa pra
80a2(rgyud): sarba dza tra/ nir ma ri sha No// ning h+ya s+thid Sh+TA na mun tsa sid+d+ha tri sha/ ba ba no d+he ba ag ni/ mu kha de ba te/ a ru tsa ru/ dza ba la ba d+ha/ ka ma ha na ta/ a tha ba ra no/ de ba de ban bi sha ra da/
80a3(rgyud): a yan tu/ sad shi g+h+ra ka ra ma sa d+ha ya/ tad d+ha ta/ oM ma dza la dza la/ tiSh+Tha sa man/ hu ru hu ru/ hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'di ni lan bdun du bzlas nas/ me ni bgug
80a4(rgyud): par bgyi/ gu gul yungs kar mar sbyang ba/ sbyar bdun sbar bas me la dbul/ mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang // de bzhin spar bas sbar bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang // bdug
80a5(rgyud): pa rgya chen dbul bar bgyi/ de bzhin 'bras bu sbar bas dbul// de nas chab kyi gsang ba bgyi// ji ltar snod rnams rims bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags
80a6(rgyud): 'chang gis su// sbyin bsreg las ni yang ngag tsam// dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang / klag sha u dum ba ra dang // sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang // kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang / pad+ma u du ba la
80a7(rgyud): thang shing // de bzhin dri d+ha'i tsan dan dang // byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang // de bzhin gshegs gang dri ba de'i shing // 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang // sha mi zhi ba'i las lags
80a8(rgyud): pas// mchod yod de bzhin gtsang dag dang // de dag gi me sbar nas// sbyin bsreg gyi ni las bgyi'o// 'bras yos tsan dan phye ma dang // a ka ru dang du ru ka/ kun tu ru la sogs pa dang /
80b1(rgyud): rba du ru kar bcas smi ka dang // spang spos pri yang ku blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar bsreg shing // mar mar mar sar lhan cig badzi// dzin yod rgyal po gsang sngags ni/
80b2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas mo la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin bsreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / nam byed
80b3(rgyud): na me lha dang gi gzugs 'bar ba shin du gnas pa la langs nas/ phyogs bcur blta zhing kun tu btags nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba brtsol bar
80b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin bsreg kyi cho ga grub kyis/ mchog slongs shig dang thams
80b5(rgyud): cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci lta bu 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi ste/ ci ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad rtsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags
80b6(rgyud): 'chang gis mchod yon gyi bsnod dbul bar zhing / gtor ma dbul ba'i las kyang bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang sres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gi sbyin bsreg
80b7(rgyud): bgyi zhing 'bras bu'i shing sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus
80b8(rgyud): phyed tsam byung nas/ dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis
81a1(rgyud): @na mkha' la phur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// na mkha'i
81a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal bcu tshun chad kyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal por cho ga bzhi mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha don
81a3(rgyud): du gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te snod mi lan na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ char g.yos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
81a4(rgyud): gi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang legaso legs so// rig sngags 'chang khyod
81a5(rgyud): kyis sprin bsreg kyi sbyin pa de bsgrub zin gyis mchog slongs shig dang / sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa/ de'i tshe thams cad
81a6(rgyud): rtsol bar bgyid do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la rtsol bar bgyid do//
81a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas/ zas kyi gong du bza' bar bgyi'o// 'tshal ba tsam gyi mdo la na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// lus sam me'i snying
81a8(rgyud): po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i rig sngag 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i tshe
81b1(rgyud): gzhib mo'i rgyal lo// / bam po drug pa'o// gang gi'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor
81b2(rgyud): los bsgyur ba rnams kyi/ rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ba dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi
81b3(rgyud): gzhal med khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi zhal med khang dang tshal dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa/ me tog 'bras
81b4(rgyud): bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa/ kha cig ni gser gyi me tog kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/ kha cig ni rin po che sna
81b5(rgyud): 'dun las byung ba'i me tog dag go// gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs brtsol ba dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / lcug me tog dang / ta la dang / g+han d+ha bar
81b6(rgyud): shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yul ti ka dang / ta ra na dang / ku ba bya ka'i me tog dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / skyed modado 'tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang
81b7(rgyud): gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / rdzing b+ha'i tsan
81b8(rgyud): dan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos legs
82a1(rgyud): par brgyan pa'i chab gser gyi bye ma dang phye legs par brdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i tshogs dang /
82a2(rgyud): dri za'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rigs 'dzin dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing lha'i 'byor
82a3(rgyud): pa'i gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas nas thams cad du brtse bar bgyid pa dga' bar bgyid pa/ dga' mgu spyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug
82a4(rgyud): pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do/ de bzhin grub pa
82a5(rgyud): bla na med pa chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong du
82a6(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i cho ga shin du brnyed par bka' lags so// phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lhan cig 'grogs
82a7(rgyud): nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan par thob par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong
82a8(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
82b1(rgyud): 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil
82b2(rgyud): 'khor 'di kha don du gnas par 'gyur legs so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas/ rtag par rgyun du mchis par 'gyur ro// lha dang klu dang /
82b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi gnas
82b4(rgyud): kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang de'i phyir bzhin du rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna
82b5(rgyud): tshogs dag lhun gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs
82b6(rgyud): pa sbyin bsreg kyi cho ga don yod pa'i bsgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te bskal pa chung ngu ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
82b7(rgyud): dpa' sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la/ des snod de blangs pa tsam gyis mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// /
82b8(rgyud): reg pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnams kyis nyon mongs par mi
83a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ mi mdza' ba dang / bdun pa dang thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig
83a2(rgyud): rten dang yid dag gi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang /
83a3(rgyud): bu mo dang / sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tshig brtsan zhing don yod la thob par 'gyur ro// 'gul ba'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams
83a4(rgyud): cad gzigs shing bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dran pa shin du nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dus bgyis nas
83a5(rgyud): bskal ba mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// pad ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchis par
83a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur te/ phyir yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
83a7(rgyud): kyi zhing du rtag tu mchis par 'gyur ro// bral bar thig le bgyis na/ thams cad du mi mda' bar 'gyur ro// me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis/ rang gi gzugs kyis
83a8(rgyud): mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad gsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod dgongs pa bsgrub par 'tshal ni/ rig sngags 'chang des
83b1(rgyud): 'bras bu dang kul ma shar bsres ste/ bsgral bsgongs nas mar dang 'bru mar dang / sha kar dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis te/ bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis ste/ de'i 'og
83b2(rgyud): tu shing ka ra bi ri'i me sbar nas/ rgongs re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ me'i nang du sbyin bsreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs
83b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi yungs kar dang / me tog ji snyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o// 'bras
83b4(rgyud): yos dang / yungs kar la khro ba'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas mes dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis
83b5(rgyud): pa'i gnod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas/ rig sngags 'chang la rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po longs
83b6(rgyud): shig ces stobs par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgoms pa'i snod de blangs par bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam gyi nas bcud kyis len par gyur nas/ nam mkha' la phur
83b7(rgyud): par 'gyur nas/ skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// lpags pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
83b8(rgyud): 'chang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ me lha gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis
84a1(rgyud): nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsgrags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro//
84a2(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim par bye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo
84a3(rgyud): mtha' dag rdzogs par kha don du gnas pa/ 'di nyin cig bzhin sho lo ka stong klag gam 'chang bar bgyid na/ tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma/
84a4(rgyud): la rdzus te skyes nas/ skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyuraro//
84a5(rgyud): mchod pa chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis nas mi bda' bar gyur nas/ 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po thamam cad dbang du gyur nas/ gnas
84a6(rgyud): kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na/ bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa ste na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
84a7(rgyud): mchog dang ldan par rnyed nas/ yun rnying po che zhing yid gzhungs pa dang mkhas pa dang / bstan chos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas skye
84a8(rgyud): bo 'bul zas stsal bar 'tshal na 'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang mar bcom sbyangs par shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bkrung shing / don yod zhags pa'i snying
84b1(rgyud): po'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi ste/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig pa snod kyi nang nas
84b2(rgyud): byung nas/ 'o thug gi nang du stsal to// de nas char bgos te/ thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bur bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras
84b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang /
84b4(rgyud): dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med ma/ khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slong mo pa rnams
84b5(rgyud): la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o// ci tsam du skye bo tsa 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang / snod de bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon zhing / de bas nyung bar mi 'gyur ro// /
84b6(rgyud): gang dag zas dag 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang chod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra
84b7(rgyud): thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin/ srin po'i 'jigs pa
84b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro lha lhar mnyen cing snyan la/ dga' bar bgyid pa mi ma yin pa'i dbyangs su 'gyu ro// /
85a1(rgyud): rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de yang dag pa 'gyur ro// che rjes nas bde 'dra
85a2(rgyud): thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i thug pas lhung zed bkang nas/ de nas mthon por bla gab med par dkyil 'khor ste/ dkyil 'khor snyed du bzhags nas/ phyogs bcu'i de
85a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de 'bul bar bgyi'o// phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo ga ga'i bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de
85a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang / lha'i 'o thug gi lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan
85a5(rgyud): dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/
85a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lha zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis stabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
85a7(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rigs sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon
85a8(rgyud): spungs nas skal pa dang mthun par tshe 'di nyid dang gzhan du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po'i gser gi 'byor par 'gyur ro// mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos
85b1(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lha 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyi
85b2(rgyud): de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi
85b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis ste/ gtsang ma'i gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad
85b4(rgyud): sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// sgron shing dang / a rga'i shing gi yams sregs shing me sbar bar bgyi'o// sbyin bsregs lan stong brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'o
85b5(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du bgyis nas/ klu'i
85b6(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad gnas pa dang / 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub lngar bgyis na/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyini dang / srin po dang /
85b7(rgyud): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi lags pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas dbang du gyur nas mchis par
85b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ nub 'dun du bgyis na/ rigs 'dzin thams cad dbang gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ chub thams cad du bgyis ma/ brgya byin lasogs ste/ su
86a1(rgyud): lAmra dren shing gis
86a2(rgyud): @bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tsho gas thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i
86a3(rgyud): bar du bsnyen bskur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro// zla ba nya nas brtsams te/ mar gyi ngos tshes nyi shu gsum 'am/ gnam stong gi bar du/ dus gsum du/ lan nyi shu
86a4(rgyud): rtsa gcig sbyin bsregs bgyis la/ arga'i shing gis me sbar nas/ gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du mchis nas/
86a5(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legaso// nga mnyes par byas kyis/ rags sngags 'chang smos
86a6(rgyud): shig dang / mchog sbyin te/ gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter smras pa 'am/ nor sbyar ba smras pa 'am/ zhing smras pa 'am/ na mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang
86a7(rgyud): bar bya ba 'am/ bsang sngags smras pa 'am/ cho ga zhib mo grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po nyid dam/ g.yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug
86a8(rgyud): po nyid dam/ grong brdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thob pa 'am/ ba glang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru thob pa
86a9(rgyud): de dag thams cad sbyin no// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa 'am/ gzungs thob pa 'am/ phyag rgya dang /
86b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa 'am/ nor bslang ba 'am/ rigs 'dzin grub pa nyid dang / ral gri'i rigs 'dzin nyid dam/ na mkha'i rigs
86b2(rgyud): 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyal ba de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags
86b3(rgyud): 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa/ de dag thams cad stsal bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mdo la/ dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi
86b4(rgyud): ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// pad ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas rdzus te/ pad ma las
86b5(rgyud): skyes nas/ skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i
86b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar
86b7(rgyud): du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la tu'i sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des kha zas la tu'i stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas
86b8(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo
87a1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas la tu mar dang sres te sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// shin tu dri zhim pa'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyang
87a2(rgyud): tshang ba dang / me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas/ snod lha'i la tus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te/ khye'u de'i la gtor
87a3(rgyud): to// khye'u des rigs sngags 'chang la smras pa/ ribs sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer/ rigs sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des
87a4(rgyud): smras pa/ rigs sngags 'chang snod kyi la tu khyer cig dang / me 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi cho ga yin no// rigs
87a5(rgyud): sngags 'chang long shig 'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de blangs te/ khye'u la yang khyed kyis khro bo'i grogs gyis shig/
87a6(rgyud): ces brjod par bgyi'o// khye'us smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe gu gul dang / tsan dan lhan cig
87a7(rgyud): bsregs la/ mar dang yungs kar du sbyangs nas/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ a rka'i shing gi me sbar ro// sbyin bsregs bgyis pa tsam gyis/ tsa tsam
87a8(rgyud): gyi mod la/ bdag bkug pas mdo la mchis nas/ de dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gi sa la tu de la reg pa bgyis
87b1(rgyud): nas/ na mkha' la mchis rig sngags 'chang gis rigs sngags 'chang thams cad zil gnon par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur
87b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad lha'i skal pa drug khrir
87b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ la tu lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ don yong rgyal
87b4(rgyud): po khro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge slong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang bud dang / khye'u dang / bu mo/
87b5(rgyud): thams cad la stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur ro// slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ci srid du lhung bzed du la tu mchis
87b6(rgyud): pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de srid du skye bo 'bru mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang gtugs par mi 'gyur ro// la tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod
87b7(rgyud): bgyis nas/ de'i 'og tu reg pa de yang gser bzang por 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs na/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar
87b8(rgyud): gtugs pa'i klu'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par gyur te/ sgon char mi 'bab pa'i sgo ba bzhin chang 'bebs par bgyid do// ci sgo ba bzhin bgyid
88a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na sgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gums par bgyi'o// rlung dang drang ba dang / tsha ba dang / gser ba thams
88a2(rgyud): cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do// phug gi sgor la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phug gi sgor bsnun na bug gi sgor thams cad phye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor
88a3(rgyud): dang gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir phyung nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas/ bsgo ba
88a4(rgyud): bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// nags tshang tshing dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas/ sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun
88a5(rgyud): na mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la ldan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs nas/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas
88a6(rgyud): kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thaMd sgren mor gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar
88a7(rgyud): sgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// rma ma byung ba'i ri mo'i dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la/ la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis su la tu stsal/
88a8(rgyud): la gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas/ dbang bdun nas/ ci dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang
88b1(rgyud): lo legs pa dang / lo rnangs pa dang / nad dang gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams
88b2(rgyud): kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar smra bar 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ tshe ring ba 'am che thung
88b3(rgyud): basmra bar 'gyur ro/ dus ma lags par 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor sbyar ba'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam sgra
88b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// mig 'phrul 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'
88b5(rgyud): la mchi ba 'am/ mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / rims mngags pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ sgyu ma thams
88b6(rgyud): cad smra bar 'gyur ro// nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro// 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas/ bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro//
88b7(rgyud): de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis chab kyis khang stsal la/ la tu blangs nas ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i snun na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i
88b8(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams/
89a1(rgyud): cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing / nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la tu la lan
89a2(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par gsal na/ dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro//
89a3(rgyud): la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khum pa'i nang du stsal te/ mtshan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste/ ci tsam du bsrel ba de srid du mi ganga' bar gyur
89a4(rgyud): nas/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang na gcig gam 'bab chu gcig pa ral tu khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dbang /
89a5(rgyud): bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod dgur sgyur ma thams cad dbang du gyur pas mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis
89a6(rgyud): nas/ yongasu spyod pa dang / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen
