89a7(rgyud): po'i gtsug tu bzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/ chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha'
89a8(rgyud): 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ mngag bzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nag po chen po'i lte ba'i
89b1(rgyud): phyogs su bzhag na/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
89b2(rgyud): bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te// khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba bgyis na/ ci srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa srid
89b3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems
89b4(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan
89b5(rgyud): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gis rigs sngags 'chang de'i yon tan skyongs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khro bo'i
89b6(rgyud): rgyal pos dbang bskur la/ lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me thabs kyis 'tshams bcings par bgyi'o// de nas arka yam pasreg shing gis
89b7(rgyud): me sbar la/ lat+na daM me thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang / yungs kar dang zho dang / sbrang rtsi bsres nas/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// lam
89b8(rgyud): brgya rtsa bcad sbyin pa dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs byung nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la sbas pa rigs sngags 'chang legs legs so// bdag tshim
90a1(rgyud): par byas so// bdag dga' bar gyur to/ rigs sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang ci ltar
90a2(rgyud): yid la bsams shing / 'dod pa smros shig dang mchog sbyin no// rigs sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyis ste/ me
90a3(rgyud): lha des kyang thams cad stsol cing / dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs nas/
90a4(rgyud): 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnam grangs bzhin du gsel bar 'gyur to chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no// lag pas me rnams tshig par bgyid do// 'bar bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor
90a5(rgyud): bzhag nas/ skra nyag ma gcig kyang tshig par mi bgyid de/ me'i nang du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du ga yar gyi nang du bsre na/ cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi
90a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lus la 'bab na ci ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// gos kyi tha mar thum por
90a7(rgyud): bgyis ni tshig par mi 'gyur ro// chab kyi nang du stsal na 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// sbyin bsregs thams cad cho ga so so'i gzugasu mchis par 'gyur ro thams cad dgos
90a8(rgyud): pa 'grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// ngogs pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der/ dgos pa 'grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang /
90b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga grub pa thams cad lung 'bog par 'gyur ro// du ba dang rlung dang me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro//
90b2(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du bsgrub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod me 'bar ba// bla med
90b3(rgyud): 'bar bzang bsgrub 'tshal na// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang // gzi brjid nyi ma dang ma nyams pas// phyogs bcu kho ra khor yug gi// kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid//
90b4(rgyud): bsgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // mchod pa bla na med par 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor bsgyur smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs pa// grub pa
90b5(rgyud): bla na med pa lags// ci ltar nyin bzhin mtshan 'da' bas// nyin bar gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig dgos pa bsgrub pa na// legs par las bgyis nor bu dang // rdzas
90b6(rgyud): bsregs legs par bgyis pa la// gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas spyad pa bsgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang me dang ni// me'i shing rnams brjod par bgyi//
90b7(rgyud): me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams cad gcig yungs pa'i// yams bsreg cho ga bla na med// tsan dan dang ni seng lteng dang // pa ta ka ra bi ra dang // a rka
90b8(rgyud): sha mi smyug ma dang // shing sha ka rna ka ri dang // 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing // smag sha dang ni snam dang // g+ha d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi/ rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas// pad+ma dkar
91a1(rgyud): po ku mu ta// ud pal me tog lo ma rtsa// birdza bu ri ba la ba shing // sin d+hu bi ri tsam pa ka/ dri ma bi rtswa mar rnge rtsa// sa ha ba la tsi tra ka/
91a2(rgyud): shing d+he kun ka bsdus pa yi// yam bsreg shing gis las bgyis te// yungs dkar ma ra dang zho dang no// sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin bsreg bgyi// bzang pos zas las bsrang
91a3(rgyud): gsum dang // mtshal las nyis 'gyur kar kus kyang // srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste// de dag bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams dang //
91a4(rgyud): de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhi ga dag ni bkang nas su// me thab dbus su bzhug par bgyi// sbyin bsreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal ba/
91a5(rgyud): gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi// gos 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis dgos pas bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu
91a6(rgyud): nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin bsregs bgyid// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang ba dang // de nas lha'i bshos gtor ma dang // me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod// /
91a7(rgyud): dbul te 'o mas bdag ma 'gus// 'o mas zhig zhi bar bgyid// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas/ yungs kar gyis bsnan
91a8(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// khro bos rgyal pos// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis
91b1(rgyud): zhig de la mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas zangs kyi sgo bu 'am// dngul gyi sbom bur ni gi nor bu de blangs nas/ sgrom bu der bzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin nor
91b2(rgyud): bu ci lta ba bzhin du/ 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba/ mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nyin mo na
91b3(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe de nor bu ci bzhag na/ mched pa dang bsregs pa dang / mched pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/
91b4(rgyud): nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe/ thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ sreg blags kyis sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams kyi thams cad du dgos
91b5(rgyud): pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur// g.yul do chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dbul po legs khar khrus bgyis pa gos
91b6(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang gos char bsdams pas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag nas/ gcig po g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs nas/
91b7(rgyud): de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams 'phams par gyur nas/ phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas/
91b8(rgyud): 'byed par 'gyur ro/ phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol dgra dang mi 'dza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung
92a1(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// lag pa nor bu bzung nas/ phyag gi gan su zhug na gnas kyi sgo thams cad dbye bar 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun na mchis
92a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas thams cad mchis nas/ lag pas nor bu bzung ste/ gnas kyi nang du zhugs nas/ chab thams cad kyi phyir mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams
92a3(rgyud): mdun na mchis nas bden par dam 'cha bar 'gyur ro// dbang du gyur nas ji srid mtsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// lo thog dang / rtswa dang
92a4(rgyud): shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// snyan cing ma dngangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang
92a5(rgyud): ldan pa dang / mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis kyang lo thog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan
92a6(rgyud): ches mang po dag gi dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ro// nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so// de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas/ 'phags
92a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugs su lta bar 'tshal na/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang ma bla glo bAr+ya bya'o// lus legs par khrus te/ spos chab kyis
92a8(rgyud): byug par bgyi'o// shing arka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar bar bgyi'o// yungs kar dang / a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba'i stong rtsa brgyad sbyin
92b1(rgyud): bsregs bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyus 'gus pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bsreg blugs kyi sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis
92b2(rgyud): mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ci ltar yid la bgyid cing / bsams pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags
92b3(rgyud): 'chang gi ci ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas mig sman
92b4(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs par khrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub cig snyung ba bgyi ste/ des zangs kyi za ma tog
92b5(rgyud): bgyis la/ de zhes smig sman so'i ba ri dang / yung kar nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ thab kyi dbus su bzhag par bgyi'o//
92b6(rgyud): de'i steng du ur shing ra dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// shing arka'i me sbar bar
92b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la/ rtun gyi steng du legs par zhib par btags la/ ldong ros dang / ga phur dang / bla rtsir bsres nas/ slar
92b8(rgyud): yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod snying po'i rigs sngags rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams
93a1(rgyud): cad 'gugs pa legs pa sbyar ste/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgyas bcing ngo //
93a2(rgyud): de nas mig sman gyis byugs na/ na mkha' la 'phur nas rigs sngags thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho
93a3(rgyud): bar yang 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// dmig la skras te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i
93a4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// mchod pa phal po cher mchod 'gyur ro// nor 'du ba chen po 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa'i dus sam
93a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyis kyang bgegs bgyid par mi
93a6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bde ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs de skye
93a7(rgyud): po mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang lhab lhub dang / rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro// bud med kyang mi 'dzum par
93a8(rgyud): lha bzhin du 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na/ chom po dang g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan zan bdug pa dang / sbrul dang dbyig dug dang / sbrul gyi dug/
93b1(rgyud): gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad la mig la bskus na smra/
93b2(rgyud): pa rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// g.yul dor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas/ mig la byugs na thams cad las brgyal bar 'gyur zhing
93b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro// 'dug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na bdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rims zhag gcig pa dang /
93b4(rgyud): zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na rims thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dug mi zad pa 'tshal ba la mig
93b5(rgyud): la bskus na/ dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyi zil pa la mig la bskus na/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar par 'gyur ro//
93b6(rgyud): mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// glad pa phyed po 'tshal ba las yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'tshangs pa srin
93b7(rgyud): po'i gnod pa dang / brjed byed kyis zin pa la bskus pa tsam gyi mod par 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pas bsad par 'os pa gang yang rung ba khrid pa mig la bskus pa tsam
93b8(rgyud): gyis/ 'jigs pa thams cad spangs shing thar bar 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na/ rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol
94a1(rgyud): #zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo'i mig bskus te/
94a2(rgyud): mig mi 'dzams par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ dpal lha me chen mo mchis nas/ dgos pa thams cad dang 'bru rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro//
94a3(rgyud): nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na/ rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gzugs mthong bar
94a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// mig la bskus te tshogs kyi nang du zhugs na mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro//
94a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na/ rtag tu lta bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu lta bar 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'gi wang dang lhan cig sbyar
94a6(rgyud): te/ mig la bskus te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ dbang phyug rgya chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro// don chen po 'grub
94a7(rgyud): par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo dang / blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal
94a8(rgyud): lha mo'i chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig tu bskus na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing // las bgyis pa tsam mchis shing thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis
94b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi bkral ba dang mig la bslus na/ gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar
94b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyi zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad gshig
94b3(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// bkres pas mig la bskus te/ grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis grub cing
94b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te/ bsod snyoms la mchis nas kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yon phal mo cho 'thob par 'gyur ro// skye ba dang
94b5(rgyud): ling tog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang / mtshan mo 'thon pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig sleb po de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas
94b6(rgyud): mig nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha'i mig dag pa bzangs dang mtshungs pa/ 'dab bzad kyis mthong ba thob nas/ thams cad snying du bdug pa dang dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang /
94b7(rgyud): don grub pa yang thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / brgyan dang / brgyan 'chang ba thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
94b8(rgyud): don yod me'i lha dgug pa'i sbyin bsregs pargya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// don kun grub pas mod la ni/ khams rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug skal pa phun sum tshogs// mod nyid kha nar stsol bar
94b9(rgyud): sgrub pa can gyi bla na med//
95a1(rgyud): @/ ni/ 'gyur bar the tshom mi bgyi zhing // yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang / legs par bkrus pas bsgrub po// sbyin bsreg bla na med 'phel ba//
95a2(rgyud): 'di ni chen bsam mi khyab// ka nar rtsa ba sdong por bcas// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/ arka'i shing dang skrag shing gi/ yam sreg dag gis me sbar ba// sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos
95a3(rgyud): til dang yungs kar dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // yungs mar ngag dang bsres pa yis// sbyin bsregs stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyi// khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi dbang bskur ba chang ba dang / de nas
95a4(rgyud): don yod lcags kyu'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ gu gul dang skye tshe 'bras bu dang / mar sbyar bas sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang /
95a5(rgyud): gtung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos sna tshogs dang / lhab lbu ba dang / brgyan 'chang ba dang / me tog
95a6(rgyud): dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi 'byor pa chen po thob par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes
95a7(rgyud): brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas/ mig la bskus te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag
95a8(rgyud): rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la sman gyis bskus na/ na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mig sman grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi btso bo'i rgyal pos 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//
95b1(rgyud): skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'dis mig byugs na/ nyin mo ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur ro// mi 'da' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang gnod
95b2(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po gnas thams cad du zhugs na/ thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po bden pa/ sgrib sman 'di'i mig la byugs nas ma
95b3(rgyud): mo'i gan su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzum par blta bar bgyis la/ kho bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang / gtso bo'i lha thams cad mdun du mchis nas/
95b4(rgyud): mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad 'grub pa bgyis pas mchis par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongasu bskor cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro//
95b5(rgyud): rtag par rgyun du bsrungs pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'gi wa nga bsgrub pa'i cho ga sbyin bsreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyis te/ don yod rgyal po
95b6(rgyud): bsgrub pa yis// rigs sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing // lha dang lha min mchod pa dang // bsgrub pa'i don kun grub pa dang // dbang du gyur pa dam pa dang // mkha' la mchis pa'i dam pa dang //
95b7(rgyud): mi snang shin du brnyed dka' dang // mod la phyag tu 'jug pa dang // nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang // ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang // thang dag tu ni rgyu ba dang / klu gnas mtshe ru 'jug pa dang / de bzhin
95b8(rgyud): chu klub che bsgral ba dang // rdzu 'phrul 'grub pa bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig dang sgrib kun dang // nad kun zhi bar gyur pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul
96a1(rgyud): las rgyal 'gyid de// nag tu sgo kun grag par bgyid// gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing // rims nad thams cad bzlog par bgyid// sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jigs par bgyid// sdig thams
96a2(rgyud): cad nyams par bgyid// dbang phyug stsol cing bskal pa stsol// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid// 'thab dang 'thab mo rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar byed// bcings pa dang ni shing sgrog dang /
96a3(rgyud): khong sgri la lcags sgrogs phye mar rlog/ rgyal po gdug pa 'khros pa yis// bsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid// da lhar 'di la brten pa na// mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing // ma bde kun las grol
96a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas kun mchis par 'os// lus can snying du nag tu sdug/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu snang chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyin dang
96a5(rgyud): ni/ rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // bud med kun dang de bzhin du// skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi// rtag tu gnas chen dag tu 'gyur// 'gi wang bla na med pa 'di// 'di yang dag nag brten pa// 'phags pa'i 'jidzin/
96a6(rgyud): rten dbang phyug ste// mchod sbyin nag tu mchod par bgyi'o// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshang du bsrung ba dang // rtag tu mchod stsol phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha ni mang po
96a7(rgyud): dang rnga klu'i rgyal po mthu chen dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang // grul bum mi min lho 'phye che// dri za lha min nyid dag dang // nam mkha' lding dang mthu chen po// de dag thams cad bsrung ba yi//
96a8(rgyud): chadadu du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur// 'gi wang bla na med pa yi// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba yis// gtsang 'gyur lag
96b1(rgyud): par khrus bgyis na// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos he// 'gi wa ba legs par bsgrubs su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyang la// zangs kyi snod du bkang
96b2(rgyud): nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du/ sgong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas// phyag dar gyis ni kha dgam mo// de nas seng lteng gi shing dang a kau' shing gis me sbar la/
96b3(rgyud): 'bras yos/ yongs kur dang / bu gul dang / 'bras dang / hil dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar du bsres he/ lan sgong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// lan sgong rtsa brgyad
96b4(rgyud): tshad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me 'dag phra mo yang zhi ba dang / thal ba blangs zhe snod kyi nang du stsal na/ de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos
96b5(rgyud): dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis na na mkha' la 'phur nas rigs sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal
96b6(rgyud): po'i 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// skra cu zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// lo dgu khri dgu stong
96b7(rgyud): du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gnas thams cad du zhugs na/
96b8(rgyud): gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
97a1(rgyud): @po'i mthu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// mig la bskus
97a2(rgyud): na ji ltar nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing / thams cad du gter ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// sa'i phug dang / thang gi sgo 'byed pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// thang gi nang du zhugs nas thang gi
97a3(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad bgyid de/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ khyim dang / gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che thams
97a4(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// chab la gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi
97a5(rgyud): khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag la byugs te/ g.yul dor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ ya lad dang / gtsang bgos pa bzhin du mthong
97a6(rgyud): nas/ sems can las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khar ba srel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
97a7(rgyud): gang la tshig smras pa de thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang la blangs pa de thams cad gter bar 'gyur ro// gang la bgos pa de thams cad bgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyu ro//
97a8(rgyud): 'khar mchis nas gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro//
97b1(rgyud): lag g.yas pa la byugs na su la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug
97b2(rgyud): pa rnams dbang du gyur nas/ bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// 'dzub mo g.yas pa la bskas na/ ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te/
97b3(rgyud): bsdigs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig 'khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon
97b4(rgyud): sum du bstan pas/ ha cang char che ba bcod par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i 'thil la byugs na/ klu gnas pa'i 'tsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/
97b5(rgyud): de'i mdo la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po btong bar 'gyur ro// mod le char pa mi 'bab na/ de'i tshe lan lnga brdabs pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyan btong bar
97b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe char mi 'bab pa de tshe/ klu thams cad la glad pa'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te lan bdun bsnun na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug
97b7(rgyud): bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis rigs phung bar 'gyur ro// gdon gyi zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus nas/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgya khri bzhi
97b8(rgyud): stong rab du zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims kyi thems pa rnams kyi dpral bar thig le bgyid na/ rims nyin cig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams
98a1(rgyud): cang zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa rnams la 'khrus bgyis na modo las nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// sha bkra dang mdze dang /
98a2(rgyud): rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// lba ba dang lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / shu ba 'tshed pa dang / 'brum bu za
98a3(rgyud): mo mched pa la byugs tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// 'dug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi bdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal
98a4(rgyud): ba tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro// lto ba na ba dang / sman pa na/ dmu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsigs logs na ba dang / chu son pa dang / gzhang na ba dang / tshad pa na ba dang /
98a5(rgyud): gcin srin pa dang / gsus pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug bskams la bsres na 'tshal ba tsam gyis mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par mi
98a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshogs mar 'ga'i wang gi ri lu bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas/ lag pa yang byugs te/ mgo la thal mos brdabs na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par
98a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgyegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun
98a8(rgyud): na mchis par 'gyur ro// dgos pa bsgrub pa chen pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na/ me ltar rang gi gzugs kyis mdun
98b1(rgyud): du mchis nas/ lag pa nas bzung ste/ rigs sngags 'chang la rigs sngags 'chang bdag gis gzhal med khang gi nang du zhugs shig/ rigs sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o//
98b2(rgyud): zhes smras pa na/ de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chad gyis bgyi ba ci tsam mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// brla
98b3(rgyud): gnyis la byugs na/ tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'gyur ro// byin pa la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol du rgal bar 'gyur ro// 'grin pa la byugs nas nams khung du bzhugs na nags
98b4(rgyud): khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas/ sman gyi rdzas thams cad kyi rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o// 'gi wang gi ri lu bgyis te/ khar sil
98b5(rgyud): nas ri sul dang / sman shong du zhugs nas/ skad drag po lan gsum 'don par bgyis te/ ci 'tshal ba blang bar bgyi'o// ri la dang sman shong gi gsang bas bsgo ba dag la legs par 'bye bar
98b6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / de nas gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad bgyid do// de rang rtsa dang na shing gel ba dang / nags
98b7(rgyud): tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa de dag rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la bcud bsrung ba de dag gi gzugs kyi mdun
98b8(rgyud): na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams dang /
99a1(rgyud): yid la bsams shing rnams pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la grub par 'gyur ro// lho la thig le bgyis na/ kha zas dang / btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad
99a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na/ ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// rgal
99a3(rgyud): tshigs la byugs na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i lam dang bstan 'thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba labyugs na/ gnad dam/ gnad rnams kyi gnas su phyugs na/ ji ltar bsams pa'i brgyan dang /
99a4(rgyud): lha lhub 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jug to la byugs na rta'i zhon pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'gi wang gi ri lu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying bzlas
99a5(rgyud): nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong glags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin nyi 'gyur du bgyis zhing bklags nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis 'thos pa
99a6(rgyud): mang por 'gyur ro// zhag bcu bzhir bgyis na/ mi 'am ci mu mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na/ thos pa bsams pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro//
99a7(rgyud): ka la bing ga'i dbyangs lhar snyan zhing ba'i snyan la rno ba'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// bu'i ched mar dang lan cig brtsal na/ bya rog lta bu dang / mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro//
99a8(rgyud): brtson rar brtsal na/ shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrogs dang / gtan pa dang khong sgril ba la byugs la/ byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// mthor bar 'gyur ro//
99b1(rgyud): tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcu bzhi'am/ tshes bco lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas na/ khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas/ 'gi wang gi ri lu dang / spos chab bsres
99b2(rgyud): bas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi modado la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'gyur ro/ nub gsum du khrus bgyis na/ gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya
99b3(rgyud): dang / bsgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phas kyis rgol ba dang / mi 'dza' ba dang / bdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//
99b4(rgyud): lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyis thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// phyis lan 'ga' yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// 'gi wang gi til
99b5(rgyud): mar bsres te/ kha gdong la byugs nas/ rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na sa bu bzhin du pang du 'khyud nas bya dga' ba chen po thob pa dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams
99b6(rgyud): cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus thog thag tu byugs na/ bsod par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur ro// dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// mda'
99b7(rgyud): 'phangs na lus la babs par mi 'gyur ro// 'gi wang gi ri lu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang / ri dang nags tshal tshang tshing gi bgrod dka' bar zhugs na
99b8(rgyud): chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / gcan zan 'dug pa dang / sbrul bdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams
100a1(rgyud): cang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pas la btags la thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
100a2(rgyud): thams cad du mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad mthun mo dang brtson 'grus chen po rtsa ba med pas pha rol zil gyi gnon par 'gyur ro// dpung ba g.yon pa la
100a3(rgyud): btags na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnas chen du 'gyur ro/ thams cad du 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po chen po 'grub par
100a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa la btabs na/ dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du phyin par 'gyur ro// 'gi wang gi ri lu khar bsrel la log pa g.yas yungs gyis don
100a5(rgyud): yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te/ tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas mthon por 'dzegs te/ phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /
100a6(rgyud): bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na/ mod la bkug par 'gyur/ mchis par 'gyur ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam gnas pa zhig na yang /
100a7(rgyud): gdon ma 'tshal bar der zhag gsum gyis mchis par 'gyur ro// yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// lag pa g.yas pa 'am/ lag pa g.yon pa la 'gi wang gi ri lu btags na/
100a8(rgyud): gang du reg par nor bu dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub
100b1(rgyud): de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchis par 'gyur ro/ byan tshang du zhugs nas/ tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na/
100b2(rgyud): 'byed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der mchis par 'gyur ro// spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du mchis na/ tshong khang /
100b3(rgyud): gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na/ chang gi bum pa thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// bang ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs
100b4(rgyud): na 'bru thams cad dgug par 'gyur ro// bcud 'byin pa khyim du zhugs na/ 'khrul 'khor legs par bgyis na/ bu mar gyi khu ba dang / sha kha la'i blag pa thams
100b5(rgyud): cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang du mngag pa 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bdun chab chu la thal mos brdabs na/ grong khyer na gnas
100b6(rgyud): pa thams cad pa nyid sgrogs par 'gyur ro// dgra bo'i sgor btags na/ bskrad par bgyis par 'gyur ro// mtshon tsha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na/ mtshon cha dang / go cha rnams
100b7(rgyud): rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor btags na/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / srin bdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang /
100b8(rgyud): rengs pa dang / rmugs pas bgyid par 'gyur ro// dung la byugs nas bus na/ sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang /
101a1(rgyud): byang dang / dug dang / nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bus na/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mi ngas thams
101a2(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro/ phyugs ltas su bus na/ 'o ma thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ gang du 'tshal ba der mchis par 'gyur ro// ra lug gi ltas su bus na
101a3(rgyud): ra lug gi 'o ma 'breg par 'gyur ro// gang 'tshal ba der mchis par 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus bus na/ thams cad srin mor gyur nas gos thams cad bgug
101a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rdza rdal blugs te 'khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang / gshig par 'gyur te/ tshugs/
101a5(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'khor bas khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro// grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dag tu brdungs na/ gnod dang // yams kyi nad dang /
101a6(rgyud): gnod pa dang / mche ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mings dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa
101a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa rnams pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyi de 'gyur ro// thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o// de nas sems can thams cad dang mthun
101a8(rgyud): mong ba zhi pa dang / rgyas pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyid pa/ mu ge'i
101b1(rgyud): dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod pa dang / brjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rigs
101b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas spos nim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems
101b3(rgyud): kyis mnyam par bzhag cing / sems can thams cad la lhag par skyo ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdung bas sbyin sregs kyi las 'di bgyis te/ arga'i shing dang /
101b4(rgyud): sha ma'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can dang / ci ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yams shIng gis me sbar la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad ma dang / pad
101b5(rgyud): ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres pas sbyin bsregs 'gyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de nas don yod zhags
101b6(rgyud): ba khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings/ de nas sbyin bsreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin mod kho nar/
101b7(rgyud): dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa la mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung pa dang / gzhan gyi
101b8(rgyud): dpung gis 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / gcan zan dang / gdug pa dang /
102a1(rgyud): sbrul dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / bdug pa dang / bcas pa'i srog chags kyis 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi tshugs par
102a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'khor ba khor yug tu rims mi 'gyur ste/ gnod pa ma lags nad kyi ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod pa rnams kyis
102a3(rgyud): mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / skrod pa dang / mnangs
102a4(rgyud): gnod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// shin tu lo legs shing / mdangs dga' la/ skye bo dang / mi mang
102a5(rgyud): pos gang zhing / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang /
102a6(rgyud): shin tu smin pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal tshang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras
102a7(rgyud): bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchis pa'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul de na dge slong dang /
102a8(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nad ma mchis pa
102b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bde bas 'tsho ba dang / yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro// byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang /
102b2(rgyud): gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsgrubs pa'i phyir/ rtag
102b3(rgyud): tu srungs pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgyad 'khor ra khor yug tu bsrungs pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
102b4(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas nas bskyang ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro//
102b5(rgyud): bdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / bsrung ba dang / yongasu skyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyag chen po'i lce'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun
102b6(rgyud): du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po rgyal po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang /
102b7(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul de legs par bsrung ba dang / bzi brjid brtson par 'gyur ro//
102b8(rgyud): dpag tshad gcig 'khor ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongasu bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
103a1(rgyud): bya/ rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bsrung
103a2(rgyud): ba dang / skyab pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur rod/ zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol
103a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems
103a4(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams
103a5(rgyud): cad yongasu bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par byon par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par
103a6(rgyud): rgyun du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrung ba dang / yid kyi
103a7(rgyud): gnas pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang nas yang du lta bar 'gyur ro// de nas sbyin bsreg gi thal ba dang / dri chu sgyu ma bgyis te/
103a8(rgyud): phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na/ 'tshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la thig le
103b1(rgyud): bgyis na/ rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
103b2(rgyud): btson ra na mchis pa dang / phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro// bdug pas zin pa dang / dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na/ bdug
103b3(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// mi dgug pa sbyin bsreg gi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // de nas pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan
103b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po brjod par bgyis te/ 'di ni
103b5(rgyud): ma sgrubs par las brgya stong bgyis par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang / shin tu bkra shis mchog dag la/ legs par khrus bgyi gos gtsang
103b6(rgyud): bgo/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag/ sems can kun la brtse ba dang / snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang / don yod zhags pa rigs sngags 'chang /
103b7(rgyud): grub pa bla med go cha'i rgyal// bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag/ 'grub par bgyid pa som nyi med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag/ de bzhin gang dag
103b8(rgyud): ga brjod na/ lus can drug tumachog sbyin gyi// phyag na pad ma ngab tu gyur// de ltar gang ba'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gnyis la bsod nams phung po
104a1(rgyud): khri phrag bskyed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba stsogs pa dang / sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// srung ba bgyis nas brjod bgyid pa/ dge slong
104a2(rgyud): pha dang dge slong ma/ dge slong ba smos de bzhin du/ bde can du myur du mchi/ sdug bsngal mi bzad mi 'gyur ba'i/ nyon mongs pa las thar par 'gyur/ rtag tu sangs
104a3(rgyud): rgyas byang chub dag/ mthong bar 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas don yod zhags pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyid ste// bzlas brjod
104a4(rgyud): kyi ni las bgyis na// rigs sngags 'chang bas de nyid 'grub/ don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brgyan gyi mdun du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/ gru bzhi 'khor khor yug tu/
104a5(rgyud): mtshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis// gru bzhi lham par thib gdab po// ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag/ dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su gdab// tsan dan dkar pos
104a6(rgyud): bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor tshogs la pa ma dag/ 'dab brgyad gur gum gyis gtor cing / pad ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa'i bum pa ni// spos chab kyis
104a7(rgyud): ni bkang ba yi// yungs dkar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi// a ka ru'i 'dug pa 'bul// bum pa gang ba dgod par bgyi// me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi//
104a8(rgyud): mchod yon snod kyang bzhi bzhag go/ rigs sngags 'chang ba gtsang 'gyur bas// gtsangad ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang //
104b1(rgyud): gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang // dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su// dus sum bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni// don yod zhags pa'i bzlas brjod snying po dag/ dus
104b2(rgyud): gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// mngon gsum dkyil mo dkrung bcas te// bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su// bgrang
104b3(rgyud): 'phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi// 'dzub mo dang ni mthe bo dag/ brgyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi// yid kyis byams pa mnyam par bzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas
104b4(rgyud): lus sdoms par legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta// tshig bzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bya// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mo la// sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro//
104b5(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te// phyag rgya bcings nas sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// sems can
104b6(rgyud): thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i zhags pa mthong bar tsam du bsres la// ci tsam na khro bo'i rgyal
104b7(rgyud): po lan bdun bzlas so// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi don la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral
104b8(rgyud): ba nas// 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / de bzhin du rab tu dga'
105a1(rgyud): bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gan du blta bar bgyis ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la/ bcom
105a2(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong g.yas pa nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig sbyar bar bgyid cing / kun tu leg so//
105a3(rgyud): zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung nas rigs sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas/ lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
105a4(rgyud): pa bye ba phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'jam pa dag shin tu gzhon
105a5(rgyud): sha chags pa dang / mnyen par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil ba dang / mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// / mig yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyu ro// /
105a6(rgyud): lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yong su dag pa dang / mnyer ma dang / skra skye bo yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi
105a7(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// ci tsam du thugs rtse na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ston cing / dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/
105a8(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchis pas mi gda' bar bgyis pa 'am/ lha'i mig thob pa'am/ sangs
105b1(rgyud): srin po dgug pa'am/
105b2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa 'am/ gzugs rab tu thob pa 'am/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa 'am/ gtsugs lag smra ba 'am/
105b3(rgyud): gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba 'am/ nor sgrub smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug
105b4(rgyud): ba 'am/ ku'i gnas su 'jug pa'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa 'am/ ro langs spang ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa'am/ ri la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer
105b5(rgyud): du 'jug pa'am/ sman blta ba'i phyir 'jug pa'am/ ral gri'i rigs sngags 'chang ba nyid dam/ grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang ba nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/
105b6(rgyud): rgyal po thob pa 'am/ yul thob pa 'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dpung chen po rab tu gzhoms pa dang / bskrad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar
105b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dgos po thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// /
105b8(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can dag la sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// mig sman bsgrub par 'tshal bas/ de zla ba
105b9(rgyud): yar gyi ngo'i tshe brgyad la/ ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du
106a1(rgyud): @bzhag te/ legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mdun du dkyil mo dkrung
106a2(rgyud): bcas te/ mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcings pa sa 'tshams bcings par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun
106a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo su yang rung bas 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi snyen gnas la goms
106a4(rgyud): par bgyis nas/ bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la zas kyi snod 'bar ba dang / blangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig
106a5(rgyud): la byugs na nam mkha' la rdzu ni 'phrul gyis mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong
106a6(rgyud): ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// phug gi gnas bye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//
106a7(rgyud): lha'i gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du brtsal ba de mchis par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / mi dang mi yin pa dang /
106a8(rgyud): phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar/ 'babs pa spyan ras
106b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis modado la/
106b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags pa kyi lha'i
106b3(rgyud): cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba yang snang ba zhes bya ba'i
106b4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul thob nas/ tshe'i tshad lha'i skal pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
106b5(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gter gleng ba mdzad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub
106b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsrung ba'i lha'i gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// pad ma'i snang
106b7(rgyud): ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyis pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rang gi lus rdo rje dra ba'i bdag nyid kyi snying por rang bzhin
106b8(rgyud): thob par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des bum pa bkang nas/ lan khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
107a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun na nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi modado la lus rdo rje las 'byung
107a2(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad
107a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam 'am/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod
107a4(rgyud): la gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am/ mi bden pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal pa dang
107a5(rgyud): mi ldan pa 'am/ byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa'i las
107a6(rgyud): thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral ba thams cad 'tshal lam/ thams
107a7(rgyud): cad dbang du gyur nas bzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par bgyid par
107a8(rgyud): 'tshal ba 'am/ don yod ye shes dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal ba'am/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'tshal lam//
107b1(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod
107b2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / ri dgas a ne pa'i lpags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
107b3(rgyud): dkyil mo dkrung 'am/ bgreng ba'i drung na nor bzangs pus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du blta ba/ khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med
107b4(rgyud): kyi dpung rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par btang ste/ ri'i steng gi pad ma'i gdan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos
107b5(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/ nyin zhag cig mchis te/ rigs sngags 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// cha ba dang yungs dkar gyis dbang bskur
107b6(rgyud): bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen po'i gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di lta bu'i yi cho gas mi bgyid na/ bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par
107b7(rgyud): 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi tsho gas lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rigs sngags 'chang gang zhig gang ga'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
107b8(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ blta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems
108a1(rgyud): can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyis par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang
108a2(rgyud): des/ dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen pa dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mo 'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad kyi cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ de ci 'byor pa'i gser
108a3(rgyud): las don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ grwa bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig
108a4(rgyud): bdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o// pad+ma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgreng phreng bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs
108a5(rgyud): mdzes par bgyi'o// spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par rgyan bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// pog por lnga
108a6(rgyud): nas a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// dris dgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog
108a7(rgyud): dang / bdug dang / dri dang / phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/
108a8(rgyud): bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyi mchod
108b1(rgyud): cing / phyag bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang / sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro//
108b2(rgyud): bdag nyid dga' gyur nas/ 'bar bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
108b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas/ legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/
108b4(rgyud): grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rkyang nas rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
108b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i rtse
108b6(rgyud): na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
108b7(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs skye rengs shar ka'i dus su mchis nas/ pad ma dri ma
108b8(rgyud): med pa zhes bya ba'i zhabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// gang du yang rung bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
109a1(rgyud): gzugs mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs te/
109a2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/
109a3(rgyud): rtag par rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
109a4(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po brgyad pa'o// // des ci 'byor pa'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
109a5(rgyud): dbang phyug don yod zhags pa byas la de nas/ zhal shar phyogs su bstan te/ bzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par 'byes pa byas te/ li khris
109a6(rgyud): thig gdab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma bri/ pad ma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba 'brang gar dang / bgreng phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa spos
109a7(rgyud): chus bkang ba me tog ci 'byor pas/ legs par rgyan pa bzhi bzhag la/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi zhing / pog phor lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs
109a8(rgyud): par bya'o// spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar bgyi mar me bltam te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa
109b1(rgyud): pa dang / phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya zhing / 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas la don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcings la/
109b2(rgyud): bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la/
109b3(rgyud): lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dga' bar snango //
109b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu skra ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhing / legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byungango //
109b5(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pa ni dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'dzeg
109b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang la mngon yod zhags pa 'grub
109b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
109b8(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs
110a1(rgyud): kyi mdun du bzhugs te/ pad ma dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// rgyal po 'od dpag
110a2(rgyud): med legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku bstan pa de de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par
110a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha bu rnams rtag tu lus ston par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
110a4(rgyud): mchog thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas
110a5(rgyud): dngul las 'phags bapaspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dri chibs kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya zhing / mchod
110a6(rgyud): yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya'o// me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdug te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o// dri sna bzhi
110a7(rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / 'dug spos kyi snong bzhi bcu bzhag par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ rigs
110a8(rgyud): sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo // bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ dkyil mo dkrungs du 'dug nas lan/
110b1(rgyud): pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo bskyang ba pad ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra
110b2(rgyud): grags par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dag par snang ngo // rgyal po'i blon po dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ming brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad
110b3(rgyud): bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang sgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid bla mar gyur cing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis su bzlas pas/
110b4(rgyud): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo
110b5(rgyud): ba de byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pa 'am/ kau ma dang / zla ba nams
110b6(rgyud): mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma'i lha dang / na mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad ci bgyi zhes bya
110b7(rgyud): ba'i byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas/ klu thams cad dbang du bgyis par 'gyur ro/ rgya mtsho'i klu ba rgyal po dga' bo dang / nyen po la sogs
110b8(rgyud): ba'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro// zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la tsan dan dmar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/
111a1(rgyud): @me tog dmar po bkram la/ bdug pos kyi snod bzhin sa bdug pa bya zhing / mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam la bzhag par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi
111a2(rgyud): bzhag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bya'o//
111a3(rgyud): ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bar
111a4(rgyud): bya'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po yid la bya zhing / snying rje'i
111a5(rgyud): sems kyis lta bar bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// phyag rgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grags par 'gyur la/ dmyal ba'i sems can de dag
111a6(rgyud): thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing / bcom pa dang / thal bar rlog par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro
111a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang mtshan bzang pos
111a8(rgyud): brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ sa'i 'og gi
111b1(rgyud): sems can mun nag pa/ snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mthus mun nag dang bral zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag
111b2(rgyud): 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyag gi gnas su rdzas te skye bar 'gyur zhing / rga ba dang 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthas 'phags
111b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob por 'gyur zhing / tshe bskal pa thub par 'gyur re / shi nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro//
111b4(rgyud): byang chub mthar thug gi bar du/ de nyid zhabs drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po dang / bla rtsi dang / ga pur dang /
111b5(rgyud): spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la/ kun tu ru dang / sra rtse pog dang / gan da ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sgrar
111b6(rgyud): te/ sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigasang bang phyug don yod zhags pa'i sor bzhi'i tshad du byas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
111b7(rgyud): ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e na ya'i lpags pa gzhag pa phyug bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad ma thogs/ gnyis pa zhags pa thogs pa/ gsum
111b8(rgyud): pa gsal zhing thogs pa/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon na dri
112a1(rgyud): med 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o// gong du ni 'od dpag med do/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang ma
112a2(rgyud): dgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos sum phrugs dgos la/ tshes brgyad nas/ tshes bcwo lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o//
112a3(rgyud): spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug bya zhing / mtshon sna sngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rigs sngags kyi lha'i bu mos pus mo btsugs te
112a4(rgyud): gyen du lta bar bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha bris par bya'o// bsgo bzhir cha 'byes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor
112a5(rgyud): 'khor yug tu pad ma bri bar bya'o/ grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba bzhag go/ sgo bzhir dri dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag go/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma
112a6(rgyud): dang / mchod yon gyi snod brgyad gzhag go// me tog sna tshogs bkram par bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa 'bul bar bya'o// spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i
112a7(rgyud): til mar gyi mar me lham par bya'o// ba dan dang / bdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyi legs par brgyan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
112a8(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor du/ zhal shar phyogs su bstan pa mchod par bya'o// ras kyi mtshon skud sna lnga srid du bcu drug pa/ thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig/ thor to gcig tu mu tog
112b1(rgyud): gri phyun po btags te/ sbrul 'khyil ba bzhin du 'khyil la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma g.yog par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang
112b2(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs te/ dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bcing bar byas la bdag bsrung ngo // khro bo'i
112b3(rgyud): rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcings pa dang / phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis/ bzhin 'dzum gyis brgyan par/
112b4(rgyud): byas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag bcing te/ mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ rang gi srad bu'i steng du gtor bar bya'o// stong
112b5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / ras kyi srad bu de 'bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags
112b6(rgyud): 'chang legs so// legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nir bu chen po gnyis
112b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa dbang du grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
112b8(rgyud): dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// spos de dpag tshad tsam du khyab par byed do// gang la dri snum pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar
113a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang bral/ byang dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang /
113a2(rgyud): phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma dang bral ba 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la/
113a3(rgyud): gab tse bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhags drung du bzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ gtsang mas khrus la legs par bya ste/
113a4(rgyud): blang bar bya zhing / dgos par bya'o// nyin re bzhin dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang des yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / lus yongs su
113a5(rgyud): dgos pas/ sngon gyi rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi zhing khams
113a6(rgyud): su bskal pa mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du/ pad ma'i snying po la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub snying po'i
113a7(rgyud): mthar thug gi bar du/ de skal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs
113a8(rgyud): pa byang bar 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
113b1(rgyud): rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun ma 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nyid nor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang bcas/ bran pho dang bcas/ bran mo
113b2(rgyud): dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog gi snying po de bsdus la bla rtsi dang / bri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru ta dang / gur gum dang / srang spos dang / sa ma
113b3(rgyud): ka dang / sri ka dang / nad la dang / po la dang / yungs kar rnams zhabi du btags pa'i phye ma char ba'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril lu ni/ dug med par byed pa'i mchog dam pa zhes
113b4(rgyud): bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang / dpal du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang / rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do// phyugs shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal
113b5(rgyud): dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa la bskus na/ bde bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bsrung ngo // nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na/ sdig pa sel lo//
113b6(rgyud): zhes thub pa gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do// thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na/ thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med
113b7(rgyud): rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du gyur par byed pa'i mchog yin no// byang 'joms shing / dug dang / dbyigs dug dang / phye ma'i dug/ gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de
113b8(rgyud): bzhin no// zas za dang / khrus byed pa dang / thig le byug pa rtag tu byas la/ de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar 'gyur ro// zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo //
114a1(rgyud): glad pa'i nad mi bzad pa la byug par bya'o// mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi thur mas so// so na ba la ni khar mur te'o// lto na bal ni chu dron
114a2(rgyud): dang ngo do// rtsib logs na ba la mar dang byug go// yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni/ laka 'thil sku bas so// nang tshabs po che la
114a3(rgyud): ni sku mnye ba dang khrus bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi gnod pa bsam pa la sna nas btang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//
114a4(rgyud): rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni tshogs mar thig le bya'o// snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tshwabasres pas so// khyim zhin par bya ba ni/ 'bras yos dang / gsum sbar gyis
114a5(rgyud): zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so// 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa rnams la ni ba glang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram
114a6(rgyud): ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag/ 'o mas gang ba bzhi bzhag/ mchod yon gyi gnod bzhi dang / phog phor bzhi ste/ a ka ru dang / du ru kas bdug go/ gu gul
114a7(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya
114a8(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa rnams la mchog du//
114b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dbang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
114b2(rgyud): gal te brgya byin dang / lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin no// mi rnams kyis lnga ci smos/ brgya byin 'gug par 'dod na/ pad ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyas bzlas te/
114b3(rgyud): brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing / dri chab kyang dbul lo// gu gul dang / mar dang /
114b4(rgyud): yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing arga'i me sbar la/ tshes bcu bzhi'i nyon la sbyin bsreg bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang
114b5(rgyud): po 'ongs nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang blangs te sbyin par byed do// de ni sems
114b6(rgyud): mi bzad do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gis gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug ste/ mchog
114b7(rgyud): thams cad sbyin par byed do/ yid la ci 'dod pa bsgrub par byed do/ gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te/ chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te ci 'byor pa gtor na/
114b8(rgyud): khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hir na n+yaka shi su yang sbyin par byed/
115a1(rgyud): cing / khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyang shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na/ rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa
115a2(rgyud): brgyad zlas te/ yungs kar la la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro// gu gul gyi dud pas bdug cing / arga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// de nas
115a3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung zhing / de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyi mdun 'dug par 'gyur
115a4(rgyud): zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed de/ mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po
115a5(rgyud): chen po dgug par 'dod na/ gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang char dbul bar bya zhing / yungs kar la lan ki shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nag po'i thog du gtor na
115a6(rgyud): khugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gar dgos pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ gnod sbyin
115a7(rgyud): gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de byed do// thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mi smra bar mtshan mo
115a8(rgyud): dus 'tshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha/
115b1(rgyud): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'am mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyuro//
115b2(rgyud): las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi rtag tu nyin par mdun na gnas so// mtshan mo longs spyod pa gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do//
115b3(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas/ bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang / snying
115b4(rgyud): rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te/ bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'i rims par phye ba'o// de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba na zhi ba/ rgyas
115b5(rgyud): pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ bsrungs pa/ nang thams cad sel ba/ byang 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// khyim bsrung bar 'dod pas/ arga'i
115b6(rgyud): yums shing dang / pad ma dang / yungs kar dang mar bsres par las sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/
115b7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ khyim chen po bsrung bar 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / khrag khrug pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi
115b8(rgyud): mdza' ba thams cad dang / rim nad thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad mgo ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / skyes
116a1(rgyud): pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu'i bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sbed par
116a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu sku ston bzhed par 'gyuraro//
116a3(rgyud): sbyin bsreg mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / ri khrod
116a4(rgyud): dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen mor 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug gi spyan sngar nyal la me tog dkar po dang / gdang pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs
116a5(rgyud): mar dang bcas te/ sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
116a6(rgyud): dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba grang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ shing arga'i yam bsreg shing dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa
116a7(rgyud): dang / me tog dkar po rnams las lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ yul gru stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho
116a8(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa dang / pad mi'i sdong bus yam bsres shing rnams la brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ mtshan mo zad pa dang / ti na ra brgya rtsa
116b1(rgyud): brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ me tog ku mu ta dang / pad ma'i sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'dab mar bcas pa dang / yungs gar bsres te/ shing seng ldeng gi me spang la/ sbyin bkren /
116b2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bzla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la snyung ba byas te/ gtsang mar khrus legs par byas la gos dkar po bgos te/
116b3(rgyud): tsan dan dang / bri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kur bsreg pa'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ nam phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo yi 'ongs nas/ zong lnga
116b4(rgyud): stong sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag cig srung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la/ shing bil ba'i me sbar tau/ bil ba'i me tog dang /
116b5(rgyud): mar bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ de'i 'og tu/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo rgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ongs par 'gyur te/ rigs
116b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang nges blangs par bya'o// gdong du mig lta bar mi bya'o// yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btud de/ rigs sngags 'chang de 'gum
116b7(rgyud): mo zhes zer ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad
116b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ gnang sbyin ma mang bar 'gyur te/ dmas pa thams cad byed cing / blan bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rna ba mar gyi ma chis bcu ni/
