117a1(rgyud): sa gang na ga ter yong ba pa mdzaH/ snang rtsa brgyang bzas 'arjod byas la/ gtong ma'i chog banag par rgya ning 'phags pa da
117a2(rgyud): ba la mchod pa byas la/ snga ma'i me tog dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / yungs kar dang mar bsres pa rnams la sbyin 'asregs zung rtsa brgyad byas te/ n+ya dang / yungs par
117a3(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na/ de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar
117a4(rgyud): bya zhing / lhag ma rang gis pa tu ri'i shing gi me sbar bar bya'o// til dang / 'bras yos dang / mar bsres pa las/ sbyin bsregs stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po'i btsun
117a5(rgyud): mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang / dbyib dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du
117a6(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad ma'i yam bsreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsregs stong rtsa brgyad byas na/
117a7(rgyud): yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras lan tsA dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin byas
117a8(rgyud): na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro// a ni'i sgra shing gi me sbar la/ sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / arga'i me tog las sbyin bsregs brgya rtsa brgyad/
117b1(rgyud): byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ kin de bzhin rten rabargya 'thob par 'gyur ro// ba la sha'i yam bsreg zhing dang / 'bram mas la sbyin
117b2(rgyud): bsregs stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ gser ba srang brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing / bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ches bco lnga'i
117b3(rgyud): zla ba la srung ba byas na/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung 'am/ chu klung chen po'i nang du rkyed pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa
117b4(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod byas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o// de nas chus nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas/ rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed do// blang la phyed kyis dkon mchog
117b5(rgyud): gsum la mchod par bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// ches bcwo lnga la zla ba nyal srung ba byas nas/ nam phyed nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags
117b6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/ a ba mni' yam bsreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bu rtsi pog bsres la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/
117b7(rgyud): rang gi ming gis sbyin bsregs stong byas nas/ sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / nang thams cad dang / gdon thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro//
117b8(rgyud): phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / ma~M mdza' ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// shing an dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin bsregs
118a1(rgyud): byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / can ngan dkar po bsres pas sbyin bsrem
118a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa dang / rgyas pa dang / mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi la kar pa de'i me tog dang / lan tsha lnga bdun bsres pa dang / shing tshar ma
118a3(rgyud): gyi yang bsreg shing yungs kar mar la bsres pas/ drag shul sbyong bar 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ pad ma dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsrem
118a4(rgyud): ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin bsregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas/ khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na/ ji srid 'dod na pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po
118a5(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de blangs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ na mkha' la gtor na/ ha cang char che ba zhi bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bzhir gtor na/ 'tshams chen/
118a6(rgyud): po bcad par 'gyur ro// sprin la mngon du phyogs der gter na/ rlung dang / sprin dang / sper ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi sde mnan pa ni/ til dang /
118a7(rgyud): 'bras yos bsres pa'i sbyin bsregs so// pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni/ sa bon bdun gyi sbyin bsreg gis so// phug sgrub pa ni shing arga'i sbyin bsregs so// arga'i
118a8(rgyud): lo ma dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsregs byas na/ phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// nag su 'gro ba'i che/ ku mu ta dang / rgya spos dang / yungs kar mar
118b1(rgyud): dang bsres pas/ nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ shing bi la shi'i me sbar te/ na
118b2(rgyud): sham brgya stong sbyin bsregs byas na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog dang /
118b3(rgyud): ka ra bi ri'i me tog dang / ud pa la rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin bsregs brgya stong byas na/ zla ba dang nyi ma 'ongs nas/ mchog sbyin lus la 'od zer btab nas/
118b4(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// a shwad thas lam bsreg shing byas na/ shu ti dang / nyi'u shing dang / a ra ka dang / tsan dan dang / yungs dkar dang / nas dang /
118b5(rgyud): mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus 'tshams gsum du/ sbyin bsregs nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur 'gyur ro// gdon dang /
118b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pa bcad na/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / lan tsha'i sbyin bsregs bgyis te/ thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa
118b7(rgyud): bcing bar bya zhing // khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o// sbyin bsrega'i cho ga'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
118b8(rgyud): cho ga'i rgyal po chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi modo la/ mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya ste/
119a1(rgyud): ras khru do khru bzhi sdam pa kha char ma bcad pas med pa/ zag ran ba'ang ba/ shin du sbyang ba la 'i mo mkhan sa smra ba'i dga' thub can bzhinas
119a2(rgyud): la gnas pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ zas dkar gsum za ba dang / dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i mtshon rtsi snod sar par bzhag ste/ bir sar bas
119a3(rgyud): 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa 'am/ bzhugs pa 'am/ dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ e ne ya'i lpags pa bsnams
119a4(rgyud): ba/ phyag bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ spyan bye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ zhal g.yas/
119a5(rgyud): pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba la gyen du pad ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun du zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya
119a6(rgyud): byas la/ 'dzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/ pad ma'i tshul du byas la/ bar na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse gsum/ gnyis
119a7(rgyud): phan padam/ gsum pa na don yod nags pa'i glegs bam/ bani pa na don yod zhags pa/ zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa ril ba sbyin lugs/ bdun
119a8(rgyud): mtshan po ma choms kyim ma papa'i rjo/ brgyad pa tha cog su choms kyis snong thogs par bya zhing / 'anga'angs gang kyis brgyan pa/ zhu ma tog su tshogs pa rnam pa sa mdzes par bya'o//
119b1(rgyud): ri bo nya la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa// khri 'phangs glegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdze/
119b2(rgyud): bar brgyan pa/ pad ma'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs kyi steng na
119b3(rgyud): nyi ma/ g.yon logs kyi steng na zla ba/ gnas gtsang mi rigs kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// ri bang
119b4(rgyud): ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par bya zhing / sdong bu dang ldan pa mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyam gang zhing / chu srin ka ma ra dang / ngang ba dang / bzhad dang / shang shang de'u dang /
119b5(rgyud): ngur pas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis lags par brgyan pa'i/ ri'i steng du pad ma'i gdan dang / seng ge'i khri dang / g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas
119b6(rgyud): su dbang phyug bya'o// bayon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yas su 'phags/
119b7(rgyud): ma sgrol ma/ lus btung te mdzes pa dang bcas pa'o/ g.yon du dri med 'gro ba lag pa dbus 'byin pa dang / nor bzong pus mo gtsugs pa bya'o// pad ma'i snying po dbus
119b8(rgyud): kyi gnas su khro ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad ma'o//
120a1(rgyud): / pad ma'i gdan la dkyil ma dkrung phyed bcas pa/ lus cung zad btud ba/ mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang srong stong rabs byed par bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon
120a2(rgyud): du rdo rje'i zom chen po// lag na rdo rje'i mchogs mang po dang / 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar
120a3(rgyud): bu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgo bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad ma'i rigs ma lag pa sbrel bar bya'o// lha mo dpal chen mo dang / dbyangs
120a4(rgyud): ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o//
120a5(rgyud): ri dang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral cig ma'o// ri khor yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gi brgyan cing mtshe'u mdzes pa/
120a6(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs gis brgyan pa/ seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phru gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba pa lnga bya'o// thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na
120a7(rgyud): rin po che me tog gis phur ma thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drang du rigs sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te/ lag
120a8(rgyud): na me tog dang / pog phor thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// steng gi bar mI du thub pa chen po rgyal po 'od dpag med dang / shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'dzin rten dbang po'i
120b1(rgyud): rgyal ba byal/ ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mad la/ tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / 'tshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa de dag 'jig cing 'jig
120b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang //
120b3(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum mchod pa/ don du gnyer ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ba khrag
120b4(rgyud): khrig brgya stong drug bcu'i drung du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba ni 'phags
120b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di dngos su mthong ba yin no// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
120b6(rgyud): dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing / sku yang ston par 'gyur ro// nyams thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur ro// nyams thag pa tsam gyi mdo la skra ston par 'gyur
120b7(rgyud): zhing / mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// don yong pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa dang / nang tshabs po ches zin pa dang / nad sna
120b8(rgyud): tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal
121a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa dang / nang dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ than drung 'gro'i myi gnas su/
121a2(rgyud): gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyis mod la/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bskur sti chen po dang / sil snyan dkrol
121a3(rgyud): ba mang po dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ grong khyer chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyams sam/
121a4(rgyud): grong du zhugs na/ ras kyi sku gzugs zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrab khru ba dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / rang
121a5(rgyud): gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skems byed dang /
121a6(rgyud): grib gnod zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
121a7(rgyud): 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// skal pa stong phrag bdun bcur tshe rab su tshe rab dran par 'gyur ro// pad ma 'od dri ma med/
121a8(rgyud): cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// pad ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rigs
121b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i/
121b2(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram 'am/ pad ma'i mtshe'u 'am/ ud pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog gi bskyed mos tshal lam/ 'bras
121b3(rgyud): bu'i kun dga' ra ba'am/ khang bzang bzhi dag cing / sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa/ rtsa dang / shing bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang /
121b4(rgyud): gyo mo dang / shing dang / bong pa dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus pas gang rnams dag pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa
121b5(rgyud): dang / nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas la ga nyams dga' dang / kha dog
121b6(rgyud): dang / gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang yungs kar la bzlas te/ kun tu gtor to/ sa gzhi de lta bu ni sbyangs pa'i cho ga yin no// khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar la/
121b7(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad/ phyogs cing pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / 'tshams bcings par byas pa
121b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad sa cig kyang mi gnas par phyogs bzhir 'byer de 'dong ngo // sro gang chags sdang ba dang /
122a1(rgyud): sdang ba'i sems can dang / snang ba'i can bzan khro bo'i gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gnas/
122a2(rgyud): kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byas te/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ngos re re bzhin khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ cha mdzes pa/ gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la/ sgo bzhi
122a3(rgyud): dang / rta babs bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i mtshon sna bzhi sbyar te/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'bri bar byas ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas/ tsan dan dkar po'i phu
122a4(rgyud): bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcwo lnga la tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar bzang po gdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar pos bris
122a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// gnyis pa ni dmar pos bri bar bya'o// gsum pa ni ser pos so// bzhi pa ni na mkha'i kha dog gis so// lnga pa ni sman gyi kha dog gis so// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi
122a6(rgyud): snying po'i 'jigs pa med par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar/ pir gsar pa dang / tshon dang / snod gsar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad ma byung ba ma stong
122a7(rgyud): pa khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing / pad ma'i phreng ba mtshon gis mdzes par bris la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag
122a8(rgyud): med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bzhag go// g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ gsang sngags kyi rjesu 'brang bar bya'o//
122b1(rgyud): g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang / rdo rje thogs pa/ bzhin khro nyer can 'od 'bar bas bskor bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang / dri med
122b2(rgyud): 'gro bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu kar shaMr chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi thugs thogs
122b3(rgyud): pa'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma mche ba gartsegs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo
122b4(rgyud): rje dang dgra sta g.yas pa'i gong mo lha dang / log 'dren la bsdig par bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba/ ral pa'i thor
122b5(rgyud): tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyis thogs tshugs brgyan par bya'o// g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo
122b6(rgyud): dbyangs ldan ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / 'bras bu'i lha mo bya'o// de'i 'og tu gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa
122b7(rgyud): bya'o// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong kyang bzhag par bya'o// glang rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyis snying po'i dbus
122b8(rgyud): dang / bar bar du lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / dbyugs pa dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrogs dag bya'o// phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang /
123a1(rgyud): @lha mo dbu ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung ngu lha mo dbyangs can ma/ 'khros pa'i gzugs can no// de gnyis kyi bar du dbyugs pa dang / ril
123a2(rgyud): spyi blugs 'bri bar bya'o// glacig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos rnams kyi grangs bzhag go// grwa gcig tu shi ba ha bzhago//
123a3(rgyud): de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can bzhag go// lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki la zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa/ lag pa na rdo rje dang
123a4(rgyud): dgra sta zhags pa thogs par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma/ lag pa'i pad ma rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po
123a5(rgyud): zom zhes bya ba'i cho gas lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ste/ dar las bcings brgyan thams cad
123a6(rgyud): dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ steng du sna ma'i me tog gi sdug gu bzhag par bya'o// tsan dan dang /
123a7(rgyud): gur gum dang / brtsi dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / phog phor bzhi bzhag cing / a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug pas 'dug go// mtshon sna lnga'i ras kyi srad bu mchod sbyin gyi srad bu tshang
123a8(rgyud): du byas la/ gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdegs par bya zhing / thor to gcig na me tog pad ma'i gdug 'khor rin po ches spras pa zlum por skyil/ bar bar steng du bzhag pa'i
123b1(rgyud): mchod pa dang / bsnyen bskur bya ste/ yungs kar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / bla rtsi'i/
123b2(rgyud): phye mas gos la bgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab bkang ba'i bum pa dang / zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma bzhag par bya zhing / gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod
123b3(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad bzhag par bya'o// ro dang / dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang /
123b4(rgyud): 'o ma dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang / 'bul na drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa rnams sha dang / khrag dang / snyun dong dang / ke'u
123b5(rgyud): dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spangs te/ gtsang mas gtsang sbrar bya'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram par bya zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
123b6(rgyud): dang lnga ldi dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ pog phor sum bcu rtsa gnyis bzhag par bya zhing / bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya/ spos sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang
123b7(rgyud): ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug pad ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing /
123b8(rgyud): dus gsum du khrus byas la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya'o// grogs gtsang mas bsgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga bya ba nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang
124a1(rgyud): bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis/ spos sna tshogs brgya rtsa brgyad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing / 'jig rten mgon pos byin
124a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa dang / pad ma'i rigs pad ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// gang bsams
124a3(rgyud): pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug go/ chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig
124a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro//
124a5(rgyud): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi sgo skal la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags la rten par
124a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// brdeg pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / bsad pa dang / dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so// gang dag de lta bu'i byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam/ mgo la brgya phrag
124a7(rgyud): stong 'gyur du 'bab par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyis phyir bzlog cing grol bar mi nus te/ rigs sngags 'chang des dkrol bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang des ri mo'i
124a8(rgyud): sku gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon par du phyogs par bzhag nas/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan rtsa ba
124b1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar zhing khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o// de'i 'og du dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bum pa de yang
124b2(rgyud): 'bar la ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing / shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing / ras kyi sku gzugs la legs
124b3(rgyud): so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang legs so leg so// khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing /
124b4(rgyud): khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang 'grub/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig/ de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas
124b5(rgyud): ba mchog grub na/ bum pa spos rgyus bkang ba blangs la/ lan brgya rtsa bzlas te/ rgyu skar rgyal la khrus byas pa'am/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas grangs shis pa la khrus bla tsam gyi mod la
124b6(rgyud): lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / dbang po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur te/ rnam pa lnga yongasu dag pa dang / mig lnga yongs su
124b7(rgyud): dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa lnga yong su dag pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
124b8(rgyud): dbang phyug rtag tu mchod sbyin par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu sku ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgo
125a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
125a2(rgyud): po bzhi dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te/ sa phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// sred med kyi bu dang / dbang
125a3(rgyud): phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gsang ba brgya stong phrag du ma bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar byed par 'gyur zhing / zhi ba dang / bde legs su byed par
125a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// shes pa don yod pa dang / thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing sbyin pa don yod pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang
125a5(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi go cha zhib mo yang
125a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / pha rol dgon pa don yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
125a7(rgyud): gang ga'i bye ma snyed sa ya phrag brgya stong drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang /
125a8(rgyud): bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'o//
125b1(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po bam po dgu pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan
125b2(rgyud): las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
125b3(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la gyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag pad ma'i rigs la rnam
125b4(rgyud): par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho rigs sngags 'chang chen po rim par bye ba'i cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rigs sngags kyi rgyal po mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
125b5(rgyud): sngar de bdag gis bsgrags par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das balha bzhin du/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
125b6(rgyud): snying po 'di smras so// / na mo s+t+rai yang tA mu ga ta pra ti dish+tsi ti bya/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa b+hu/ nam prad d+he ka b+hU ta r+ya shra ba ka sang ge b+h+yo/ tring nug ta pra ting ba ni b+h+ya/ na ma sa myag ga ta na Na/
125b7(rgyud): na ma sa myag pri ta ban na Na/ na ma sha ra ti ta su tra ma hA ma ta ye/ na ma ar+ya mai tre yang pra mu ke bya/ ma hA bo te sa twa ar+ya ga na ba re bya/ na ma ar+ya a mi ba ya/ ta thA ga ta ya d+he te sa myag sam
125b8(rgyud): bu d+ha ya/ ne mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mo s+yar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi satwa yA/ ma hA satwa yA/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ye b+h+yo/ ma hA ri shi ar+ya gan na pa re b+h+yo/ man tring t+ya i dan/ ar+ya
126a1(rgyud): pa lo ki ti shwa ra mud ki nan/ a mo ga rA dza na na hri da yan/ ta thA ga ta sa mu kha nas shi tan/ ma hA ta pa ri shad ma ste/ a ha ma ta ni ni a brta yi sh+ya mis dan
126a2(rgyud): dumi sarba ka r+ye shusarba sa re shu tsa ma rag sha bab du/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ma tsi ra tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma thaka ru ni ka/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ tsi tsi ri/ ba ra ma ha ka ru ni ka/ si ri mi na
126a3(rgyud): bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ma hA pad ma hata ya/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud t+ya bad t+ya/ ye h+ya ti/ bud t+ya brad t+ya/ da b+ha da b+ha/ ka Na kaH/ ki ni ki ni/
126a4(rgyud): ku nu kunu/ pa ri shud d+ha/ sad ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA sh+ma ma pra pa ta/ tsa la tsa la/ saM tsa la saM tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta/ e ta Da/ ba ra ba ra
126a5(rgyud): bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ e h+ye ti ma hA ka ru ni ka/ ma hA ba shu pa/ ti bi sha na ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi/ hu hu hu hu/ oM ka ra ma ha b+ha
126a6(rgyud): ma ma b+he sha da ra/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ hu ru hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ da ra da ra/ rasmai sha ta sa ha/ sa pra ti man ti sha rar/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/
126a7(rgyud): ta pa ta ba/ b+ha ga ban/ so ma a ti ta ya ma ba ru na/ ku be ra pra men tra/ ra sha kaM na/ a bya rtsi tartsi ran/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nan ku ma ra/ rung tra pa
126a8(rgyud): sa ba/ bi sh+tsA dand/ de ba shi na ya ga/ pa hu pi ba de b+he sha d+ha ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru du ru/ sarba bya ti bya/ tha ra tha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra kha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/
126b1(rgyud): bar dka lag pa mnas/ mtha ma na sa ma'i gra sa ca thar mu hu su phra mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun ma/ b+ha ga pan/ a r+yAb mo ga thA ra mardza/
126b2(rgyud): ma ma sarba/ satwa d+bash+tsa sarba ba ye bya/ sarba pa sa sgo bya/ sarba pa ta ban da na/ ta ta na ta rdza na ra/ rdza tse ra ska ra/ ag ni/ ud da ka/ bo sha sha s+tha pa ri ro tsa ka/ ka na ka na/
126b3(rgyud): ki ni ki ni/ ku nu ku nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ra yA ba la/ be d+yeng ka/ tsu du rA r+ya pad d+ya/ saM pra ka sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma ha ta/ mota ta ka ra
126b4(rgyud): b+hi ta ma ta/ shad paM ra mi ta pa ri pu ra ga/ ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ ta ta ta ta/ tha tha tha tha/ ti Ta ti Ta/ tu tu tu tu/ e ne ya tsarma kri ta pa ri ka re/ e h+ya
126b5(rgyud): i sha ra ma he sha ra/ maha bud d+ha ga nan/ ban tsa ka/ ku ru ku ru/ ba ra ba ra/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ha ma Ta/ bi shud ta bi sha ya ba si na/ ma ha ka ru ni ka shwa d+he/
126b6(rgyud): yA da dz+nyo ba bi ta/ rang na ma gu ta/ na ma wa d+ha ra/ sarba da dzA shi ra si ri ma gu ta/ ma had tsung ta ka ma la kri ta ka la la/ d+ya ma sa ma ti byi ma k+ka/ a ba gr-i bya/ ba hu
126b7(rgyud): sad dA san ta ti ba ri pa tsa ka/ ma hA ka ru ni ka sarba karma/ pa ra na bi sho ta ka/ sarba pra ti pra mo tsa ka/ sarba sha pa ri pu ri ka sarba sad tA swa ma k+ka ba ka/ na mo stu de sAhA/
126b8(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa can ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis/ 'khor mang po ri dang / nags
127a1(rgyud): tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po 'byung ba 'gyur ro// lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang /
127a2(rgyud): mnad ra ba'i me tog gi char chen po pus mo nub tsam bab par 'gyur to// sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mdze risi lha dag gis kyang / na mkha' nas
127a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang / lha lhub dag gi char phab po/ 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha'i bu dang / kla dang / gnod sbyin dang / dro bra dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
127a4(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gsang ba po de dag thams cad kyis/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po lags so legs so// yid bzhin
127a5(rgyud): byi nor bu chen po// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par bka' ba 'dis bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo 'di bshad pas/ rin po che'i char chen
127a6(rgyud): po 'bab po zhes zer ro// de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / zas dkar gsum za bas/
127a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste/ mchod pa byas la/ yungs kar 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ dpal lha mo
127a8(rgyud): la snun pa byas na/ tshes bcu bzhi nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo'o bar 'gyur ro// 'tshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
127b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'tshams bcad pa dang / zhi bar bya ba la/ a ga ru dang / can na gyi du/
127b2(rgyud): thos bsregs la thal ba dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o// rims nad thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bka' ba'i srad bu la 'dungad pa lan mi
127b3(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ btags na/ rims nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la mar dang / til mar la bzlas te/ zangs kyi snod du sangs
127b4(rgyud): rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog gi snying po dang / pad ma'i ze ba dang / bcas pa btab ste bcos pa 'di ni sprul pa yin te/ zas dang skom dang / bsku dang / sna nas btang
127b5(rgyud): ba'i las byas te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byad bcad na/ mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bskas
127b6(rgyud): shing tshig mas dril la/ lus kyi dri ma byin par byas te/ gong bu las gzugs brnyan byas te/ lan bdun bzlas te/ mtshon gyis btab na/ dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang /
127b7(rgyud): gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las byad chen po 'jig par 'gyur ro// bsrung ba'i skud
127b8(rgyud): pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ de bzhin du mdud pa dor byas na/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang / skrag pa dang /
128a1(rgyud): bsngangs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lto ba na pa la/ cha chu 'jams tsam la lan/
128a2(rgyud): bdun bzlas te byin na/ lto ba'i nad 'jig par 'gyur ro// dug bsad na chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na/ dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// mi gdug par 'gyur ro//
128a3(rgyud): mig na ba la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na/ mig nad thams cad la 'jig par 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa las 'jig pa la bzlas te/ byugs na/
128a4(rgyud): dug med par 'gyur ro// so na ba la ka ra bi ri'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i so shing ngam/ shing pha gu'i shing la bzlas te zos na so nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'tshams bcad
128a5(rgyud): pa thams cad la sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug gi/ 'gul ba 'gags pa la 'dogs par byas na/ 'gul 'gags pa thams cad la thar bar 'gyur ro//
128a6(rgyud): mig nad la spos chu dang / shing pa la shi'i chu dang / shing pa la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba 'am/ shing dngar gyi chu la len bdun bzlas te bkrus na/ mi ga nad
128a7(rgyud): thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// rna ba na ba la til mar dang / shu ti zangs kyi snod du bcos pa las rna ba bkang na/ rna nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa/
128a8(rgyud): dang / rtsod pa dang / khrab khrug dang / mi snyan pa thams cad chu la lan bdun bzlas te/ gdod pa bkru ba byas na/ thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpun dang / stobs
128b1(rgyud): dang yul lab dag / byir rnas bdag mi mdza' ba thams cad dag/ g.yul ngothams cad du bzung gi lcib la dkyil 'khor byas pa/ zum pa da ma ban bzlas /
128b2(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ a ga ru'i bdug pa 'bul zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ don yod pa'i dgra pa'i snying po 'dri
128b3(rgyud): mchod de grags byas ma zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// zhib chen
128b4(rgyud): bor 'gyur ro// chu de bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te/ tsan dan la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ snying kar thig le byas te/ rtag tu dran par byas na/ mtshams med pa byang
128b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// khyims thams cad bsrung na/ mtshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ shing seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la btags te/ phyogs bzhir
128b6(rgyud): btsugs na/ 'tshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la mtshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro//
128b7(rgyud): srog chags pri ha dang / lu ta dang / me dpung rnams la pad ma dang / na gu li dang / shing arga'i me tog mar dang bsres pa la sbyin bsregs byas na/ khyim bsrung ba chen
128b8(rgyud): po byas par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gdon thams cad la bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ yang na las thams cad nor bu bsgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag la sogs pa la cha mnyam pa
129a1(rgyud): byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o// dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / ma ku li/
129a2(rgyud): dang / gan dang / na gu li dang / pa ru ni dang / tan tra pa ru ni dang / gan ta pri yang ku dang / ta ga ra dang / tsa kra dang / ma hA tsa kra dang / so ma ra tsi dang / su man da rnams
129a3(rgyud): phye ma zhib mo byas te/ char pa'i chus sbrus la tsan dan dang / gur gum sbyar ba'i chus bsrad te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
129a4(rgyud): gi spyan sngar nor bu byas te/ yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te a ga ru'i bdug pas 'dugs la/ de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste/ ras kyis g.yogs
129a5(rgyud): la grib mar bskams te blangs te/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzla bar bya zhing / khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mgo bar bzung na//
129a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bla ma gcig pur
129a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang gzi brjid 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khya
129a8(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / dus thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams
129b1(rgyud): cad kyang rtag tu mthun par byed cing / byad mi bzang ba dang / dug sbyar ma dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags das rgya ga yongs byed kyis mi tshugs shing / thabyas cag
129b2(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / bsod nams dang / bkra shis dang / dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
129b3(rgyud): cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu sku ston pa bzhed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// skal pa bzang po'i thogs pa med par
129b4(rgyud): yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa la btags na/ glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa dang / dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// stobs
129b5(rgyud): dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung
129b6(rgyud): po dang / sha za'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// nams kyang rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byis pa rnams kyi 'gul du
129b7(rgyud): btags na/ gdon thams dang / rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / bcas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi
129b8(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring
130a1(rgyud): @bar 'gyur ro// bud med rnams la sa ragasar btags te khrus byas na/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ 'phags pa
130a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ skal pa bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing / bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim 'thab dang / rtag tu rjes su
130a3(rgyud): 'thun par 'gyur ro/ khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur ro// shes rab mchog tu 'gyur ro/ thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur de la bud med kyi skyon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
130a4(rgyud): phyi ma de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi thob par shes par bya ste/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags na/ thams cad du bsrung ba byas par
130a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dug dang / mtshon dang / mes mi tshugs so// dug byas pa la yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba skye
130a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / bde bzhi par 'gyur ro// rlung dang sprin dang / ser ba mnanan/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad
130a7(rgyud): mnan par 'gyur ro// bzlog par byas na/ bal po se'u yi shing gi lcug mas bzlog par bya'o// dran pa bskyed na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don
130a8(rgyud): yong ba'i nags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ nor bu chu dron las btang bar byas na/ klag pa tsam gyis tshigs su bcang ba stong 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / thos pa mang po brgya mtsho
130b1(rgyud): bstsags par 'gyur ro// rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bya bar 'dangs/ lus bsgru bar byas na/ gang du bzhugs pa der thams cad dbang du 'gyuro//
130b2(rgyud): pus mo gnyis la byugs na/ chu klung chen po pus mo nub tsam gyi pha rol rgal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dmag gam yul ngo'am/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ r-i sul
130b3(rgyud): lam/ dgon par phyin pa na/ bsgreng ba byas na/ bde ba dang / bde legs su rgal bar 'gyur zhing chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan zan gtun po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs
130b4(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing bltar med par 'gyur ro// brtson ra thams cad du song ba na byug pa byas na/ khong sgril dang lcags sgrog gis bcings pa thams cad chag grugs su 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la
130b5(rgyud): bskus na/ mtshon cha mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mig gnyis la bskus na/ gnyid log pa'i tshe rmi lam chen pa rmi bar 'gyur zhing / ci ltar bsam shing smon pa snang bar 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa sman
130b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston bar bar mdzad cing thams cad bka' stsal bar 'gyur ro// de la mig nang thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// kha'i nang du bzhag na/ gang bzlas pa byin par byed cing
130b7(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin na dpral bar byugs pa byas na/ byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/ thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lag thil du bskus na/ glang po che dbang
130b8(rgyud): du 'gyur zhing / gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ dbral ba'i dbus su thig le byas na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro// med pa la byag ma mgrin sngon bzhin
131a1(rgyud): du bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bgyib kyi mchis shes bran bzhin du 'gyur/ 'o ma nga sgyuraH/ migs bslus na/ mtshan mo yang nyi ma thayi du/
131a2(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur zhing / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur shing / gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur ro//
131a3(rgyud): klu'i gnas kyi mtshor bor na/ klu chen po char gyi rgyun gtor bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches pa'i tshe/ chu dang bsres te na mkha' la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin la bltas te/ ser ba'i rgyun
131a4(rgyud): la gtor na ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa la btags na/ gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags te me'i nang du zhugs na/ mes mi tshugs
131a5(rgyud): shing / tsan dan bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// ral gri la byugs te g.yul ngor sot+ta na/ lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur nas/ pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur
131a6(rgyud): zhing / thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// nang chen pos thebs pa'i nang pa tshabs po che la phye ma byin na/ nad tshabs po che las thar bar 'gyur ro// pho ba na ba la chu dron las btang na mod las
131a7(rgyud): yongasu btang bar 'gyur ro// rtsi'is logs na ba der ba las btang na ni bar 'gyur ro/ nad thams cad la ni kun mar dang til mar la sbyar ste bsku mnye dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba'i
131a8(rgyud): nad dang / sngar blugs pa dang / byug pa byas na/ nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phug gi sgo khor yug du byugs la snying po lan bdun bzlas te/
131b1(rgyud): da ma pa mas par byar rgyabyasapa/ thams rgyal pa'ims thams pam / zugs sa/ sa na
131b2(rgyud): sdang bathams cad bzlog par 'gyur ma/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ ba chu ste/ maM smra bar snying po'i mdo brjod pas byas na lan brgya myong ban
131b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shing rta'i rtsibs shing la byugs na/ g.yul ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par
131b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zong la gton na rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyur ro// bu mo'i gdong bkrus na/ mgo yang bar 'gyur ro// snying kar thig le byas na/ thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin
131b5(rgyud): par las thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ bdag bsrung ba/ gzhan bsrung ba'i nor bu chen po gang dang / gang la sbyar zhing bzlas pas/ thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro//
131b6(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la lan bdun bzlas te byin na/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// byur ngan pa med par bya na/ ras la dkyil 'khor bris
131b7(rgyud): la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ga
131b8(rgyud): ru'i 'dug pas gdug par bya zhing / spos dang ldan pa'i tis mar gyi mar me bsgom par byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis de la byung ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyuro/
132a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa gsal ma gser ram/ dngul gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgyartsa
132a2(rgyud): brgyang bzlas te/ thugs na/ de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po khams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ gdon thams cad tshar bcad na/ tis dang/
132a3(rgyud): 'bras so bo'i sbyin bsreg gis// nad dang gnod pa thams cad gsal ma/ tshul bzlas pas so// dus ma yin par 'chi bzhi bar bya na/ dus gsum du lan gsum du rtag
132a4(rgyud): tu bzlas pas/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcing ba dang / lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril gzhom na/ nyin re re brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// rgyal po
132a5(rgyud): dbang du bya na/ lam chen por brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// chom po rengs pa dang / rkun po rengs par bya na/ ra dza ko sha ta
132a6(rgyud): ki'i sa bon gyis sbyin sreg bgyis so/ me rengs par bya na seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te/ mar bcug na/ me rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// chu rengs par bya na/ ka l+ya ka'i
132a7(rgyud): sa bon chu'i nang du btab na/ chu rengs par 'gyur ro// dug gzhil na/ rma bya'i sgo yis so// mtshon rengs par byas na/ shing gnam lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba la bzlas
132a8(rgyud): te gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/ ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs na/ ting nge 'dzin stong thob par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rigs sngags
132b1(rgyud): 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge sgren ma nges pa lang gi gci bas dkyil 'khor grub ni pa cha shin du mdzes par byas te/ tsan dan gyi mchod par bya ning /
132b2(rgyud): gur gum dang / bla rtsi dang / ga phur gyis mchod nas/ me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas/ bum pa spos chus
132b3(rgyud): bkang ba bzhi bzhag la/ mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog phor bzhi spos chu bum pa'i dbus su bzhag par bya zhing / a ga ru'i bdug pa 'bul bar bya'o// bum pa'i steng du
132b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhag par bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing / spos kyi mar me bzhi bltam par bya/ mchod pa chen po bya'o// dkyil
132b5(rgyud): 'khor gyis dbus su dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
132b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku ston par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can brgya stong mang po'i 'dul na/
132b7(rgyud): ri'i rtse mor spong rtsa brgyad bzlas paso// sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas/ rdo rje'am mdung rtse gsum pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya mtshan mi bya zhing /
132b8(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i sdig pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ khro bos lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ gsor te na mkha' la 'phangs te/ bdud la sogs te sdang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro//
133a1(rgyud): las thams cad 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang / bsams pa thams cad 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ don yod
133a2(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa phyag rgya bcings te/ stong nyi shu bzlas na 'grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'dod pas/ stong sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas na/
133a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du spos chus bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bstan gyi sku gdung dang bcas pa lang mi/
133a4(rgyud): btad de khri bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs mnan te/ khri bzlas na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//
133a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje zhabs mnan te/ bzlas brjod lan stong byas nas/ gu gul gyi bdug pa 'bul bar byas na/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyi 'dun du
133a6(rgyud): 'dug par 'gyu ro// thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing / thams cad du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/ ma bsgrubs ma grags par 'grub cing / cho ga zhib mo mtha'
133a7(rgyud): yas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtse ba dang / byams pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par bstan to//
133a8(rgyud): go cha bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyis phung pos 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la/ rtag tu 'tshams bcad ba dang / phyogs kyi
133b1(rgyud): ba dang / yul bcing ba byas te/ bsrung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// go cha bgos par
133b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na/ yang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga
133b3(rgyud): zhib mo mchog las khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la// shes rab dang byang chub kyi sems thams cad dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par de bzhin gshegs
133b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis lung bstan to// nam sarba ta thA ga tA ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra/ badz+ra da ra bya/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma sa ka ru ni ka/ tsau ri tsi ri/ bai ri bi ri/ ma ha pa
133b5(rgyud): sta/ ka la ka la/ kai li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma ha sta ma pra ma ba ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ti tsa re shwaHra/ e h+ya hi sing h+ya/ sing t+ya/ bu t+ya bu d+ya/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ ki ni ki ni/ sa ra ma shud
133b6(rgyud): d+ha sad ta/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ra/ ma ha ba shu pa te di sha ra dang / haha/ hi hi/ hUM hUM/ au ka ra ma ha/ pra ma re she da ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ra smin sha Da/ ma ha pra ba
133b7(rgyud): man ti ta sha ri ri/ dz+wa la dz+wa ya/ pa ta pa ta/ ba ga ban/ so ma ti t+ya/ ya ma pa ru ru na/ ku re ba pra me na ta ri shi ka na/ tsing tsa ra na/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku ma ra rud
133b8(rgyud): tra/ tsasbu bas pa ngan da/ de 'jo ni sa ka/ ShA hu brI d+hid/ rtsigasapa/ dar dang / sa ran ta/ a ba mo kaM ta/ lo ke shwar/ ma he wA ra/ mu ya su ya/ sun pa sun mam \u0f7f/
134a1(rgyud): mA ta Da na tardza na ra tsa ta ka ra/ ag ni ud ka/ bi sha shasta/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ kan ka ma/ ba lo bod ting ga tsa/ du ra r+ya bang byas ma pra ka sha ka/ tha ma
134a2(rgyud): Ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma ha byang dand ka ra pra sha man/ mi li mi li/ e na ye ya tsarma ba ri ka ra/ e he hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud ta bi shu ya ni/ ba sin maha ka ru ni ka/ she yang tob
134a3(rgyud): ta rang na ma ku ta ma la du ra/ sa rbad nya sha ra si tri ta/ ka ru pu tar+ya na ba ma ti/ bi mo k+ka a pra kam bya/ shad pra ra ba ri pu ra ka/ ba hu sad hA san Ta/ te sa ri san Ta/ te sa ri sa tsa ke/
134a4(rgyud): sarba ma ra ti pra tu sta pa marda ka/ sarba sid da sha ra ba ri pu ra ka/ a thi shing tsang sarba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi she ki ra ba ga ban ta ma mo// ga ra tsa hUM phaT/ na mo s+tha te sAhA/
134a5(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi cho ga snga ma de lta bus las thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i zhes bya ba'i grub pas mchog las thams cad pa'o// // na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba sma ta b+ha ya/
134a6(rgyud): ta tha ga ta ya/ na ma ar+ya lo ki te sha ra ya/ bod te sad ta ya/ mahA sad tA yA/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ a mo ga bar da/ pa sha ha sta yA/ ma ha shud ta sad tA ya/ a gad tsa ba ga ba na/
134a7(rgyud): pad ma hasta/ ba ra tang ka rang gu le pad ma bud tse/ mahA pa shu ba ti be sha da re/ pra si sta shi gra ma ga tsa/ ma ha be ga pi pu sha/ ta ra mi ha ba ha pa/ a mo ga shud de/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa la tsa la/
134a8(rgyud): bod te sa twa ya/ a gad tsa/ b+ha ga ban/ a ba lo ki te sha ra/ ma ma g+han d+ha pus pa/ sa ma tsa na ya ma/ bri tid tsam/ tri rad na sar+yan/ a mo ga s+tha te swA hA// 'phags pa spyan ras
134b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug na/ a ga ru'i bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas so// na mo ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya bo te sa twa ya ma hA sa twa
134b2(rgyud): ya/ ma hA ga nu ni ka ya/ sarba ga nad ti bas te/ a mo ga bun pa rad ya/ sarba gnad ma le/ bi shu pri ye tsan tradra shi pri ye/ gan d+ha gnad+ha/ nul pa nas ma ma pra ti ma pa rab rab dus n+tu
134b3(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te dbul bya'o// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bod des twa ya/ mahA sad tA ya/ mahA ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/
134b4(rgyud): ma hA pra b+ha su bri ma le/ ma ha pra b+ha su bri ma le/ pA ma b+hi shi de te/ su ma ti sa ra te/ tu ru tu ru/ bid tsing tra su ba pa ma la/ bi bu shud de/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ du ru du ru/ a mo ga hri da
134b5(rgyud): ye/ pa ma de na ka ru ba tid tsa ma ma pu swa pa re swA hA/ me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul lo// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+yA pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bod de sad tA ya/
134b6(rgyud): maH sad tA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ ma hA b+hod d+he sadra ya ba re ba re/ s+pha ra sma ra/ b+ha ga b+han/ sa ma ya/ sarba ta tha ga ta swa sid te/ b+ha ga b+han/ a ba lo ka ya/ sarba sa twa ya/ a ba
134b7(rgyud): lo ki ni/ a ga pa ti ba sha ha ste/ sid de sid de sing dpra te/ si dan du te/ sid pu dardzas gsad/ du ru du ru/ sad te sa ma ya pa la ya swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/
134b8(rgyud): dran par bya ba'i rigs sngags so// na mo rang na tra ma yA/ na ma ma rgya ba lo ka te shwa ra ya/ bod ta~M sad hA ya/ maHsad tA ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ tu re tu re/ b+han dza da ra ya/
135a1(rgyud): #pad mdza ba be ga ta bar te/ be ga pe gad+hA t+ya d+huH/ sarba bai dzi la pri ye/ bud ta raHsa ngags rkyen mi li mi li swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags te/ man/
135a2(rgyud): bdun bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// na mo radra na tra ya yA/ nam ar+yA pa lo ka ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA ka ru ni ka ya/ a pra ti had/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ka ya b+ha ga
135a3(rgyud): a har a ha ra/ pad ma sa na/ pad ma bu rtse sha tang ga me/ shA tse pu tse shwa ta lu bi bu shud de/ dum dum/ dza la bu dang / darma sa ga a ta na swA hA/ mar ma'i rigs sngags te/ lan
135a4(rgyud): bdun bzlas pas so// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mA ar+ya pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya// map+na ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya tha/ oM pi ra pi ra pad ma a ga ma ga ma/ a mo ga dang hA sid ti/
135a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta ga ga na ra smi san tse ti te/ sarba bid d+yA ya da ra bi sho d+ha ni/ a ma ga sid ti swA hA/ spos nu dri zhim po'i bum pa la lan bdun bzlas te khrus bya'o// khrus kyi rigs sngags/
135a6(rgyud): na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki te sha ra yA/ b+ho d+hi satwa yA/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ dus me dum me/ pad me/ pad ma ni ra ba se shu d+he/ shud ta kan tsa na pra
135a7(rgyud): ba sa bi ma le/ shudang ra shre shud ci shu ci go tsa ra si te/ pad ma mang ba ba ti pra re ni swAhA/ gos kyi rigs sngags te lan bdun bzlas pas so// na mo rang na tA ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba la
135a8(rgyud): ki ti sha ra ya/ bo ti sa twa ya mahAs twa ya/ tat+ya \u0f7f/ sha me sha ma ya shan ti me/ ma mas s+ya ya na ku ru shan no/ si me sarba pas shan ta ka la na/ par po shan ti dzaM yang sid di/ b+ha ga bas/
135b1(rgyud): ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ sa ra sa swA hA/ mal cha la bsngags te nyal na/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa thams cad mi mthong ngo // na mo rad na tra ya yA/ nu ma ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/
135b2(rgyud): bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma ha sa twA ya/ mahA ka ru ni ka yA/ tad+ya tha/ na ga pra ka ra sha ne/ tib bya dza le/ dza la ba he sa la sang kro pa ya ya nan/ pad ma bi shud d+he bin dza le/ saM sho d+ha ya/ ad man
135b3(rgyud): da ra da ra da re sa li le swA hA/ chu'i sngags te khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i chu blangs la lan bdun bzlas te spyad do// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+yA ba lo ka ti shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi sa twa ya/
135b4(rgyud): ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ sarba sad tra he tang ka ra ya/ a mo g+ha pa sha pra ta ya/ sarba de ta mnan san pra ta yA/ de ban ga daM/ ya baM dz+ra ba dob gya pra daM ya/ pa ka la/
135b5(rgyud): pu ba ni bu pa ni be sha de na/ san pa ya/ ma ri po shu d+he swA hA/ dbul ba'i gsang sngag so// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA/
135b6(rgyud): ka ru ni ka ya/ sarba ngem su ra nam ta gr-i te/ sa ma sa da sad med/ pra pu ra na sa ma ma gan ta/ ba bsod dag na bi shud d+he/ mug ti pri be dza ye bi dza ye dza ya mor ma lco pa na ya ti su sha ma ya gan/
135b7(rgyud): dbang ni/ bi sho d+ha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ bi shud d+he pad ma bi shod d+ha na sA hA/ me tog gi snying po dor ba'i sngags so// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bo ti sa twa ya/
135b8(rgyud): mdas thas/ mahAg ru nags/ rgya ba/ dari na nad pa/ rang nab rgya/ shug kra ma po d+han/ shu rngam mi'i ma thoH/ shug sa theg d+han/ cung rgyas brgya na/ shud+ha bi le swAma?/ tsa kun/
136a1(rgyud): 'am ras kyi srang bu'am/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor bar byas na/ khung chu gag pa
136a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ mahA ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya tha/ dz+wa li dz+wa li dz+wa li bi me lo dza la/ pra ba pi ra me sur+ya ba rti/
136a3(rgyud): dza la ya pad ma la da re swAhA/ me'i sbyin bsregs kyi thal ba la lan bdun bzlas te/ kun tu gtor na/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyis nam yang mi tshugs so// na mo
136a4(rgyud): rad na tra ya yA na mo ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi sa tA ya/ ma hA sa tA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya tha/ dza le dza le/ dza la ba ti dza la pra ma ni/ na ga pra ba ni/ pe bya bi rA re/
136a5(rgyud): mi li mi li swA hA/ nye reg gi rigs sngags so// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya tha/ ri na ha ri ni/
136a6(rgyud): bi ga li bing ga la~M/ hi d+hid d+hi/ b+ha ga ban/ ni tsi la pa/ pra tsa la/ pra ti ti snga man/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma bu d+ha darma/ sang ga sa t+yai na sahA/ stegs bu 'am/ rtsa ku sha bting ba
136a7(rgyud): la lan bdun sngags pas so// stan gyi rigs sngags so// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na mA sarba ma na da la ni ba sin da ba ta na/ na mo bid d+ya ya te ba ta na Na/ sarba ka la ba sid d+ya na Na/
136a8(rgyud): na mo ar+ya ba lo ki shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi si twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ maha ka ru ni ka ya/ e t+yar+ya b+ha ga ba ti sad ma san da ri/ ma hA bi r+ya de ba ti/ tsa la tsa la/ pad ma sun da ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/
136b1(rgyud): su ru su ru swA hA/ nyin re bzhin me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / spos chus pho nya mo pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma/ gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma mchod nas/ bzlas brjod
136b2(rgyud): lan bdun byas na/ nams kyang bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugaso// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo kro d+ha ra dza ya/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa yA/ ma hA ka
136b3(rgyud): ru ni ka ya/ na ma sarba bi d+ya ku la paM sha s+ya/ tad+ya tha/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya pra ba bi ni/ sarba big na pra sha ma ni/ pad ma pi tho ba bi sh+le/ na ga na ga/ bi pu sha ta/ ka ma la pu tsa/ ta ra ta ra/
136b4(rgyud): ta ra ya ta ra ya/ ba ram ma mo ga tri da ya dza ye tri me tre/ ba ru da bu be/ ba ru da bu be/ sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta ya sa ma ya/ ba ra ba ra/ pu ru bu ru/ pra ma pa sha
136b5(rgyud): da ra bi pu shi ta ta na/ ma hA ba ya ha re/ a ba lo ka ya bi lo ka ya/ sarba sad pa lo ka ni/ ba ra ba ra de swA hA/ las thams cad pa'i rigs sngags so// khyad pa ra dA ni/ rigs
136b6(rgyud): sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na/ 'khor ba'i las mi rnams bsrung bar bya'o// na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ mahA sa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni
136b7(rgyud): ka ya/ tad+ya tha/ ma ra ma ra/ sa ra sa ra/ band ba nad na/ sa man te na/ a mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ bud d+ha d+harma/ saM ga sing te na swA hA/ thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
136b8(rgyud): bzlas te yul bcing ngo // na mo rang na tra ya yA/ mam ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ mnyes te ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya ba/ ti ga ban da ni/ a mo g+ha a pra ti ha
137a1(rgyud): mu ru mu ru/ su ru su ru/ du ru du ru/ sarba big na big na sha ni/ pad ma sa ra bi bu shi de ti/ b+hud d+ha/ d+harma sang ga t+yen b+han da a tsi ta/ ba ra de
137a2(rgyud): swAhA/ spyan drangs te phyin phyogs bcing bar bya'o// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki ti/ shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ ted+ya thA/
137a3(rgyud): hi li hi li/ mi li ye si ri si ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ma dra mi/ ma na da ra/ da ra da ra/ gad tsa gad tsa/ b+ha ga ban/ ar+ya pa lo ki te/ shwa ra ya/ sh+tsa b+ha ga b+han/
137a4(rgyud): tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pad me swA hA/ me tog ci snyed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ skem ma nas phul slar gshegasu gsol bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi
137a5(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i khro bo'i chen po'i snying po'i mchog bsgrub na/ bslab sla ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi mchog
137a6(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// cho ga zhib mo grub pa'i tshe/ kho bo rgyal po bsgrub pa'i mchog don yod pa'i rigs sngags mchog 'di bshad par bya/ don yod rgyal po khro chen gyi/ snying
137a7(rgyud): bongs pa grub na/ cho ga zhib mo grub pa de/ khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa mchog/ grub pa'i mchog de don yod pa/ rigs sngags 'di ni bshad par bya'o// gang dag
137a8(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyi na/ chog zhib mo mchog grub pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya stong gis gzigs par gyur pa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag
137b1(rgyud): brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba/ bsod nams kyi phung po bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
137b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba/ stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad don yod pa/ de kho na nyid bsgrub 'grub pa/ dran pa tsam gyi mdo la ni/ sa gzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la/
137b3(rgyud): sum bcu lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing / lha bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas// klu rnams 'dar ni yid yod cing // gnod sbyin srin po bros 'gyur ba// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed che/
137b4(rgyud): rigs sngags rgyal po bla na med// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas// dpung dang bcas shing bzhon bcas pa'i// las skyes 'bar ba'i phreng can kun// 'dar yeng kun tu 'dar yid yod//
137b5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi po yi// gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // de dag thams cad 'dus 'gyur nas// 'jig rten dbang la skyabs song zhing // bcom ldan mgon po
137b6(rgyud): skyabs du gsol// thugs rje'i bdag nyid bskyab du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom 'das ga la ba
137b7(rgyud): der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// nga bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i snying po rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po gang gis klags
137b8(rgyud): pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu grub cing / 'dran pa tsam gyi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/
138a1(rgyud): @#dngos grub dang / mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i
138a2(rgyud): nang du yongasu bsgrags par 'gyi'o// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na ma a mi da ba ya/ ta tha ga ta ya/ na mo d+ya ba lo gi te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/
138a3(rgyud): oM padad+ma me pad me/ pad ma da ra bi bu shi ta pu rmo// tsa ra tsa ra/ pra ma bi shang ra/ ba ra ba ra/ bi tsad tra me'u le da ra/ ma ni kan badz+ra ba dUr+ya lang tri ta sha ri ra/ ha ra ta ra ra ya b+ha ga ban/ bgag
138a4(rgyud): ba ti pe ran/ du ru du ru/ a mo g+ha ba sha ta ste/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra/ da ya ka sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ti/ ba ha bo d+hi sa twa ba ra ba ra da/ pad ma sa na/ pad ma ge sa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba
138a5(rgyud): ta tha ga ta a bi she ka/ a bi shi ga te/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ pa la pa la/ ma ha ba ga da ra/ bi kri ta ya na daM/ sta ka ra la/ ma ha de tsa/ da ra da ra/ bi pu la tsa na sa ra da/ ma hA ka ru ni ka
138a6(rgyud): me ha pa shu pa ta/ ba sha da ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra ma ra pu n+ya sam pa ra/ sug tang na sa ma ti/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki te/ i sho ra ma hA shwa ra/ du sdang ma ka du bral da ma ka/ wa da ra tsa maH
138a7(rgyud): be ga dar/ sa ma sa ma ma hA su ma pra ba sta/ tsan tra su s+ya sa ti re ka pra ba/ ma la ma la/ sarba ma la bi shad ka/ sarba re shi ka na/ sanaHti/ mahA ma hi shwa ra du ba dur/ a mi da ba dzin la
138a8(rgyud): ki tra dza ta/ tak+ki ne tsan ta/ la kri ta shi ra/ ma tha ma tha/ sarba rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sa pu ta ga na/ ban tsan ka/ ta ra ta ra ta/ ga na sa mA lang ki ta na kra tra ma la/ sarba bi ga na bi na sha na ka ra
138b1(rgyud): ba ra me tra tsang tra ma hA ka ru ni ka/ ba ra ba ra ba ri purnam na de pa/ se'u mya mu kha shad pa ba raM mi ta pi ra bu ra ka/ mi li mi li/ e ne ya rtsa rma ni ba sa na/ bya gra tsarmad
138b2(rgyud): ri ya/ da ra dar/ sarba ta tha ga ta ma pa lo ki ti dra ni/ tri ri tri shu la da ra badz+ra dz+wa la dar/ a mo ga pa sha ha sta ya ma pa ru ni ka be ra ru pa da ra/ na gra na dra tu/ ba ra re bi ma la bi
138b3(rgyud): shud d+hi d+ha d+ha/ sarba ba ba pra sha ma ka/ sa ra ki la bi sha na sha ka/ tre lok+Sha ba shang ka ra/ sarba sad ta bi sho d+ha ga/ bo d+hi sid ta ba ra sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi te/ oM bad ma b+hi bu shi ta shud+d+he/
138b4(rgyud): d+hi ra d+hi ra do// a ba lo ga ya man/ sa ma sa ma/ sarba kar karma/ ma me sa d+ha ya/ sid de gu h+ya ni ba ni/ ba ra da hUM phaT/ na ma sta de swA hA/ grub pa don yod pa rigs sngags
138b5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu/ 'byung po'i tshogs dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad kha sgrub 'gyel te/ gcig tu 'bar
138b6(rgyud): bar gyur cing / gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' nas/ ba spu langs te/ skrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad
138b7(rgyud): dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / skrag par gyur pa'i lha dang / lha ma yin de dang / drang srong spa gong
138b8(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / rgya mtshon gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / sgra dang / klu gang dag chun gnas pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra de dang / lha gang dag lang gi grod
139a1(rgyud): khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang / rigs sngags 'chang gis 'khar los sgyur ba thams cad gang dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / nam
139a2(rgyud): mkha'i lha thams cad 'khrug par gyur nas/ nam mkha' las babs ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
139a3(rgyud): phyag de la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa pad ma ku mu ta dang / ud pa la dang / pun ta ri ka dang / man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po'i cher dang / lha'i
139a4(rgyud): rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub pa tsam ri bo ta lar babs ste/ lha'i sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs len cing / ha ha ba po dang / gzhi'i sgra ston nas/ bcom ldan 'das
139a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ sems can thams cad kyi don du rigs sngags chen po 'di bshad do// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi
139a6(rgyud): sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod
139a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ mu tig gi do zhal brgya stong ri ba phul/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sngags chen po cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshad do// don yod pa'i rgyal po rig pa chen po'i
139a8(rgyud): snying po mgon po thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag ngan yod pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa'i mchog las thams cad 'grub pa bshad du gsol/
139b1(rgyud): de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dbang byag gis/ ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i chung bar rgya gzhib ma grub padan med pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal ba'os kyi zla
139b2(rgyud): gzugs bsgrub pa'i mchog gi cho ga dang / yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa/ ras grub ni kun nas lags par phye ba kha tshar ma bcad pa sgra med pa/ ri mo mkhan gtsang cal khrus
139b3(rgyud): byas pas gos gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas/ tshen lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag la bri bar bya ste/ dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
139b4(rgyud): dbang phyug ral pa'i phor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing / rgyal po 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ thor thugs kyis g.yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ ri dgas e na ya'i lpags
139b5(rgyud): pa gon pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i steng na/ pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs
139b6(rgyud): zhal dbu ma zhi zhil ba'i bzhin 'dzum pa/ zhal g.yas pa 'jig su rung ba khro gnyer can thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/
139b7(rgyud): zhal g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin bsgyur cing mche ba brtsigs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa
139b8(rgyud): rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can spyan stong par bya zhing / bzhi pa dbug 'byin pa'i
140a1(rgyud): byaphyag du bya ste/ 'od 'dom gang ba 'khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs su lha mo sgrol ma mdzes pa bag dang bcas shing lus
140a2(rgyud): btud pa/ mchod sbyin pa phyag rgya la mig gtod par bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma mdzes bag dang bcas pa/ gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing don yod pa'i zhags
140a3(rgyud): pa la mig gtod par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin ma ral pa gcig ma bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes pa'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o// phyogs gnyis par lha mo phyag na pad
140a4(rgyud): ma thogs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes pa'i 'og tu pho nya mo gsang sngags kyis rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o// 'og
140a5(rgyud): tu gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen pos me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom
140a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ dbang phyug gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jig su rung ba'i gang
140a7(rgyud): rgyangs can khro ba'i don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra bar bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po ta la na/ gzhal med
140a8(rgyud): khang dang bcas pa mthong bar rigs par bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po bcu/ sems can chen po dmyal ba
140b1(rgyud): chen po brgyad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// ngam pa'i chas spong ba dang /
140b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad smos pa 'am mthong ba tsam gyi modo la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar med pa la bzhol ba'i mthar thugs pa yang yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// /
140b3(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan
140b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing / dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ shi nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas
140b5(rgyud): tshe rabs brgya stong phrag lngar rjes su dran par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur na//
140b6(rgyud): lhag par mang du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
140b7(rgyud): 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas/ btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis/
140b8(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs bslu bar byed pa de'i spyan sngar ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod par byed na/ des na
141a1(rgyud): khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par byas ste/ don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying ba snying phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas shing / gazlas brjod chog chen po byas pa min nano/ da nan/
141a2(rgyud): khro badzin yod pa'i zhags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar mi smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te/ chus dbang bskur ba des na khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang
141a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod pa grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo mchen po'i
141a4(rgyud): gzungs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku bzugs kyis spyan sngar mngon sum thal mo sbyar te/ 'dug nas lan bdun bzlas te/ bskor ba ldan byas te/ chu'i mchod yon
141a5(rgyud): dang / lha bshos dang / bdug pos dang me tog phul nas phyag 'tshalo zhes smras nas/ des na khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgyar bzlas par

141a7(rgyud): byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du mig gtad de/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis snying khar bzhag pa'i tshul 'di/ phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par
141a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa
141b1(rgyud): gyun ras gzigs dbang phyag dan yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po brgya stong brag khri bzlas brjod byas par 'dod ba dang / ngan yong ba'i nags pa'i phyag rgya 'di la na brgya stong zag khrir byas par 'dzud /
141b2(rgyud): des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas/ gnas gtsang zhing dben pa'i gnas sam/ 'chags 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ phug bam/ ri'i
141b3(rgyud): rtse mo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khar gsar gtsang sbra dang / byi ngor byas te/ ba ser mo'i lci ba legs par mnyes te/ bal las byung lnga dang bsres te/ bskud pa la spos sna tshogs kyis byug
141b4(rgyud): pa byas na/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ gur gum gyis khru do pa'i tshad tsam bris la/ bla rtsi dang / ga bur gyis mchod par bya'o// dri chab kyi bum
141b5(rgyud): pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ ras kyi 'gul bcings kyis bcings la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o// me tog dang / 'dug spos kyi dri zhim po dang / me tog gi phreng ba nyi shu
141b6(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bya'o// stegs bu'i steng du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod bzhag
141b7(rgyud): par bya'o// 'o thug dang sbyar thug dang / khan da kha da ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lan san dang / bu ras dang / zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod bzhag par bya/ a ga ru nag po dang / tsan dan dkar po/
141b8(rgyud): dang / gzurang dang / kutu ru dang / shi ribs ka dang / cung seng rnams snod dang bzhag nas/ a ga ru'i lam sreg shing gis sbyin sregs bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar gyi
142a1(rgyud): mar me sum bcu rtsa gnyis bskam par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing / khrus legs par byas pas/ tshes bcu ban
142a2(rgyud): nas bcwo lnga'i bar du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/

142a4(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i grub pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de na ras kyi sku gzugs las
142a5(rgyud): 'od zer bdun byung na/ kun nas rnam par byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar bzhag par 'gyur ro// bzhag pa tsam gyi mod
142a6(rgyud): la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba bu ldang bar 'gyur/ mdog mdangs yongasu dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
142a7(rgyud): gi mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya sor mo las/ lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya 'bar bar 'gyur/ byag na
142a8(rgyud): pad ma'i lom g.yo bar 'gyur/ rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu leg so// logs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags

142b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gzugs ston par mdzad do// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do// 'di ni grub pa'i mchog bla na med pa ste/ ma bsgrub par las byed pa'o// de nas dbang du bya
142b3(rgyud): bar 'dod na/ me tog pad ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang gi ming nas brjed de dbang du 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog
142b4(rgyud): la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul lo// yang lan bdun bzlas nas/ me tog snyim pa blangs te/ gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyuraro//
142b5(rgyud): gdon gyi zin pa la byin na/ gdon thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// nad gyis thebs pa la byin na/ nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor gter na/
142b6(rgyud): rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro bsreg pa'i steng du btor na/ sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongs grol bar 'gyur ro// mnar med pa
142b7(rgyud): na gnas pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams la gtor na/ ska ci de las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// nyal ba'i sngas su bzhag na/ rmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags

143a1(rgyud): bzhin byegyi ba'in grang bar 'gyur ro/ rgyal ba'i sring du ga na zan pa du 'gyur / lha'i bzugs partan gyi nga du na/ 'gug pa gru
143a2(rgyud): las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mig sman bsgrub par 'ong pas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar smig sman sdang ros la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ 'grub pa'i chags bcu ston par
143a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'bar ba dang dbu pa byung ba dang / dung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ nges mig la bskus na mig snang bar 'gyur ro/ gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi
