143a5(rgyud): yan lag dang nying lag la bskus na/ na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// spyi bor thig le byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon par 'gyur ro// mig la byug na khyab
143a6(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad 'grub byed do// mtshan mo mgo la bskus na/ kau ni mo bzhin
143a7(rgyud): du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khas bus nas dor bar bya'o// rang gi lus la byugs na/ tsa sring 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur ro//
143a8(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ che bskal pa stang thub par 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang snying khar bskus pa byas na/
143b1(rgyud): nag pa chen po'i gzug su 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad kyis gzugs ston par 'gyur ba nas/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna chags ma
143b2(rgyud): po ston par 'gyur/ zla ba dang / nyi ma ston par 'gyur ro/ ldong ros dang / 'di wang dang / se'u bi rig dang / gur gum dang / ku ku sa la don yod grub pa khri bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags
143b3(rgyud): pa'i snying po khri stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ thams cad du mi smra bar bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btags la ras kyi
143b4(rgyud): sku bzugs la mngon du phyogs te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang mgon la/ tshes bcwo lnga la nyin zhag gcig snang ba byas na/ phye ma zhing du btags te/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /
143b5(rgyud): khro bo'i snying po dang / don yod par grub pa'i rigs sbas kyi rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pa
143b6(rgyud): chen po bya nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod byas la/ nyin zhags gcig srung ba byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa
143b7(rgyud): gcig bzlas pa byas ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag brgya byas khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu mig la bskus na/ don yod pa'i grub pa'i gzungs bzlas pa byas na/ bskus
143b8(rgyud): pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo tal na babs/ gnal med khang dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ri bo to lan gnas pa mthong
144a1(rgyud): par 'gyur // bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de zhin gshegs pa'ang pag med chos 'chang ba mdzang ba 'gyur/ chos bshad pa
144a2(rgyud): de yang thos par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa ldan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong
144a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / chos bshad pa'i gsung gi sgra de yang bos par 'gyur ro/ 'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rigs su skyes pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa gang
144a4(rgyud): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing / rmi lam du ston par mdzad// /
144a5(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// zhon yong zhags pa'i snying po dngos grub sbyin par bya 'gyuraro// lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//
144a6(rgyud): lha'i bde ba nyam su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thebs pa thams cad la mig sman 'di bskus na/ nang thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dug thams cad la
144a7(rgyud): bskus pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ mi mthong bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / g.yon can dang / chom po dang / rkun po thams
144a8(rgyud): cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshon bzang ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug la mig la bsdus na/ thams cad rgyal zhing len thebs par
144b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo thams cad du mig la bskus na/ g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpung gi tshogs rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ mig la bskus/
144b2(rgyud): na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi smra ba grong khyer du song na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo grong khyer du gnas sa tshogs thams cad dang du 'gyur ra/
144b3(rgyud): mig g.yas pa la bskus na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mthong ba de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mig g.yon pa la bskus na/ rigs ngan pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
144b4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ don yod pa grub pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
144b5(rgyud): la mchod pa byas na/ de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro ba'i rgyal po dang / gzungs thams cad so so lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
144b6(rgyud): stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi mngon sum du mthong ba thos par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ sngon gyis
144b7(rgyud): sgrib pa gnar med pa'i gan su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su skye 'dran par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchon
144b8(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// phyag g.yon pa mnan te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ lha dang /
145a1(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa la sogs pa skrag par 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// gang gi tshe dgon pa 'byung ba'i de'i tshe/
145a2(rgyud): don yod par grub pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa byas na/ lha dang / klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar
145a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lce'i gnas su bzlas te mnan na/ klu la sogs pa thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyu ro// snyan du lan brgya
145a4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ gang dang gang du song ba der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ blon po 'am/ thon mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
145a5(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma la gang bsam pa dang / gang bcol ba dang / gang smras pa'i las de thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dbus nas bzung ste bzlas na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du
145a6(rgyud): dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang bskur shing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// thog mar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas bzlas pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis mnan te stong phrag
145a7(rgyud): bcu bzlas pa byas na sa'i 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur ste/ mngag bzhugs thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// pad ma'i stong bu rtsa
145a8(rgyud): brgyad bzlas nas/ pad ma'i tshe'u ru bor na/ pad+ma zad mi shes par 'byung zhing / pad+ma dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// ud pa la la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/
145b1(rgyud): sung ba la'i che 'ur bar na/ ud ba la'i spyan mos 'ang mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur shing / rnams kyang nyams par mi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar tshur/
145b2(rgyud): de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog dang / gnad ya shi ka dang / yu ti ka dang / na pa ma li'i me tog rnams kyang dus thams cad me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par
145b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang / me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ skyed mos tshal lam/ nag tshal gyi nang du gtor na/ 'bras bu zad mi shes shing / dus thams cad
145b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dpal chen po dgug par 'dod pas/ pra tshil lha mo dpal chen mo'i dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag
145b5(rgyud): na pad ma thogs pa/ zang rgyas pa byas la/ 'bras bu dang / me tog bkram par bya zhing / ga bur dang / tsan dan dkar po'i mchod pa byas la/ ras kyi sku
145b6(rgyud): gzugs kyi spyan sngar bzhag par bya zhing / sngar tsan dan dkar po las byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
145b7(rgyud): phyag gi sku gzugs la/ a ga ru'i 'dug pas dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / gnyis ka la mchod pa dang /
145b8(rgyud): bsnyen bskur bya/ gtor ma dkar po dang / dri chab dbul bar bya/ mchod yon snod dbul bar bya ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing /
146a1(rgyud): gos bcang mas bgos pas mngon du phyogs da dkyil mo dbyung du 'dugan/ don yod pa'i gags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byam sa/ na
146a2(rgyud): pa'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / me tog ladzin yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i mgo la bdags par bya'o// ma chog gan
146a3(rgyud): gyis mchod par bya zhing / can dan dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug thos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
146a4(rgyud): snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya zhing / yung kar re re la bzlas nas/ dpal lha mo chen mo la ma snun par bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal snga mo chen mo 'bang bar/
146a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gser du snang bar 'gyur ro// dpal chen po bgug
146a6(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na/ nyin re bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dpal lha mo chen
146a7(rgyud): mo la dus gsum du mchod par bya zhing / mchod yon gyi snod kyang bzhag par bya/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya/ sbyin pa bya/ longs spyod par bya/ bsod nams kyang bya/
146a8(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// dpal lha mo chen mo rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i snying
146b1(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi zhing / can dan gyi ri lu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad mang ba
146b2(rgyud): dang / rabal lha mtshan mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lha nor bu dang / gser dang mu tig gis brgyan pa/ lus snang gsal/ zhal pad ma khabye ba lta bu/ spyan srung ba la rdzo
146b3(rgyud): po lta bur gsal ba pad ma bsnams pa/ gdan pad ma nor bu dang / rin po che dang / gser 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa/
146b4(rgyud): lha'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lha'i brgyan pas/ lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa/ mang pos yongasu bskor ba mdun na 'khod par 'gyur te/
146b5(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang gis 'jig par mi bya zhing / sems dga' bar byas la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// // na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo ar+ya
146b6(rgyud): ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ ma hA a mo ra d+ha ya/ tad+ya tha/ oM pad mi ni pad mi ni tra prad pa ra ge pad ma da re/ pad ma ba ti/ pad ma bri ye
146b7(rgyud): pad ma pra b+he/ pad ma 'gi'u ri/ pad ma sa na pra te shing te/ a ba lo ki ti bri yi ba ra de ba ra da yi/ ni pra si ta/ pra sa ta ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ar+ya ba lo ki ti be ra te/ phu ru hu ru/
146b8(rgyud): ba rang gi ni tsa la tsa la/ pad ma'i bu shi sta/ pad+ma bri ye bri rtsi ta/ bi ma nad re ba ra ba ra saM ba ra/ sma sa ma ya/ ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya sa me/ sad h+ya a ti sha na/ de'i
147a1(rgyud): @a mo ba sha ba ra de hUM/ na mo tu te swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis/ lha mo dpal chen mo phyag brgyad ste rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par/
147a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur/ rigs kyi bre tshur shog/ thugs las skyes pa/ gsung las skyes pa/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro dang bcas
147a3(rgyud): ba grub kyis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya'i gzungs la bzhugs shing / nga'i gnas la rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams cad byos shig
147a4(rgyud): de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yang rigs sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya pa la
147a5(rgyud): ti shwa ra yA/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka yA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ ma tri dza de tri/ ba ra ba ra/ a ba lo ki ta ba ta de/ kri ri ni sri pa du/ am pa/ sam pa/
147a6(rgyud): bi pu la ki ri ki ri pra bu ra bu rtse/ a mo ga ba sha ha ste swA hA/ de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo chen mo'i nu ma gnyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rgyun de khas zed de/
147a7(rgyud): 'thungs pa tsam gyis mad la/ lha'i me tog pad ma dang / ku mu ta lhar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su gyur/ sgra cung zad 'khyil zhing 'khyil la/ mig ud pa la sngon po lta bu dang / tshig
147a8(rgyud): gsal zhing mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ don yod pas rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad ma la rnam par blta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bum pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po//
147b1(rgyud): mngon gsum du gyur cho gzhib ma mang po 'grub par 'gyur/ tshe lo stong phrag bcu thub par 'gyur/ rgyal po 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs gcig tu gnas med
147b2(rgyud): khang mchog na/ chos 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ nor bu chen po pad+ma la lta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur/
147b3(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis su bu 'gyur/ de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
147b4(rgyud): sras gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bu'i gtso bor gcig pur
147b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/ thams cad du stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
147b6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rims par phye ba'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po shes pa'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo zab mo dag mngon gsum du 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyi gnas dang / klu thams
147b7(rgyud): cad kyi gnas dang / mi 'am tsa thams cad kyi gnas dang / phug dang / khrus kyi gnas thams cad sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad sgo 'bye bar 'gyur ro//
147b8(rgyud): thams cad du 'gyur zhing / bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa/ bla ma gcig pu/ 'jig rten mgon po dran par mchod pa'i gnas su
148a1(rgyud): / 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur/ dpal chen mo lha mo 'khor
148a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa la sbyin bsreg bgyis na/ rigs sngags 'chang de la bu bzhin du byams pas/ rang nyid bsnyen bkur yongs su spyad pas yongasu spyad do// 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid du
148a3(rgyud): 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / shang ka shi la dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / lha'i nor bu
148a4(rgyud): rin po che'i bar thams cad du sbyin par byed do// yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang po mang po sbyin par byed cing / lha'i bza' ba dang / btung bA ra dang / bdud rtsi'i bar du sbyin par byed do// gnas
148a5(rgyud): thams cad du song ba na yang rtag tu rgyan mi chad par bu la bos pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can
148a6(rgyud): ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rigs sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang mchog tu 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na 'byor pa ci lta ba bzhin du rgyal bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug
148a7(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug chen po dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen rdo rje 'chang gi tshogs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin chen po gsang ba po'i 'khor rnams dang / rtag tu rgyun
148a8(rgyud): mi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yongasu bskor/
148b1(rgyud): bskor nas/ nyin mtshan du bsrung ba dang / bslab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/ nganas don yong ba'i rgyamamatshan bu chen po padam la lha ba'i dpal drim med pa zhes bya dzin man
148b2(rgyud): pa'i gags pa'i cho ga nib ma ba zlas pas grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ba'i glang gi byam ga zag khrig brgya nga
148b3(rgyud): khrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul za mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ dge slong na/
148b4(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis/ lha'i nor bu chen po/ nor bu rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i gser dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang /
148b5(rgyud): lha'i gos dang / lha'i brgyan dang / lha'i dri dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams re re zhing / 'phang du ri'i rgyal po ri rib tsam gyi phung po byas nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung
148b6(rgyud): gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de lta bu
148b7(rgyud): so sor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo gcig gi bar du dbul bar byed/ mchod par byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa re re spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan
148b8(rgyud): ba'i til mar rgya mtsho tsam gyis bkang ba'i mar me bskam par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yong su bzung bar 'gyur/ g.yo te don yod pa'i rgya mtshor
149a1(rgyud): nor bu chen po pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa'i/ ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i zhing po 'ang ldog pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi zu za
149a2(rgyud): chen po de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu
149a3(rgyud): bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung ston par 'gyur/ dpal l+h+wa me chen mo yang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur zhing /
149a4(rgyud): dus kun du de'i khyim du gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal lha mo gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas sa
149a5(rgyud): phyogs de nyid du gnas par gyur te/ dpal lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug
149a6(rgyud): chen po'i rigs sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag brgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul spyod pa dang / las sna tshogs gzhan dag pas dpal lha mo chen po'i
149a7(rgyud): mchog tu bsten to// dpal lha mo chen mo ni/ thams cad kyi ma yin no// dpal lha mo chen mo ni/ don yong pa'i mchog sbyin pa la/ don yod pa'i grags pa rgya chen sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i
149a8(rgyud): nam mkha' gzhal med khang 'chang ba'o// don yod pa'i yon tan sgrags pa'o// mchog sbyin pa'o// dpal lha mo chen mo ni zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od byed pa/ gnas sum bcu gnyis kyi nang na dpal
149b1(rgyud): lhas canam mchog tu bstan pa// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas khrus legs par byas pa chus bsags shing b.las byung ba lngas byugs pa gos gtsang ma bgos// kha zas
149b2(rgyud): ma bza' bar bya zhing / sha dang / chang dang / gtsang dang / lkog kya dang / ke'u rnams dang 'dres pa dang / 'phags pa rnams yongasu spangs par bya/ khabs ngan pa dang / btu
149b3(rgyud): ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma can yongasu spangs par bya/ sems can ngan pa dang / rten ngan pa dang / ngan g.yo can dang / gsod skyen can dang / skye bo ngan pa dang / khrel med
149b4(rgyud): pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa dang / bral ba dang / thub cod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongasu spangs par bya/ gnas ngan pa dang / bsgo nyes pa dang / bza' nyes pa dang / grib ma ngan
149b5(rgyud): pa yongasu spangs par bya/ gcig gis gcig 'bags pa kha zas ngan pa yongasu spang bar bya zhing / dri dang dug spos kyis yongasu bsangs te/ mi smra bar bzlas brjod bya'o// byams
149b6(rgyud): ba dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba'i sems dang yid dge bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing / snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i semasu byas nas/ bzlas brjod bya'o//
149b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpa' lha mo chen mo
149b8(rgyud): la can ngan gyi badrug pa dbul bar bya zhing / dus ji lta ba'i ma cag dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'azlas te/ thams cad la dbul bar bya'o
150a1(rgyud): na mo ran dram sa/ nam sa bal ga tan ras/ mgyis ta ma/ mthus tas/ ma ga tsu kak+Sha/ rgya/ oM thun mam/
150a2(rgyud): gan da sa re a mo ga dza la sam par ni/ pad ma sam bu ri ta ra ta pa mu ti te hUM swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang mchod yon
150a3(rgyud): dbul lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun
150a4(rgyud): bzlas/ a ga ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / ji snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ spos dang ldan pa'i til gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / de nyid kyi zhabs drung du dkyil mo
150a5(rgyud): dkrung du 'dug la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas te/ snying po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
150a6(rgyud): phyag rgya lan bdun bcing bar byas na/ bcings pa tsam gyi mo la sku gzugs g.yos par 'gyur ro// zhes sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par
150a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs sku gzugs ston par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa thams cad yong su stsol bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin
150a8(rgyud): par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i phyogs thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbugs kyang sbyin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di la nang thams cad
150b1(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa
150b2(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe/ rigs sngags
150b3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor bar byas na/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang / rmug par byas par 'gyur ro//
150b4(rgyud): 'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags 'di yin no// na mo rang na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bod d+he sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ mahA ka ru ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/
150b5(rgyud): oM a mo ga pa sha hri da ya/ pad mi ni ba ra de/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ri ta pad ma bu rtse swA hA/ snying po'i rigs sngag so// oM a lo ki ta sad ma ni/ pa rang ga ni/
150b6(rgyud): du ru du ru swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i gzungs/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i
150b7(rgyud): gzungs kyi rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/ 'tshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod sbyin par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras
150b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dus kun du sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad las yongasu
151a1(rgyud): #/ grol bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ gdon thams cad la mtshan sna lnga'i srang bul lanam nu
151a2(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la/ gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul du btags na/ gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ gal te nag sa
151a3(rgyud): chen dong / ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa yang gdon thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// srung ba nag pos rims nyin bzhi pa las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro//
151a4(rgyud): gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar pos rtsal bar bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad 'gi wa nga la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thig
151a5(rgyud): le byas na/ thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur/ snying kar thig le byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad
151a6(rgyud): kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// lag pa thil la thig le byas na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro// smin 'tshams su thig le
151a7(rgyud): byas na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// 'gul bar byugs na/ rje rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung ba gnyis la byugs na/ rgyal
151a8(rgyud): rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur rol// bral ba'i sgra mtsham su thig le byas na/ bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na/ dmang rigs
151b1(rgyud): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje nga la byugs na/ dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba med par 'gro zhing / sbar zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ nang pa'i 'thig la bskus na/ chu klung chen pon
151b2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho'i pha rol du rgal bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ byad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// pus mo gnyis la byugs na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar
151b3(rgyud): zhing rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na/ tsan dan dang / pu shel ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te/ mig la bskus na/ mtshan mo yang nyin bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// gter thams
151b4(rgyud): cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / gal te de skal ba stong du bzhag pa zhig na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lhor bskus na/ ji srid du lho chus ma bkrus pa de srid kha zas dang / btung ba mi
151b5(rgyud): 'dod par 'gyur ro// pho mtshan la bskas na khu ba 'gegs pa byas par 'gyur ro// ba las byang ba lnga dang bsres nas btungs na/ lus dag cing dri ma med la gtsang zhing sprod pa gtsang ma dang
151b6(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// bsgom nyes dang / bza' nyes dang / dri ma ngan pa dang / blta nyes su mi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sgrig
151b7(rgyud): pa thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byang sde mas thams cad
151b8(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur/ gsang sngags dang / sbyor ba dang / gtong ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing / thams
152a1(rgyud): cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ pas kyi rgol pa dang / mi mnga' ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ kun mar
152a2(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar te/ tho rangs kyi dus su mi smra bar byas nas zos na/ klags pas tshig su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba zhags bdun byas na/ bstan bcos thams
152a3(rgyud): cad mngon par 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyor ba byas na/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba thams cad 'grub par
152a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// zla ba gcig bzhin du sbyor ba byas na/ thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba lo gcig gi bar du byas na/ che lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams
152a5(rgyud): cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang / tshig brtsan par 'gyur ro// til mar dang lhan cig bskol te mgo la bskus na/ skra cung zad gyen du 'khyil cing lcang lo can du 'gyur ro//
152a6(rgyud): bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bskus na/ ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu ta ltar 'jam par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad la byugs na/ mar dang 'dra bar
152a7(rgyud): 'jam par 'gyur zhing / rkang lag shin du gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ rna ba la byugs na rna ba ci tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na glad pa'i nang na sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snabs
152a8(rgyud): dang / mchil ma mi 'byung bar/ lha'i spos kyi dri mnan par 'gyur zhing / nam yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnan par mi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so rgal ba/
152b1(rgyud): yang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mid pa'i nang dang / skye 'gas pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// 'jam tsam du byas te/
152b2(rgyud): rna ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba can dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na 'gi wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par
152b3(rgyud): bya'o// de nas legs par grub po dge ba mchog tu dge ba/ dge bar 'gro ba mig bskang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
152b4(rgyud): bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas na/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad mo la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad
152b5(rgyud): bzlas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing / khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la smig rkang gi ri lu khar bcug na/ ji snyed bshad pa dang klags pa
152b6(rgyud): 'dzan par 'gyur ro// lce pad ma dang / ku mu ta'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par de la lha'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang la smras pa de
152b7(rgyud): ngag bran po dang / bran mo bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/ gang la dri mnan pa de yang dbang du 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su gyur pa yang dbang du byed do/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po
152b8(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dris des
153a1(rgyud): #'byer bar 'gyur zhing / byams pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung ba gams pa la btags na/ lags pas spang ba chen po non par 'gyur/ skabs dang / bcom/
153a2(rgyud): 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro// byad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang ba'i mthu stobs dang 'dra ba'i ston par 'gyur/ mgul du btags te g.yul ngor song na/ gcig pur
153a3(rgyud): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// spyi bor bzhag nas rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang /
153a4(rgyud): blon po chen po dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / spyi bo la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ lag pa la btags na/ gang
153a5(rgyud): la reg pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser las reg pa tsam gyis zad mi shes par 'gyur/ sa bon btab pa dang / gdab
153a6(rgyud): par byas na zad mi shes par 'phel bar 'gyur/ rin po che'i lag pa dang / pad ma 'dra bar 'gyur/ 'bras bu'i phung po 'phel bar 'gyur/ nyi ma re re zos na dran pa dang ldan pa dang / blo gros chen po 'phel
153a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ 'bras dang / mdze dang / ldog pa dang / lu ta dang / shu ba
153a8(rgyud): dang / g.yan pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / phol mig la byugs pa tsam gyi mod la 'jig par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// sbyor ba zla ba cig tsam du byas na/ cho ga zhib mo dang /
153b1(rgyud): gsang sngags rims par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mchog 'grub par 'gyur/ dus kun tu lus la thogs na mtshon gzas pas lus la mi 'jug go// chom rkun dang /
153b2(rgyud): g.yon can thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur/ til mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ klad pa na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang /
153b3(rgyud): klad pa phyed na ba la 'jam tsam blugs pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyin chad nad gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ gdon stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad la zhun mar
153b4(rgyud): dang / yungs kar bsres te bdugs na/ phyogs bcur byer zhing / nams kyang gnas kyi phyogs der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi yid la 'dod pa'i dgos pa gzhan thams cad kyang
153b5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams cad dgug pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spyan 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul ba/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyis
153b6(rgyud): grub pa'i mtha'/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po'i gi don rnams dang / brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / skye mas byed thams cad 'byer bar
153b7(rgyud): byed pa/ sdang ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa/ nad thams cad bzlog pa/ bdug pa'i dus rnams bzlog pa/ 'chi ba'i dug dang / gnas pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa
153b8(rgyud): med pa/ rims thams cad 'joms pa/ khyad par du rims nyin bzhi pa 'joms pa/ bzhin dar bar byed pa'i gtso bo/ gos bdug pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags dang / byad thams cad dbang
154a1(rgyud): du byed pa'i mchog gang la rgyal po khros nas gshed mas mtshon gzas pa yang 'dug pa 'dis 'dug na/ de tha~Md zhi bar 'gyur ro// drug dang / dug sbyar ma dang /
154a2(rgyud): srog chags lu ta dang / sbrul gyis zin pa dang / srog chags gi na si dang / gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang bcas pa mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin pa yang bdug
154a3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis thams cad med par 'gyur ro// nad kun 'phrog pa 'grub pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam/ grub pa lha rnams kun gyis mchod/ brgya byin
154a4(rgyud): sum bcu lha dang ni/ lha min lha cig g.yul 'gyed tshe/ bdug pa 'di yis bdug pa dang / lha min de bzhin pham par 'gyur/ drag po yis ni sum rtsegs bsregs/ khyab 'jug gis ni ba li bcings//
154a5(rgyud): me'u thung gis ni sa bzhi mnan// lha min dbang po nyi zla dang // bza' rnams pham byas 'khrug par 'gyur// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// 'dren pas byams pas stobs kyis btul// bdud
154a6(rgyud): ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// bdug pa'i rgyal po mthu stobs kyis/ sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag zad// rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs byas pas// rgya mtshor gnas kun nur par 'gyur// snod gcig gis
154a7(rgyud): nisum cha skams// yid bzhin nor bu chung zod pas// don kun grub pa bdag nyid che// bdug spos 'di yis pha mo byas nas// slar yang rang gi khyim 'ongs te// rtag tu rgyal mtshan rtser gdags nas//
154a8(rgyud): bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas shing // nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni// rin chen bdun gyi char pa babs// de ltar bdug pa stobs ldan yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te/ 'jig
154b1(rgyud): rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad// khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad// don yod grub pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad// tshig dang yi ge shin
154b2(rgyud): tu gsal bar bzlas nas// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa stong phrag bcu bzlas te/ de nas rigs sngags
154b3(rgyud): 'di stong phrag brgya bzlas so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo gi te/ a mo ka hri da yan tsa ra tsa tsa tsa tsa ra/ ma hA ka na ka sar+ha ya hU~M/ a bye shir tsa ya/ a mo ga pa sha ha ste swA hA/ de nas
154b4(rgyud): rigs sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ mnyam par bzhag pa thabs la mkhas pas bdug pos mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la bdug spos kyi rgyal po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
154b5(rgyud): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i stong ba rgya che ba nor bu rin po che'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs la/
154b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin pa'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba 'dug pa'i rgyal po yin te/ thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te/
154b7(rgyud): bdug pa dbul bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te ma ha a mo ga dza ya swAhA/ de'i 'og tu bdag rang la 'dug na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
154b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang
155a1(rgyud): bram ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed de/ gang la smras pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og du mtshan mo rang gi gzugs ston par
155a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / mchog sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dmyal ba'i
155a3(rgyud): tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur ro// gang dag gi lus la bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// yul 'khor dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang /
155a4(rgyud): rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / thams cad bgyi ba mchis zhes bya ba byed par 'gyu ro/ rigs bzhi'i
155a5(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang / tshes brgyad la khrus legs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la/ ba las byung ba lngas byugs pas/ khyim gyi
155a6(rgyud): phug su dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod bzhag par byed pa/ gtor ma dkar po nye bar bzhag pa dang / de bzhin gabye pa thaMd la dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
155a7(rgyud): cad la dmigs te/ phyogs bzhir phyag byas la 'jug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par byas na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi rdul
155a8(rgyud): phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongasu gang ba la/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs
155b1(rgyud): bal+la'i spos kyis gos pa mi mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po can dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shi sha dang / ta ma la'i lo dang / bdug spos mang po na mkha'i ngos khengs pas
155b2(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs
155b3(rgyud): ba 'og min gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad 'dug pa'i dris rab tu gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad
155b4(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'di la the tshom mi byed cing / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// skad chen po'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na/ de nas sangs rgyas
155b5(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
155b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ dus kun du dgongs par 'gyur/ yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir/ byon par 'gyur ro// bde ba can du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang /
155b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dges par 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang la
155b8(rgyud): don chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/ gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing / ha cang char chen po gcod par byed cing /
156a1(rgyud): char mi 'bab na 'bebs par 'gyur ro// rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad dpyod par byed/ bdugs pa tsam gyis gdon tshad 'jig par 'gyur ro//
156a2(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i gan su bdugs na/ rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thaMd gcod par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs
156a3(rgyud): dang / nag po chen po la sogs pa dgug par 'gyur zhing / dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur/ bya ba thaMd byed par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe na/ bdugs na dpung gi tsho gas yan lag
156a4(rgyud): bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du sbyor ba byas na/ kun 'dug pa chen por 'gyur ro// 'dug pa'i cho ga'o//
156a5(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang /
156a6(rgyud): mdong bkru ba dang / lus bsrub byas na/ ya la dang go cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsal/ don yod pa'i
156a7(rgyud): na thun chen pa rdo rje gags panas kya 'dus pa shA chus pacas gyis thams cad thung ba/ blan med ga/ mkhas pas mdzod spyanam su kyis 'i byas na/ chags kyi dang
156a8(rgyud): dang/ ngas 'dun byinang dang / da bzhin rig byed kyi tshogs pa'i nang du/ ma pa'i nang du bcos pa bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa bying / lha rnams thams cad ma mtsha
156b1(rgyud): byed drug pa ma ni gcod pam 'chang / 'jig ma tshon po'i g.yas kyi dbug/ nga ba rgyan rtse zan du chos bzhin// ga nga bgrub pa ni mchog yin te/ tha ban pa'i ma ju/
156b2(rgyud): mtshungs// smin ma rnab dpral ba dag/ pad ma dkar sham shin du 'jam// mig gnyis yud pal sngon po 'dra// sems can thams cad dka' bas su// dga' ning cag tu tshig
156b3(rgyud): brgyan 'gyur// de'i mig gis gang mthong ba/ thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur// skyes pa dgal su byas na/ cag tu rig klu tho che zhing / cab tu la ya ga pagos pa'i/ 'a
156b4(rgyud): ba med pa'i lus su 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni bzod cing nges// gdon sbyin 'byung po gsang ba bas// rtag tu thub par mi 'gyur ro// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // rtag tu sred
156b5(rgyud): med stobs ldan zhing // glang chen stong gi stobs ldan 'gyur// lha rnams 'dir ni yid yod cing // klu rnams mtshon skrag par byed// gal te rigs sngags smra ba yis// reg na ri rab lhan
156b6(rgyud): po yang // g.yo bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing // stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur// nor bu'i rgyal po bla na med/ 'di ni thos pa tsam gyisu/
156b7(rgyud): sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// dpal dang skal bzangs rtag thob 'gyur// gang gi lag tu thob 'gyur ba/ sgrib pa kun las nges par grol//
156b8(rgyud): de bzhin 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur// de bzhin gash+ye ba kun gyis ni// thugs skyes gsung skyes sra su 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing //
157a1(rgyud): rigs sngags smra ba dbungs dbyung phyir// de bzhin du ni gsung ba dang // rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyi// bsod nams phung po
157a2(rgyud): chen po thob// gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi snyed las/ de bzhin ga bye ba de dag thaMd mthong zhing
157a3(rgyud): dbugs 'byin pa dang / phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// dpal dang skal ba bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtag tu lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongasu dag par 'gyur/ sems can thaMd
157a4(rgyud): kyis mchod pa gcig pur 'gyur// dgra tha~Md kyis gsod par mi 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rje rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur/ phyag na pad ma yang rtag tu mchog sprin
157a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gabye ba tha~Md kyis lung bstan pa ste/ 'dir de bzhin gabye ba thams cad kyis nor bu chen po bzung bas/ sdang bas bdud la sogs pa tha~Md dang / bgegs
157a6(rgyud): dang log 'dren thaMd las rgyal te/ pha rol bam par mdzad nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// 'dis rnga chen po la bskus te brdungs na/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro// gang thos pa tsam gyis
157a7(rgyud): sems can thaMd kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa/ rigs dang / bya gang yin pa de dag thaMd kyang yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro//
157a8(rgyud): 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mnar med pa la gzhol zhing gnas pa dag las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongasu
157b1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyi
157b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rims thaMd kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'dis dung la bskus te bus na/
157b3(rgyud): chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/ tha na drang gi sgra thos pa'i bar der de dag thams cad kyang slar log par mi 'gyur/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang /
157b4(rgyud): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'di ni skye ba phyi ma yin te/ shi nas thams cad rigs mthun
157b5(rgyud): par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ pad ma las dkyil mo
157b6(rgyud): dkrung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar da/ 'od dpag med las mngon gsum du chos kyi 'brel gtam 'thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo la cod
157b7(rgyud): pan dkar po btsongs te/ nor bu chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btabs na/ bsgreng ba tsam gyis rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mo la btags la mthong ba tsam gyis de bzhin gabye ba byang
157b8(rgyud): chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mthong bar rig par bya'o// 'di bsgreng ba tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thad/
157b9(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur/ gnod pa thams dang / mi nges dang / mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams 'jigs
158a1(rgyud): @/ par 'gyur/ rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang / sdang ba'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dug ma zad pa dang / gcan can gtum pa dang / bya nga
158a2(rgyud): sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / bye ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / 'bras dang / yu'u ta dang / dug dang / shu ba dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol pa dang / skye 'gags pa 'jigs par 'gyur/
158a3(rgyud): sdang ba'i klung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / klung gis mi tshugs shing / bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / mi mang pos yongasu gang zhing 'byor par 'gyur/
158a4(rgyud): chos 'dod cing chos kyis kun dga' la dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / zas dang / skom ro zhim pa dang / shin tu 'jam pa phun sum
158a5(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur/ sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / phra men dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang /
158a6(rgyud): skye ma byed dang / grib gnon dang / bza' nyes dang / smyug nyes dang / blta nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing / mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun
158a7(rgyud): byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba gnas pas gnas par 'gyur/ yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po'i byin brlabs yin no// de nas byang chub
158a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhin 'dzum zhing / mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
158b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu bdags pa/ de bzhin ga bye ba thaMd kyis byin gyis brlabs shing / lung bstan pa bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ nor bu chen po
158b2(rgyud): sems can thaMd la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ rjes su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gser dang / na lad dang / 'gi wa nga dang / bla ba dang / ldong ros dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la/
158b3(rgyud): dang / gur gum dang / na ga bus pa dang / dra tsha dang / ta ga ra dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / s+thi ka dang / ka la ka dang / ru s+tha dang / shu ti dang / pri yang ku dang / hi ri nu dang /
158b4(rgyud): sug smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dza ta pa ti ka su ma na dang / sa ma ka dang / sra rtsa phog dang / shing arga'i 'o ma rnams bsobs te cha mnyam par byas la/ gser nyis 'gyur du byas te/
158b5(rgyud): sgyu skar bzang po dang / tshes grangs bzang zhing dge ba la khrus legs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag te/
158b6(rgyud): phye ma zhib mor byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtor ma dri chab bzang pos spangs te sbyar la gser dang / bsres la
158b7(rgyud): ga zur dang / bla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te/ nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshadu byas nas/ bug la ras skud kyis btags te/ gser gyis g.yogs la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
158b8(rgyud): blang brgyad brnas/ tha ba'i rgyal po brgyartsa brgyad bzlas pa/ 'phags baspyad ras gamigs dbang phyug gi spya snga ma smra bar bsgrub pa byas la/ de nyid kyi skabs drung du/ grib ma la gams par byagyi/
159a1(rgyud): phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyi g.yog par bya zhing / phyed gre yog par mi bya'o// gang la gser gyi g.yog pa 'di ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i yid bzhin nor bu
159a2(rgyud): chen po dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las chen grub par byed do// gser gyis ma g.yogs pas ni 'jig rten gyi dgos tha~Md bsgrub par
159a3(rgyud): byed/ nang thang dang / gdon thaMd dang / lu ta dang / 'brus dang / 'gro ba'i nang dang / shu ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / phol mig dang / sha kra dang / mig nad dang / glang nad dang /
159a4(rgyud): gzhogs phyed na ba dang / kha nad dang / sna nad dang / so nad dang / dkan na pa dang / len pa dang / mchun pa dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / lton pa dang / mchin pa na ba dang /
159a5(rgyud): rgyab na ba dang / gcin sri ba dang / zug zer dang / 'khru ba dang / bo ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum thang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rim thad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung
159a6(rgyud): las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi nang gi nad thad la chu dron dang sbyin no// phyi rol gyi nad thad dang /
159a7(rgyud): gnod pa thaMd la byugs pa tsam gyis yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// thang du dgos pa tha~Md la sbyar ba tsam gyis thang 'grub par 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o// gser gyis g.yogs pa dpung
159a8(rgyud): pa la btags te/ dzadaM thogs pa med pa 'gyur te/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad
159b1(rgyud): 'grub pa/ bla na med pa/ rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar byas te// Ni thig le dang / gdong bkru ba dang / lus slu ba'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub
159b2(rgyud): ba ste/ the tshom mi bya'o// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rigs sngags bzlas na/ bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
159b3(rgyud): lag pa g.yas la btags te rigs sngags bzlas na/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ lan cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rab tu 'phel bar 'gyuraro//
159b4(rgyud): mgul par btags te bcings na khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba btsang bar 'gyur/ tshangs par mi spyod pa tshang par spyod par 'gyur// thub par ma byas pa thub par byas
159b5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ snyung ba byas pa skung ba byas par 'gyur/ tshig mi brtsan pa tshig bcan par 'gyur/ ma grub pa grub par 'gyur/ dam tshig mi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems
159b6(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur/ sbyin pa gang chung ngu yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du/ sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ nor bu 'di lag 'thil g.yas
159b7(rgyud): pa la bcags na/ gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// su la brjod par mi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// skyed pa la btags te chu'i nang du zhugs
159b8(rgyud): na chu klung chen po'i snying slebs par 'gyur ro// de nas nor bu sgrub par 'dod pas dngul shing shin du yongasu dag pa las/ pad+ma 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa kha bye ba/ dbus kyi
160a1(rgyud): snying po dang ze ba za ma tog 'dra ba/ sor bcu drug tshad du byas la/ de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu bzhag par bya'o// ba lang gi lci bas ba lang gi gcin dang /
160a2(rgyud): ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya ste/ kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma bris la/ pad+ma dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma gzhag ste/ bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
160a3(rgyud): gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi bzhag par bya zhing / me tog bkram par bya tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka bdug pas bdug cing / gtor ma dkar po bzhag
160a4(rgyud): par bya/ 'phan bdugs rnams pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar gyi mar me sum bcu rtsa gnyis lham par bya/ 'bras bu dang / me tog 'phreng ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spun
160a5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phogs par bzhag ste/ rigs sngags 'chang / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ nyin mtshan gcig sbyang ba byas la/ tshes bcwo lnga nas nyi shu dgu dang /
160a6(rgyud): gnam stong gi bar du/ dus mtshams gsum du mchod pa bya zhing / pad ma za ma tog can de dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar
160a7(rgyud): phyogasu mngon du phyogs te/ 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya
160a8(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bya/ de bzhin khro bo'i phyag rgya bya'o// mi smra bar dgos pa thams cad byas na/ de'i 'og tu tshes bcwo lnga zla ba nya'i nang bar gyi dus mtsham su/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad ma dang
160b1(rgyud): bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ na mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya
160b2(rgyud): ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis pad+ma 'bar ba de lag pas blang bar byas te/ blangs pa tsam gyis modo le na mkha' la
160b3(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi gdog can/ blta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/
160b4(rgyud): snang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thade bzlog par byed/ 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur/ tshe bskal ba stong thub par 'gyur//
160b5(rgyud): don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ don yod pa dri ma med pa'i rtse mo la rnam par blta zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags
160b6(rgyud): ba thob par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i kun gyi de bzhin gabye ba'i zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gabye ba de dag tha~Md kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongasu dag par
160b7(rgyud): rdo rje la rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ sgra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci/
160b8(rgyud): mchis zhes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ mgo ba'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogasu song nas/ bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor
160b9(rgyud): dang bcas/ legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshig su bcad pa stong spobs par 'gyuraro//
161a1(rgyud): ming btsam gyis thos pa rgyam tsho bsags par 'gyur ro/ skye'i rtse mor bkag na/ skye bad+ma dang / shu mu ta ltar 'jam par 'gyur shing / thos pa mang po 'dzin par 'gyur
161a2(rgyud): lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bgyi ba ci mchis zhes de bzhin gabye ba de dag la chos bshad pa chen po thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzigs pa dang / rgyan dang /
161a3(rgyud): gzhal med khang ston par 'gyur/ mgul tu btags na/ phug gi gnas thaMd du 'jug par 'gyur/ zad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ phug stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i
161a4(rgyud): sgo bye bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyis lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la
161a5(rgyud): btags na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po la sogs pa thaMd mi snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// thad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro// rkyed pa la btags na/ gter thad
161a6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ byasra pa g.yas pa dang brla g.yas pa la btags na/ nags kyi phug gi gzhal med khang gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye zhing / sman gyi dngos po tha~Md rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par
161a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags na/ rlung gi phung po dang pa'i stobs kyis shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / cung zad tsam song bas dpag tshad stong phrag bcur
161a8(rgyud): 'gro zhing / slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur/ nyin mtshan gyis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi song ste/ slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing
161b1(rgyud): gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/ zad du dgos pa bsgrub pa thaMd grub par 'gyur ro// lag 'thil la btags na/ sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing / sa'i 'og phug gi sgo thong bye bar
161b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byar bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thaMng dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bsgrub pa'i
161b3(rgyud): cho ga'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag don yod
161b4(rgyud): grub kyi bum pa rab mchog zhes bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa ji lta ba de ltang / bcom ldan 'das bum
161b5(rgyud): ba chen po'i mthu bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba lagaso// rigs sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par bsgrub
161b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ khams pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun nas shin tu zlum pa/ mgo 'am mgrin par phyin pa'i tshad shin du 'jam zhing
161b7(rgyud): thag thug dang / shang shong med pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/ kun nas yongasu gang bal tshal gyis mtshon gyis pad ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/ mgrin par pad+ma
161b8(rgyud): snying po dang ze ba bri/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ shar phyog su zhal bri/ lhor mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag/ nub tu dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag/ byang du yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyan
162a1(rgyud): pad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs par bya'o// pad+ma'i 'dab ma la dab phyug dang / dbang phyug chen pa dang / bram ze dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / gshin rje dang /
162a2(rgyud): chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / khyab bdag dang / brgya byin dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / lha tshogs gzhan bri bar bya zhing / me dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / lha mo sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang /
162a3(rgyud): pho nya mo dkar mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug bri bar bya'o// pad ma'i 'dab ma'i 'khor yug tu pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o// de nas
162a4(rgyud): bum pa mtshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing / gser gyis brgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes pa bya'o// de nas thang shing las pad+ma'i gdan zlum po bum pashong ba tsam gyi tshad du
162a5(rgyud): byas la de'i steng du bum pa bzhag la/ bum pa de yungs kar dkar pos de kang ste/ rgyan thaMd kyis brgyan par byas/ ras dkar pos bcing bar bya/ steng du yung dkar dang / bla rtsi dang / 'gyi'u wa
162a6(rgyud): dang / ldong ros bzhag par bya/ bu ba'i khar dmar pos g.yogs par bya/ rin po che'i sna bdun bzhag par bya/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ dkyil 'khor gru
162a7(rgyud): bzhi pa/ 'phang du 'khru gang bar bya ste/ ba lang gi lci ba dang / sar bsres pas legs par byugs ste/ cha mnyam par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng du dri thams cad kyis byugs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
162a8(rgyud): dbusu tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ gur gum dang / me tog pad+mas mchod pa bya ste/ pad ma 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ pad ma'i ze ba'i steng du bum pa bzhag te/
162b1(rgyud): 'phan gdugs sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'khor yug tu spos dang / me tog pad ma sna tshogs dang / 'dug spos sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi snod sna tshogs dang / bum pa
162b2(rgyud): gang ba mdzes pa dang / bdug spos kyis phye ma rnam pa mang po bzhag par bya/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ba ci 'byor ba tu kun tu bzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me bzang po bcu drug bltam par bya/
162b3(rgyud): phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas pad ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya/ sgo bzhi shin du cha 'byes par bris/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan ma gsal bar bya/ mnga' dang / ba dan 'khor yug tu bzhag par bya/
162b4(rgyud): tshon skad sna sngas bskor bar bya/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar gsum ci 'byor pa bzhag par bya/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs bkram par bya/
162b5(rgyud): me tog 'phreng ba bzang po kun tu bzhag par bya/ bdug spos kyi snod dang / bum pa gang ba kun tu bzhag par bya/ pog phor bzhi bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyi phor bu bzhi bzhag par bya/ snod bzhi dang / kham
162b6(rgyud): phor brgyad bzhag par bya/ ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang po bzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me gang ba drug bcu gcig dbul bar bya/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar bkram par bya'o// chang dang /
162b7(rgyud): sha dang / breg tsong dang / kye'u dang / 'bags pa dang / zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spang bar bya'o// 'go nyis spang bar bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ zla ba lnga la bsgrub par bya'o//
162b8(rgyud): bsrung ba'i tshogs bdag srung ba dang / thor tshugs bcing ba dang / de bzhin du grogs bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung bar yang bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / mar dang yungs kar gyi 'dug pas bdun
163a1(rgyud): bar bya'o// tsan dan dang / a gaka ru dang / du ru ga dang / kun du ru'i bdug pa 'di ni yang dag par bstan to// bum pa bskur ba ni mchog ste/ dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug
163a2(rgyud): nas gsang sngags bsgrub par bya ste/ dus mtshams gsum du bum pa dang / sangs rgyas la mchod par bya'o// mi smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug nas/
163a3(rgyud): lag pa yas pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur la/ don yod pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzla so// yid la byed pa rtse gcig
163a4(rgyud): pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje lhur bya zhing / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga'i nya'i thun tha ma'i nang par dbyig gi bum
163a5(rgyud): pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po yang grags par 'gyur te/ bum pa chen po de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang dga'
163a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ dri ma med cing yongasu dag la/ dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ mdog yongasu dag cing me tog bad ma dang / ku mu ta ltar dkar zhing 'jam par 'gyur/ bum pa de'i sku gzugs
163a7(rgyud): rnams rang rang gi lus las/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ rigs sngags 'chang
163a8(rgyud): bum pa 'di bsgrub 'di ni grub po// de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis chu dang yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dbang bskur ba byas na/ dbang bskur ma
163b1(rgyud): thag tu bum pa de las sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang chen po legaso legaso// khyod kyis bum pa bzang po grub ste bzang po lta ba bzhin/ don yod pa'i snying po'i bum/
163b2(rgyud): pa bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po yang de bzhin gyis ji ltar 'dod par long spyod cing / yid la ci lhar bsam shing bcol ba thams cad grub par gyur cig/ de nas mchod pa chen pos gzhal
163b3(rgyud): med khang chen po de mchod de/ bum pa bzang po de bzung bar bya zhing / mchod pa byas na/ ji ltar yid la 'thad pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad grub par gyur te/ legs par bshad pa 'am/ gtsug
163b4(rgyud): lag khang ngam/ gar gyis bstan chos dang / rtsis chos dang / bya ka ra na/ cho ga zhib mo smos pa dang / gsang sngags smras pa dang / nags bsgrubs pa dang / phug bsgrub pa dang / bcud kyis
163b5(rgyud): len pa dang / mig sman dang / gter smra ba dang / rig byed kyi gsang sngags dang / mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis snyad pa'i sde la sogs pa chos dang 'dul ba smra ba de dag thams cad 'byung

163b8(rgyud): dang / rgyal po la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang sems kyis bsams pa tsam gyis mod la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ mig 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /

164a2(rgyud): med khang dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po'i bdag po gzhal med khang de thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// char ha cang che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang /
164a3(rgyud): grang ba dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / chu bzlog par byed pa de thams cad ston par byed/ g.yul 'gyed pa ston par byed pa'am/ gnas dang / gzhal med khang dang / dpal ston

164a5(rgyud): ji ltar bsams pa de thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// bla rtsi de blangs la 'gyi'u wang dang / ga bur dang bsres te/ shing ar ka'i 'o mas smras te ril bu byas nas/ ba ser mo'i 'o ma
164a6(rgyud): la bdar te/ dpral bar mig le byas nan mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang bye ba stong phrag bcu'i 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/ snying kar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing
164a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rje dpon du 'gyur ro/ lce'i rtse mo la reg ma nyin re zhing tshig su bcad pa stong grags shing 'dzin par 'gyur/ mad nas
164a8(rgyud): stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur/ 'o ma dang lhan cig 'thungs na thos pa mang po brgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur/ shing arga'i 'o ma dang / lhan cig zos dang / rigs sngags
164b1(rgyud): 'chang thams cad kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ lta ba'i gan su thig le
164b2(rgyud): byas te/ chu klung chen po'i nang du bzhugs na/ gting tu bying bar mi 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/ spyi bor thig le byas te g.yul ngo
164b3(rgyud): zhugs na/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur/ zhun mar dang lhan cig zos na/ glang po che stong gi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / lag pa ya gcig gis glang po
164b4(rgyud): che bskyed pa dang / na mkha' la 'phen zhing slar yang 'dzin to// ril lu 'dis lag pa la bskus na/ mi stong thub par 'gyur ro// rilu 'di lha'i gnasu bskos te bzhag na/ lha thams
164b5(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur ste/ dus dusu char 'bebs shing sad dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba gcong par byed do// rgyal po'i bskor bskos te bzhag na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor
164b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / bka' la gtogs pa dang / zhang lon dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang / bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang gi sgor bskos te bzhag na/ dge slong
164b7(rgyud): thams cad bde ba'i reg pa la gnas pa gnas par 'gyur/ rtag tu byams pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis nang du rgan pa'i mthar bskos te ban/
164b8(rgyud): na/ dge slong thams cad zas dang skom dang / 'dod dgu 'thob par 'gyuraro// lhung bzed kyi nang du bzhag ste/ grong khyer mang por bsod snyoms la song na/ kha zas ro bro ba'i
165a1(rgyud): @#/ mchog rnam pa sna tshogs 'bad mi dgos pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyis gan su bskos te bzhan nas/ mchod rten la mchod pa byas na/ ri lu rdza/
165a2(rgyud): sri mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa de srid du/ mchod rten chen po brgyad la nyin re zhing mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gan su/ zhabs drung du
165a3(rgyud): brkos te bzhag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ ri lu ji srid du gnas kyi bar du/ nyin re
165a4(rgyud): zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// lam po cher brkos te bzhag na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / gcan zan khro bo rnams bcings

165a6(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ba lang dang / phyugs dang / rta la sogs pa 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongasu thar par 'gyur/
165a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad brgya 'khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur/ nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur//

165b1(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// chang yod pa'i sgor brkos te bzhag na 'chang thad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhing gi nang du brkos te bzhag na lo tog mang po 'byor par 'gyur ro// brag phug tu
165b2(rgyud): brkos te gzhan na/ brag phug gi sgo bye bar 'gyur ro// bu ga'i gan su byugs na ro thams cad 'dzag par 'gyur ro// nags kyi phug tu brkos te bzhag na/ nags kyi lha thadaM rang gi 'dun na 'dug

165b4(rgyud): khyim 'thon po'i gnasu bzhag na/ ji srid snang ba de srid du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams bsrung bar 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcu kun nas dpag tshad brgya 'tshams bcad
