165b7(rgyud): skams shing / tshe zad pa dang / bgegs chen po'i zin pa la/ dri chab kyi bum par ri lu 'di bsres te/ don yod pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrus byas nas/ 'phags pa
165b8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la/ nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad las yongasu
166a1(rgyud): thar bar 'gyur/ tshe slar nub par 'gyur/ lha'i lus gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/ phra ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang bral bar 'gyur/ las gzhan dang
166a2(rgyud): gzhan stong phrag brgya bye bar 'gyur te/ rang gi blos kyang thams cad sbyor bar bya'o// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i lus can du 'gyur phug gi gnas thams cad kyi rje dpon rgyal por
166a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshe skal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur/ shi nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma'i snying po las rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nor bu dang / gser dang /
166a4(rgyud): dngul dang / rdo rje dang / be dUr+ya dang / mar gad dang / mad ma ra ga dang / in tra ni la dang / mu tig rnams kyi lus brgyan par 'gyur ro// skra bung ba ltar gnas cing 'khal ba dang /
166a5(rgyud): mig ud pa la'i mchog sngon po lta bu dang / lpags pa'i mdog gser lta bu dang / ngag 'jam pa dang / gnyen pa dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'od dpag med kyi phyag gis spyi bo
166a6(rgyud): la 'jog par 'gyur ro// phyag na pad+ma'i phyag mchog sbyin pa'i dbug 'byin cing khyad par mchog gi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// pad ma la rab tu gnas pa rnam par gzigs pa don yod pa'i
166a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ring srel du 'gyur zhing / khams sna tshogs kyi mdog gi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che 'du ba dang 'dra ba'i zhing 'di lta ste/ sku gdung re re yang
166a8(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin du so sor gsal bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad de/ lus re re ston par 'gyur ro//
166b1(rgyud): ring bsel 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ gzhan du yid la ma byas na de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
166b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi de la smad par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang nyal kar rang gi blos byams pa'i sems kyis ring bsrel mngon du byas te/ smon lam btab par bya'o// ci 'dod
166b3(rgyud): pa bsams te mchod pa byas na/ bsams pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'di ska cig tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel gyi snying po 'di ci lta ba bzhin du bum
166b4(rgyud): pa bzang po 'di yang blta bar bya ste/ de gnyis yang rdzu 'phrul mdzad par snang ba mthun pa yin te/ 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed pare mi bya'o//
166b5(rgyud): bum pa bsgrub pa yod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ 'phags pa spyan
166b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/ mchog tu smad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mor gyub pa/ bla na med pa don yod pa chen po'i bum
166b7(rgyud): ba bsgrub pa'i rig pa 'chang ba rnams kyis 'grags pas grub pa 'ang ma bu gling ba'i rigs bzhi pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du rab du 'byin pa dang /
166b8(rgyud): bsgrub ze shin du bkra shis pa bla na med pa/ rang gi byin gyis brlabs pa don yod pa chen po'i cho 'phrul sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa/
167a1(rgyud): grub pa yang dag par bsgrub pa che zhing tshi ga byang chub kyi snying po'i chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba/ de bzhin
167a2(rgyud): gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir du dbug 'byin pa chen po 'jig rten du ba ni/ sems dpa' chen
167a3(rgyud): bo legs so legs so// mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa bsgrub pa/ klags pas 'grub pa/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba/
167a4(rgyud): rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ rtag tu skyong bar mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phying 'phags pa
167a5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod la yongs su gtad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu
167a6(rgyud): yid dga' ba ste bzhin 'dzum nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
167a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad dang /
167b1(rgyud): nga gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi so ga chags su byung ba ji skad ri dgas dang / bya ji zhid pa 'di dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su bzung bar bgyin pa/
167b2(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar ba brgyab dang / byang chub chen po'i 'am la dgod pa'i phyir/ nang rje chen pa'i rnam par dag pas pangs
167b3(rgyud): su zung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par rtse ba de dag ni bdag gis thams cad kyimachog tu yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
167b4(rgyud): yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis bdag dran na bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni bdag gis rtag tu blta par bgyi'o// cag tu
167b5(rgyud): rjes su dran pa dang rtag tu rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i rgyal po'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po//
167b6(rgyud): / bam go/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bzhin 'dzum par yid
167b7(rgyud): bya'o// / 'bar ba de dang 'bram mA pu tra ka'i mar dang lhan cig tu sbyar la/ bdag gi lus bsku bar bya'o// bskus pa tsam gyi mdo la
168a1(rgyud): rang gi lus kyi lpags pa gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur ro// lus rdo rje'i snying po bzhin du mchod pa dang /
168a2(rgyud): mi rigs par gyur nas/ 'khor brgya phrag stong dang 'phur bar 'gyur ro// ska la bskus na swa spu gser gyi mdog du 'gyur/ sen ma la bskus na
168a3(rgyud): sem mo gser du 'gyur ro// so la bskus na so gser du 'gyur ro// mig dang lus gang dang gang du bskas pa de dang de nyid/ gser
168a4(rgyud): mdog du 'gyur ro// til mar bzhag te/ bcud kyi len mchog srad cig gis zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ron/ til mar dang sbyar
168a5(rgyud): bzangs glebs pa la bskus te/ mes sregs na srang gcig gis srang bcu'i gser du 'gyur ro// bcud kyi len mchog 'di dang /
168a6(rgyud): ba'i 'o ma dang / zhun mar bzhi cha cig dang sbyar te/ me mi che bas skol te chos par rig pa dang / 'di de nas phyung la/ khrus
168a7(rgyud): legs par byas shing / gos sar pa bgos la gtsang mar byas te/ thog mar ba'i rnam lnga la byug par bya'o// de nas chu dron po dang
168a8(rgyud): bcud kyis len gyi mchog 'di btung bar bya'o// sbyor ba zhag bdun byas na/ des lus rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang /
168b1(rgyud): mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / nad thams cad byang ba dang / mod la drug thams cad sel ba dang / dug slar zhen par mi 'gyur ba dang /
168b2(rgyud): mtshon gyi ma yin chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/ mes tshugs par mi 'gyur/ yang dug ma rungs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// zhag bcu bzhir
168b3(rgyud): sbyor ba byas na/ nad thams cad byang ba dang / 'di'i lpags pa rnam par dag pa dang / skra dkar med par 'gyur ro/ zhag
168b4(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyor ba byas na/ byis pa lo bcu pa pud+ma kar sham dang 'dra ba'i mdo can gyi lus su 'gyur ro// pad ma'i lo ma dang ku mu ta ltar
168b5(rgyud): 'jam pa dang / ud pa la lta bu'i lha'i mig dang / mi 'am ci'i dbyangs lta bur ma zhum pa dang / dbu skra 'khyil pa 'khyil cing / bung ba
168b6(rgyud): ltar mdog gnag pa lhar rdzas lta bur 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na la stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang /
168b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / sdig pa byed gzhan rnams kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo cig
169a1(rgyud): tshang bar bsnyen na lha'i bu mo dag dang lhan cig rtse bar lha rdzas kyi longs spyod dang / gzhal med khang dang / ji ltar lha rnams brtse ba
169a2(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyuraro/ dro bar gyur ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig zos na/ mo nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// namakha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ zangs srang stong dang / bcud kyis len pa'i mchog srang cig dang /
169a3(rgyud): dngul srang bcu zangs dang sbyar te gzhun bcud kyi len mchog dngul srang stong du 'gyur ro// srang cig gis zangs srang stong dngul du 'gyur ro// kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer byung na ni/ kha dog sna tshogs
169a4(rgyud): su 'gyur te/ gzugs mdog sna tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing / dngul dang gser gzhul til mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ mgo bo la bskus pa tsam gyis mod la sku
169a5(rgyud): mdog sna tshogasu 'gyur ro// lus la bskus na kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro zhing / khyim thams cad kyi sgo phye bar mthong
169a6(rgyud): ste/ khyim thams cad kyi dngos po dang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le byas na mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// khar bcangs na gang dang smra ba de nor gyi dbang du 'gyur ro// yang na ba ser skya'i//
169a7(rgyud): zhun mar dang / mar dkar dang 'o ma dang / bcud kyis len gyi mchog 'bar ba dang / lhan cig bskol te/ khar bzhin du legs par chos pa dang / spangs la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying
169a8(rgyud): po brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid bskus pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad rigs 'dzin gyi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po bcu 'tsho
169b1(rgyud): gru ma/ bya brnas par sangs rgyas bamam ldan 'das mthang bar gyur ro// byang chub kyi nang pa mchog tu lung bstan pa zab par 'gyur ro// theg sa byas nanam sa
169b2(rgyud): mthur bar 'gyur ra/ oM zhes bya ba'i sgras tshangs pa'i gnas nas phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ro// se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis 'og min gyi bar du 'gro nang byer yang 'ong bar
169b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nas kyi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur de'i tshe bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba tha ma yin zhing mngal na gnas pa las
169b4(rgyud): yongasu thar pa yin no// de nas ngan yang ba'i rol lu brjod par bya ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba bsgrub par byed pa legs par bsgrub na/ rigs sngags 'chang ba legs par
169b5(rgyud): khrus byas shing gong gtsang mar bya'o// pad ma dang / lig bu mig dang / na ga ge sar dang / 'ge'u wang dang / ud ta ma ra Ni dang / skyer kha 'ang dang / a ga ru rnams de/
169b6(rgyud): bzhin du de dag cha skams te/ zhib mor btags la kha ra dang sbyar te gser dang / dngul gyis bkri zhing / zangs kyis kyang bkri ste/ tsan ngan dkar po'i gab co'i nang du bstus
169b7(rgyud): la lag pa'i snyim par bcang bar bya'o// zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skung ba bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyal
169b8(rgyud): po'i stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro ba'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// gsang sngags rgyal po rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas mgul
170a1(rgyud): par gyur na de blangs te/ khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// sor bzhi tsam gyis rkang pas la mi reg pa 'gyur ro//
170a2(rgyud): dpag tshad brgyar 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// me tog can gyis rigs 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// lus las mud pa dang / ud pa la'i dri 'byung ba
170a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro// ud pa la sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / ke du'i med tog dang / de dag cha bsnyams te sbyar la/ mkhas pas sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te/ ri lu byas gser dang /
170a4(rgyud): dngul dang zangs kyis bkris ste/ zla ba yar gyi chos drag nas tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcu gnyis nas bcu bzhi'am/ bcu gsum nas bco lnga'i tshe gnyin zhags gsuM
170a5(rgyud): du smyung ba bya'o// shin tu khrug byas shing / gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
170a6(rgyud): sku ga zugs ras la bris pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ shing a shong tha las byas pa'i gab ce'i nang du ril lu bcug nas/ lag pa'i snyom par bcug la ri mo'i spyan
170a7(rgyud): sngar ci srid du khol ba'i sgra 'byung ba de srid bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas grub pa yin te/ de las khar bcug na dpag tshad stong du 'di 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / slar yang 'ong
170a8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// sor brgyad tsam du rkang pa sa~M la mi reg par 'gyuraro// le stong phrag bcur mtsho bar 'gyuraro// mig ud pa la sngon po lta bur 'gyur// ung ba la sngon pa
170b1(rgyud): dri khra nas 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gzhin yongasu rgyas bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gyuraro// mdog pad ma bru grur 'gyuraro// lus la tsam pa ka'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
170b2(rgyud): rigs 'dzin na mkha' la thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / rgya spos dang / ba ni na dang / de dag rnams cha snyams te/ zhib mor btags
170b3(rgyud): la du ru ka'i mar gyis ri lu bya'o// gser dang / dngul dang / zangs kyis bkri'o// tsan dan dkar an tshu'i phye ma dang / po las byas pa'i sgom bur bcug ste/ tshes bcu gsum
170b4(rgyud): nas nyi'i bar du nyin zhag sum gyi mi nyal bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs la mchod pa rgya cher bya zhing / gtor ma yang
170b5(rgyud): rgya cher byin la rtswa dUr ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ lag pa'i snyim par bcug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po
170b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas ri lu 'gul bar gyur na// rigs sngags 'chad pas des na grub pa yin par rig par bya ste/ ri lu grub pa ni de yin no// de nas
170b7(rgyud): rigs sdug 'chang bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod bar ba ste// nam langs kar skya rengs ser po 'char ba'i dus ni bza' bar bya'o// sangs rgyas
170b8(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bya'o// grog byed pa la yang byin te/ ri lu khar bcug pa tsam gyi
171a1(rgyud): mdo la mi snang bar 'gyur// nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// dpag tshad lnga stong du 'gro zhing slar 'ong bar 'gyur/ ri lu bsgrub par byed pa tshegs med pa
171a2(rgyud): grub pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur/ khru gang tsam gyis rkang pas la mi reg par 'gyu ro// de nas gter rko bar 'dod par/
171a3(rgyud): gnas gang na gter yod pa'i dogs pa'i gnas dor ba'i lci bas/ ma 'dal byas la me tog stor gu gul gyi dad pas bdug cing gtor ma gtsang ba dang / sha dang khrag gi
171a4(rgyud): gtor ma dang phye zan dang / 'bras bu dang / pad ma'i gtor ma dang / gtor ma rnam pa gsum sbyin par bya'o// 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa
171a5(rgyud): bya'o// stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod bya'o// stong phrag bcu tshang ba dang // gnas gdan gter yod pa'i gnas der/ gter bsrung ba mngon du bya zhing / gter bsrung ba la gtor
171a6(rgyud): ma dang / mchod yon sbyin par byas na/ gter bsrung ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las byed pa por 'gyu ro// gang du mngags pa dang / gang bsgo ba'i las thams cad byed lnga
171a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// yungs kar dang thal ba la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ bgyegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin
171a8(rgyud): dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro// log 'dren phung ba na nyungs mar dang / yudas kar dang / gu gul dang / skye tshe'i 'bru dang / lan tsha

171b2(rgyud): bcom pAr 'gyur zhing / rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// dmag bcing bar 'dod pas/ yung kar dang dag dang / skye tse'i 'bra dang / sa bon bdun rnams sbrang rtsi dang sgal
171b3(rgyud): lad dmag gi mdun du shing nim pa'i me sbar te/ thog mar brgyad brgya byas nas dmag bcing bar 'gyu ro// nal gnyis byas na nad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brgyad
171b4(rgyud): brgya bzlas brjod lani gsum pa byas na/ dmag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyir yang lan 'ga' 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas dbyug pa bsgrub par 'dod na/ dbyug
171b5(rgyud): pa bsgrub par 'dod na/ dbyug pa seng lde nga la gshin rje'i dbyug pa'i tshad khru do la bya'o// de nas 'phags pa sman ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar/ zas dkar gsum zos te/

171b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas dbyug pa 'baro// de nas grub pa yin par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dbyug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de nas
171b8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa blangs te/ kun du lan bdu bskor bar bya'o// de nas dbyug pa
172a1(rgyud): des sa la brdab par bya'o// dbyug pas sa la gru bzhir gzhal bar byas nas/ kun nas gru bzhi lham pa'i khyim chen po gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur te/
172a2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / bu mo'i skye bos gang bar 'gyuraro// /
172a3(rgyud): de nas lha mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang ba mdzes pa lta bar 'os pa zhig 'ongs nas/ rin po che sna bdun la byas pa'i snod bum pa gang ba zhig thog shing sgo
172a4(rgyud): nang na 'dug/ de nas lha mo de nA re rigs sdug 'chang rang gi khyim yin gyi nang du zhugs shig ces smras par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas snying po med par gyur pa'i
172a5(rgyud): khyim gzhal med khang 'dis ci zhig bya/ ces brjod par bya'o// de na re snod gang ba'odi long shig dang / rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyuraro// zhes smras par 'gyuraro// rigs sngags
172a6(rgyud): 'chang bas 'di dag ces khyos pa byas pa dang / lha mo de dus ste ji ltar char ba cher babs pa de bzhin 'di'i mig nas mchi ma byung ba dang / rigs sbags 'chad bu blang ba
172a7(rgyud): zhing / rang gi lus la bsku bar bya'o// bskus pa tsam gyi mdo la 'dzam bu chu klu dag gi gter lta bu'i lusu 'gyur ro// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shi shi'i dri lus
172a8(rgyud): las 'byung bar 'gyuraro// khar bcug na lha rdzas kyi u dpala'i dri kha nas 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mchog mig tu bskus na/ lha rdzas ud pa la sngon po 'dra ba'i lha'i mig
172b1(rgyud): tu 'gyur ro// skra la bskus na lha'i rma bya'i mdog 'dra ba'i skar 'gyur zhing / skra 'khyil la 'khyim par 'gyuraro// rna ba'i bu gar blugs na lha'i snyan du 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong
172b2(rgyud): brag gsum du thos par 'gyu ro// dpag tshad stong phrag gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'thungs na bskal pa stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// bair gyi bskal pa rjesu dran
172b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gang thabs dang tro Ta ga dang / brda sprod pa dang / bstan bcos dang / b+ha ra ta dang / ra ma ya na dang / sngon gyi gtam snying dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang /

172b5(rgyud): mngon pa dang / theg pa chen po dang / de dag thams cad mngon du phyogs par gnaso// thams cad rtogs pa khong du chud pa chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bud med na re/

172b7(rgyud): nas bud med de nu ma gnyis ston par byed na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas nu ma gnyis bzung la btsir na de las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyuraro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas blang ba

173a1(rgyud): phung po la zhon par 'gyuraro// rigs 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi rig 'dzin 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal dang / dpon por
173a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de nyid rig po rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa yin no// dbyug pa lags pa
173a3(rgyud): g.yas par bzung ste/ don yod pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya zhing / lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ gang 'dod pa de dag thaMd skad cig la 'grub par

173a5(rgyud): dbyig pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing / gnod sprin mo'o sted du bskor bar bya'o// go gal gyi bdug pa smin par bya'o// gtor ma da kar
173a6(rgyud): po can gyi snod 'bul bar bya'o// lan bdun bskor ba tsam gyis mod la/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod srin mo'i mdun na 'dug cing / bga' zhin du byed par 'gyur ro// /

173a9(rgyud): nod sbyin
173b1(rgyud): lde mo'i 'dun du skor nas/ nor gyi mchog rnam pa mang du sbyin par byed// mdun na rang gi ngo bo gnas par 'gyuraro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad smin par byed do// rnam thos
173b2(rgyud): sras kyi zhabs la lan bdun brdab cing / don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par byed nas// rnam thos kyi sras bdun na rgyug cing gnas par 'gyur ro// nor
173b3(rgyud): mang du sbyin par mdzad do// gang 'dod pa de thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro// mi smra bar dbyug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas brjod bya zhing / rgyal po'i sgor lan bdun bskor
173b4(rgyud): ba byas ni/ rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor rnams bdag nyid dang nor la dbang bar 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi sgor skor na grong khyer na gnas pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khyen
173b5(rgyud): dang / bu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur zhing gnaso// de cig pu mched par 'os par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bran po dang / bran mo bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lha
173b6(rgyud): khang du song nas lha'i spyan sngar bskor ba zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byed nas/ lha de dag gi ngo bo mdun gnas par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de thams cad byed
173b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe nyi mi'i mdun du bskor ba byas zhing / don yod/
173b8(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byas nas/ nyi ma babs te mchog gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// zla ba'i zhal du bskor zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas
174a1(rgyud): brjod byed na/ zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang bcas te 'bab par 'gyur ro// mchog bsams pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// ring bsel
174a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byed cing / don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byed cing dbyug pa bskor na/ mchod rten 'bar zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang bsams
174a3(rgyud): pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byed
174a4(rgyud): cing dbug pa bskor na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
174a5(rgyud): cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa dang / bsams pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// yang na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang
174a6(rgyud): gi sku bzhin thun tho rangs kyi tshe/ mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// cho ga bsams pa thams cad sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par mdzad par
174a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dbyug pa rig 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gnas su song ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran
174a8(rgyud): par bya/ dbyug bskor bar bya'o// bskor ba tsam gyis mi de la/ klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci 'dod par char gyis rgyun 'bebs so// char ches
174b1(rgyud): na khang thog tu don yod pa'i snying po skad drag pos brjod de dbyug pa bskor na/ char ches pa chad par 'gyur ro// ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe/ sprin logs su bltas te khros khro ba'i
174b2(rgyud): rgyal po skad chen pos dran par bya zhing / khros pas dbug pa bskor na/ sa dang rlung dang / ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// dpag tshang tshun chad du mtshams chen po kun du bcad
174b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ gdon kun gyis zin pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun dran par bya zhing / dbyug pa bstan na/ gdon thams cad du zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// brjed byed la sog
174b4(rgyud): pa'i bar la bstan pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos bya bas na/ byabs pa tsam gyi mdo la rims thams cad las
174b5(rgyud): mthar bar 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi pa'i rims ngu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed cing 'thabs pa'i tshe/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po khros pas bzlas brjod bya/
174b6(rgyud): dbyug pa bskor ba byas na/ mtshon dgra cha dang / lag cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing phol gyi dpung rnams kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'brog dgon pa'i
174b7(rgyud): nang du 'gron po rnams sos na/ don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing / dbyug pa bskor ba byas na rkun po dang / chom po dang / mi rgod dang / seng ge dang / stog dang / dom dang / dred
174b8(rgyud): dang / dug mi bzod pa dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / dug dang / bcas pa'i srog chags de dag thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim du bde
175a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mi ngas thams cad dang / ba lang gi nang dang / byug nad chen po dang / rta nad chen po dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo
175a2(rgyud): nang chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po skad chen pos dran par bya zhing / dbyug grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bskor bar byas na/ bskor ba rtsa
175a3(rgyud): gyis mod la/ mi ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / tshang 'brub thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// /
175a4(rgyud): 'jig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// bud med dam skyes pa dgug par 'dod na/ gnas mthon por 'dug ste/ skad chen pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po len nyi shu
175a5(rgyud): rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// dbyug pa bskor bya'o// gang gi phyed dbye ba de'i ming brjod par byas na/ dpag tshad brgya nas kyang de 'ong zhing / bdag dang nor la dbang byar yod cing gnas
175a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// ji srid mtsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te nor bu bzang po'i sras dgug par 'dod na/ zla ba mar gyi tshes bcu bzhi la srung ba byas ste/ dbyug pa la
175a7(rgyud): don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ nor bzad kyis sras kyi lte ba'i steng du bzhag par bya/ khro bo'i bzlas pa byas na/ bzhi 'thun gyi tho
175a8(rgyud): rangs tsam na/ nor bu bzang po'i sras rang nyid/ rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing / gser gyi dong rtse stong phrag bcu smin par mdzad do// de la
175b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum gyis sbrul dbul bar bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya/ nor bu bzang po'i sras la mchod yon gyi chab dbul bar bya/
175b2(rgyud): nyin ma re re zhing nor bzang gis sras la mchod yon gyi chab phul na/ nam 'tsho'i bar du nyi ma re re zhing / gser gyi dong rtse sbyin par mdzad do// de las rigs 'chang bas/
175b3(rgyud): phye dang bzhi cha gcig dgod par bya ste/ sbyin pa byin par bya/ bsod nams gsags byas la/ nor bu bzang po'i sras dang ldan cog du rjes su yid rang ba bya'o// 'brog dgon pa'i na
175b4(rgyud): du song na/ 'brog dgon pa gang na chu dkon par dbug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing / gang na ne'u gsing sngon po yod pa'i gnas
175b5(rgyud): der sa la lan bdun brlab cing / bskor te skad drag pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nyams thag thag skad gang na/
175b6(rgyud): de nas gnas gang du brda bas gnas der/ lha rdzas kyi chu ha cang drang ba yang ma yin/ ha cang dro ba yang ma yin/ ro dang bcas pa'i rdzing bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs
175b7(rgyud): sngags 'chang bas dbug pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ rdzing bu'i nang du chu la brdab par bya'o// de nas rdzing bu'i nang nas mi ser skya bo cig byung ste/
175b8(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang ba la thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas 'dag ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba ci 'dod ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas bdog ni kha zas kyi
176a1(rgyud): ched du lags kyis stsal du gsol zhes brjod par byed cing / de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas mi de la shis pa'i tshig rjod par bya'o// de nas mi de rdzing bu
176a2(rgyud): na zhugs pa dang / ska cig thang cig yud tsam la kha zas dang / btung ba ro zhims po rnams pa sna tshogs yod par byedas cing / rigs sngags 'chang ba la smin par byed de/ skye
176a3(rgyud): bo stong par brgya'i ston mo sbyar yod cing / yo byed phun sum tshogs par shin tu mang por 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang bas rdzing bu med par mi byed na/ rdzing bu de dus rtag tu
176a4(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur mi snang bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad la yo byed thams cad kyis brel pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'on te don yo
176a5(rgyud): ba sna tshogs bya bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang ba des len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i dri chus khrus byas la spyi gtsug bcing bar bya'o// mi smra bar dbug pa la lan
176a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ bskor ba bya'o// de nas 'khor dang skye bo mang po 'khor zhing slong bar 'gyur ro// de nas dbyug pa bskor ba byas na/ yid la ji ltar sesaM
176a7(rgyud): dpa'i ngo bo de bzhin du thams cad ston par byed do// 'bras bu dang med tog gi char 'beb so// sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed do// de nas ro langs bslang bar 'dod
176a8(rgyud): na/ rigs sngags 'chang ba des legs par khrus byas shing gos sar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas la dur khrod du stong ste/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i snying po len bdun
176b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byed cing / dur khrod kyi nang du bskor ba byas na/ dpag chad tshun chad du kun du 'tshams bcad par 'gyur ro// bgegs
176b2(rgyud): thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / sri mo ma rungs pa thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis mi ro langs te bkru bar bya'o// ba'i rnam lngas sbyar bar
176b3(rgyud): bya'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur pa sor bcu gnyis pa bzhir gzugs par bya'o// mtshon sna lnga'i skung bas dkyil 'khor kun
176b4(rgyud): tu bskor bar bya'o// mi ro ras dkar pos bkri bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhags par bya'o// me tog gis gtor bar bya'o// gtor ma dkar po bzhag par bya'o//
176b5(rgyud): mchod yon gyi chu bzhag par bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba shar phyogs su kha ltas te 'dug la dbyug pa lags pa g.yas par
176b6(rgyud): bzhag ste/ rigs pa'i rgyal po gdon par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan drug bcu dran par bya'o// g.yas pas bya ba par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i myi ro dwe ga
176b7(rgyud): byabya pa rngub par byas na
176b8(rgyud): smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas gsang sngags dran par bya'o// yid kyis bsams par byas na/ mi ro de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ 'dis pa dang//
176b9(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa snying kar bzhag par byas na/ khrag tu skyug
176b10(rgyud): ro 'am par 'gul bar 'gyur/ g.yo bar 'gyur/ lang kye byog bcur lta bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa de spyi bor bzhag par byas na/ mi ro
177a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// khrag des thig le byas na/ khyim thams cad la sgo bsung byed cing sgo thams cad gdangs par 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa
177a2(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur cing 'dug go// dbyug pa snying kar btsir na skyug par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas blangs te mtha' dag bza' ba
177a3(rgyud): bya'o// zos pa tsam gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'byung ba chen po'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug chen po 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// oM zhes
177a4(rgyud): bya bas dbyugs pas btsir la bsdigs byas na/ de nas lce 'byin par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas bcad la rigs sngags 'chang bas blangs par bya'o// blangs pa
177a5(rgyud): tsam gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas ral gri'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang pa
177a6(rgyud): bcwo brgyad kyis 'khor gyi skor bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas mi ro'i spyi bor dbyug pas brdabs na/ sgra 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / shi ba'i ro gcig tu mkhregs pa'i
177a7(rgyud): gser yin pas blang bar byas na/ srang gcig gis zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ro// de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'alag
177a8(rgyud): pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying rtse ba'i phyir bdag gis 'jig
177b1(rgyud): rten pa'i cho ga las so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ sems can chen po sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
177b2(rgyud): cho ga dam pa gsang ba'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / blo rtan po 'jig pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dam pa bsgrub par byed pa/ de
177b3(rgyud): kho na nyid grub par 'gyur ba dang / klags pa dang / dran pa tsam pa dang / grub par byed pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsams pa chen po
177b4(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / mchog grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi 'dod par rtogs pa bsams pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
177b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi drang nas 'byin par dang bsgo ba thos nas/
177b6(rgyud): de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sba ra t+ne/ bcom ldan
177b7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
177b8(rgyud): ba dan dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spud pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur chen po byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang por byang chub sems dpa'
178a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen pos/ gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi lhar gtogs pa dang / gang dag rigs 'dzin grub pa dang / gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin
178a2(rgyud): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gang dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig
178a3(rgyud): la rjes su zhugs pa dang / gang dag ri bo ta la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang /
178a4(rgyud): chas dang / sdud pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te/ yid dga' bar gyur to// 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag brgya bskor ba
178a5(rgyud): byas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mig mi
178a6(rgyud): 'dzum par 'dug te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'jam pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa'i rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa'i tshe/
178a7(rgyud): 'phrul/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par snang mdzad
178a8(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i blags pa dang / bsgrubs
178b1(rgyud): par byed pa grub pa mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog bsgrub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing / lung stan pa
178b2(rgyud): lags te/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i
178b3(rgyud): phyir dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/ dmyal ba dang / yid dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten sel ba sngon gyi sgrub pa dang / sdig pa mi zad pa
178b4(rgyud): 'joms pa dang / ngan song thams cad sel ba dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa nges par bsreg par byed pa dang / yongasu bsgrag pa
178b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// mtshams med pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spong ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang / 'phags pa'i dge
178b6(rgyud): 'dun la 'khu ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad spong bar byed pa/ de dag gis mnyan pa dang / mthong ba tsam dang //
178b7(rgyud): sdom pa tsam dang / len cig 'bad pa tsam dang / 'chang ba tsam dang / thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// nga mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// byang bar
178b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rims thams cad dang / nang thams cad dang / dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phra dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams
179a1(rgyud): / cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nad dang /
179a2(rgyud): mya ngan dang / smre dgas 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phung bar byed pa
179a3(rgyud): dang / rdeg pa dang / bsdig pa dang / gsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa dang / brtson du 'dzin pa dang / lcags su 'jug pa dang / rkun po dang / mi rgod
179a4(rgyud): dang / se ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / nad ngan pa dang / dmu chu dang / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'brumo bu g.yon can dang / shu ba dang / shu bran dang / g.yan pa dang /

179a6(rgyud): kha bdugs dang / sbrul nag po dang / srogs chags go na dang / dug dang / bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang gcas pa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang /

179a8(rgyud): dang / mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhags par 'gyur/ phung bar 'gyur/ mod la phye mar blag par 'gyur ro// yongasu bklags par 'gyur ba 'di la dogs par
179b1(rgyud): mi bya/ yid gnyis skyed par mi byed/ the tsom mi byed/ sems gnyis su 'gyur ba skyed par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu mngon du dran pa bgyi ba dang / rtag/
179b2(rgyud): tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po yang bzlas par bgyi'o// rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa
179b3(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul/ rnam par
179b4(rgyud): snang mdzad kyis byin gyi brlabs/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po ni/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du yid
179b5(rgyud): la kha ton du brjod par bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su dran par bsgom par bgyi'o// de dag dran pa bsgom pa tsam dang / dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig
179b6(rgyud): las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
179b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lung ston pa dang / byin gyis brlobs par 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton tu byed pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras
179b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / dran pa dang / dus gsum du shin tu gsal bar yid la byed pa dang / mchod cing phyag byed pa lta smos kyang ci
180a1(rgyud): dgos te/ sems can de ni nga dang 'dra bar yin par rigs par bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin
180a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs pa dang / dbang skar bas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig lan mang du shin tu lhag par byed pa
180a3(rgyud): lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o// bdag kyang dus thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// dus thams
180a4(rgyud): cad mthong bar smin par bya'o// bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de'i tshe bdag gi sems can myur bar byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / chos kyi
180a5(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba bzhags par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni go cha chen po brtan par khas blangs pa la 'chel ba lags pas/ sems can thams cad bskul ba'i phyir/
180a6(rgyud): re ba'i mchog thams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzig
180a7(rgyud): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa'i mchog legs so legs so / 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga de ni mi
180a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa tsam gyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / snang ba'i cho ga byed pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pa lta smos kyang ci
180b1(rgyud): dgos/ sems can de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sems can dag bdus la babs pa gang yin par shes na smros shig/
180b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal tu lta zhing 'dzum ste/ don yod rnam par lta ba'i bzhags pa'i
180b3(rgyud): snying po smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
180b4(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags byams pa la sogs pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil
180b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / drang srong gi tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
180b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te/ bA sha hri da yAM/ dz+wa la
180b7(rgyud): dza la/ d+harma drA du/ gar+b+he/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma ha pad ma b+hu dze/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma ha bA sha d+ha re/ ba ra ba ra ba ra/ rash+mi/ sha ha sa ha sra/ pra ti man Di ta/ sha rI rI/ ta ra ta ra/ pi phud
180b8(rgyud): la/ te dza d+ha re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra// da pa ra mi tra/ pa ri pu ra Ne/ ka la ka la/ ma hA b+h+yA ma mA be sha d+ha re/ ma la ma la/ sarba pA baM/ A ba ra Na/ man+da ki la bi la ShA/ na sha ne/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
181a1(rgyud): bo d+hi sad to// bu shud d+he/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ pad ma le ya ma run/ ku be ra/ na ba skri te/ hu ru hu ru/ pra m+ba/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ ku bA rA/ nan di ke sha ra/
181a2(rgyud): i shwa ra Nahe shA ra/ de ba pu tra/ ban di tra/ nam skri taM/ bI bI d+ha/ ma Ni mo'u li d+ha re/ a mi tA b+ha dzin/ ma ku ta/ d+ha re/ dbyi/ ma ni ka na ka/ badz+ra ma d+ha re/ badz+ra be dur+ya/
181a3(rgyud): ma ra ka ta/ pad ma ra ga/ in tra nI la/ di bya mug ti ka/ a lang kri ta/ sha ri ra/ shwe ta yid nya ba bI ti/ d+ha ra dza ta ma ku ta/ man Di ta/ na ba tsan tra/ ra Shi ti/
181a4(rgyud): bad ma d+ha ra/ pad ma ng+ga ra/ bad me a sa na/ pad ma d+hu dza/ tri lo tsan/ tri shu la d+ha ra/ pA sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a b+h+r-i shig ta/ sar sa ra/ sarba bA pa pra sha man
181a5(rgyud): na ka ra/ ma ha ku ru Ni ka/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba ba ra d+ha ya ka/ b+ho d+hi b+ho d+hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ b+ho d+hi/ man d+ha/ a ba lo ki ti/ lo ki sha ra d+hu ra/ ma ha
181a6(rgyud): shwa ra/ ma hI tsin ta ma ni/ d+ha ra/ bA sho ro ba/ ma hA so du mya/ ba da na/ ma ha ku ru ni ka/ bu d+hu/ bu d+hA/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bA ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo/
181a7(rgyud): gi te garbe/ me hA bu n+ya terba/ d+ha ra/ tha b+ha ra/ sing+gi ka ra/ sarba bya d+hi ha ra/ sa ba sang tA da ya ba ra/ sarba tu khaM/ ba mo tsa ka/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ na mo stu
181a8(rgyud): swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'di ni rmad du byung ba/ rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jigs rten
181b1(rgyud): las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// gzugs sna tshogs chen po'o// sgyum ltadu
181b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin rnams par 'bru phyag stong mda' pa/ dbu stong mda' pa/ sman stong gi rnam par gzigs/ phyag stong gis byin gyis brlabs pa/ gang gi rlung gi bye
181b3(rgyud): ma khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i bye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang / mnyam pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid
181b4(rgyud): gsal ba la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'jug pa/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos kyi sgron med 'bar ba/ bdud
181b5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad kyi bdud 'jom pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgred pa/ dmyal ba thams cad sel ba/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad
181b6(rgyud): grub par mdzad pa/ cho ga bsgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog/ sa bcu chen po la so sor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rjes su 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas thams
181b7(rgyud): cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa byin gyis brlabs pa don yod pa'i mchog/ phun sum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul
181b8(rgyud): pa'i rnam par sprul pa/ don yod par sems can rgya mtsho snyed yang dag par 'dzin pa/ don yod par sems can sa bon la so sor 'jog pa/ don yod par byang chub sems
182a1(rgyud): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su sgrogs pa/ don yod par de
182a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur gyi sprin rab tu byed pa/ don yod par sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'dzud pa/ don yod pa
182a3(rgyud): sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ don yod par lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdag pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos
182a4(rgyud): dang / gdags dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / brgyan dang / chos gos sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod pa'i tshe rab tu rjes te/
182a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du brgyan pa/ sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par blta ba/ don yod par bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu rdzogs pa/ de ni yod
182a6(rgyud): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pa/ don yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / grub pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa/ don
182a7(rgyud): yod pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub pa/ don yod pa'i rigs sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag brgya dang / rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhig mo yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par
182a8(rgyud): grub pa mthong ba/ don yod par cho ga mthong ba/ don yod par tshe rab tu 'phel ba/ don yod par snyan par grags par rab tu ston pa/ don yod pa'i 'khor ba las rab tu
182b1(rgyud): sgrol ba/ don yod par skyes pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su sgrol ba/ don yong par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ don yod par bzlas brjod dang / chog
182b2(rgyud): rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par rigs 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur ba thob pa yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par
182b3(rgyud): lha'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang sum bcu rtsa gnyis lha'i gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par log min gyi gnas kyi
182b4(rgyud): rnadu 'jug pa/ don yod par sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su rgya byin lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/ don yod par ri rab chen po lags pas bsgral pa/ don yod par 'dzu 'phrul
182b5(rgyud): gyi stobs ston pa/ don yod par stobs 'phel ba/ don yod par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba/ so sor thob pa ston pa/ don yod par yid bzhin gyi nor
182b6(rgyud): bu rin po chen po'i rin che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par 'bru'i char 'bebs pa/ don yod par gos kyi char rab tu 'babs pa/ don yod par rgyan dang / chos
182b7(rgyud): gos dang / mu tig gi chun 'byang dang / gdub 'khor dang / gser gyi tsong tsong dang / gdub bu dang / dpung brgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa yang dag par ston pa/ don
182b8(rgyud): yod par ro'i mchog/ ro brgya'i kha zas kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par sems can sna tshogs grol bar ston pa/ don yod par bstan bcos dang / tshig le'ur bcad pa dang /
182b9(rgyud): ma pa sna tshogs
183a1(rgyud): tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / mdo bde dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcang ba dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes/
183a2(rgyud): bu rabs dang shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyis man ngag sna tshogs dang / chos kyis mngon par sna tshogs kyis gtam yang dag par ston pa dang / don yod pa
183a3(rgyud): theg pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rab tu ston pa/ don yod par gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yI dgas dang / grul bum dang /
183a4(rgyud): brjed byed dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren sna tshogs nyes pa dang / bsod pa dang / shin tu sel ba yang dag par ston pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na
183a5(rgyud): yon tan chen po can gyi gzungs/ ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ thams cad tu mi 'jigs pa'i gnas rab tu ston pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i laM
183a6(rgyud): legs par rab tu ston pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu ston pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par mdzad pa lags te/ bcom
183a7(rgyud): ldan 'das don yod pa la rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stong 'o// yon tan khyed par yongs su
183a8(rgyud): sgrags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang
183b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen pos mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rten 'das pa na
183b2(rgyud): par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho gas thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa/ gsang ba'i snying pos yongs
183b3(rgyud): su sgrags pa legs so legs so// de dag ni sems can thams cad la lam mchog/ shin tu mchog tu gyur pa/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs kyi
183b4(rgyud): snyid kyi snying po gsang ba yongs su sgrags pa ste/ gang gi 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can pha rol tu sgrol ba yin no// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu bo
183b5(rgyud): ma du/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang // dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / rmang rigs gang la la zhig gam/ sems
183b6(rgyud): rdzigs kyi nu mo da ge ba
183b7(rgyud): gzhan gang rung bas don yod par rnam par lta ba'i snying po 'di dang / smad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol
183b8(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad smad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi brlabs dam tshigs chen po'i dkyil 'kho
183b9(rgyud): gyis ming 'dzin pa tsam gyi kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro// gang gi'i klung
184a1(rgyud): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye mi'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
184a2(rgyud): rgyas mngon du mthong ba dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon du lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can chen po de dag gis ni/ bsod
184a3(rgyud): nams kyis phung po shin tu che ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / ming sna tshog
184a4(rgyud): da ltar thos pa dang / yang na klog pa dang / yang na blta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen
184a5(rgyud): bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang mnyam pa yin no// bka' ba byed pa lha smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang /
184a6(rgyud): thos par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzugs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol non par byed pa dang / 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / bzlas brjod
184a7(rgyud): kyi cho ga byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas bsgrubs par byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa de ni dka' ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/ de dag mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba
184a8(rgyud): gang zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bka' ba la zhugs pa dang /
184b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen
184b2(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge slong bam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rmang rigs gang yin pa'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang /
184b3(rgyud): cho ga stobs chen po dang / pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bsgrub pa byed pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ 'bri ba dang /
184b4(rgyud): klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa dang / go cha dang / dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshigs dang / phyag brgya bcings te/ bsgrub pa
184b5(rgyud): dang / 'di lte ste/ thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / sems dpa' dang / dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'o snying
184b6(rgyud): po dran pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dbang bskar ba dang / gzungs 'di yang len nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dran pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang /
184b7(rgyud): byams pas snying brlan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rtse ba lta bur byed pa de ni/ dka' ba spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no// bskal pa grangs med pa gsuM
184b8(rgyud): du bka' ba spyod pa dang / zhugs pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin no// de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /
185a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid du so sor gnas pa yin no// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po//
185a2(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyag g.yas pa'i byang chub sems
185a3(rgyud): dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang /
185a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag brgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzugs dang dkyil 'khor dmar po dang / yang na gur gum 'dra ba'i mchog/ sa rdul dkar
185a5(rgyud): po snum pa ni/ mar sar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin/ sa'i khyad par dbye ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mngags/ byang chub snying pos sa der mtshungs/ rings bsrel bzhug
185a6(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten dang / de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin no// bkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis/ slar yangs de dgang bar bya/ ji srid dong bu mnyam par dgang / de ni dkyil 'khor
185a7(rgyud): yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag pa sgrags pa min/ 'dir ni grub pa med par bstar/ khru ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis tshad/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag gdab/ yang na khru ni
185a8(rgyud): bcu drug dang / yang mthu ni bcom bya/ mnyam zhing khru ba ni legs par dbyed ba'i lce bdag n+de/ sa dang bsres te sku bya ba/ shin tu blar gdig pa dang / 'jam zhing mnyen po
185b1(rgyud): bya ba yin/ de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ sna tshogs mtshon gyis kun du dbye/ sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang // rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying
185b2(rgyud): po ni/ rnam par phye steng gru bzhi tshang / khrus gsum na yang khrus bzhi ni/ thig skud mtshon gyis rnam par dbye// nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu// gdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni// nor bu rin
185b3(rgyud): pa tshe sna tshogs bya/ bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu/ pad ma dang ni rdo rje dag/ kun tu bri bar bya ba yin/ phyi'i thig gi tshad dag tu/ rdo rje rnams pa'i stobs bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs
185b4(rgyud): gzhal med khang / stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya/ pad ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang // gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dpalnga// rnam par snang mdzad
185b5(rgyud): thub par bya// g.yon du 'od ni dpag med pa// g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs// shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni// don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi// dbyang phyug 'gon la mngon
185b6(rgyud): sum du// btud te thal mo sbyar ba ni// phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i// me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya//
185b7(rgyud): 'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni// khro bo'i rgyal po phrag bzhi pa// btud te thal mo sbyar ba dang // lha rdzas me togs rna tshogs dag/ lags pa gnyis la thog pa dang // sna tshogs
185b8(rgyud): brgyan gyis brgyan par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs brgyan pa// sna tshogs dar gyi mdzes par bya// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che// pad mo'i bden dang rnam brgyan pa
185'a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya// gra bzhi dag ni byas nas ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste// dbus kyis gnas su 'jigs med pa// shar gyi gnas su
185'a2(rgyud): gnas pa ni// lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan// g.yon gyis gnas su gnas pa ni// gos dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan// nub kyis gnas na gnas pa ni/ lha mo dkar mo rnam par/
185'a3(rgyud): brgyan// byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo pad ma mdzes dga' brgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rims gra rnams su// rgyas chen bzhi ni gzhags par bya// bar gyis gnas su bzhag
185'a4(rgyud): pa ni// ral pa gcig ma gtum mo shing // nub tu pho nya bzhin skyur ma// g.yas phyogs las ni bzhin sbyar ma// rdo rje lcags sgrogs bya ba yin// byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong /
185'a5(rgyud): kun kyang med dbus 'jig pa med// dkyil 'khor dbus su bkon pa bzhin// phyi rol thig la pad ma'i phreng // rdo rje rtse gsum bzhag pa ni// kun tu 'bar bas phreng ba bcas/
185'a6(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// bri bya rtags dang phyag rgya dang // lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang // chu lha dbang po lus ngan po// dbang
185'a7(rgyud): sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi// lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar// lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin// lung gsum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
185'a8(rgyud): kun kyang pade ma bden la gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang // legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// gdung rtse
185'b1(rgyud): gsum dang pa ny+dzi sa/ ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad mi 'phreng // 'khor lo drung dang 'gag dag dang / ral gri dang ni gtor ma rab// bum pa gang ba dag dang ni/
185'b2(rgyud): mi snang ba'i 'bag sha dang / pad+ma dang ud dpal la// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang / nor bu dang / dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang // gra bzhir rdo rje mtshan ma yin// nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni/
185'b3(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil// bya ma gsum dang ku 'di dang // ril ba b+hi ga ri dang // rigs dgas e ne'i lpags pa la/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang / steng du rgyu skar
185'b4(rgyud): bcas pa yi/ zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang 'dug bya// so chen dbye bar bya// mkhas pas rang gi sgor bri dang / 'gying 'bag mthong na 'jigs su rung / la/
185'b5(rgyud): na rdo rje 'jigs pa med/ rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang / ki li ki li gtum pa che/ lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru bzhag/ nub tu rdo rje bing ga la/ mthong na 'jig su rung ba yi/ byang du nges
185'b6(rgyud): par gnon ma rjes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pad mo'i phreng dang ud pa la phreng / gra dag dang ni gra rnamasu/ klu'i rgyal po bzhin rnams bri/ sgo bsrung ba dag bri ba ni// nor bu bzang
185'b7(rgyud): dang gang ba bzang // stobs kyi lha dang lnga brtsan yin// sgo'i gnas kyi bar dag tu// chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba// gang ga dang ni sin ta dang / phag shu dang ni sin du yin/ phreng ba'i nang rol thog
185'b8(rgyud): dag tu/ dpal gyi lha mo ba san ti// dpe med ma dang sa'i lha// lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma/ de bzhin me'i lha dag dang / 'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma/
186a1(rgyud): gtu mo dang ni me tog so// de dag bri bar bya ba yin// khrus byas 'bris mkhan gtsang ma yis/ gtsang ma'i snod du mtshon rnams ni// lhag ma min pas kun
186a2(rgyud): du bris// zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya/ khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa// spab par bya ba'ang nya sha dang // tsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams/ 'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni// log
186a3(rgyud): 'dren glags tshol spang phyir ro// khrus byas gos ni sar pa bgos// gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// kun du brgyan par bya ba ni//
186a4(rgyud): ba dan sna tshogs mda' dang ni// lha rdzas dang ni sbyang ba dang // bdan yang ni sbyang bar bya/ mtshon skud sna lnga'i srang bu yis// kun tu yongasu bskor bar bya'o// zangs las byas
186a5(rgyud): ba'i pad ma'i tshad// sor bzhi 'dab ma kha bye ba// mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnamasu// pad ma brgyad ni bzhags par dag/ gser lnga
186a6(rgyud): byas pa bzhi bzhag cing // de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byung ru'i phreng ba dang / mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no// kun du gser gyi srang bu dang / rin chen sna tshogs
186a7(rgyud): bzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil gyi thig bar du// gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang // dngul gyi snod ni bzhi bzhag go// dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la// dngul dang / gser dang /
186a8(rgyud): zangs las byas pa'i me rtog spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa bzhag par bya'o// gser gyi bum pa bzhi bzhag la/ mu tig dang / byu ru dang / pad ma rag dang / mar gad dang /
186b1(rgyud): in+d+ra ni la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog spras pa'i mgo lcog bzhag par bya'o// bla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur gum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod gang ba
186b2(rgyud): dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi med tog dang / mu tig gis brgyan cing / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o// cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi
186b3(rgyud): bzhag par bya// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi bzhag par bya// tshen sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po bzhi spang bar bya/ dngul gyi pog phor bzhi bzhag par bya// bla rtsi dang / ga pur dang
186b4(rgyud): gur gum gyi gdugs pas gdug par bya// sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste// rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyi
186b5(rgyud): la bkang ba la dar gyi bcings la/ brgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du/ zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag par bya'o//
186b6(rgyud): de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi chab kyi dngul gyi snod dang /
186b7(rgyud): zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// lcags kyi bum pa gang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// me tog dang / mgo lcogs dang / pog por bkang ba
186b8(rgyud): drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya ste// gdug pa sna tshogs kyis gdug par bya'o// sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan cing sdud pa bzhag par bya'o// sna ma'i me tog gi
187a1(rgyud): gdu bu'i steng du/ mnga' la ba dan btags pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi btsugs te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra' bar byas pa'i mda' dang / nor bu'i phreng ba rnam
187a2(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyi brgyan par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi thog thag du/ sa dang bsres pa'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la dri chab kyis bskus te/ tshon sna lnga'i srad
187a3(rgyud): bus thig btab la/ sgo bzhir rnam par phye ste/ seng ldeng ga pur bu'i tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi btab po// tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor
187a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum drug bcu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhag go/ kham phor zlum po drag bcu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyi
187a5(rgyud): bkang ba bzhag go// gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi so sor bzhag go/ snod tshon sna lnga'i drag bcu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bca'
187a6(rgyud): ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshog bzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyis yongasu gang ba ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtor ma bzhag go// 'bras
187a7(rgyud): bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna chog bkra mo// phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du sbyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyis dkyil 'khor la drug bcu rtsa bzhi/ snying po'i dkyi
187a8(rgyud): 'khor la sum bcu rtsa gnyis gdag so// me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o// gtor mo brgya drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / dkyil 'khor thog thag du mar med par bya'o// chang dang /
187b1(rgyud): sha dang / breg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / kyi'u dang / rtsod sngon/ la phug spangs pa'i gtor ma bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol grwa bzhir don yod zhags pa'i mdo
187b2(rgyud): sde klog par bya'o// sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi ba rol du byin pa klag par bya ste/ chos klog pa legs par khras byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi bkris te
187b3(rgyud): gtsang ma dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dgos pa'i gos gtsang ma dgos te/ chos kyi stan shin tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas/ tshig 'jam pos gnyen por klag
187b4(rgyud): bar bya'o// nub kyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor 'thon po la// bde ba can gyi bkod pa bris pa/ 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
187b5(rgyud): mthu chen pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'thon por byas la/ rnam
187b6(rgyud): bar grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil
187b7(rgyud): 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// lho phyogs kyi cha la/ ri 'dra ba'i gnas mthon po byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal
187b8(rgyud): dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhag pa ras la bris pa dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/ byang phyogs kyi cha la khro bo'i rgyal po dang /
188a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs
188a2(rgyud): par bzhag go/ stegs bu'i snum pa mthon por byas pa thams cad kyang legs par brgyan par bya'o// dar gyi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
188a3(rgyud): dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro dbul ba dang / 'bras bu naM
188a4(rgyud): pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms bzhag pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang / ga bur dang / bla rtsi dang / gur gum dang bsres pa'i gdugs pa
188a5(rgyud): ras kyi skra gzugs la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus byas zhing gos lan gsum rjes te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho
188a6(rgyud): ga bya'o// tshes brgyad nas btsam te/ tshes bcwa lnga tshang gi bar du// don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsagaN+DI
188a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par
188a8(rgyud): 'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang / rnam pa
188b1(rgyud): na yor
188b2(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba nyar thug gi bar du// zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// tshes bcos lnga'i nyin
188b3(rgyud): mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang bag tu med pa bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan mo thog tog tu bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang / lus snyom
188b4(rgyud): par bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i semasu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba 'tshams bcad
188b5(rgyud): pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la zhugs par
188b6(rgyud): bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo// mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod brtsam par bya ste/ don lo
188b7(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la// khro bo'i rgyal po rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// bzlas
188b8(rgyud): brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun du 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing / leg so zhes bya
188b9(rgyud): ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// rigs sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug shin du 'bar zhing 'od 'gro ba nyi ma
189a1(rgyud): stong lhag pa'i 'od zer can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon du gshegs nas/
189a2(rgyud): phyog bcur dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzig shing / rig sngags 'chang ba la legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i spyi
189a3(rgyud): bo la bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu rkyen cing spras pa 'di ni bzang ba 'di yin te/ legs lagaso// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod
189a4(rgyud): pa'i zhag pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs
189a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
189a6(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad 'pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor bgegs dang / rnams par log 'dren thams
189a7(rgyud): cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmang rigs dang / tha na byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs
189a8(rgyud): pa'i bya yang rung ste// sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol bar byed pa yino// 'di ni sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug
189b1(rgyud): bsngal ba dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yong su thar bar byed cing 'jig pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yino// 'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa'i
189b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po dang / gsang sngagasu bcas pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di/ rigs sngags 'chang
189b3(rgyud): ba des dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / ming 'dzin pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol du rgal bar 'gyu ro/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid
189b4(rgyud): du sa bcu skrod nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// de gang zhes na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mthong du
189b5(rgyud): mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan mga'
189b6(rgyud): snyung bas mthong ba dang / thang cig dang / ska cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yi no zhes nga smra'o// bdag ni sesaM can de la de bzhin
189b7(rgyud): gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jigs rten las 'das pa yin pas/ spyi bor bskur bar bgyi'o// rigs 'chang bas zung shig dang / mchog
189b8(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam pa de thams cad rjes su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do// de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar bsam sa
190a1(rgyud): mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par
190a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gang gi'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i tingange 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor de'i de
190a3(rgyud): tshig tu zhugs pa ni/ dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
190a4(rgyud): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin te/ lung bstan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/ de ni mangs na gnas par skye ba'i
190a5(rgyud): tha ma ste/ phyis mngal na gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// shin nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// de pad ma'i nang nas brgyan thams cad kyis
190a6(rgyud): brgyan par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun tu che rabs dran par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
190a7(rgyud): 'khor du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
190a8(rgyud): cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs par mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan sngar leg so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs
190b1(rgyud): kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skyes pa yang yin pas/ leg so leg so// phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rab tu gnas pa yino//
190b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing / bsod nams kyis brgyan
190b3(rgyud): pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can rkyang nas/ spyi bor 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam mngon sum du
190b4(rgyud): sgrogs par mdzad do// tha na dkyil 'khor chen po'i rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang / rnga bran dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol mo'i sgra gang dag grags pa la sems can gang dag gi sgra
190b5(rgyud): de thos nas/ rna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tha na
190b6(rgyud): byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// de ltar rnam par grol ba'i cho 'phrul pa yino// rigs kyi bu
190b7(rgyud): po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze/
190b8(rgyud): rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs dang / 'ga' zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang / sems can
191a1(rgyud): gang gis sgra de thos na/ sgra dbyangs de dang ming zos pa/ rna ba'i bu gang song bar gyu ba de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi zad pa las bral bar/
191a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnams par grol bar 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o// 'phags
191a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo che yino// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug grog mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin
191a4(rgyud): bar mdzad par 'gyuraro// mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjesu bsrung ba mdzad do// sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogasu song ste/ sa gzhi snang
191a5(rgyud): ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las su grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i sa'i rdul rlung
191a6(rgyud): gis bdebs te/ de lus la phog pa gang yin pa de yang tha na sems can ngan par yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
191a7(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad las yongasu grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs
191a8(rgyud): par 'gyur // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugaso byung bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyi bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu
191b1(rgyud): bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de ltar sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyi 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par grol
191b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thabs cad bsreg cing / sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang /
191b3(rgyud): nyon mongs pa drag po rgya mtsho dang / 'kho ba las sgrol bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na med pa dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMs
191b4(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i laM bla na med pa ston/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sprin bsregs byas pa tsam gyi mod la/ the tshom
191b5(rgyud): med par me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang dbang chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nur gyur pa rnams sprin bsreg
191b6(rgyud): byas pa 'di tsam gyis mdo la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// the tshom med par lha dang / ku dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
191b7(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mo la rigs sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la 'dud par byeda'o//
191b8(rgyud): de bzhin du nyin mtshan kun tu bsrung bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bcu yang phyogs bcur bsrungs pa
192a1(rgyud): byed do// mi srun pa ma rungs par sel cing / dmyal ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed//
192a2(rgyud): de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med pa bskyed par 'gyuraro// tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / srang bdun dang / ga bur dang / bla rtsi srang
192a3(rgyud): gcig gi bzhi ci'i re re dang / gur gum srang cig dang / ce bog kun tu ru srang lnga dang / gur gul srang bdun dang / 'di rnams cig tu bsres te bye mar byas la/ ka ra dkar po/
192a4(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsis ri lu zho ro'i tshad tsam du stong rtsa brgyad dang / nyungs kar dang / 'bras yos bsres te/ ri lu dang bsres nas/ mar gyi nang du spags te/ sgrin bsregs bya'o// shing
192a5(rgyud): su ra b+hi dang / shing arga dang / shing sho mi yam bsreg shing gi me sbar te/ sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bya'o// gang dang gang gi tshe/ stong tsa brgyad sprin bsregs byos na/ de dang de'i sdig
192a6(rgyud): pa dang / sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyuraro// de dang de'i tshe nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes
192a7(rgyud): ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / rmang rigs la sogs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang
192a8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dang / byur thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang /
192b1(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor 'jigs pa dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can
192b2(rgyud): ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol pa dang / mi rgod dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad 'jig
192b3(rgyud): ba med par 'gyuraro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag gis
192b4(rgyud): de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas thams cad bde ba can
192b5(rgyud): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyuraro// pad mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gan su gtogs pa rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri/
192b6(rgyud): tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog cing // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
192b7(rgyud): rgya'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba di lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// stong rtsa brgyad tshang na rigs sngags 'chang ba'i lus
192b8(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rigs sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/
