193a1(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang ba la legs so legs so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten
193a2(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sprin bsregs kyi cho ga yino// 'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sprin bsregs chen po'i cho ga yino// 'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po/
193a3(rgyud): dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren char gcod pa'i sprin bsregs chen po'i cho ga yi no// 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin
193a4(rgyud): bsregs chen po'i cho ga yino// 'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na med po yi no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu/
193a5(rgyud): brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i mgo bo'i spyi bo la 'jogs par mdzad do// 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
193a6(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i cha byang ba dbu lcang lo'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad mo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i
193a7(rgyud): mdun na bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs sngags 'chang ba khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin bsreg
193a8(rgyud): gi cho ga chen po grub pa legaso leg so// zung shig dang / mchog ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i
193b1(rgyud): mchog smras pa na/ de thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i mgo bo'i spyi bo la phyag bzhag pa dang /
193b2(rgyud): phyag bzhag ma thag tu rigs sngags 'chang ba na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
193b3(rgyud): mngon gsum du mthong ba thob par 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
193b4(rgyud): kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
193b5(rgyud): 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du/ mngon gsum du thos par 'gyur ro// de nas hom khung
193b6(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin bsreg gi gnas/ bla na med pa'i bad ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa/ sa dang ba'i lci bas bsres pa
193b7(rgyud): dang ldan par byas te/ pad ma'i snying po la hom khung bshad zab su rko ba dang / thang kun tu 'khru gang ba brkos par bya'o// nang du pad ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa
193b8(rgyud): bzhag lan/ tshon sna tshogs kyi pad ma de brgyan par bya'o// pad ma'i phyogs 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la/ dri sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa brgyan par bya'o//
194a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba bzhin dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhin dang / mchod yon gyi chus bkang ba'i gser gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs
194a2(rgyud): kyi gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te/ phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs spangs la/ dkyil 'kho
194a3(rgyud): kun du tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri ma chus yongasu bkang bar bya'o// sgo bzhi
194a4(rgyud): chos smra ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan par la 'dug nas/ don yod
194a5(rgyud): pa'i zhag pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o// gser gyi med tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bya'o// de nas rigs sngags
194a6(rgyud): 'chang bas khras byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos dri zhim pos bsgos te/ gtsang mar byas la ri lu la don yod pa'i snying po brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// blo bo'i rgyal po brgyad kyis
194a7(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgyan brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// don yod pa'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhag pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad
194a8(rgyud): sbyin bsreg pa ni/ mi smra bar byams pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni legaso bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
194b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug zugs rje chen po la phyag 'cha'o// 'di lta ste/ oM bo rA bA ni/ tsar car/ bang bab+hudz+re/
194b2(rgyud): dze la dze la/ hu ta shes na/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bI mo kA/ b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sarba ma la na/ a mo g+ha ba ni ba ra de/ hAM hAM/ ni rad ha/ pA bam/ sha ma sha ma Ni/ lo kod dA ni/ sa man nair
194b3(rgyud): shi bde/ tu ru tu ru/ za ba raM/ oM mog+na sing d+hI/ oM b+hu b+ha b+hu ba/ na mo stu ste swA hA// de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po
194b4(rgyud): dang / gzungs kyi sbyin bsregs gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas/ smad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o// thal ba
194b5(rgyud): des gang gi lus la gos pa de ni sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad grol bar 'gyu ro// dpral bar thig le byas na/ de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro// zha gnyis
194b6(rgyud): pa dang / zhag gsuM pa dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin bar dang / nam byed pa dang / nyin byed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims las
194b7(rgyud): lan 'ga' yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro// dpag tshad brgya dras te 'bros par 'gyuraro// tshogs mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi las thar par 'gyu ro//
194b8(rgyud): thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyuraro// thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der / gnod sbyin dang / srin po
195a1(rgyud): 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyuraro// thams cad
195a2(rgyud): 'bros so// phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na/ slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// snying kar thig le byas nas/ nang thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnasu thig les byas na/ lto ba'i
195a3(rgyud): nang gi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro// bdag pas zin pa la bkus na dug med par 'gyu ro// dug gis myos pa la byin na dug mi bar 'gyu ro// thal bas khrus byas na/ khyad par
195a4(rgyud): g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyuraro// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched dang / 'brum bu dang / lcags 'dra ba'i mtshan dang /
195a5(rgyud): me dpal dang / 'brum bu bran rnams byung na/ chu dron mo dang sbyar te/ bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na/ mod la nad thams cad las yongasu thar bar
195a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sprin logasu gtor na/ sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad mi 'bab bo// rlung ldang ba logs su gtor na/ rlung bsdams par 'gyuraro// phyogs bzhir gtor na
195a7(rgyud): mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// yul 'khor kun du gtor na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldumar dang /
195a8(rgyud): kun dga' ra ba dang / ri dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nag tshal thams cad legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun du
195b1(rgyud): mtshams chen po bcad par byas par 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na/ der 'jug pa dang / phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge
195b2(rgyud): slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rga bzhi pa dang / rigs dgas dang / bya
195b3(rgyud): de dag thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgod pa tsam gyis nad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// nad thams dang bral
195b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// tshe yongs su rjes nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyuraro//
195b5(rgyud): dur khrod dam/ ro bsreg pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te// mngon par dga' ba 'am/ bde ba
195b6(rgyud): can du skye bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer ram gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun du gtor nas/ 'tshams chen
195b7(rgyud): bo bcad cing zhing chen por 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad las legs par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// skye bo'i nang du
195b8(rgyud): gtor na/ skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// nad mi zad pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas/
196a1(rgyud): rang 'dod pa las/ rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las
196a2(rgyud): 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bris pa bshad par bya'o// dar ram/ ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do 'am/ khru gsum 'am/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su/ don yod
196a3(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byed 'chang ba pa/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyi brgyan pa/ cod pan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang / ga ya su zla ba ches pa can gyis
196a4(rgyud): brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa dri ba ni/ ri bo ta la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshog
196a5(rgyud): kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o// de'i steng du brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ seng ge'i khri'i steng du bad ma'i gdan bya'o// de'i steng du 'phags pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug
196a6(rgyud): bzhugs par bya te// pad ma dang / mdang rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing bzung ste// phyag dbugs 'byin par bya'o// dbu'i gong man chad gzhal med khang
196a7(rgyud): chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spros pa/ dbus mtho ba dang bcas par bya'o// dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun chad dang 'thun par pad ma'i
196a8(rgyud): gdan la bzhug shing / brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gis dbusu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag
196b1(rgyud): med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhug
196b2(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od 'dom gang la 'khor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi brgyan par bya// de bzhin gshegs
196b3(rgyud): pa'i nyen kor kun du 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba bya'o// de nyid kyi gnyen 'khor du lha sum bcu rtsa gnyis bya'o// gong gi dbus rje 'chang
196b4(rgyud): gakhro ga nyer can rdo rjegasor bar bya// de nas tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jugang pan dzod phyug chen po dang / rabang byig dang / zhwa'i bu'i dbang zug can po dang / snyam
196b5(rgyud): rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang / 'og min gi nas kyi lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen bzhi
196b6(rgyud): dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhonu dang / me lha dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / stobs
196b7(rgyud): lha dang / gang bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams me to//
196b8(rgyud): sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lags pa nas 'brul ba dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po//
197a1(rgyud): // bam po// lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag tu pad ma'i phreng ba/ rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pas smras pa'i bang
197a2(rgyud): ma'i phreng ba kun du 'khor bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma sgrol ma dkyil mo dkrung byed du bcas te/ bzhugs pa ud pa la dang / nor bu rin po che phyag na thog
197a3(rgyud): pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du lta bar bya'o// de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna tshogs 'chang ba/ brgyan
197a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi brgyan par bya'o// g.yon du gos dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil mo dkrung byed du bcas te bzhugs ma ku mu ta dang / nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa/ rgyan
197a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan ras gzigs phyug la lta bar bya'o// dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad ma mdzes dga' ma me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis
197a6(rgyud): brgyan pa bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma dang / dkar me'i 'og tu/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ nam bza' dkar po gsol pa/ brgyan
197a7(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs par bya'o// g.yas phyogasu srin mo ral gcig ma gtum mo dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra
197a8(rgyud): sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lde'o// g.yon du pho nya mo zhal mche ba brtsig pa/ phyag bzhi rdo rje dang / dgra s+tha dang /
197b1(rgyud): zhags pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ dkyil mo dkrung byed du bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la lto ba'o// ri bo ta la'i 'obs kyi gseb
197b2(rgyud): tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
197b3(rgyud): dbang phyug la gtor bar bya'o// ri smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo ba san ti dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang
197b4(rgyud): lcags sgrogs ma dang / dung can ma byas te/ brgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ me dog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o// gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten
197b5(rgyud): chen po brgyad phreng bar sbrengs la/ mchod rten gyi brgyan ji ltar brgyan pa de ltar brgyan par bya'o// mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying
197b6(rgyud): por gshegs pa la/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu drang srong dang /
197b7(rgyud): lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byas te/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo
197b8(rgyud): rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon du g.yob par bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa/
198a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// g.yon phyogs na khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// de'i 'og
198a2(rgyud): tu drang srong dang / lha'i tshogs gcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang / g.yas kyi phyi rol thog thag tu de bzhin gshes
198a3(rgyud): pa'i sku gzug brgya rtsa brgyad pad ma'i gdan la tshad ji lta ba bzhin du/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// 'phags
198a4(rgyud): pa sran ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drang du rigs sngags 'chang ba dbus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / bog phor dang / bgrang breng lag
198a5(rgyud): na thogs te/ 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du lta bar bya'o// ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang bar byas la ro sna
198a6(rgyud): tshogs pa'i kha zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// snod bsar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o// 'di yang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshog
198a7(rgyud): dang / gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba spang bar bya'o// tshigs ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// chang dang sha dang / breg btsong dang / sgog skra dang / ke'u
198a8(rgyud): dang 'dres pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang phra dog dang bral bar bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje/
198b1(rgyud): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsuM la dang bas lhag par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o// ga pur dang / bla rtsi bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyi bri bar bya'o//
198b2(rgyud): dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongasu spang bar bya'o// rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongasu spang bar bya'o// de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yino// zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri
198b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// rgyu skar shin du bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang / nyi ma shin du bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o// rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thos
198b4(rgyud): cad kyis sngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba yino// rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge
198b5(rgyud): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / bu de med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u
198b6(rgyud): dang / bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par
198b7(rgyud): gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba ni sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi
198b8(rgyud): mdo la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// mtsham med pa lnga byed pa dang / mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu
199a1(rgyud): spong ba dang / 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong
199a2(rgyud): bar byed pa rnams kyang mthong ba tsam la smos pas sdig pa thams cad phyi mar klag go// rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdom po chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang
199a3(rgyud): gi'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong
199a4(rgyud): ba dang 'dran pa rigs par bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni/ gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i ri bo bo ta la na/ 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug
199a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te/ mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// yid gnyis bskyed por mi bya'o// sems kyi ska
199a6(rgyud): mi gcig rab tu dang bar byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// lus dang sems yid las byung ba'i yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// nad thams
199a7(rgyud): cang dang dral bar 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang pra dog dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang / bla mar lta bar 'gyuraro// tshe ring
199a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// pad mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye
199a9(rgyud): rab dran par 'gyur
199b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
199b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rigs pa'i mun pa'i nang du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar mi mnyam pa dang
199b3(rgyud): mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te// ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa grub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las
199b4(rgyud): 'das pa bsgrub pa brjod par bya'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyi mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
199b5(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon du bsrung ba
199b6(rgyud): dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten las
199b7(rgyud): 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
199b8(rgyud): chen po'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM A mo glu/
200a1(rgyud): / a ba lo ki te ma hA ma d+ha la pad me/ sarba bo d+ha sA hA// na ma skri te b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba lo ki te/ a ma g+ha ma hA pra hA be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+hA ra/
200a2(rgyud): ma hA ka ru ni ka/ b+ho d+ha ya b+ho d+ha ya/ mAh+ya b+ho d+hi b+ho d+hi/ pad ma bi b+ho d+ha ni/ sarba pa swaM an d+ha/ ka ra pra sha ma ni/ sarba dur ka ti/ b+ha ra ka/ ma ha ka ru ni/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be sha d+ha
200a3(rgyud): blo dA ni
200a4(rgyud): ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta rba/ hu ru hu ru/ i mo ga ga ga rbe/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha bA sha ha ste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mo kru b+hu dze/ kI ni krI ni/ sarba a ra ba na/ bi shud d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/
200a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA/ ba ri pU ri ti/ ta ra ta ra/ tar yan man a ba lo ka ya pad ma b+hu dzes/ ma ni ka na ka/ bi byA shi ta yA/ bi b+hu shi ta yA/ dur dan ta nan/ ma ha bo dwi sa twa/
200a6(rgyud): ba ra da/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ sarba de ba ba ga Na/ na ma skri ta/ ri shi ga na/ sta bi tai/ sha ta sa ha/ pra tsan dra/ \u0f7fsur+ya a ti re ka/ ra shrI ra b+ha b+ha si ta/ ma ha pa shu pa te/
200a7(rgyud): be sha d+ha ra/ ba ra ma/ shud d+ha \u0f7fsa tA/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ki te shwa ra/ ma he shu ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ba ra ma ha ka ru ni ka/ man dru lo ki shA ra/ su pra bud d+ha/ ma ha pad
200a8(rgyud): mabu dzi/ sha ra/ mahA be rA ri sha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hang+gi ri/ maha ka ru ni ka/ ma ha 'i mo k+ka mnad la/ dang / sarba ta thA ga ta/ gU h+ya mu dra sa ma ya b+ha ra/ ma ra byi du d+ha
200a9(rgyud): ra d+ha ra/ ma ha ma ni/ mo'u le da ra/ a mi te b+ha/ ma ku ta d+ha ra/ gu ru d+hu ru/ sa man ta a ba lo ki ta/ lo ki shU ra/ ma he sha ra/ pa sha d+ha re sha ra/ pa ra ba ra mA/
200b1(rgyud): mahA me tre/ a ba lo ki ta/ sarba sad ta/ san ta rag sid d+hi/ si d+h+ya shA/ ba ri pu ri ka/ ma ha ba ra/ bra mod/ na mostu te swA hA// 'di ni thams cad rnam
200b2(rgyud): par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dzas cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs
200b3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog gsang ba/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongasu spong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par spong ba/ de bzhin gshegs
200b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs la 'jug pa yino// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
200b5(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// o bI ra bI ra/ ma hA man d+ha la/ bi sha ru pa/ Shad pa par mi ta/ pa ri pu ra ka/ sarba bo d+hi sad ti/ pa ra mi/ bi bu la bi mo kra d+ha ra/ ma hA bA sha/
200b6(rgyud): bi lo ki ta/ a mo g+ha bA sha/ dze li ta/ ma hA dza la/ a ba lo ki te/ ma ha ma Ni di pA d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba b+ha si ta/ dza le dza la/ ma ha gam b+hi ra/ bi mo kA ba sha d+hA ra/
200b7(rgyud): ba la b+h+yo d+h+yang ga/ a ka ru ka/ oM pra h+ma ru ba/ ma ha a mo g+ha paM sha/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sarba sa ta/ bi lo ki ta/ ba ra bra ha/ na mo sta ste swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i
200b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa
201a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM bi byA b+h+yaH/ bi bu d+h+ya/ bi ba d+ha/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/
201a2(rgyud): tar tar/ ta ra ya/ ma hA b+hu dza/ bi lo ka ya hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'pha/
201a3(rgyud): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM A mau g+ha pA sha ma ha da na/ pa ra mi ta/ pa ri pu ra yA/ hAM da ra dar/ bi bi b+ha/ bi tsi tre'u/ sarba sa twa/ u ba b+ho ga tha/
201a4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta / a hA/ d+ha na/ mu dzA/ me gle'i pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra yA/ ma hA pad ma pA ni hUM phaT swA hA// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying
201a5(rgyud): po ste/ gang gis yung 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te/ dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen mo// shin tu rgyas pa chen
201a6(rgyud): po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du byin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
201a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha shi la/ sam b+ha ra sa ma b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ha shud d+ha/ sa twa/ bad mu bi b+hu Shi Nu/ b+hu dza d+ha ra
201a8(rgyud): d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki te hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di sbyang ba byas te/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas/ mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// de nas
201b1(rgyud): don yod pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mdo la tshul khrims yongasu dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smos
201b2(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrim kyi dri zhim po'i dri mang po lus las 'byung zhing / phyog bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyuraro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di
201b3(rgyud): 'dran na/ de ni rtag tu tshul khrim yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// dge slong gang zhig tshul khrim nyams par snang ba byas te/ 'di bzlas brjod byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi
201b4(rgyud): mod la tshul khrim yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// tshul khrim mang po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
201b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM ma ha bir+ya a mo ga/ bi lo gi te/ bar ba ra/ dri d+ha/ bi r+ya/ ma hA ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo
201b6(rgyud): d+hung ga/ ba la b+ho d+ha ni hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongasu dag pa'i yid kyis dran par bya na/ dran pa tsam la sogs pa'i mdo la rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
201b7(rgyud): phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thas
201b8(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha klan te/ sarba/
202a1(rgyud): bo d+hi sa ta krA mi Na/ kra na krA na/ ma dza me'i tri/ ma tsa ka ru na/ sarba sad tA/ 'das la/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ sarba sa ta kra mi na hUM 'aTaswA hA/ gzungs
202a2(rgyud): 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i
202a3(rgyud): ri dgas dang / bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir/ gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par
202a4(rgyud): byed na/ dmyal ba'i sems can las thar par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa rnams par grol bar 'gyur ro// nam yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi ba
202a5(rgyud): du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
202a6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM sarba ta thA ga tA/ ma ha a mo g+ha/ ka ru Na/ d+hA na sa ma ti/ sarba bi kA/ a pra kam bya ba/ tsu rur+tha
202a7(rgyud): ru/ hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs la dmigs nas/ yid rtse gcig tu byas te/ dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la nges bas
202a8(rgyud): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang tinge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyu ro//
202b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting 'dzin thams cad la dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM A mo g+ha/ ma ha prad nya/ a ba b+ha sa/ s+pha ra na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/
202b3(rgyud): sa man ta b+hud d+hi/ a ba lau gi ta/ b+ha ga ba na/ prad dz+nyA a ba lo gi ta kru Sha/ ma hA prad dz+nyA pa ra da ba Ni/ ma ha prad dz+nyA pad ma da ri ni bu dze hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di dran
202b4(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyis dge ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyan mi
202b5(rgyud): 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rjes su dran
202b6(rgyud): ba'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
202b7(rgyud): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rmongs par mi 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gzung
202b8(rgyud): yino// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo//
203a1(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM ma mo g+ha/ bi mo k+ka/ man d+ha la/ ma hang b+hu da ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma ha b+hu ta/ ka ma la na/ a mi ta b+ha/ ma kuH/
203a2(rgyud): b+ha/ ma ku ta/ d+ha ra hUM phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor yungs kar dang / dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas/ chus kun tu chag chag btab na/
203a3(rgyud): chag chag btab pa tsam gyi mod le/ dkyil 'khor kun du sa sbyangs ste/ yong su dag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar shel sgo nga dang / rin po che dag par dri ma med pa mdzes pa de
203a4(rgyud): 'dra bar sa gzhir 'gyur te/ shin du dga' ba dang / shin du dri ma med pa dang / shin du nyams dga' ba dang / shin du yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyuraro// shin tu sa
203a5(rgyud): gzhi sba bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmangs
203a6(rgyud): rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyuraro// de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
203a7(rgyud): gyi khams su skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangs rgya'i bar du bsod nams kyi bung
203a8(rgyud): po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po stsogs par 'gyuraro// gang dag byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs pa'i rigs dang / bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag
203b1(rgyud): thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// gang gis de'i sa lag par 'ongs te/ reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang /
203b2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de dag phyis lus la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro//
203b3(rgyud): rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyu ro// sa yongasu spong ba'i rigs sngagaso// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203b4(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug thug rje chen po la 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ oM A mo g+hA/ dru ma ta la/ bri krA sha kha pa tra/ pu shwa pa la/ bi ta ba a ro ha/ na
203b5(rgyud): Da ta Da/ ga pu shwa ri na/ ud ba/ hra da sun da ra/ pra sra ba Na/ bi bi d+hA/ bi tsing tra/ pa ri shod yA sho d+ha ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man te na/ pa ri man da la/ pa ri sho
203b6(rgyud): d+hi yA/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la/ su ba ri shud d+ha pad ma u ba li b+ha/ dza la ma lan/ bi shud d+ha/ shwo d+ha yAsh+tso d+ha yA/ ma ra ma/ ma ha shud d+ha sa tu hUM phaT/ na mo tra
203b7(rgyud): b+ha ba ni hUM baT swA hA// 'di tsan dang / pad ma srang bdun btung bar bya'o// khrus pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos bdag nyid dbang bskar bar bya'o// khras byas pa tsaM
203b8(rgyud): dang / dbang bskor ba tsam gyi/ bdag rang gi byi nang yongasu dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dag dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang /
204a1(rgyud): te nang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rgas pa la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bgeg dang log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yosu
204a2(rgyud): thar par 'gyu ro// gnod sprin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa yongasu spangs par 'gyur zhing / bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drug
204a3(rgyud): du slar bong nus par mi 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba bde bar bsgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / nam mtsho'i ba'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams
204a4(rgyud): cang spangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phag pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug
204a5(rgyud): mngon gsum du mthong ste/ shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi 'jig tan gyi kham su bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// pad mo'i nang nas rdzus te skyes
204a6(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyu ro// brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / lus mtshan dang dpe byed kyis brgyan pa dang /
204a7(rgyud): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// mthar byang chub pa thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don
204a8(rgyud): yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin yang de bzhin gsheg pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo
204b1(rgyud): sde gcung sna tshog rnam pa du ma khas 'byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha/ bad ma bi ma le/ pra sa ra sa man/
204b2(rgyud): ta mu khe swAhA// char byes ste thig gdab pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo grA bi bi d+ha/ ru ba bi nid tra/ gan d+ha ra/ san d+ha ra/ pra b+ha ra bu dze swA hA/ tshon rtsi'i sngags dang kasku
204b3(rgyud): gzugs gzhog pa dang / mtshon cha dang sngags bri ba'i sngagaso// oM e mo g+ha/ sa man ta da shA dig/ ma ha si mAn/ b+han d+ha ya d+hu ru d+h+r-i hUM phaT/ yungs kar la lan bdun
204b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pas 'tshams bcad pa'o// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni/ pa sha ha ste/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA/ yungs kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag
204b5(rgyud): bsrung ba'o// oM a mo g+ha/ tsa da ma ni/ hu ru hu ru/ na g+ha pA sha bad d+he hUM phaT swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'o// oM a mo
204b6(rgyud): g+hu/ rak+Sha da sa man te na/ mA ha pA shweHb+hu ru b+ha ru swA hA// slob ma dang grogs rnams bsrung ba ste/ yungs kar dang / thal ba la lanau nyi shu rtsa gecig bzlas brjod byas
204b7(rgyud): ste bsrungs bar bya'o// oM a mo g+he/ dze laM bi ma le/ su ru su ru swA hA// dri chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas na khrus bya ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ a mri ta/
204b8(rgyud): bin du tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ di bye ba ste/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ gos kyi sngags so// oM a mo glu/ bu dza ga/ ka pa tsa ba re de tsi ri/
205a1(rgyud): tsi ri swAhA/ cho ga'i sngags yin te/ yungs kar dang gur gum gyis khrus bya'o// oM a mo g+ha/ s+thA ma b+hu dze/ brgyan te na pra sa ra swAh+ma/
205a2(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs kyi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ tsu Da ma Ni pad me/ a'i shin tsa yan ma sarba ta thA ga ta a/ a b+hiSh+Te ke'i ma ni ma Ni sI hAM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so//
205a3(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha/ pad ma/ b+ha sun d+hu re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha re ni/ ma Na De hUM// stan gyi gsang sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ sa man ta pa r+yang ke/ b+hu be na/ b+hu bi swAhA/ dkyil mod krung
205a4(rgyud): bcas pa'i sngagaso// o a mo g+ha/ su ra b+hi/ pad me/ pa ra ba ra haM// me tog gi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha g+han d+ha/ pra sa re'i/ su ru/ pu rnaM b+ha dze swA hA/ dri'i sngag
205a5(rgyud): so// oM a mo grA/ bi bi d+ha/ le ba na/ pra ba ri/ bi ri bi ri sAhA/ byug pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo grA g+ha na/ s+pha ra na sa ma ye'i d+hA ra d+ha ra hAM/ bdag pa'i sngagaso// oM a
205a6(rgyud): mo g+ha/ shu kla/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra d+ha ra hUM/ gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o// oM a mo g+ha/ za ba ra/ nubi lo ka ti/ kai ro ki re hUM/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngag so//
205a7(rgyud): oM bi bi d+hi/ a mo g+ha/ ba la ba ra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ ad b+hud ta/ gAn dru ba re hUM/ mchod yon gyi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni byA/
205a8(rgyud): sha Na bA re/ dza la dz+wa la/ brgyan dang / tha~Md dang / dar sbyang ba dang / mda' dang / tshon sna lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ba dza ni/ dza ya dza ya swAhA/
205b1(rgyud): snod kyi sngags te thams cad du sbyar ro// oM a ma g+hA/ pra bar/ b+ha ba na/ b+hu dze/ tha ra tha ra swA hA/ gzhug pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ nam skar na/ sarba tarbA ta an dza le hUM/
205b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ tsakre/ du ru du ru/ pra du ru swA hA/ bskor ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ sa man te/ a yan tu/ b+ha ba ni/ sarba ta
205b3(rgyud): b+ha b+ha ba swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ tsin ta me na/ pra kra rA ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ gsol ba btab pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ ni man na Ni/ bi mo kA man d+he la/
205b4(rgyud): mi li mi li swAhA// snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ ma ha ra sh+mi/ dza la sa ha pre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa man te swA hA/ mar me'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ b+hA sha
205b5(rgyud): ha ste/ pra sa re gang tshe/ swa b+ho ba nan/ bi sar rdzi to si/ sa ra sa ra hAM phaT sAhA// slar gshegasu gsol ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ pa sha ban d+ha/ sa man ta/ ma ha sa
205b6(rgyud): ma ya/ di NA hUM phaT swA hA/ dam tshig gi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha/ sa men te/ pra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra/ ma b+hu te shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di la/
205b7(rgyud): tu dang / mo da ka dang / zan dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / gtor ma dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa sbyin pa byas nas/
205b8(rgyud): byis bkyegs byed mi nus par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya de nas brjod byas ste/ gang gis gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ sdig pa thams cad zhig par
206a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya de nas brjod byas ste/ gang gis
206a2(rgyud): gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ sdig pa thams cad zhig par 'gyur/ las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni/
206a3(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin/ lag gnyis pad ma 'dar byas la/ sor mo rnams ni mnyam bzhag ste// gung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya// lags gnyis ma nyaM bar bzhag
206a4(rgyud): pa yi/ phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di// don yod zhag par byin gyis brlabs/ 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyi// lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed// oM pad ma b+hu dze/ pad+me d+ha ra/
206a5(rgyud): pad ma bi ma le swA hA// dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas/ rdo rje pad ma rtag tu bya/ gung mo cung zad skum nas ni/ lag gnyis pad mo 'dra bar bya/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong
206a6(rgyud): ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang phyug dag/ mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par/ sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub
206a7(rgyud): sems dpa' kun gyis ni/ phyag byas pa'i phyag rgya 'di// rnam grol dkyil 'khor smad du byung // oM pad me su pad mi/ bi mo kA/ man Da la/ pad ma b+hu dza swA hA rdo rje bcing
206a8(rgyud): bar mnyam bzhag ste/ rdo rje pad mo gung mo ni/ bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ rnam grol gsang ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ yang dag grol bar rab tu bstan/ phyag rgya
206b1(rgyud): 'di ni bstan pas ni/ ngan par byas pa thams cad 'jig/ oM a mo g+ha badz+ra/ pad ma b+hu dze/ mi li mi li swAhA/ lag gnyis thal mo khong stong las/ mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing /
206b2(rgyud): nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra// yid bzhin nor bu brjod pa yin// las ni don yod thams cad byed/ don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs shing / don yod pha rol phyin drug rdzog
206b3(rgyud): don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin/ don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang / 'tshams med lnga po sbyong bar mdzad/ oM a ma~M/
206b4(rgyud): g+ha/ ma Ni ma Ni/ pad+ma ma Ni swA hA/ rdo rje pad ma'i thal mo sbyar/ pad ma kha bye 'dra bar rgyas/ gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi/ phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang / phyag rgya ga 'di ni
206b5(rgyud): mtho ba tsam gyis/ 'bras bu chen po smad du byung / 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phags/ dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ oM a mo g+ha/ badz+re/ ma hA bad me dza le/
206b6(rgyud): su dza le/ many+dzu dza le swAhA/ snying kar rdo rje pad ma nyid/ rdo rje bcing ba phun sum tshogs/ 'jug mo lcags kyu 'dra bar ni/ bcing bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ gzi brjid chen po
206b7(rgyud): ngag dang ni/ stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang / thams cad grub par rab tu sprin// 'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che/ sangs rgyas nyid ni bla na med/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog
206b8(rgyud): ba 'grub gsang sngags grub pa bla na med/ oM ma mo g+ha/ sid d+he/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ sid d+he/ a ba lo ki yA/ sing d+he/ ma hA bi pu la sid d+he/ ku ru ku ru swAhA/ rdo rje
207a1(rgyud): @thal mo mnyam gzhag ste// gung mo gshig ste bsgreng ba dang / srin lag mthe bo so sor 'gyed/ gang mo yid tsam dgug b+h+ya/ pad mi'i dbang phyug
207a2(rgyud): sems pa che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma che// rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor na// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// phyag byas pa ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya 'di dag don
207a3(rgyud): yod pa'i// zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yi no// phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ rnam par grol ba'i
207a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi ldog par thob par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya'ang bcings pa tsam mthong bas// mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyuraro//
207a5(rgyud): mthong ba dang gzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing // mod la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la
207a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug thug rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a ba lo ki te/ ma hA shud d+hu/ sa twa/ sa ra sa
207a7(rgyud): ra/ man ta a ba b+h+ra sa/ kun Da la/ d+ha ra/ a mi ta b+ha/ ma ku ta/ d+ha ra/ dza ta ma ku ta/ na ma badz+re na dra na/ man Di ta/ tsa ra tsa ra saM b+hA ra b+hu ba NaM/ Sha ra/ bad ma b+hu dze
207a8(rgyud): swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma 'jig rten
207b1(rgyud): mgon po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yino// phyag rgya bdun phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya bdun po de gang du bcings zhing / phyag rgya
207b2(rgyud): mchog bzung ba ni/ phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyi phyag rgya bcings par 'gyuraro// bzung bar 'gyur// de dag thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur//
207b3(rgyud): bstod par 'gyur ro// ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyu ro// phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags bsgrub pa thams cad dang kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// tham
207b4(rgyud): cang byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yino// gang zhig bya rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas bsgrub par
207b5(rgyud): byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi bsgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
207b6(rgyud): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi bar du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu bzung bar 'gyuraro// pha rol du phyin pa drag
207b7(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// mtshams med pa lnga byeng ba dang / dam pa'i chos
207b8(rgyud): spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis/ ji ste phyag rgya bzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam gyis mod la sdig pa de dag
208a1(rgyud): thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad kyi yongasu bzungs par 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / gnod
208a2(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin
208a3(rgyud): rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / sba ba'i phyir rgyun du rje su 'brang bar byed par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong ba
208a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyu ro// rdo rje mkhregs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// dug gi mi tshugs/ mes ma yin/
208a5(rgyud): mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ byi ba bdug pa'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan zan rdum pos ma yin/ dug mi bzad pas ma yin/ rgan po dang /
208a6(rgyud): mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdib pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang /
208a7(rgyud): byang dang / spod gtong gis 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi la mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba mthong bar 'gyur//
208a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad/
208b1(rgyud): kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad pas/ 'di mthong bar dgos par 'gyur ro// rtag tu yon tan dang / bsod nams 'bar ro// dpal gyis lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su
208b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis mchod
208b3(rgyud): par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// lha'i gan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dges par 'gyur te/ rtag tu dges pa ston bzhed par 'gyu ro// rig sngags 'chang bas khrus
208b4(rgyud): byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang mar byas la/ dri sna tshogs kyis lus bska ba dang / bdag pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas na/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur
208b5(rgyud): gum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/ ga pur dang / bla rtsis bgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan
208b6(rgyud): sngar 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug gi skra gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas/ phyag rgya 'di bcing bya'o// mchod rten rab bsrel can gyi brang
208b7(rgyud): du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i cho ga mchod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// byam pa dang / snying rje'i sems su bya'o// sems can thams
208b8(rgyud): cad la lhag par rtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
209a1(rgyud): @#dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran par bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po 'dun po de dag bcing bar byas
209a2(rgyud): na/ phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdan bcing bar 'gyur ro// de nas mthu brjod par bya'o// mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags
209a3(rgyud): ba'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yin// rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skye bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi
209a4(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcas pa'i nang du 'am/ rig byed bzhi 'tshogs pa dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes
209a5(rgyud): pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / rmangs rigs tshogs pa de dag gi nang du/ de dag gis don yod pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mo do la
209a6(rgyud): mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skye nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang /
209a7(rgyud): dge ba dang / mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas byug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal 'thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
209a8(rgyud): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug chen po'i 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yid dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin do
209b1(rgyud): gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / gzhan yang rig
209b2(rgyud): du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dang / 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon du mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan
209b3(rgyud): par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / mi nyes pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram/
209b4(rgyud): rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / che thung ba dang / nad med pa dang / char 'bab dang / shin tu char 'bab
209b5(rgyud): pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar ba dang / rgad pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang /
209b6(rgyud): 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'bri ba dang / lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / nyes par byed pa dang / dge ba'am/ mi dge/
209b7(rgyud): ba 'am/ 'bri ba'am/ 'phel ba dang / skye ba lags par skye ba'am/ ngan par skye ba dang / bu 'byung ba bu pho 'am/ bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bu ngan pa'am/ bso
209b8(rgyud): nams can min pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas/ the tshom mi bya'o// ches grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin
210a1(rgyud): mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi/ bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sgra dang / bkrub shal dang / shin du khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma
210a2(rgyud): bcang ba dang / bden par smra ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang / bla ma legs par gnyan pa de bzung ba kha nar bya'o// zas dang / skom gtsang ba dang / chang dang / sha dang /
210a3(rgyud): breg gcong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / 'dres par byas pa'i zas yongs su spang ba dang / shin tu spangs pa dang / de dag gis khyad par 'dod pas yongasu spang bar byas
210a4(rgyud): na las 'di ni mod pa thams cad mngon du mthong bar 'gyuraro// dka' thub spyod pa la rnyas sems mi bya/ mgus pa mi bya ba ni lkog tu yang mi bya'o// rje su bstan pa de dag ni
210a5(rgyud): mchog yino// bsgrub par byed pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa yin/ dngul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la/ zangs la
210a6(rgyud): pad ma'i bdan stong bu dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du dngul lam gser byas pa// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshad sor bzhi pa/ bden pad
210a7(rgyud): mo phyag bzhi pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad ma dang / nor bu rin po che thogs par bya ba ni 'jig sbyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du
210a8(rgyud): sbyang bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas me long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel bzhag par bya'o// ga bur dang / bla rtsis sku la mchod par
210b1(rgyud): bya'o// me long gi nyen kor thog thag tu/ dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags par bya'o// dbang bskur ba'i dar
210b2(rgyud): gdags par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjed bya ste// /
210b3(rgyud): ji tsam brgya stong tshang gi bar du bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bya'o// des med+mo 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'bar bar 'gyuraro//
210b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyis 'dzag go 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung // de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur/
210b5(rgyud): don yod par dga' ba dri mo med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// lus shin tu dri ma med cing yongasu dag pa
210b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i grub pa bstan par bya dgos//
210b7(rgyud): pas/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor brgyar gru bzhi/ 'phang du khru do ba byas la shin du mkhregs pa shin du 'jam pa
210b8(rgyud): bya'o// thig skad kyis rnam par bye ste/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing / sgo bzhi rnam par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnam par bye ste/ pad ma 'dab
211a1(rgyud): ma brgya rtsa brgyad tshon gyis gsal bar bris shing / pad ma'i dkyil du ge sar dang ze ba bya'o// stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis
211a2(rgyud): brgyan pa dang / stegs bu gru bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go char dgos pa/ gtum pa 'jigs par byed pa bri bar bya'o// stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas bar bar du lha
211a3(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
211a4(rgyud): lha dbang phyug dang / phyag nA rje dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna kyis bri zhing / brgyan
211a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol du mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / pad mi'i phreng ba kun bya'o/
211a6(rgyud): phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / gra'i bar dbus dang / gra'i bar du lha mo brgyad bya ste/ 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i
211a7(rgyud): lha mo dang / dung can ma dang / pus ma dan ti rnams brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i snod thogs pa bya'o// phyi rol thog zag tu rmed
211a8(rgyud): ba'i bar bar du/ dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// ga pur dang / bla rtsis mchod cing dkyi/
211b1(rgyud): 'khor kun du dar tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi bcung peng gis bkang ste bzhag par bya'o//
211b2(rgyud): dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis bkang bar bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu bzhag par bya'o// snod brgyad dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ma swa bkang
211b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// kha zas bza' ba dang / gtor ma sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// dri sna tshogs dang / byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang
211b4(rgyud): ste bzhags par bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa tham
211b5(rgyud): cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ oM zhes byas pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig ma 'jig
211b6(rgyud): ten mgon mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na/ sa dang po la gnas par 'gyuraro// sngon sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa/ gang ci yA
211b7(rgyud): rung ba/ de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ don thams kyi rjesu 'jug par 'gyur/
211b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dges par 'gyur la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyi
212a1(rgyud): par mdzad do// gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas/ che 'bos pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gsang sngags
212a2(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa'o// oM b+hu yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas sa gnyis pa thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug
212a3(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad rjesu smin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur ro// nor gyi dab
212a4(rgyud): phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing / bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin
212a5(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// oM pad me gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa gsuM
212a6(rgyud): pa la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur/ pad ma yang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
212a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byang can 'dun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zham
212a8(rgyud): pa'i pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du/
212b1(rgyud): dngos grub rjesu dran par sbyin par mdzad do// oM pad ma hriHgsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa de
212b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i skra gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa rkyang nas phyag spyi bar 'jog par mdzad la/ rigs sngags 'chang ba legaso/
212b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba rjesu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang tshur shog/ khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongasu dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par
212b4(rgyud): yongasu dag go// mi'i 'jig rten 'di na tshe 'phos nas/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir zhing rnams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos
212b5(rgyud): par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// oM pad ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ saM lnga pa la gnas
212b6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa de ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad pa/ sgrib pa thams cad yongasu zad par 'gyur/
212b7(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chad la leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang la legaso leg so// khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig
212b8(rgyud): sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod che rjes na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du/ dge ba'i
213a1(rgyud): rtsa ba mtshungs pa skyed par 'gyur zhing / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad ming gtsug tor gyi
213a2(rgyud): snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing / rigs sngags chang khyod sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis bya thams cad gyis
213a3(rgyud): shig/ yid la bya ba'i bsgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro// oM pad mA lo ki te/ gsang sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum
213a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ sa drug pa thob te 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas
213a5(rgyud): kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzig mngon du ston par mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do//
213a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan rigs sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad/
213a7(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du chur shog/ las byas pa ni shin tu yongasu zad cing / khyod kyis sems can
213a8(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sgo rnams ni chad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni bye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang / rigs kyis
213b1(rgyud): spri ni khong du chud/ khyod kyis don/ yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'di ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams
213b2(rgyud): ni phye bas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa rnams/ ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad ma dz+wa la hUM d+hig/ yig
213b3(rgyud): bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pade ma dri ma med pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ tingange 'dzin gang thob pas lus
213b4(rgyud): shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi
213b5(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dag gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs
213b6(rgyud): dag bab pa las/ me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams pa rnam pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gsheg
213b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i pad mi'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i gser gyi mdog can dpung pa rkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rigs/
213b8(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi spyi bo la 'jog cing legaso// zhes bya ba yang 'byin la/ dbu skra 'byin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang leg so lagaso// 'di ni sangs rgyas
214a1(rgyud): #bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchong ba'i cho ga yin// 'di ni 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang /
214a2(rgyud): phyug gi snying po gsang ba bces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa dam gtsug gtor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o// rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyi dkyil 'khor
214a3(rgyud): mthu dag rdzogs pa dang / pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
214a4(rgyud): du song la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad la gyi shig/ oM a mo grA ma Ni pad med/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po brgyang pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ lus shin du yongasu dag cing
214a5(rgyud): dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che chen po shel lta bu phyi nang med pa yongasu dag ste/ de ltar rigs sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su
214a6(rgyud): dag par 'gyuraro// sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan sa gzig dbang phyug rang gi lus yongasu dag pa/
214a7(rgyud): rang gi gzugs kyi rngo za ston cing rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la/ rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ phyag g.yas pa mgo zar sgra
214a8(rgyud): bo la 'jog par mdzad/ legaso zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mjed de/ rigs sngags 'chang legaso legaso// rigs sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam h+ya pa
214b1(rgyud): dag pa la zhug so// rigs sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel pa'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar chur shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyis rgya mdzad
214b2(rgyud): pa byed par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa bad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
214b3(rgyud): bsgrub pa/ dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ oM bad ma lo tsa ne hu ru hUM/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa dgu pa la gnas
214b4(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
214b5(rgyud): khrig dgu bcu rtsa dag dag/ rigs sngags 'chang la mngon gsum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad garigs sngags 'chang
214b6(rgyud): gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/ legaso zhes bya bar yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang chen po legaso// khyod kyis ngal zhing spangs pa'i
214b7(rgyud): las legs par bsgrub par byas na/ khyod kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa grub ste/ don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhig mo sgrub
214b8(rgyud): pa dang / mdo sde lung dang bcas pa/ bsgrub pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams grub pa yin no// oM pad mo uSh+NI Sha bi le hUM baT/
214b9(rgyud): zhags pa
215a1(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas/ sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing /
215a2(rgyud): lha dang ma'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o brjod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad ma gtsug
215a3(rgyud): tor gyi 'khor lo bsgyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o// gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par
215a4(rgyud): sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag pa'i zhem pa gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyod pa// gos gtsang ma bgos pa/
215a5(rgyud): byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smra ba/ bla na med pa la gus pa/ dkon mchogasum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa
215a6(rgyud): byed pa 'di ni/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa bstan to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la na rdo rje/ byang chub sems dang
215a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bzhin 'dzum pa rab tu 'dzum la/ rje bskor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa'
215a8(rgyud): chen po gsang sngags kyis gzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyas pa 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzung sngags kyi
215b1(rgyud): snying po re re bo 'di dag ni/ bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod
215b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nyin zhags gcig bsnyen gnas pa gnas shing / zas blangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum bu dang /
215b3(rgyud): ca ba bzang ba zos nas/ rigs sngags 'di bsgrub na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
215b4(rgyud): phyugs gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhags gcig sbyang ba la gnas shing / nyan zhag cig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur
215b5(rgyud): ba ni/ lags na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dge slong mgo
215b6(rgyud): bregs pa/ rigs kyi mtsho ba bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ rmangs rigs gang la la
215b7(rgyud): ska cig/ thang cig yud tsam maM/ dus tshigs cig gam/ dus tshigs gnyis sam/ dus tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar/ don yod pa'i zhag
215b8(rgyud): pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs sngags kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba/ gzung sngags chen po bcu po 'di lan cig dran nam/ klog gam/ ming gzung
216a1(rgyud): ba yang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshig cig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang / de'i mtshams med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/ bskal par
216a2(rgyud): gnas pa yang de'i thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa bsags pa rnams dag par 'gyur/ lus yongasu dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur// sgrib
216a3(rgyud): pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rjes 'chi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ naM
216a4(rgyud): kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcur 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgya bcur 'jig rten gyi khams
216a5(rgyud): bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal ba 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis su/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum
216a6(rgyud): phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyi su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs par skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis/
216a7(rgyud): nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri zag brgyad bcur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/
216a8(rgyud): bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgar 'og min gyi gnasu lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/
216b1(rgyud): bskal pa 'buM phrag sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du brgya byin byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnaMm
216b2(rgyud): su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la sprod par 'gyur te/ nam kyang ma'i mngal da skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang /
216b3(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur// thams cing du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje de ltar rigs lan tsog dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i tsa ba/
216b4(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gal te gang zhig zhag cig gam/ lan cig snang ba la gnas te/ bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byed na/ lag
216b5(rgyud): na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo 'di nyid bsgrib pa dang bral nas/ don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin thob po// don yod pa rnam par gaN+DI
216b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin 'thob bo// pad ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin thob bo// don yod par 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi
216b7(rgyud): snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
216b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen dang ldan par 'gyur/ che rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khamasu bde ba can du bang ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni don yod pa'o zhe
217a1(rgyud): pa'i cho ga zhib mo// don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha'
217a2(rgyud): ngag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur
217a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sde gas bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste/ bsgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// de nas gnod
217a4(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan
217a5(rgyud): 'das don yod pa pad mo gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan
217a6(rgyud): 'das rigs sngags 'chang kun gyi grub pa bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
217a7(rgyud): 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad
217a8(rgyud): par bya yis nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa/ pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rigs sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig
217b1(rgyud): kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran par yid la byed pa yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang /
217b2(rgyud): byams pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas/ sems can thams cad la/ dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ba ngan sot+pa da skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal
217b3(rgyud): ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad bsgrub pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// /
217b4(rgyud): lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyi nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang /
217b5(rgyud): g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par 'gyuraro// lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad sel bar 'gyuraro// len lnga brjod pa tsam gyis
217b6(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu 'byin par 'gyuraro// lan drag brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad
217b7(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro//
217b8(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de lta bas na/ sems can thams da kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan mi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o// sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar shi ba dang / dge slong gang
218a1(rgyud): la la slab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la gus par ma byas par shi ba de'i nang du/ bye ma gtsang
218a2(rgyud): ma blangs la/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas du khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa 'am/ mchod pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o// gang dang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod par bye ma gtor
218a3(rgyud): ma thag tu/ de dang der bye ma bab pa'i sems can de dag/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zar skye ba 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi skye gnasu skyes nas/ de de'i mod la tshe rjes nas/
218a4(rgyud): thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur zhing / nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyuraro// yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang
218a5(rgyud): gnyis pa 'am/ rkang bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing / thams cad mtho ris su
218a6(rgyud): gzhol bar 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang lhang sko skad dang / ne'u le dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sdig pa dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor
218a7(rgyud): de la grib ma babs pa tsam gyis thams cad kyis las kyi sgrib pa rnams rnam par ga par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyuraro// dung la lan bdun
218a8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas nas/ gnas mthon por bus na/ sems can gang dag dung ngo sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dgas dang / bya dud 'gro'i skye
218b1(rgyud): gnasu gtog pa de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyuraro// gang dag tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag
218b2(rgyud): bsnyen gnas la gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas/ sems can de
218b3(rgyud): dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur la/ tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur
218b4(rgyud): te/ tshe rab su tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyis 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang 'am/ skye bo mang
218b5(rgyud): po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs nas/ gang dag der gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos gos la gdugs nas
218b6(rgyud): gang gis lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam 'jig par 'gyuraro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// /
218b7(rgyud): gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas
218b8(rgyud): pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs nas// dge slong thams cad kyi
219a1(rgyud): mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro//
219a2(rgyud): ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar 'dugs nas/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mdo la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa mchog kun rjesu sbyin par
219a3(rgyud): byed do// gu gul dang bsres nas lha mo'i mdun du bdug pa bya zhing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bya ba byas na/ mod la lha chen po 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags
219a4(rgyud): 'chang gi mdun du 'dug nas/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed do// bo la dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul bsres nas/ sred med kyi bu'i mdun na 'dug par bya
219a5(rgyud): zhing / gas sngags rtsa ba la na nyi shu rtsa gcig lus kyi yan lag dag la bya ba pa byas na/ sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa mchog kun rje su
219a6(rgyud): smin par byed la// dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed// yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdun cing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu byab pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang
219a7(rgyud): gi gzugs kyi mdun du 'dug la/ mchog thams cad sbyin par byed de/ pad ma'i phyed ma dang sres nas/ nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs la bdugs na/ nag po chen po
219a8(rgyud): dang / rnam mo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / mchog dang bya ba bsgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// na ga pus pa dang / sbrul gyi
219b1(rgyud): shun pa dang bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas/ klu'i mtshor gtor na don yod pa'i zhags
219b2(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing // dran par byas na/ klu dang / klu mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas/ rigs sngags 'chang
219b3(rgyud): gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing / gang sgo ba de dag thams cad byed la/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyuraro// lan gsum sbyar bas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yA
219b4(rgyud): 'ong ngo // klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing / thams cad sgo ba bzhin byed lo dbang du gyur nas/ 'dug go// gnod sprin dang / srin po dgug par 'dod
219b5(rgyud): pas/ dur khrod kyi nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdug la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na/ gnod sprin dang srin po dag rgyag cing
219b6(rgyud): 'ong la/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas/ rje brdzun bka' stsal cig ces zer ba dang / de bsgo ba ci lta ba bzhin byas na/ bsgo ba thams cad byed la/
219b7(rgyud): mngags pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing / ji srid mtsho'i bar du 'dug// thod pa sbyar ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ bdug pas bdugs na/ 'byung po thams
219b8(rgyud): cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams dbang du 'gyur la las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas/ btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba glang gi lci
220a1(rgyud): bas dkyil 'khor byas par byes pad ma'i ri mo bris zhing / phyi'i gtor ma pad ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la/ 'dug pa 'dis 'dug cing gsang
220a2(rgyud): sngags rtsa ba brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ gnod sbyin mo la brdeg par byas na// sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug
220a3(rgyud): cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste// don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro// yang na me 'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya
220a4(rgyud): ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la sdug pas/ long spyod dang gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la/ rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su sbyong bar byed do// gal te srid mo/
220a5(rgyud): byas na rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro// gal te chung mar byas na sum bcu gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spod la rtser 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha mo dpal la bdugs
220a6(rgyud): na/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing / lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor/
