220a7(rgyud): bu phung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ de nam mtsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing / nor chen po nyid 'phel bar byed do// rnam thos kyi bu la 'dugs na gser srang stong sbyin
220a8(rgyud): par byed do// nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs la/ gser dong tse bdun sbyin par byed do// tshal gseb du bdugs na/ tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis
220b1(rgyud): mdun na 'dug cing / rdzas dang sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go// ri rnams la gdugs na rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad
220b2(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyuraro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na/ grong khyer kun tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nang mgo ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang /
220b3(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'brog tu bdugs na/ rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng ge dang / stag dang /
220b4(rgyud): sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyis 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / ri dgos gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la
220b5(rgyud): bdags na/ rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams 'gegs pa/ tsan dan gyi bdag pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o//
220b6(rgyud): de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags bsgrub pa ni/ nyi ma'i go zi brjid dang mtshungs shing / skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba
220b7(rgyud): yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyi 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phel lo// lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang /
220b8(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas/ rtag tu mchod pa'i gas su 'gyur gyis/ rigs sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o// dpral ba'i steng du thig le
221a1(rgyud): / byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal zhing shel ltar dag la/ mdog dkar zhing dri zhim pa dang /
221a2(rgyud): glang po che'i byed la dang / dpral ba dang / ba glang gi gnas ltar skyon med cing mnyam par mthun la/ shin du dul ba ded dpon cig pu'i nor bur gyur cing / gsang sngags/
221a3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas pa legs par sgrub cing / gser dang / gos ltar kun du 'bar ba ni thig le yin no// smin mtshams kyi bar 'phul ba ni/ shin du phra ba rtag par mdzes
221a4(rgyud): pa ni/ zlas pa nya la mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni/ rgyud skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyis dbus na/ lha rnas
221a5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na ni 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gdugs gcig pa ltar 'phar ba yin/ 'jig rten pa'i nang na gdugs gcig pa/ bde
221a6(rgyud): bar gshegs pa ltar shin du dul ba yin la/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du/ nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni/ seMs
221a7(rgyud): can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yino// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog sems can thams cad
221a8(rgyud): kyi don du sbyin par byed de/ de ltar thig le nor bu mthu ni/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed pa'o// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ sum bcu
221b1(rgyud): rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang du 'gyur bar rjesu 'gro ba dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyur pa/ thams cad dadang
221b2(rgyud): du 'gyur ba ni thams cad da mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyis mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la/ mes
221b3(rgyud): mi tshig/ chus mi khyer cing / lus la dug dang / sbyar mi'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byang mi bzad pa dang / ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur
221b4(rgyud): te/ nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang rlung dang / glad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod
221b5(rgyud): la de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can bcon du bzung ba 'am/ chad pas bcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la/ thig le lta bur byas pas// de dag thams cad
221b6(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur/ smin mtshams dpral bar thig le byas na/ de'i modo la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon stong rnams lus la 'jug par
221b7(rgyud): mi 'gyur zhing / glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khyu dang / chom rkun dang / shod kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri'i su la dang / ngam grog dang / glog dang / glang ba dang //
221b8(rgyud): sbrul dang / sngangs 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/
223a1(rgyud): g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btog pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas na/ 'khor lo
223a2(rgyud): la byugs la/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na/ bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lags bzhi las rgyal bar/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis
223a3(rgyud): pham par byas par 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro// thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dad
223a4(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du 'gyur nas/ nye bar 'khod do// ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyuraro// dpung pa g.yas par nor bur btags la/ yan lag dang / nying lag dag tu thig le
223a5(rgyud): byas na/ thams cad du rgyal ba 'a thob cing / rigs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la don gang dang / gang bsgrub pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyuraro// ri lug+ma ni khar bcug nas/
223a6(rgyud): lhan cig 'dug la smras nas ni/ thams cad du ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang ni rmangs rigs nyid/ skyes pa dang ni
223a7(rgyud): bud med dang / khye'u bu mo rnams kyang rung / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ kun du mngags pa'i las rnams byed/ ri lu zos pa tsam gyis ni/ nang rnams thams cad rnam par
223a8(rgyud): 'jig/ gang gi nyin ni bzhi pa'i rims// gang dag khong skye ma nad kyis nyams// gang zhing rtag pa'i rims kyis btag/ gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang / de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can//
223b1(rgyud): bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon/ skye ma byed skyes pa brjed byed dang // gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad dang // sdig pa'i las ni kun du spyod// sngon gyi las ni mi bzang ba// de kun
223b2(rgyud): ska cig tsam gyis 'jig/ ri lu khrus byas tsam gyis ni/ 'bras dang shi bar 'gyur rnams dang // lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang // mtshan mar rdol dang med pal dang // khyi rngo mdze dang
223b3(rgyud): rkang pa'i nang // mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni// gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin// byug pa tsam gyi mod la ni// thams cad dug med zhib par 'gyur// ri lu thams cad las byed
223b4(rgyud): pa// lha rdzas shing sos par 'gyur// ri lu dag ni 'chang byed cing // thig le dag ni byas pa yis// thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob// thams cad du ni nor dag 'du// dpal
223b5(rgyud): 'dod pa ni dpal thob cing // 'bru 'dod 'bru'i phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing // klu rnams dag ni dga' dang bcas/ gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / lha min
223b6(rgyud): mkha' lding mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang // 'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag rgya nas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang du nas 'khod// 'khor
223b7(rgyud): kun bran byed ci bya zer// gang zhig ri lu de dag ston// ri lu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // de'i
223b8(rgyud): rigs la rtag tu ni/ mchod sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad/ bsod nams phu bo stong dag ni// nyi ma re re sogs par byed// 'jig rten pa'i bde sbyin cing // 'jig rten pha rol/
224a1(rgyud): shin tu bde// tshe rje ba ni 'phos nasu/ bde ba can du mod la 'gro// gang dngag du b+hur ni/ tshe rabs rtag su tshe rabs dran// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che//
224a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// dus kun du ni bsrung ba dang // skyob dang sbeng dang bsrung bar byed// gang zhig bu ni med pa dang / bu
224a3(rgyud): med bu ni 'dod pa la/ ri lu gcig gcig sbyar na su/ mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni/ mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor// 'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su// zla ba
224a4(rgyud): tshe bcwa lnga la/ skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing / yan lag la ni thig le bya// dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchog ston sbyin// bsrung ba'i tshe
224a5(rgyud): ga byas nas su// gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyid brgyan gyis brgyan nas ni// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas//
224a6(rgyud): snying rje sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing nges pa dang // bla ma rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgram zhing // spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // du rus
224a7(rgyud): can dan sa la ki/ lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing // bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/ ri lu legs spang bzab par bya// gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni// btung dang kha zas bza'
224a8(rgyud): bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzig kyi dbang // mchog sprin mdzad pa mchog rab bya// byams mdzad de'i zhabs drung du/ mchen mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni// mthong ba mchog
224b1(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing // mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad// bud med de ni bu bskyed cing /
224b2(rgyud): gzugs bzang mchog tu blta na sdug/ stob ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// lha yi dpal ni rje su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang / tshe ring dbang phyug tshad
224b3(rgyud): med 'gyur/ dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang // sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed par 'dod pas/ thos pa la rten nas 'dug cing // rigs sngags
224b4(rgyud): 'chang gtsang ma des// zhag bdun du ni nyin re zhing / mar dang 'o ma skol ba der ri lu bdun bcu ste// zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'jam
224b5(rgyud): tsam pa 'thungs la/ phyis kha zas bza' bar bya// zhag bdun gyis bla'i rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur te// bstan chos thams cad dang // chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang /
224b6(rgyud): snyan ngag dang / rnga sprod pa dang / mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis sde dang / tshig su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs
224b7(rgyud): kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha don du longs par 'gyuraro// zhag nyi shu rtsig ci
224b8(rgyud): tu sbyar byas nas/ stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur te// glang po che khri'i stobasu 'gyuraro// zla ba cig tsam sbyor ba byas na// lo lnga brgyar mtshe zhing
225a1(rgyud): @gnyer ma dang // sgra dkar spangs la skra cang lo 'khril zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyuraro// lo gcig tu sbyaran/
225a2(rgyud): lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing / na mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang / lhan cig 'thun par rgyu la/ brgya byin dang / yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo
225a3(rgyud): cho ga dang // lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur ro// nyi ma lta bur 'od stong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang
225a4(rgyud): po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed// gzi brjid 'bar ba shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba la the tsam mi bya'o// las thams cad bsgrub pa'i thig le
225a5(rgyud): dang / ri lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sman mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub pa bshang bar bya ste/ rigs
225a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yino// sman dngul chu dang / b+ha mi kI ra dang / su ban ti kI ra dang / shel sngo bsangs dang / kug kri dang / su gan d+hi dang /
225a7(rgyud): king ku Sh+Ta skyon med pa dang / uta pa la bzang po dang / pad ma mag kA dang / gu gul dang / phe lu pa tre dang / gur gum dang / na ga pu pa Sha dang / bcas pa dang / spangs spos dang
225a8(rgyud): shi ri sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas zhib du btags pa'i phye ma la/ don yod pa'i pad ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba rigs sngags kyis shin du brtson par
225a9(rgyud): rgyal po sde sa kyis
225b1(rgyud): lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing / khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig ma lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya// de'i tshe gzungs
225b2(rgyud): sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas/ smon don yod pa'i rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog/
225b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhags la grib skam bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgyad brgya bzlas rjod
225b4(rgyud): byas nas/ snod kyi nang du bcug la/ nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ thams cad du bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gcamar gyur pas/
225b5(rgyud): lus legs par khrus byas la/ spos chus byugs te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya// sman gyi mchog 'di nyungs mar gyis sgras la/ rang gi lus la byug par bya ste/ lan cig bskas pa
225b6(rgyud): tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ gnas gsang bar bya bar bya ba'i sgo bcang ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad
225b7(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / ci bgyis zhes bya ba byed
225b8(rgyud): la/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'jug par 'gyur// klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la/ klu'i 'khor
226a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa thams cad 'dun du 'khod nas/ bya thams cad la ci bgyi ba zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing / la su ba dang / dgos pa thams cad byed
226a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing / nyon mtshan du gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad spro ba bzhin byed par 'gyuraro// sman la si ha dzi hra dang / ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar
226a3(rgyud): bas mgo kun byugs na/ ci ltar yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed/ gnasu gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par
226a4(rgyud): byed/ gnasu gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs skra sna tshogs ston par byed// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar da 'phel ba rnams ston par byed
226a5(rgyud): cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos kyi til mar dang spras nas/ byin pa dang rkang pa la bskas na/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gang du
226a6(rgyud): 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing / nam kyang byir sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskas na/ gang dang gang la reg pa de 'ong ba
226a7(rgyud): 'gyur la/ sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzho nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa ga
226a8(rgyud): yin pa byed do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang mi 'thong ngo // bud med gang dang 'brang na sus kyang mi 'thong la// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi sheso// /
226b1(rgyud): khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / gzhad rgad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs pa byas pa thams cad byed la/ lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // bum pa la byug
226b2(rgyud): nas chus bkang ba na/ chus rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mthong ngo // gzhong ba chus bkang ba de'i dbusu byug na/ chu de gang bar snang la/ bum pa de ni mi snang ngo // bdag
226b3(rgyud): nyid la byugs na/ bum pa chus bkang ba lag na thog na/ bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni snang la/ mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo // mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhag
226b4(rgyud): mi mthong bar 'gyur/ de'i sgra thos shing rang lus ni mi mngon no// gnas su gtog pa de thams du zhugs na// rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo // su
226b5(rgyud): yang rung ba'i mig la bskus na/ de dag thams cad mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der/ mi snang bar 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir
226b6(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro// lus kun la bskus nas mdzod chen po'i nas zhugs na/ mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ gser dang / dngul dang / phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
226b7(rgyud): byi ru dang / dung dang / man shal dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / mar gang dang / mthon ka dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / brgyan dang / lhab lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na/
226b8(rgyud): thams cad blangs nas song na/ sus kyang mi mthong la/ gar dga' bar 'gyur// ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du ring por mi mthong la/ khrus byas na thams cad du mnong //
227a1(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pas gtsang mas khrus bya'o// de nas spos chus khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i gcin gyis khrus
227a2(rgyud): bya'o// yang gur gum gyi khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu spos kyi til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med
227a3(rgyud): gzho nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig la bskus na/ de nas ril lu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o// de na gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing
227a4(rgyud): dran par byas la/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo // nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma
227a5(rgyud): bcu bzhi'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la/ bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la yongasu spod par byed kyang / sus kyang mi shes la/ 'jug kyang
227a6(rgyud): phyir 'gro ba na/ sus kyang glags mi snyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas kyi bar du/ rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro// phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs
227a7(rgyud): nas phug tu zhugs na/ phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la/ ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig/ chu'i nang du zhugs na/
227a8(rgyud): ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus mi rlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyuraro// me'i nang du zhugs na/ mes lus la mi reg cing / tsan dan ltar bsil bar 'gyuraro//
227b1(rgyud): klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na/ gnas na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis/ ji ltar rang gis yid la lasu bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig/
227b2(rgyud): mi snams par bya ba'i ri lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rgyal po// bam po// / phyags rgya
227b3(rgyud): gsum ni rnam sprul pa// phyag rgya de dag yang dag stan// bzang po gtso bo chen po ste/ mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin// phyag rgya gya nom bla na med/ 'jig rten 'dren pa
227b4(rgyud): snyan pa yin// snying po 'di nyid gyur pa ste// phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di// dus gsum gtog pa'i de bzhin gsheg/ kun
227b5(rgyud): gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya dkyil chen leg par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di/ phyag rgya dus gsuM gshegs pa yi// de bzhin gsheg pas phyag
227b6(rgyud): rgyar btab// de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po la// thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab// de bzhin gsheg pa'i rig dkyil gyi/ gsang nyid kun du zhug pa'i yin// de na gsang
227b7(rgyud): ba nyid// dngos grub bla med bshad par bya// oM a mo g+ha hri da ya// pad ma uSh+NI Sha/ sa d+ha ya b+ha ra/ mya hA bAd me swAhA// bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegasu gso//
227b8(rgyud): ba'i sngagaso// oM pad mo uSh+NI Sha/ a mo g+ha/ man d+ha le hUM// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs
228a1(rgyud): kar sres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// oM pad ma shi kha re hUM/ spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas paso//
228a2(rgyud): oM m+bo uSh+NI Sha/ a mo g+ha dza le hUM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te/ yungs kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya bas so// oM bi la shud d+he hUM// nye reg bya ba'i sngagaso// oM
228a3(rgyud): sang tshad ya pad me hUM/ gos bgo ba'i sngagaso// oM mi li mi li shud dwe hUM// lus yongasu spangs pa'i sngagaso ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa so// oM pad ma
228a4(rgyud): uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha/ a bi Shin tsa/ ad ma shud d+he hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te/ dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas paso// oM mA ka pa tse/ dwi nA ban d+ha hUM dza la swAh+ma/ go
228a5(rgyud): cha'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas paso// oM badz+ra a dI Sh+T+rIn pad me hUM/ byin gyis baiR+shab pa'i sngagaso// oM dza la pad me d+ha ra dA ra hUM/ sa'i sngagaso// oM pad
228a6(rgyud): ma a shwa ya ru ha tsa la tsa la hUM/ bdan gyi sngag so// oM i bya pad me hUM/ me togs kyi sngag so// oM pad ma a me g+ha/ sam b+hA ra Ne hUM swA hA/ bdug spos kyi sngag so// oM bang/
228a7(rgyud): ma gan d+he a sha re hUM/ byug spos kyi sngag so// oM pad ma pra kir tse d+har ni sa me swAhA/ 'bras yos dang me tog gi sngag so// oM pad ma dza l+ye su gan d+ha ba ti hUM/ mchod yon dbu
228a8(rgyud): ba'i sngagaso// oM shug la ba re ra sa ya shud d+he hUM/ lha bshos kyi sngagaso// oM sa ru su ru/ kam byA ba ti swA hA/ gtor mi'i sngagaso// oM ma pad ma a shr-i ni sa d+ha ya hUM// gtor
228b1(rgyud): ma zar bzhugs pa'i sngag so// oM pa la b+hi shud d+he pra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngag so// oM pra ra buSh+pe dza ya swA hA/ phreng ba'i sngag so// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la ya/ ra sa ra sa gri Ni hUM/ gtor ma
228b2(rgyud): bcos pa'i sngagaso// oM pad ma di ba ya dz+wa la hUM/ mar me'i sngags so// oM sa ma pad ma b+ha ba ne shu sa ra hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM pad ma u Sh+NI Sha/ a mo g+ha mu ni hUM/ phyag
228b3(rgyud): bya ba'i sngagaso// oM tsakra man Da le/ sa man ta pad me hUM// bskor ba'i sngags so// oM sa man ta pra kir na pad me sam b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so// oM bad ma sa ma
228b4(rgyud): ya uSh+NI sha/ ma ha ma a mo g+ha sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshigs go sngagaso// oM sa man ta/ sad+hA ra Na/ oM pad me hUM phaT/ dkyil mo krung gi sngags so// oM pa ri mi ta dza la pad me hUM/
228b5(rgyud): bgrang phreng gi sngags so// oM sha ta sa ha bra dzadz+wa li ta pad me/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so// oM sa man twA d+ha ri sha na pad me hUM// rmi lam gyi sngagaso// oM sa man ta
228b6(rgyud): rakA ra ni pad me hUM/ srung ba'i ba'i sngagaso// oM sa man ta me ru Ni sI re hAM/ ring sngags so// oM sa man ta/ dza la dza la ma hA pad me dza le hUM/ me'i sngagaso// oM du ru du ru/ pra/
228b7(rgyud): sa ra d+hu sa ri man tre swA hA/ bsreg blugs kyi sngagaso// oM sa man ta/ e ba lo gi ta ga h+ye/ ba yu dza be gi ni sAhA/ na mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngagaso// oM shu b+h+rastA ra Ni/ pad ma/
228b8(rgyud): b+hu dze dz+r-i/ mtshon cha'i sngagaso// oM sa man ta/ a kar shi ni pra sa ra gu d+he hUM/ drang ba'i sngagaso// na mo tri byA be ne i shA ya/ lo ki sha ra d+hu ra d+ha ra/ a ba lo gi te gu he/ a
228b9(rgyud): ma he shA ra ya man hA
229a1(rgyud): / gad tsha b+ha ga ban/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma ha bi ra/ ma ni ka na ka/ badz+ra be dur+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ pad ma ra ga/ in tra ni la/ ma hA mug ti ga/ bi b+hu Shi ta sha ri rA/ hra bad ma b+hu/
229a2(rgyud): dza/ a mo g+ha pa sha d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo gai ta/ ba ra da/ ba ra da ya ka/ dza la dza la/ sa man ta/ a ba lo gi ta/ a gad tsha a gang tsha/ b+ha ga nga na/ shri g+ha sa ma ya/ ma nu smA/
229a3(rgyud): ra bi bi d+ha be Sha d+hu ra/ ya ma ba ru Ni/ ku be ra na ma skrita/ oM sha ra ma he sha ra/ pad me sha ra/ i dri b+ha ga ban/ shri gra a gang tsha/ sarba bying d+hu man Da la/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/
229a4(rgyud): da ri shan/ swa ra ban bi bi ng+ga te dza d+ha ra/ sa man da ra smai/ dza la gar b+ha/ sha ri ra/ ma hA ka ru ni ka/ sU ma mya mu kha/ pa ri pu ra na/ tsan d+ha man Da la/ na ma tsan tra dza ta d+ha ra/ a mi ta b+ha/
229a5(rgyud): ma gu ta d+ha ra/ a mi ta b+ha/ ma gu ta d+ha ra/ ma hA pra h+ma be sha d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na/ a mo g+ha pa ra d+ha/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ pad ma pa sha a ba lo ki ta/ shud d+ha swA hA/ ba ra da ya
229a6(rgyud): ka/ na mo stu te swA hA// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags so// rigs sngags 'dis gu gul nag po la lan bdun brgya rtsa brgyad
229a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o// bdag pa tsam gyi mdo la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par
229a8(rgyud): mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang gdag pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge
229b1(rgyud): slong tshangs par spyod pa bsam pa dag pa dang pa can smos pa lta smos ci dgos// mo nyid la rang gi gzug rang gi po yongasu dag pa dad pa can mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la/ don
229b2(rgyud): yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon gsum du mdun na 'dag cing / 'dod pa dang / dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par
229b3(rgyud): byed// sred med kyi bu la bdag na gzug snyan 'gul zhing / tshig 'byin la/ yid la bsam pa thams cad kyis yongasu rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur/ stob
229b4(rgyud): dang / shug dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa'i dngos po sbyin par byed do// ma mo'i gnasu nag po la bdag na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i cho ga dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur
229b5(rgyud): nas/ 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad bsgrub par byed// thams cad du dngos grub chen po bsgrub par byed// tshog kyi dbang phyug la gdug na/ bgeg dang / log 'dren tham
229b6(rgyud): cang bcing bar 'gyuraro// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdug na/ sdang nga dang / bdud dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang
229b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sgor bdug na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkugs nas dbang du 'gyur te nye bar gnas la/ 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad byed//
229b8(rgyud): nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na/ nyi ma 'bar cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed// zla ba nya ba la bdug na/ zla ba dbab cing dang
230a1(rgyud): phyag 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed// rnam thos kyi bu la 'dug na/ nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par byed// lha mo chen mo dpal la 'dug na dpal 'thob par byed par
230a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad la bdag na/ bdag pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyog bcur 'bros so// zin pa'am ma zin pa la bdag na mdo la 'ong ngo // dar khrod kyi mi ro la bdag na/ ro langs
230a3(rgyud): ldang bar 'gyur ro// thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed// klu len rgyug par byed cing sbod gtong byed// rdo rje las gdugs na 'baro// ma dang rtse gsum pa la bdug na 'bab par
230a4(rgyud): byed// 'khor lo la bdags na na mkha' la 'gro'o// thag la bdag na sbrul bzhin 'khril bar byed// rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu la bdag na 'bab par byed cing / rang nyid 'gyur
230a5(rgyud): bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byedado// lhung bzed la gdag na 'bab par byed la/ rang nyid 'gro bar byed// dung la bdugs nas bus na/ sgra gang grags pa de dag thams cad du/ 'thab
230a6(rgyud): pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
230a7(rgyud): sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / gdugs pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / thar par 'gyur zhing / rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi ba
230a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rims nyin bzhi pa la bdug cing gsang sngags kyi rjesu dran na/ rims nyin bzhi pa kun 'don cing 'bros par 'gyuraro// klu'i mtshor 'dags na/ mdo nyid la char gyi
230a9(rgyud): lharal gri la bdug na 'bab par byed la/ rang zhing 'gro bar byed
230b1(rgyud): rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed// char ches na gnas mthon por 'gyur 'dags na char ches pa gcod par byed// sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na/ grang lhag dang / rlung
230b2(rgyud): dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed/ log cig gi bar da mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// ri mthon po'i rtse mor bdags na/ phyog bzhi thams cad kyi dmag tshegs
230b3(rgyud): dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmug pa dang / rengs dang / bcings par 'gyur la/ dpog tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad pa
230b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la bdugs na/ sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bu mo la bdags na bag mar blang
230b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// tshong zong la 'dugs na/ rin chen po lon par 'gyur ro// bang ba la bdug na 'bru 'bel ba mang por 'gyur ro// btung ba'i gan su bdags na/ btung ba 'bel ba
230b6(rgyud): mang por 'gyuraro// gos la bdug na gos 'phel bar 'gyuraro// me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs na/ gang la byin pa de bdag nyid dam/ nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyu ro// phreng
230b7(rgyud): bal 'dugs na gsang sngags len bdun bzlas brjed byas na/ gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang / 'byung ba smra'o// 'phag
230b8(rgyud): pa rdo rje 'chang ba la bdugs na/ rigs sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par mdzo do//
231a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs na gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin ma 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing /
231a2(rgyud): las byed par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar du nye bar 'dug go/ sbyor ba mo la 'dug na/ sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid
231a3(rgyud): mtsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug/ 'dod dgur sbar ba'i gzugs can la bdug na/ 'dod dgur rgyur ba'i gzug can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes smras na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar
231a4(rgyud): du yo byad dang / longs spyod du bya ba bsgrub par byed la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro// dril bu la
231a5(rgyud): bdugs nas sgra bkrol na/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur la/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ khyim gyi nang du dkrol na/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang /
231a6(rgyud): srin po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung na/ phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyuraro// oM a mo g+ha pa sha pad ma uSh+NI sha/ ta ra ta ra/ a ba ta ra tu/
231a7(rgyud): b+hag ban/ gad tsha tu/ swa b+ha ba nan/ tu ru tu ma hA pad ma b+hu dze swAhA/ slar gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug spos gu gul dang chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la
231a8(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ thams cad du slar gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rims par bye ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
231b1(rgyud): de nas lha mo sgrol ma// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seMsaM
231b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
231b3(rgyud): byug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de/ lan gsuM bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de/ thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
231b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smra so// bco ldan 'das rig sngag chen po 'jig rten du cher bsten lagaso// gsang sngags chen po'i
231b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhag pa/ bde ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
231b6(rgyud): don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa'i slad du bzhag lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal
231b7(rgyud): po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa/ pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags
231b8(rgyud): 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing / g.yas drangs par 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rig sngags bsgrub cing / yongasu spyod pa la rim 'gro bgyi ba dang /
232a1(rgyud): rigs sngags bsgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog stsal bar bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongasu bkang bar bgyi ba de dag gi bcom ldan 'das/
232a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon gsum du/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ lha mo sgrol ma la
232a3(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chen sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byin gyis shod cig/ de nas lha mo sgrol ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
232a4(rgyud): don yod par sgrol ma dri med pa pad ma gtsug tor mo chen gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na mo ste'i yid d+hi kA nan/ ta tha ga ta nan/ shakyar dza a d+hi Sh+T+r-i na/ nam
232a5(rgyud): skri ta nan/ na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na ma ar+ya ba lo gi te shwa ra yA/ b+ho d+he sad ta yau/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ na mo ta ra ye/ ma hA de bye/ au ta ra Ni tA ra Ni/ tA re pad ma bi b+hu shi ta tA re/
232a6(rgyud): ma ne ka na ka bi tsing tra ta ma le/ dza ta ma ku Ta man Di ta pad me d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pad ma pA sha b+hu dze/ oM mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/ ta ra ya/ b+he ga ba ti/ ma ha sid d+hi ba ra te/ tu ru tu ru/
232a7(rgyud): ma ha ta ra Ni/ ba ra de/ sA d+hu ha ya/ sA d+ha yA sid d+he a mo g+ha ba ra de swA hA// oM a mo g+ha pad me ne ta re sA hA/ snying po'o// oM ma Ni ta re swA hA// nyes pa'i snying po'o//
232a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che'i snying po'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhag pa cho ga zhib mo/
232b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog bskul bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjesu stsal ba lagaso// bcom ldan
232b2(rgyud): 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par gyi ste/ du ru ska dang / gu gul dang / sprig ga gcig tu bgyis la/ gsang sngags kyi snying po 'dis lan
232b3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdag na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mdo la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bkug pa dang / g.yar drangs par
232b4(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di bsgrub pa'i tshe// rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjesu stsal
232b5(rgyud): bar bgyi/ bgeg dang / log 'dren thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyid/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo/
232b6(rgyud): dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyid/ mchog gsal bar bgyi/ bde legasu 'gyur
232b7(rgyud): ba dang / bgeg bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na/ bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la gdugs shing / bdag gi snying
232b8(rgyud): blo nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu tse gcig brjod na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mdo la/ dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo/
233a1(rgyud): rang gi gzugs yongasu dag pa bstan cing / mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dang / byung ba'i bka'
233a2(rgyud): mchis bgyi'o// dran pa tsam gyi mdo dang / don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang
233a3(rgyud): de'i mdun na mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang / sdigs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad
233a4(rgyud): so sor bzlogs par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po bsgrub rjes su gsal bar bgyi/ bkris kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar gyi/ rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub thams
233a5(rgyud): cad rjesu gsal bar bgyi/ cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bya ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams drang gi
233a6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rjesu brtsal bar gyi'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad so sor bzlogs par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bgyi/
233a7(rgyud): rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rigs sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi nad thams
233a8(rgyud): gsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab pa de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu mngon gsum du
233b1(rgyud): bstan cing / mdun du nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin du dran pas/ lus las 'das par bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sbrul lpags pa rjes pa bzhin
233b2(rgyud): du lus brjes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskal pa dang mnyam par pad ma dag la brdzus te skye la/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rab su tshe rabs
233b3(rgyud): dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bzung zhing / byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par
233b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
233b5(rgyud): thams cad skyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams mngon gsum du ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang /
233b6(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig gtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
233b7(rgyud): dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ lha mo sgrol ma la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/
233b8(rgyud): lha mo chen leg so legaso// rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu leg so// cho ga zhib mo 'di yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang
234a1(rgyud): de yang yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir dang / yongasu bskya ba'i phyir dang / dngos grub rab du sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongasu bskyang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin
234a2(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po
234a3(rgyud): nag po chen po dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha du ma dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lnga len dang / gar mkhan mchog dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang /
234a4(rgyud): ljang sngon dang / dung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen dpal dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / me tog chems te/
234a5(rgyud): thams cad 'dus nas/ mthun par stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
234a6(rgyud): der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi mi'i tshe/ rigs sngags 'chang de la
234a7(rgyud): rigs sngags smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ma 'am// dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo ga
234a8(rgyud): zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di bsgrub par bgyid dam/ klog par bgyid dam/ 'don tam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das
234a9(rgyud): dge slong ngam/
234b1(rgyud): de la bdag cag kun 'dus nas/ mthun par rtag tu rje su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gzi brjid bzhugs par bgyi/ dngos grub chen
234b2(rgyud): po'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongasu rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlogs par bgyi/ sdigs pa
234b3(rgyud): dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongasu sbyar bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rje su 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legaso// /
234b4(rgyud): khyod kyi bya ba de ltar yin te/ rigs sngags kyi blo chen po 'di ngas gdams shing rje su gtad do// zhes bka' bstsal to// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor rdo rje chen
234b5(rgyud): po'i snying po'i gsang ba mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// // rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa klags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa mchog tu gas
234b6(rgyud): ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa/ yongasu rdzogs s+ho// @/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs
234b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
234b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa/ gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyis
235a1(rgyud): 'khor gyi gsang ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad
235a2(rgyud): pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri bar yongasu bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjesu bzung ba'i slad du rig sngags
235a3(rgyud): 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di lpags te/ rigs sngags thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sgrub pa
235a4(rgyud): cho ga rjesu stsal bar bgyi na bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnas par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig sngags kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin
235a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rig sngags kyi
235a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba la rjesu 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/
235a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug rnam tshig gi byin gyis brlangs kyi de kho na nyid du 'gyur lags so// de bzhin
235a8(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs dpa' chen 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces
235b1(rgyud): bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i dam tshig/ rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
235b2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo'i de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig/ ngas byin gyis brlabs shing / rjesu yid rangs la phyag rgya chen
235b3(rgyud): po btab nas/ byin gyi brlabs so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig 'dum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
235b4(rgyud): brlabs kyi byin gyis brlang so// sems can thams cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlab so//
235b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi gsang ba/ rnam par thar
235b6(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ bkod pa don yod pa'i mthong ba'i tingange 'dzin mngon du byas nas/ ting 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
235b7(rgyud): na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/ lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i
235b8(rgyud): gnas thams cad snang bar byas// lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa
235b9(rgyud): dpo'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas
236a1(rgyud): 'og nags pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snang gi gnas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
236a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / g.yo ba'i mthu des de ga thams cad bskul bar 'gyur ro// bskul ba tsam gyi mdo la de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri
236a3(rgyud): gru 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus nas lhags nas 'khod do// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po
236a4(rgyud): 'das par mkhyen nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du gnas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams
236a5(rgyud): cad du rigs spri'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tshugasu thogs pa/ tshangs pa'i gzugs can phyag bcwo brgyad
236a6(rgyud): la rang gi ngo bo nyid zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang
236a7(rgyud): 'phreng bsnams pa/ pad ma bsnams pa/ pad mi'i phyag rgya bsnams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ me tog gi phur ma dang / birdza
236a8(rgyud): bu ra ka bsnams pa/ dbug 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam
236b1(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nor bu bya rgya mdzad pa/ gzugs zhig/ spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir/
236b2(rgyud): thogs pa/ gdan pad ma/ skra 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjesu 'brang ba/ pha rol du byin pa bcu'i bskor ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / bshin
236b3(rgyud): rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan pos bskor ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya
236b4(rgyud): mtsho'i dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya ba'i spyan sngar 'khod nas/ mig mi 'dzum bzhin pas me tog sna tshogs pa rnas
236b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gtor te/ 'di lha ste/ me tog sha la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / sho ka par ta ka dang / kha bye 'khyil ba
236b6(rgyud): dang / g+han b+ha bA ri shi ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / mdog mdzes dang / sum+b+ha n+ya ka dang / kye snar dang / cher gsal dang / dri med gzi brjid
236b7(rgyud): dang / dri dga' dang / rab sim dang / ba la shaM dang / za ba dang / man ran da ka dang / gzi brjid gsal ba dang / dri med dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin du
236b8(rgyud): bstan dang / lha dga' dang / yid dga' dang / yu ti ka dang / pa ma dang / ku mu ta dang / bad ma dkar po dang / ud pa la dang dmar po dang / ta rgyan gur rgya dang
236b9(rgyud): sud pa la dang
237a1(rgyud): gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa na/ mngon sum du rnam
237a2(rgyud): bar thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsas pa don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smraso// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' tham
237a3(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshalo// rigs sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
237a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi rigs dang / phyag rgya thams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag
237a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sha ra dA ti'i bu la phyag 'tsha'o//
237a6(rgyud): byang chub dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
237a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237a8(rgyud): chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog
237b1(rgyud): de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
237b2(rgyud): 'phags pa'i mngon gsum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis nga bzlas kyis/ bdag gi zhal nas gsung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar
237b3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'phags pa'i mngon gsum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis da bzlas kyis/ bdag gis dgos pa thams cad grub
237b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar gyur cig// tad+ya tha/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu run+da ru/ mahA ka ru ni ka/ bi ri bi ri/ bai
237b5(rgyud): ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ba ra ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA bad ma hAs+t+ra/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA shud d+ha sa tu/
237b6(rgyud): I h+ye hi/ b+hud d+ha b+hud d+hA/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kaN ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Na kur+Na/ ba ra ma shud d+he sad tA/ ka ra ka ra/ kai ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA sta ma pra ba ta/ tsa la tsa la/

237b8(rgyud): skar/ 23 / coM hrahrI/ nun+dats+tsham+bu/ o kar zany+dza/ b+ha~M She d+hi ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi re d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta raH ra/ sa rasar/ bar bar/ tsar car/ khar bar/

238b5(rgyud): ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ sa man ta dz+wa la/ a man ta dzA la/ a mo g+ha hAM// / don yod pa'i snying po'o// a yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang ba/ de bzhin

238b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig po kun nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi
238b8(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing / lha'i me tog go char rab du ba go/
239a1(rgyud): kun nas rin po che'i char bar du bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khra khrig phrag stong kun nas gshegs nas na mkha'i
239a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor na rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugaso// don yod pa rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phral la babs pas khyebs pa dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog
239a3(rgyud): rnams dang / lha'i brgyan dang / gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la mchod pa dang /

239a5(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba mchog bstan pa legaso lagaso// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rigs sngags kyi gnas
239a6(rgyud): rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig pa'i rje su zhugs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma cig shar ba yin no//
239a7(rgyud): gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phra mo snyed kyi/ 'byung ba rdzog
239a8(rgyud): par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis/ thams cad rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yi ge gcig gis rje su zhugs pa yin la// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par
239b1(rgyud): phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gi rje su zhugs pa yi no// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di
239b2(rgyud): don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing / ska gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/ des na don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabaso//
239b3(rgyud): snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rtag tu klags pas grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
239b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ snying rje chen
239b5(rgyud): po dang ldan pa legaso leg so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig bsgrub pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bsgrub pa klags pa
239b6(rgyud): 'grub pa/ 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis/ yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// bsgrub pa bde ba
239b7(rgyud): klags pas grub pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
239b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma
240a1(rgyud): yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i
240a2(rgyud): sgrub pa klags pas grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das byin gyis brlab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis

240a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis yo byad dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/
240a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas/ snying shin du dga' ste yo byad dang cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon gsum nyid du sdig pa sreg cing / ma
240a8(rgyud): lus par zad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtsad nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su/ dbus su pad ma'i khor lo
240b1(rgyud): bya// mtshon rtsi'i rnam pas rnam par dbye/ pad ma ze ba'i dbus su ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya// bum pa bkang dang pad rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor kun
240b2(rgyud): nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram// spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa'o// mar me'i phreng ba kun du phud// mchod yon chu dag bzhag par bya// a ga ru dang
240b3(rgyud): du rus ka// bdug spos sna bzhi dag nas bdag/ rigs sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la// nye bar gnas pa tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi
240b4(rgyud): chos ni bcwa lnga ste// zla ba yar gyi ngo bo bsgrub// shar du kha ltas 'dug nas su// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// snying po brgya rtsa brgyad
240b5(rgyud): du bzlas// yi ge gcig tu 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas// skya rengs shar nas 'jig rten dbang / bram ze'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing / 'gal 'gyur
240b6(rgyud): 'gul pa de yis ni// dmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi// sgo rnams dag ni phye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo la g.yas pa tsam des ni// dmyal
240b7(rgyud): ba'i tshor rkun rnam par 'jig/ dmyal ba de yang rnam par 'jom// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// thar nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa yi// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las
240b8(rgyud): grol// mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi sgrib
241a1(rgyud): ba dang / sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal mi zad pa thams cad mthar gtug par yongasu zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las
241a2(rgyud): yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ska mdog gser gyi mdog can du ston

241a4(rgyud): ba sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po rnam
241a5(rgyud): mod nyid la mngon gsum du ston par mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa/ mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams kyi phung
241a6(rgyud): po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongasu bzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyi gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur/ gshin rje dang /
241a7(rgyud): chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon gsum du ston cing nye bar
241a8(rgyud): 'khod la/ kun nas bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ dngos grub dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad
241b1(rgyud): par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can du ma mthong ngo // des sgrib pa dang / sdig pa lhag ma ma lus par
241b2(rgyud): shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga snang ba byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas par thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te
