241b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su so
241b7(rgyud): ba'i gang zhig sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad par 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'chang khrus byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos/ snyung ba byas pa des/ dkyil 'khor la mngon
241b8(rgyud): du phyogs par bzhag la/ rigs sngags 'chang cho ga byed pa des gsang sngags rje su dran par byas nas/ rma bya'i sgos byab par bya'o// de tsam gyis yon tan gyi
242a1(rgyud): khyad par thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / na ba/
242a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tsom med do// sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig bzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ lha tham
242a3(rgyud): cad kyis bsrung zhing kun nas bsrung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed par 'gyur/
242a4(rgyud): tshe ring ba dang / sgrib pa dang / nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par
242a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snying rje dang / byam pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bsnyung ba dang / bzlas brjod
242a6(rgyud): bya'o// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po// //
242a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko la'i tshang du cha legs par bye ba/ gra bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas kyi rim pa can du tshen sna tshogs kyi skud pas
242a8(rgyud): thig gdab cing / dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad ma mchog kha bye ba/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ snying po dang ze ba shin du 'byes pa/ snying po las pad ma byung ba
242b1(rgyud): kha byed byed pa/ lag pa gnyis byung bas 'ad mi'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris pa dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste/ dar gyi kha g.yogs nas/ pad ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du
242b2(rgyud): bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs pa dar gyis cod pan bcings shing brgyan pa/ pad ma'i steng du bzhugs pa
242b3(rgyud): bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun du phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar bri'o// sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma'i steng du bzhags pa kha dog dang 'od zer
242b4(rgyud): 'bar ba bri'o// grar grar bum pa gang bo bri'o// dkyil 'khor kun du pad ma dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o//
242b5(rgyud): gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya/ mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/ tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i bdag spos dang / spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ dkyil 'khor kun
242b6(rgyud): du mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dgod cing / kun du 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dgram par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas/ legs par
242b7(rgyud): khrus byas shing / gos gtsang mar bgos pa/ 'jigs pa med pas/ zlas pa yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur cing / byams pa'i
242b8(rgyud): sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// gang gi lag gis bzung ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam gyis mod la dga' ba thob cing / sdig pa thams
243a1(rgyud): @cad 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ mtshanams med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ mod la nad thos
243a2(rgyud): cad byang zhing / ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
243a3(rgyud): lung bstan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngags pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
243a4(rgyud): gis sprul pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis mngags pa/ rigs sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ lha thams cad kyis bsrungs pa/
243a5(rgyud): klu'i dbang po thams cad rjesu 'brang ba/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha
243a6(rgyud): dang / ku be ra dang / nyi ma dang / zla bas mchod pa de bzhin du/ rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / bza' kun dang / 'jug rings dang / de bzhin du bza' khyim dang / thams
243a7(rgyud): cad du bkra shis kyis mchod pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad
243a8(rgyud): kyi rje su zhugs pa/ rigs spyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gir klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sma
243b1(rgyud): gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang mthun pa'i sman ni/ sman gyi
243b2(rgyud): rdzas bkra shis pa bye brag gam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang yang med do// sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog/ gtso bo sbyin pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba'i phyir
243b3(rgyud): yin no// de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas/ gnas gang yang rung bar sbyar bar byas te/ gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o// ji lta
243b4(rgyud): ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa de lta de ltar bsam pa yid la byed pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad mod la 'grub
243b5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams cad kyis bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ spos chus
243b6(rgyud): legs par khrus byas pa/ nyin re sman re re don yod pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ zos pa tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
243b7(rgyud): la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dgongs shing / snang ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ nyin zhags gsum du sbyar ba dag rnam
243b8(rgyud): par dag par thob bo// nyin zhags lngar byas na dran pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag bdun du sbyar na/ rig sngags 'chang chen po cho ga zhib mo rnam par dag pa thob bo//
244a1(rgyud): nyin zhags bcu bzhir sbyar na/ don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po thob po// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na/ de bzhin
244a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po thob po// de bzhin gsheg pa thamasad kyi gsang ba de kho
244a3(rgyud): na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub thob po// zla ba gcig tu sbyar na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta bu sa brgyan pa 'thob cing / tshe lo stong
244a4(rgyud): thub par 'gyuraro// zla ba gsum du sbyar na/ lus yongasu dag pa dang / 'dog yongasu dag pa 'thob po// lo gcig tshang bar sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub rigs sngags banang
244a5(rgyud): 'khor los bskur bar 'gyur to/ mig mthon 'thing mdog bud pa lta bu/ ska ral bu 'khyil par 'gyur/ tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun par 'gyur/ tshe skal pa 'buM
244a6(rgyud): thub par 'gyuraro// bdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ gang dri bsnams pa tsam gyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang /
244a7(rgyud): yi dgas dang / skye ma byed dang / brjed byed dang / brib gnon thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so// gal te myur du mi
244a8(rgyud): 'bros na/ spyi bo dum bum du 'gags shing / yan lag dang / nying lag rnams zhig par 'gyur la/ bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig
244b1(rgyud): pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa lnga dag 'jig par 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / mi shis pa dang / bkra
244b2(rgyud): mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ spos bsnams pa tsam gyis rgyal ba dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rig
244b3(rgyud): dang / rmangs rigs bgyi zhes bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// byugs pa tsam gyis 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan
244b4(rgyud): pa dang / mdze dang / khyi rngo dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / khong gi rma yongasu sos par 'gyur/ dug thams cad dang / zos pa dang / dug myos pa dang / sbyar
244b5(rgyud): dug dang / drag po dag sbar ma dang / sbar dag phye ma dang / byad rnams la bskas pa tsam dang / chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam gyis dag med par 'gyur ro// dri tsam gyis klu'i rgyal
244b6(rgyud): po 'jog po'i dag kyang med par 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa las dpral bar bskus na/ ku co 'don cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig
244b7(rgyud): pa dang / nyin gnyes pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / lba ba dang /
244b8(rgyud): 'pho ba'i nad dang / mchin pa na ba dang / skran dang / gcin sri ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / mgul na ba dang / kha na ba dang / 'khyil zhing na ba dang / tshad pa na ba dang /
245a1(rgyud): 'dom na pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag na ba chu dron po 'thung ba tsam gyis yongasu sos par 'gyur ro// gzhogs byed na ba dang / mgon pa dang / mig na
245a2(rgyud): ba dang / rna ba na ba la/ bskus pa tsam gyis sos par 'gyur ro// thig le byas la chom rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / byi ba za ba 'jigs pa dang / gcan
245a3(rgyud): zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur/ lag pa gdangs pa'i 'jigs pa byung bar mi 'gyur/
245a4(rgyud): mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing / bar chad bya bar mi nus so// nam mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas 'khod//
245a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang dang du sbyar ba'i rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na/ las bsgrub
245a6(rgyud): par byed do// sman gyi mchog shin du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas de'i phyir gser gyi ril lo'i dkyil 'khor
245a7(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
245a8(rgyud): pad+ma gtsug gtor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snang bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
245b1(rgyud): snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyi bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed
245b2(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs mngags pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba rje su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lung bstan pa/
245b3(rgyud): mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gtsugi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi
245b4(rgyud): nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin
245b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dir tshang bstan par lnga su zhig gis nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang
245b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gang gis klung gi bye ma snyed byed ma dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon gsum du dag pa'i rtsa ba bsad nams kya
245b7(rgyud): pa mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par bzung ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gsheg
245b8(rgyud): pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor bu gser gyi kha dog tu bstan pa'i ril lu 'di gang gis mthong zhing
246a1(rgyud): 'chang ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ nor bu ril lung 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang /
246a2(rgyud): gdug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs
246a3(rgyud): nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig cing spangs par 'gyur/ rims dang nad thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur/ gang gi lag na sman
246a4(rgyud): 'di yod par gyur pa'i/ sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro// ril lu gang la yod pa ni// phyir mi ldog par lung stan cing // mgon po sa bcu dag la
246a5(rgyud): gnas/ rtag tu mchod rten gyur pa ste// sku gsung snying po'i bdag nyin can// dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun//
246a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' bo de kun gyi// sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras// rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur// thugs las skyes dang
246a7(rgyud): zhal nas skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon// rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni/
246a8(rgyud): 'jig mdzad 'di ni the tshom med// ril lu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab du sgrol// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag/ de ni ngan 'gror 'gro ma
246b1(rgyud): 'gyur// phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba thob// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med// mgon po rtag tu mngon gsum mthong // bde ba can du 'jug par byed/
246b2(rgyud): gang dag de'i mngon dga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa// rtag tu 'khrugs par mi 'gyur zhing // de bzhin mi g.yo mi 'gul te// sems dpa' ri
246b3(rgyud): rab che dang mnyam// bzung du med pa mtsho dang 'dra// de la dgyegs dang / log 'dren dag/ nams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas
246b4(rgyud): su 'gyur// gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas par bkol dang bcas// rtag tu bsrung phyir gnas med de/
246b5(rgyud): 'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhi no// lha tshogs thams cad bsrung bar ni// the tsom med par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab du 'phel// de la legs
246b6(rgyud): bar 'jug par 'gyur// 'jigs med rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong // gru 'dzin ri la gzhal med khang // tshal dang bcas shing rin
246b7(rgyud): chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min gsang ba ba// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// de bzhin lho
246b8(rgyud): 'bye 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'akhor rnams ni// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin chen lha'i seng ge'i gdan// khang pa brtsegs
247a1(rgyud): pa rin chen dang // nor bu chen pos brgyan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso// pad me'i snying po zhugs nas ni/ don yod zhag
247a2(rgyud): ba'i bya rgya dang // dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i chos ston to// srung kun thos par gyur nas ni// thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong // de ltar rmi lam bzang rmi ba// nyin
247a3(rgyud): cig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur// nor bu ni rgyal po'i bu ni de 'dra bas// de bas mi'i 'bad pa chen po bzung // dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang //
247a4(rgyud): rmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am// btsun mos slas sam dpung gi gtso bo 'am/ skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo dag/ nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang
247a5(rgyud): byed pa// de ni stong pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// chom rkun gyis ni mi slus shing // gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jig pa mi bzang brgyad las thar//
247a6(rgyud): de la dug dang sbar ba'i dus// dug sbyar drag pos mi tshugs shing // de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yong // de la nad kyis mi tshugs
247a7(rgyud): shing / na bas ma yin sdig pas min// pad ma chu yis mi chags ltar// rtag tu chags pa med par gnas// g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang na'am// 'thab pa 'am
247a8(rgyud): 'gyed pa rtsod pa na// lan 'thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur re the tshom med// de bas rdzas ni bshad bya ste// sman ni bshang bya ste// sman ni bkra shis
247b1(rgyud): tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang /
247b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa// grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu bzang // 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / shi ri
247b3(rgyud): sha'i me tog dang / a pa marga dang / me ru dang / na la dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / rdo dreg dang / me da dang / brtsod dang / bu ka ri dang / mar kar
247b4(rgyud): ti dang / dzA ya dang / bi dzA ya dang / pha ri ba la dang / ra sa dang / bi rA dang / d+h+ya ma ka dang / rgya spos dang / bu sa dang / a ba ra ta ka dang / ru sta dang / bya gra na kha dang /
247b5(rgyud): bad tA dang / ta tsa dang / ka Da ma b+ha ra dang / pri yang ku dang / gi'u wang dang / smrig kA dang / smig rkang dang / yungs kar dang / na ga pus pa dang / e lA dang / ldong ros dang /
247b6(rgyud): gur gum dang / ga pur dang / bla rtsi dang / spang spos dang / na le sham dkar po dang / su ma na dang / nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / spring rtsi dang / tsam pa ste/ de bzhin rdzas ni
247b7(rgyud): de dag kun// su pa ra Ni ni dkar pos sbyar// ril lu nam cig tsam du ni// skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin// su bar nas ni bka' nas su// rdzas rnams bsres
247b8(rgyud): nas sbyar bar bya/ cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste// bla rtsi yis ni dri bskyed do// phye ma zhib mor btags nas su// can dan dkar po'i chus sbyar nas// grib ma la
247b9(rgyud): ni bkram par bya/ ches brgyad nas ni brtsams nas su// tshes ni bcwo lnga nyi'i bar// nyin gcig bzhin tu don yod pa'i// rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// khro bo'i
248a1(rgyud): rgyal po nyin cig bzhin// lan bdun par du dbang bskur ro// phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba yang byan/ de nas ches ni bco lnga ste// nya la chu dang yungs ka/
248a2(rgyud): dag/ dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag par bya// de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni// bzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye// rgyar ni ko la'i tshad du
248a3(rgyud): bya/ shin du 'jams la phyi brdar legs// tshen rtsi sna tshogs 'byes pa dang // dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab bo// sgo bzhi yod cing grwa bzhi 'dod// kun nas shin du cha
248a4(rgyud): phye zhing // dkyil 'khor snying po che phye ba/ tshad dang shin du ldan par bya// pad ma chen po bzhi dag dang // de bzhin phyag dang spun du bcas// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor
248a5(rgyud): bu rgyal po 'chang ba yis// phya rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya// chu'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// las kyi rdo rje rab du bri// dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la// kun nas kha khyer rnam pararaM dang /
248a6(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du ni// nor bu pang ma legs par bri// glo zazhi yis ni gnas rnams// pad ma zhags pa'i mdung rtse gsum/
248a7(rgyud): ngorje tshul mchog lta bung bri// grwa bzhi yi ni gnas rnams// lag na rdo rje long bar dri// pad ma'i steng na rang du gnas/ dkyil 'khor bzang po phan phran dang // bum pa
248a8(rgyud): bkang dang me tog dang // bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyad// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog phung cher bzhag par bya/ kun du mar po'i phreng ba dang /
248b1(rgyud): mchod yon chu dang a ga ru/ tsan dan bdag spos dbul bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po 'jigs med pa// snod bzang legs par bkram nas su// rgya dar la yis
248b2(rgyud): kha g.yogs te// dkyil 'khor de nyid rigs pas bzhag/ dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang // bzhag ste de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du bzhag pa ni// /
248b3(rgyud): nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang
248b4(rgyud): bskur bar bya// de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur ro//
248b5(rgyud): de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis lag pa g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni/ cha ba dam du bsnams par bya/ bsdams pa tsam gyi mod la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi na mkha'
248b6(rgyud): la 'gro// nor bu dri ma med pa'i don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ bkod pa zhes bya ba/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba thob la/ 'khor rig
248b7(rgyud): sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ khung gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams phye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg/
248b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi da mtshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dag kha ton du longs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gsheg
249a1(rgyud): pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'dud pa dag gi gsong por smra bar byed/ thams cad du yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba thos pa
249a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad ma'i 'khor lo bdun du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na/ sngar
249a3(rgyud): snyan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams 'thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i ril lu ni 'jig rten dang / 'jig
249a4(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i las rnams bsgrub yi no// tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba
249a5(rgyud): dran par 'gyur/ nor bu ril lu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon gsum du mthong zhing lta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
249a6(rgyud): dbang phyug mngon gsum du mthong zhing rtag tu lta bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus la yod pa de yang phyir mi ldog par rig par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po
249a7(rgyud): mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa drang grang ba'i tshul
249a8(rgyud): gyis bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa spyan la bskur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos
249b1(rgyud): song ba/ de dag thams cad dus kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
249b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba las yongasu thar bar 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam
249b3(rgyud): la gzhol bar 'gyur/ che rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na legs par bsgrub pa'i las mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/
249b4(rgyud): mthu stobs kyis s+phaR+Sha bya/ shin du gsal zhing rab du gsal ba'i bsam pa 'bad pas sbar bar bya/ rang gi sha dang khrag dang yongasu btang nas btsal bar bya zhing / cho ga
249b5(rgyud): zhib mo'i rgyal po yongasu btsal bar bya ba yin no// phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos dang / brgyan rnams yongasu
249b6(rgyud): btang nas/ yongasu btsal bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog btang bar bya yi/ de btang bar mi bya'o// don yod pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
249b7(rgyud): rim par phye ba/ bsgrubs pa 'di btsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// 'di'i dus phyi mi'itshe na/ sems can thams lnga sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ sems
249b8(rgyud): can thams cad yang dag pa'i dad pas/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing nam kyang ngan 'gro log par
250a1(rgyud): 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu ril lu bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
250a2(rgyud): don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor
250a3(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya'i mthu des/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'kho
250a4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ klags pas grub pa rigs kyi dam tshig spri'i gsang ba thams cad du nye bar ston par mdzad//
250a5(rgyud): rigs sngags rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// ngal ba dang / dab pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar
250a6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos grub med par 'gyuraro// de lta bas na/
250a7(rgyud): gsang sngags bsgrub pa ni shin du gsang bar bya zhing / legs par snang ba byas la dbab par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya/ gos ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa yod
250a8(rgyud): su spang bar bya/ mi bsrung ba dang / mi bden pa dang / phra ma dang / sems can sun par byed pa dang / gsang sngags rku ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rku bar byed pa dang / byag
250b1(rgyud): rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag ni/ rtogs pa ni gang yang med do// dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing / byang chub sems dpas kyang smad la/ mgon po 'phag
250b2(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi kyang smad pa yino// sems can sdom du ma bsregs pa 'di// gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di dang le lo du//
250b3(rgyud): rtag tu smad par bya ba yin/ lha rnams kyis ni yongasu btang // ma rung ba ni bdud kyi zos// ma rungs pa ni bgyegs kyis zin// bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang //
250b4(rgyud): mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa// de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung // de la skyob pa gang yang med// mgon med kun du smad pa yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung
250b5(rgyud): du'ang med la nyes pa yin// gsang sngags dang ni smad mi 'grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byan/ gzhan yang ma rungs byed yin// de bas sems can mkhas pa sbyin// slob
250b6(rgyud): par 'dod cing yon tan dga'// snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gsal gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ de'i lag na sbyin bya ste// de'i dngos grub bla na med//
250b7(rgyud): gsang ba 'di ni shin du gsang ba yin te// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsang ba snying po de yang / rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya
250b8(rgyud): sbub sra ste/ grags pos grub pa de bzhin du/ sman nor 'di la chag tu 'jug cing / dngos chub kyi de kho na nyid rab du ston par byed pa ma'o// rigs sngags 'chang ni/
251a1(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba// rigs sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis// khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed la// 'dir ni nyin zhags skang
251a2(rgyud): ba dang / dang dang gus pas mchod par bya// don yod 'khor lo bsgrub byed pas// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa grub/ sman spri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru dang /
251a3(rgyud): pad ma ge sar dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ldum bu dang / pad mi'i 'dab ma dang / de bzhin du gi wang dang / ldong ros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam
251a4(rgyud): sbyar te/ phye ma dag tu byas nas ni// de nas don yod rgyal po yis// tshes brgyad nas ni bcwo lnga'i bar// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad/
251a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bsku ro// de'i 'og tu chu ltar byas te// mig la bsku ba dang / ri lu dang / bye ma dang / til mar ches pa dang / kha gdong bkru zhing khrus bya'o// mig
251a6(rgyud): sman ni so'u phyi re dang lhan cig spras la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o// ril lu ni/ sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig sgra'o// phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyu
251a7(rgyud): la phul ba'i me tog dang lhan cig sgra'o// til mar dang bcos pa ni pra ha ti li ste/ shing ba la shi mar dang lhan cig smra'o// kha gdong bkru ba ni can dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig
251a8(rgyud): sgra zhing / su man dang / gur gum dang / spos chus lhan cig smras la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya nas/
251b1(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang nyin gcig bzhin sbyang ba byas pas gcig tu smras te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
251b2(rgyud): byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la/ de nas so sor dar gyis kha bcad de/ dkyil/
251b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi snying por bzhag la/ don yod pa'i rgyal po brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brtsa brgyad bzlas byas nas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur ba byas nas
251b4(rgyud): kyang / rigs sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod byas te/ bdug spos lnga dag dbul bar bya// a
251b5(rgyud): ga ru dang tsan dan dang // smrig ka gu gul du rus ka// mchod yon snod ni lnga dbul zhing // gtor ma lnga ni dgang bya ste// ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang // snod ldan
251b6(rgyud): 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor mi cha lnga dbul bar// kun du phreng ba nyi shu dang // mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang // spos kyi bye ma lnga dag dang // spos kyi cha lngar phye mas byug/
251b7(rgyud): phran nyi shu rtsa lngar gdags// tshon lnga yis mdzes par bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga bzhag go// sgo bzhi gra bzhi
251b8(rgyud): bum pa brgyad // brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang // yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni/ dgos dang
252a1(rgyud): snod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar// ston pa'i 'dus shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de na
252a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs byas// don yod chen po gzhal med khang // rigs sngags 'chang gis
252a3(rgyud): rtag tu gsang / de nyid dngos grub bsgrub bla ba// de bzhin nor bu sngon sngagaso// don ni shin du bkra ba ste// mkhas pa'i mi yi bya ba yin// phra mi 'tshig kyang mi brten
252a4(rgyud): te/ brdzun nams kyang smra mi bya// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid de// de la 'grub par the tshom med// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// kun nas gru bzhi lham pa
252a5(rgyud): ste/ dgra bzhi cha ni legs par dbye// ko li'i tshad du legs par dang // sna tshogs mtshon gyis thig skud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor
252a6(rgyud): dbus kyi snying por ni// 'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya// pa dbus kyi lte bar bang ma yis// 'khor lo gsal bar bri bar bya// pad ma'i snying por gser dang ni//
252a7(rgyud): dngul dang tsan dan las byas pa// bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// 'khor lo kun dang rtsibs dang ni/ mu khyud dag gi cha dbye'o// dkyil 'khor snying po'i gra
252a8(rgyud): rnams der// lha'i dbang po tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri// kun du kha byar rnam pa dang // pad ma'i phreng ba rnams bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun
252b1(rgyud): du ni/ rtags dang bya rgya rnams bri ste// rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum// ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang // gshin rje be con pad ma gdugs// dbyug to mda' bo che rnamaso//
252b2(rgyud): gra rnams kun du phreng ba dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram// sgo sgo der ni dkyil 'khor gyi/ lha ste gshin rje'i chu lha dang // lus ngan dang ni gzhon nur bri// dkyil
252b3(rgyud): 'khor gra ba'i rnams dang ni// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ go cha legs par bgos pa dang // khro bo'i lta ba 'jigs med bri/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/
252b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams// legs par yongasu rdzogs par ni// rigs sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs khrus byas la// gos gtsang bgo
252b5(rgyud): pas 'jigs med pas// sman mchog bzung ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa// gang gis ngan 'gror thar 'gyur ba// sems can
252b6(rgyud): kun la bstan par bya// rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang // gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang gis bsgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur/
252b7(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang gis spyan sngar khrus byas la// rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ tsan dan gyi chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
252b8(rgyud): brjod byas/ skra yan chad tsam byug la chod zin par bskus nas/ kha gdong bkru bar bya'o// mig sman la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na/ mig bzang
253a1(rgyud): por 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad chang bar bzlas brjod byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro// de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
253a2(rgyud): byas/ sgra yan chad bsgru ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang / lus rkang 'thil yan chad bsku'o// yi ge gcig po yid la byas la/ sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas/ rgyal
253a3(rgyud): po dang / btsun mo'i sgo 'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'das pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang 'phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag tham
253a4(rgyud): cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang / kha don du mthong zhing / sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis lpags te 'dug pa/ ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad pa/ de lta
253a5(rgyud): de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo sgyur ba 'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/ phags gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa dang / tshangs pa dang / sum
253a6(rgyud): bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po 'am/ mig gsum 'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ gzhin rje 'am/ rnam thos kyi bu 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po/
253a7(rgyud): chen po 'am/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser skya 'am/ gsang ba 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu'am/ gang ba bzang
253a8(rgyud): bo 'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung ngam/ drang srong nyid de/ ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do// me to//
253b1(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs sna tshogasu snang la/ gzhan med khang gi/
253b2(rgyud): rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed de/ ji ltar 'dod par gyur pa yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do// 'khor tshogs pa'am/ dgon pa 'am/
253b3(rgyud): 'chags pa dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogasu ston par byed do// 'dron po 'brog gi nang du byin pa nyams thag pa/ 'jig
253b4(rgyud): pa mi bzad pa/ chu med pa/ dgon par 'gon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skyes po sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med pa/
253b5(rgyud): skyob pa med pa/ dpung gnyen med par gyur pa/ de la rigs sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyog bzhir mtshams bcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi
253b6(rgyud): tshul du ri mo bris la/ ril lu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag go/ yungs kar gyi til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
253b7(rgyud): bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste dbang bskur nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya bas phyag rgya cings la/ sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ phyag/
253b8(rgyud): rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis/ chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing bu 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan
254a1(rgyud): pa'i gzhal med 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang / khang bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur/
254a2(rgyud): zhing bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyamA dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshong dang / tshong dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang / glang
254a3(rgyud): po'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go// chu
254a4(rgyud): dang yungs kar la lan bdun byas nas/ phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan
254a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun du gtor na/ 'obs bcad cing
254a6(rgyud): ra ba kha khyer gyis bskor la/ grong khyer kun du skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas/ grong khyer gnan pa 'am/ mche bar sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'i dri'i til mar de nyid yung
254a7(rgyud): kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ chang pa gang mi'i nang du gtor/ chang ba gang phyogs bzhi kun du gtor na/ kun du mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/
254a8(rgyud): ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag pa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na/ mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar
254b1(rgyud): 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na/ gtor pa tsam gyis mdo la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong
254b2(rgyud): khyer mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshegs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshal gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na/ 'brog dgon
254b3(rgyud): pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shis nas/ 'jig shing skrag pa chen pos rab du 'bros par byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na/ mtshon cha thams cad dang /
254b4(rgyud): 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro// zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ 'gyed zla gtso ba der gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng gtor na/ me 'bar ba 'byung
254b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa ji ltar yid la byas pa'i las 'bum spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs
254b6(rgyud): par khrus byas la/ spos kyis bskas pa des yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal pos bskas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
254b7(rgyud): phyug la gtor bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas phyag byas pa'i log pas ril lu spyi bor bzhag la phye mas gdab par byas/ til mar gyi rgyal po rkang pa la
254b8(rgyud): byug par bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste/ yong su sbyong ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs bskya bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs
255a1(rgyud): @g.yo ste/ gar dga' bar 'gro la gzugs brnyan rab du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro'o// lha'i steng du gtor na/ lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba
255a2(rgyud): der 'gro'o// phye ma'i lha'i steng du gtor na/ khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya bas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ bdag nyid
255a3(rgyud): kyi pus mo dang byin pa la bskus na/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rkang 'thil la bskus kA sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi reg go// rdo'i steng du rkang pa bzhag pa dang / rkang
255a4(rgyud): rjes su 'byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu bzhag pa'i brku ba la bskus na/ sor bzhi tsam gyi steng du na mkha' la 'dag go/ yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas na/
255a5(rgyud): me'i sbyin bsregs byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis spras pa la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur na/
255a6(rgyud): mig la bskus na/ mig gsum ston cing / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston par byed do// thal bas lus la byugs ni/ tshangs pa'i gzugasu ston to// shing pa la sha dang /
255a7(rgyud): pa rnam ka bsres pa lus la byugs na/ sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang gzugasu ston to// til mar chen pos khar bskus na/ thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na/
255a8(rgyud): gzho nu'i gzugasu ston to// yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen pos byugs pas bskus la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/
255b1(rgyud): phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing / khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bzhag/ de nas las thams cad byed de/ na mkha'
255b2(rgyud): la gtor na/ nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe/ na mkha' la gtor na/ me tog go char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur// 'dus
255b3(rgyud): ba'i nang du na mkha' la gtor na/ 'bras bu dang / nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs ston to// tshal gyi nang du gtor na/ me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs ston to// ri phug tu gtor na/ rdzas
255b4(rgyud): dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ gtsug lags khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor na/ yo byad thams cad kyis yongasu gang zhing rdzogs pa khang pa bzang
255b5(rgyud): po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to// grong khyer stong par gtor na/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing / yongasu rdzogs pa dang / yul rgyal po dang / sras
255b6(rgyud): dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khyed bu dang / bu mo dag ston to// yang khro bo'i po hU~M zhes bya bas gtor na/ dpung
255b7(rgyud): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to// dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na/ shi ba'i lus kyi rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro
255b8(rgyud): skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ bya 'am/ nya 'am/ rus sbal gyi
256a1(rgyud): rigasu skyes pa 'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am/ thod pa las tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i
256a2(rgyud): gtam yang smra'o// gang du gang gi skye gnas su skyes de thams cad smra la/ thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o// yungs kar des kyang rus gong 'brel pa 'am/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus
256a3(rgyud): pa thor ba la bab na/ bab pa tsam gyi mdo la sems can dmyal ba nas yongasu thar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// zong bkram pa'i nang du gtong
256a4(rgyud): na/ thams cad mi sngon par 'gyuraro// nam mkha' la gtor na/ skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad gcer bur 'gyuraro// 'dus
256a5(rgyud): pa'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad bro brdung bar byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor ni/ dge slong thams cad bsam gtan thob par 'gyu ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na/
256a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyuraro// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na/ thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyuraro// sbyor ba'i khyim sgor gdon/
256a7(rgyud): sbyor ba thams cad 'bar la/ ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo // shi bo'i steng du gtor na/ bro brdung bar byed do// thogs pa'i steng du gtor na bro brdung bar byed cing rgyug la
256a8(rgyud): phan tshun rgyug par byed do// lam gyi gzhi mdor gtor na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad rang gis gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la/ rdza
256b1(rgyud): srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyu nas 'khod do// nyin cig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na/ mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum
256b2(rgyud): rnyed do// don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzhib mo'i rgyal po//
256b3(rgyud): de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzigs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur
256b4(rgyud): 'du smon to// rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che/ rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang // de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha// bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs pa che// log 'dren rnams
256b5(rgyud): ni rab 'joms dang // khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan// ki la ki la rgyal po che// khro bo tshol ba stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rjes 'od gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de
256b6(rgyud): nyid dang // klu chen rab 'joms spyan yang dang // sog mo'i me ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang // de bzhin mche ba brtsigs pa dang // rgyal po chen
256b7(rgyud): po rdo rje'i sgrog/ klu'i dbang po stobs kyis gnon// mgog gos sngon gon pa dang // dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma'i lte/ byas
256b8(rgyud): na pad ma pad ma byug/ de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang / de bzhin 'jig rten 'jig rten bla// sna tshogs gzugs te bzang po dang // sred med bu dang tshangs/
257a1(rgyud): pa dang / drag po 'di ni dbang phyug dang // nag po chen po gzhonanu dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba lha// rgyu skar sgra gcan 'jug
257a2(rgyud): rings dang // de bzhin bza' dang lha ma yin// na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po dang ldan rnam thos bu// de bzhin yul skyong
257a3(rgyud): mig mi bzang // 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // mi'u thung ni drang srong gzugs// nor bu bzang sras gang ba dang // sna tshogs gzugs can pa dang // rgyal dang /
257a4(rgyud): ni ded dpon dang // tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong stag dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha// shing
257a5(rgyud): lha de bzhin lo tog lha// ga gA si ta yA mu na/ zla bskal ldan ru sbal nya// lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can// skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang // me tog rgya brlabs chen
257a6(rgyud): bo dang // sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar 'gug pa bstan pa dang // de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid// sbyin bsregs 'dra ba 'di nyid ni// sgyu
257a7(rgyud): 'phrul rmad 'byung gsang sngags 'grub// rdzas grub nor bu til dmar grub/ don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa/ mchod rten dgon
257a8(rgyud): ba gtsug lag khang // lci'i gnas dang de bzhin grong // grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i ngogs// metshe'u lteng ka chu bo dang // rdzing dang de bzhin char 'bab dang // 'brug
257b1(rgyud): sgrogs dang na/ klog 'gyur dang // gzhan yang ma ni 'bar ba dang // dud 'gro phung po sde 'gyedang dang // skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs dang /
257b2(rgyud): khyu mchog grub pa mthong ba dang // de bzhin rmad du byung ste/ rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang // de nyid dngos grub bla na med // sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// btso
257b3(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid bdag gis bshad// rigs sngags 'chang rnams klags pas 'grub// dbul po rnams ni nor thob cing // sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid//
257b4(rgyud): mu stegs can rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul dka' rnams ni thar par 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thog/
257b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin bla na med pa 'thob// chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong // sdig byed pa rnams sdig pa 'jig/ mi rigs byed rnams thar pa 'thob// mtshams med lnga rnam
257b6(rgyud): rnam dag don// dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dal// ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru// thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas/
257b7(rgyud): ma grol ngan 'gro kun las grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma snyan pa lung ston byed// skyon dang dri ma sdig pa spangs// thams cad mdo la spong bgyi/
257b8(rgyud): de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bklags pas 'grub par bgyid pa las// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'das// don gyi dngos grub bla na med// gang dang gang
258a1(rgyud): du sbyong ba bgyid// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yid la bsams pa grub 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsams pa// ji ltar sI
258a2(rgyud): la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa/ de ltar rnam rnam 'phrul ston par bgyid// tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal/ bsnyung ba bskyi ba mi 'tshal ste//
258a3(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin dus bzhin na// cho gas rigs sngags rgyal po bzlas// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing // legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag/ bgos
258a4(rgyud): ba bden par smra ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ sdom la gnas shing tshad
258a5(rgyud): par spyad// chos ma yin pa spong byed pa// gal te de nyid 'grub 'dod na// chang dang sha dang kun dngob dang // 'dris dang zas 'phro sbags pa spangs// sems can
258a6(rgyud): ngan pa sun 'byin pa// rigs sngags rka dang cho ga rku// chos rku gsang sngags rku ba dang // de bzhin yi ge rku ba dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar bgyis// de dag
258a7(rgyud): la ni dngos grub med// ma rungs pa 'di dam tshig nyams// yid bcug pa ni med par byed// sdig pa chos ni kun du spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis smad/
258a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad// rtag tu chos kyi snod ma 'gyur// shi nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol// rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ dbul
258b1(rgyud): po lus ni skams pa dang // mdze dang khyi rngos 'debs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin// chos rku ba'i lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi
258b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol ga pa de// sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin/ de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni// rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya
258b3(rgyud): zhing / rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang ni/ pha dang me dang bla ma dang / ston pa dang / skyobs pa dang / skyabs pa dang / dpung gnyan mdzad pa/ ston pa mchog
258b4(rgyud): sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang mi 'jigs sbyin pa/ rga shi las thar bar byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ nor sbyin pa/ longs spyod sbyin pa la dad pa/ mchog bskyed pa/ de nyid
258b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po// dbang phyug mgon po mchog sbyin por mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos
258b6(rgyud): grub sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongasu thar par bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs spong bar
258b7(rgyud): grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs rab du sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rten sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag
258b8(rgyud): tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab du sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad bas shin du gus par bgyid pa lags so// de nas rdzas kyis sman bsgrub pa dang / bzlas
259a1(rgyud): brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgying ste/ seng ge'i lce dang / snying dang / mig dang / de bzhin du nya byis kyi bye ma dang / ldong ros dang / bra mi'i 'o ma dang /
259a2(rgyud): gu gul dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ze ba dang / ud ba la sngon po dang / nag pus pa dang / li shi dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du gi wang dang / bla rtsi dang / ga pur
259a3(rgyud): dang / gur gum dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / sbri ka dang / de dza pa ti te/ de ltar cha mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad phye ma zhib mor byas pa/ dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar
259a4(rgyud): gyis g.yog/ don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o// dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
259a5(rgyud): brjod byas pas dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang lan nyi shu cig tu dbang skar ro// khri tshang nas cha sngar byas te/ phye ma dang / til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig la bskas
259a6(rgyud): pa dang / til mar chos pa dang cha lnga'o// phye ma'i pad ma mu ru ki bye ma dang / sbyar la khri bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos ni lnga stong ngo // til mar ni ma ha ru di ras
259a7(rgyud): 'grub ste/ brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu ni sbrul gyi khrag gi bsgrus te/ khri gcig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lnga stong /
259a8(rgyud): lnga brgya'o// mig sman ni rma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / glad pa dang sbyar la/ khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos stong rtsa brgyad do// bram te'i la
259b1(rgyud): srang nyi shu/ gnadar ba te'i la srang brgyad/ yungs kar srang bcu drug/ lom srang brgya/ pa ser mo grus pa'i 'o ma dang / ba'i lji ba dang / ba'i sbyin srang bdun/ du rus ka srang
259b2(rgyud): gnyis te/ rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas/ pad ma'i sdong bus dkrug cig zangs snod du btse'o// mnyam par bzhag pas gsas sngags bzlas// cho ga dag gis bsrung bar
259b3(rgyud): bya// cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar// me tog bdug spos dag gis 'dug/ til mar mchog ni bsgrub par bya// chu ngur me bung grub pa mchog/ spos kyi shing gis bus pa bzang /
259b4(rgyud): 'di ltar grub par shes pa dang // khro bo'i rgyal po dbang bskur ba// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro// til mar de ni snod gtsang ma// zangs snod yang na dngul snod bzang /
259b5(rgyud): smig ma'i snod du bzhag par bya// de nas rigs sngags brgyad stong dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid/ so so ga tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs pa der
259b6(rgyud): bzhag par bya ba ni/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas nas bzhag cing slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang // 'jug pa dang / dam
259b7(rgyud): tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / bsrung ba'i cho ga dang
259b8(rgyud): nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi slo dpon gyis de dag thams cad bstan par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po/
260a1(rgyud): bzhag la/ rigs sngags 'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal
260a2(rgyud): pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur la/ phyag brgya bcings nas rnams pa sum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro// de nas las thams cad
260a3(rgyud): byas te/ yungs kar dkar po grub pa la// rigs sngags 'chang gi brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la/ pad ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bkrus pa/
260a4(rgyud): sbyangs pa phye ma zhib du btags pa/ thal ba lta bu la/ brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas/ snod dgang / gu gul dang / can dan dang / a ga ru dang / sprig ka la brgya rtsa
260a5(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ snod kyi nang du bkang la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor bzhag go// de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas
260a6(rgyud): kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe/ bya ba thams cad bye do// dger ram yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad mi 'chang du byas pa/ 'dab
260a7(rgyud): ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la/ sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad/ rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po
260a8(rgyud): zhags pa/ pad ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhen pa/ gzhona'i bskal pa grub pa dang / de dag la brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang
260b1(rgyud): dbang bskur byas la/ mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag go// gang gi tshe don du bya ba de'i tshe/ las thams cad grub pa ston to// shin du gsang bar byas te/ su yang
260b2(rgyud): mi sbyi no// sangs rgyas rnams la brnyas par gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pas yang ba la/ bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing // 'phral du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/
260b3(rgyud): rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan ni sangs rgyas la gus shing / sangs rgyas chos la bsten byed pa// 'phags pa'i chos
260b4(rgyud): la dad pa dang // byams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can// de'i lag tu rab ta sbyin/ bdag gi srog bzhin btang bar bya/ de dag dngos grub mchog yin te// klags dang
260b5(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin// rje su mthun pa'i las byed do// 'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba'i
260b6(rgyud): lam ni bde bar 'gro// gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// bde ba can du rtag tu 'gro// brngas te skyes pa'i pad ma las/ brgyan rnams kun gyi rnam par brgyan/ tshe
260b7(rgyud): rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de nas rigs sngogs 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa// gtsang mas legs par khrus bya/
260b8(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos nas// nyin zhag gcig srung ba byas pas/ lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug zhal mngon du bzhag ste/ me tog dang / bdug spos dbul
261a1(rgyud): @/ zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs dang / phyag na rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
261a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la/ a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdag lag na rdo rje la gu gal gyi bdag spos kyis bdug/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha bshos dkar po dbul/
261a3(rgyud): lag rdo rje la rol mo sna tshogs dang / ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po zlas brjod bya// mtshan mo khro bo'i ngal ba med par bzlas brjod bya
261a4(rgyud): ste/ kha gdod khro gnyer med pa dang / dri ma dang ser sna med pas/ nam langs kyi bar du bzlas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur
261a5(rgyud): la/ lag na rdo rje'i yang pus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te// de gnyis kyi mig nas 'dzag pa/ rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na// mi snang bar 'gyu ro//
261a6(rgyud): mig la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro'o// khar bcug na rigs sngags dang / cho ga zhing mo// gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs
261a7(rgyud): dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du nye bar 'jug cing / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes
261a8(rgyud): sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis smod par byed// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis po la gnon par byed de// de ltar lag na rdo rje 'gug
261b1(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til ma po ran par bdag nyid la bskus/ mig sman gyis mig la byug/ phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid thig le bya// nor bu mgo nal bzhan
261b2(rgyud): nas gu gul gyis bdag/ bdag nyid dur smrig bgos nas/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgom zhing / zhi ba dang / dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun nang du bzhug
261b3(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gi sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rig sngags 'chang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skra dang / mdog dang / rtags
261b4(rgyud): dang / spyod lam du mthong te/ mtshan nyid nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod cing / 'od 'dom gang ba/ stan pad ma brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i mdun gyis bdar ba/ lha'i tshogs kyi gzug
261b5(rgyud): mthong ba bstan to// dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mdog du mthong nas/ thams cad zhags gnyis la 'dud par byed do// rigs sngags 'chang
261b6(rgyud): des brnyas par mi byas te/ bdag la bstod par mi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyis bsod nams yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i dge slong gi
261b7(rgyud): dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbug 'byung bar byas te/ rgyu des na brnyas par mi bya'o// de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de
261b8(rgyud): nas 'das pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / chang tshing dang / yul dang / ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par byas te/
262a1(rgyud): yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khe'u dang / bu mo dang / de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibasu
262a2(rgyud): mthong mchod pa chen po dang / rim 'gro sna tshogs pa byed par 'gyur la/ de gzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yino zhes smra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga thob bo//
262a3(rgyud): yungs kar dang / til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha'
262a4(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugasu ston to// rkang pa til mar gyis bskus pa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis 'phags te/ na mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid
262a5(rgyud): du ma bkras pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du ston to// mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pas rig sngags 'chang de nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus
262a6(rgyud): byas ste/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la/ yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs la/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang /
262a7(rgyud): bram ze dang / btsun mo dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyuraro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang des nor bu
262a8(rgyud): bzhis dbu rgyan dang / phreng ba byas la mgo la btag so// til mar gyis yan lag tsam pa bsku bar bya'o// dpral bar thig le bya/ mig sman gyis mig la sku/ phye mas
262b1(rgyud): bdag nyid la bdab/ ras bzang po yug gcig bgo/ byang chub sems dpa'i cha byas du bya/ nor dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skad kyis de dag tham
262b2(rgyud): brgyan dang / spud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan par snang ngo // lag na pad ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras
262b3(rgyud): gzigs phyug gi gzugasu snang ngo // yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / yid bzhin
262b4(rgyud): nor bu dang / rgod pa'i kha dang / 'gul sngon dang / rta mgrin du ston to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar ston te/ ji srid du thig le yod cing / dbu rgyan thog
262b5(rgyud): pa de srid du/ tshul sna tshogs ston par byed// til mar dang yungs kar bsres nas/ shing kun shwA dang lhan cig sgras nas lus la bska/ lag pa g.yas na
262b6(rgyud): rdo rje dpal bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas/ dpa ma'i phye mas gtor la/ nor bu'i spyi gtsug tu bcing / mig sman gyis mig la bsku/ gu gal gyis
262b7(rgyud): bdugs la/ shes rab can khro bo'i'o lta ba'i tshul du byas na/ mngon gsum du rdo rje 'chang ba'i gzugasu snang te/ de la the tshom mi bya'o// ji srid du bdag khrus ma
262b8(rgyud): byas pa de srid du/ rdo rje gzugs can sna la las sna tshogs byed cing / mi dang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tshom mi bya'o// seng
263a1(rgyud): ge'i khrag gis til mar dang nor bus sbrus nas lus la bskus na/ mi'i seng ge'i chen po'i gzugasu ston to// phag gi khrag gis spras nas/
263a2(rgyud): lus la bskus na/ phag gi gzugs chen por ston to// til mar dang / phye ma lhan cig bskus nas/ yung dang shing pa la shi'i mdog tu byas la lus la bskus na/ sred
263a3(rgyud): med kyi bu'i gzugasu ston to// rig sngags 'chang gis pad ma dang / til mar lhan cig tu spras la lus la bskus na/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston to// shing
263a4(rgyud): arga'i 'o ma dang / til mar dang mnyam par sbyar la bskus na/ tshangs pa'i gzugasu ston to// glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbar nas lus la bskus na/ tshegs kyi
263a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston to// ri khrag dang sbyar nas lus la bskus na ri'i gzugasu ston to// til mar dang thig shing dang / pad ma'i bye ma dang / glang po che'i
263a6(rgyud): khrag dang / lhan cig sbyar nas lus la bskus nas/ nag po chen po'i gzugasu mngon gsum du rang gi gzugasu ston la// gang dang gang dag la theg byas na/ ma mo'i
263a7(rgyud): tshogs kyi gzugasu ston to// sbrul gyi khrag dang / lpags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang / lhan cig sbrus la skal tshig su bsku zhing dpung pa g.yon par bskus na/ klu'i
263a8(rgyud): rgyal po chen po'i gzugasu ston to// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar gzugasu ston to// de nas gzhal med lta bar 'dod na/ yungs kar la til mar gyis
263b1(rgyud): bskus nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor/ phye mas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun du bskus na// de 'dun rgan rims kyis bkod pa'i gzhal med khang chen
263b2(rgyud): po rgyan gyis brgyan byar ston to// dge slong rnams kyi steng du gtor na// dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin/ rgyal po'i gzugasu snang ba
263b3(rgyud): dang / gzhan blon po dang / gzhan dag skabs pa dang / gzhan dag 'dun 'don dang / gzhan yang yongasu spod pa'i gzugasu ston la/ yungs kar la skas pas gtor na//
263b4(rgyud): slar yang dge 'dun rnams su snang ngo // shing arga'i 'o ma yungs kar la skus nas/ dge 'dun gyi dbus su/ dge slong rnams kyi mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar
263b5(rgyud): dge slong thams cad 'khor ba ltar snang ngo // ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa la gtor na/ rgan po mkhar ba thog pa/ rgur po lhag gi skra kar can nyams chung bar snang ngo //
263b6(rgyud): mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar la gtor bas/ gal te mtshan thog thag bzhan na gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// lugs gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na/ de thur ma'i bze ba dang /
263b7(rgyud): sbrul nag por snang ngo // snod kyi steng du gtor na khams phor du snang bar 'gyuraro// gtung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byug pa'i steng du gtor na/ phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo // grong
263b8(rgyud): khyer gyi sgo dang / grong khyer kun du gtor na/ grong khyer kun mi snang bar 'gyur// grong khyer kun du yungs kar dang / pad mi 'bye gtor na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
264a1(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo mi snang bar 'gyur// seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi steng du gtor na/ lam gyi gzhi mdo' thams cad dus
264a2(rgyud): ge'i gzugasu ston to// sde drag cing brtul la/ lan chags mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na/ thams cad wa'i gzugs snang la phyogs bcur brgyug go//
264a3(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed pa'i sar gtor na/ thams cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la/ mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad mi snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// me'i
264a4(rgyud): nang du gtor na/ mi snang ba las snang bar 'gyur til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na/ rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyu ro// chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyuraro// bum
264a5(rgyud): ba chu'i gang ba la gtor na/ srog chags chu'i nang du gnas thams cad chu'i gnas nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so// tshal gyi nang du yungs kar gyi gtor na/ me tog dang
264a6(rgyud): 'bras bu mi snang bar 'gyur ba thams cad snang zhing shing skam po dang / tshal gyi mthar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to// nam mkha' la gtor na phyogs bzhi'i
264a7(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang du me dog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs ngag 'babs te/ lha'i dri legs par sbyin pa yid dag pa/ sim par
264a8(rgyud): byed par 'bab bo// las dang ldan pa'am/ bzo'i las kyi gnas te/ las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bska/ bud ma chen po'i
264b1(rgyud): bye mas 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyi phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las kyi zo bzang po ji ltar ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid
264b2(rgyud): g.yo la las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang po mthar byin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir zlos pa ma byas pa na/ rin ji lta ji lta ba
264b3(rgyud): de lta ltar nyo tshong byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis zlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la/ dpag tshad brgya rnam gyi bar du srid na/ de dang de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
264b4(rgyud): rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing / yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas/ 'jim pa bzhag la/ snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod
264b5(rgyud): pa bzhin bya ste/ snod kyi ngo bo dngul las byas pa 'am/ gser las byas pa'am/ zangs las byas pa'am/ lcags las byas pa 'am/ lcags lnga las byas pa/
264b6(rgyud): rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ ji lta de lta bu'i snod bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong
264b7(rgyud): byed do// yungs kar gyi phye ma dang / pad ma'i bye ma lhan cig sbyar nas/ tsheng dus su gtor na/ kun du bzang po bkra ba'i snod mi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang
264b8(rgyud): bar byed do// thags pa'i steng du gtor na sbrul chen por byed do// khyim dang ra ba'i chos dang / sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang / ka ba'i steng du gtor na/ khang pa dang / ra
265a1(rgyud): ba dang / 'khor gyi 'khyams rnams sbrul du ston ton/ ji srid chu dang / yungs kar gyis zlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go//

265b3(rgyud): nas/ 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas/ til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas bsku/ lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas nas/ dkyil 'khor

266a3(rgyud): ma chen po'i phye mas gtog nas/ thod pa'i steng du bzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hUM zhes se gol byas na/ mdang rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed de/ ldang
266a4(rgyud): bar byed de/ na mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun du 'bar bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'bar bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid 'bar byed do//

266a8(rgyud): bar byed de/ lcer bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te dung lan bdun bus na/ phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs
266b1(rgyud): pa skyed par 'gyur te/ ji srid du bzogs pa ma byas pa de srid du mchod zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go// spos chus bzlog cing khrus byas nas/ phyir bde bar gnas par

266b4(rgyud): mar gyi rgyal po dang / phye ma bsres pas byugs pa dang / thig les kyang dbang bskur zhing / pad ma chen po'i phye mas kyang byugs la/ lag pa'i phyag rgya dang /
