266b7(rgyud): ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du namakha' la 'dug go/ las su bya thams cad zin nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na/ gtor
266b8(rgyud): ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la blar yang rang gi gnas su 'jug go// go cha de lta bu ni/ dkyil 'khor
267a1(rgyud): thams cad la byas te/ thams cad du yang mtshan ston par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o// zhes/
267a2(rgyud): bshad do// de'i phyir pad ma'i dngos grub bshad par byas te/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las shin du legs shing / mdzes pa'i snying po dang / ze ba dang bcas
267a3(rgyud): shing / sdong bu dang / chad dang ldan par byas la/ 'dab ma byed kha bye ba dang / 'khor bar 'dab ma drug bcu rtsa bzhi yod pa/ khru gang rtsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying
267a4(rgyud): dang / ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la/ til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad ma'i phye ma dang / mig sman dang / mig la bsku ba dang / thig ler bya ba dang / bcas pa
267a5(rgyud): kun nas legs par bskus la/ pad ma'i snying po'i bar du/ nor bu rin po che bzhag nas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi ba
267a6(rgyud): du dbang bskar/ rigs sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pas/ gos gtsang bgos pas til mar gyis bdag nyid la bska bar bya// mig la bska ba dang
267a7(rgyud): thig le dang / 'dugs pas bdag nyid kyi lus la bdugs par bya'o// lags pa g.yas pa la nor bu bdags/ lag pa g.yon pos pad ma bzung la/ bcom ldan
267a8(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad ma'i mchod pa 'bul ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas/ chu dang yus
267a9(rgyud): byas ste pa ma 'bu
267b1(rgyud): kar gyis btab na yang 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// pad ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na/ pad ma 'gal me bskor bzhin 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad ma'i
267b2(rgyud): 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyur ro// pad ma chu'i nang du bzhag par bya ba ni/ mtsho phran nam/ lteng ka 'am/ nu bo 'am/ chu bo chen po 'am/ 'obs dang / rdzing ngam/
267b3(rgyud): mtsho'i nang gang yang rung gan su bzhag nas/ gnas de thams cad du pad mi' mtsho chen po 'byung ste/ ji srid du bad ma 'byung ba de srid du bad ma rtag tu pad ma'i mtshor
267b4(rgyud): 'dug te/ ston ka 'am/ dgu na nam/ dpyid dam/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus rtag tu pad ma'i mtsher 'du go// tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas/ yungs kar la til mar gyis
267b5(rgyud): bskas pa bye ma dang / sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba gcig la/ lag gis bzung ste bskor la/ yungs kar gyis gtor na/ me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// chu
267b6(rgyud): dang yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par bya ba yino// 'bras bu ji srid pa lag gi bzung nas/ yungs kar gyis gtor na/ 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyuraro//
267b7(rgyud): gos lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor te bskor na/ gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed do// rgyan lags pas bzung nas/ yungs kar gyis gtor
267b8(rgyud): nas/ lha'i rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du byed la/ thams cad la brgyan gtags par 'gyur ro// yungs
268a1(rgyud): kar dang chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs kar til mar gyis bskus la phye mas bsgo// gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / shing kun dang / sna
268a2(rgyud): hI 'o mas kyang bsgos la de dag gcig tu byas nas/ grib ma la skam mo// de nas 'bras bu gcig khar bcug la phyogs bzhir gtor na/ kha nas me 'bar bar
268a3(rgyud): snang zhing / lus las 'bar ba'i sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa de srid bar du/ lus las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs
268a4(rgyud): 'byung // til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ kong bur til mar gya rgyal pos bkang ste bus na/ mar me 'bum ston par 'gyuraro// me thab khung bu'i
268a5(rgyud): nang du bcug na/ ji srid du ma byung ba de srid du me 'bar bar ston to// mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma byung na/ rtag tu 'bar ro// 'gal me 'bar ba'i nad
268a6(rgyud): du bcug na/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'am snyed du snang ngo // gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na/ gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa thams cad 'bar bar
268a7(rgyud): snang ngo // lag cha dang mtshon cha thams cad la byugs nas/ gcig du 'bar bar 'gyu ro// bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la/ ril lu gsang ba'i spyi bor bzhag
268a8(rgyud): na/ lus thams cad cig du 'bar bar snang ba nas/ lus ril bsregs par snang ngo // 'o ma dang yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lus slar snang bar 'gyuraro/
268b1(rgyud): lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la/ ril lugasang ba 'bar ba lag pas bzung ba 'am/ rkang pa'i mthe bos bzung na/ lag pa dang rkang pa gnyis cig tu 'bar ba dang
268b2(rgyud): 'brel bar snang ngo // 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po 'am// rgyal po'i 'khor raM// bde can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad de yan
268b3(rgyud): lag nyam par snang ngo // dri chab dang yungs kar gyi gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'gyuraro// mtshan mo ri lu bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhags nas/ yung
268b4(rgyud): kar gyis gtor na/ mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang ngo // kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yino// mtshal chen po'i mtha' dang
268b5(rgyud): nang du gtor la shing cig la ril bu gsang ba bzhag na/ shing dang rtsa ba dang / shing gyel ba dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma thams cang gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo //
268b6(rgyud): ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun tu gtor na/ ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mched par snang la sems can kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyuraro// rkun ma
268b7(rgyud): dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / snang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thems cad dang / sdang sems can nas/
268b8(rgyud): ringags gtum po dang / bya la sogs pa'i bar ri la gnas pa rnams/ de'i mtshan po nyid phyogs bcu kun du bar du bros shing / ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to//
269a1(rgyud): spos chab kyi zlog par 'gyur ro// gzug brnyan gyi steng du gtor la gsang ba'i ril bu 'bar bar bzhag na/ gzugs brnyan thams cad/
269a2(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par 'gyur ro// mar me'i ril bu shar phyogs kyi sgor sbab te/ gnas gtsang mar bzhag/ dkyil 'khor
269a3(rgyud): cig sbar nas/ gtor mi'i cho ga bum pa bkang ba bzhag/ grong khyer kun tu yungs kar gyis gtor zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal yang dran par byas na/ grong khyer
269a4(rgyud): kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba cig tu snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na/ grong khyer na gan
269a5(rgyud): pa skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro// grong khyer de ni gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir
269a6(rgyud): rgol ba// phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / gnod phyed dang / klags lta ba 'am/ klags tshel bar gyur pa gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
269a7(rgyud): yi dwags dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / mi ma yin pa gang yang rung grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag lang long du gyur cing / gdung la du zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin
269a8(rgyud): cing / gror khyer gyis sgor byung nas/ phyogs bcur rab tu bros so// gror khyer de yang kun nas gnod pa med cing / 'khrugs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang /
269b1(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang / yungs kar gyi gro khyer
269b2(rgyud): gyi sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na/ bzlog par 'gyuraro// bkra shis par shog/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po/
269b3(rgyud): ldong ros dang / thig shing gi phyi ma dang / yungs kar dang kaHha ta'i la dang / arga'i 'o ma dang / pha gu'i 'o ma dang / gcig tu sbyar ro// nyi mig 'khris pa dang
269b4(rgyud): bcas pa dang / na ga pus pa dang / bad ma'i chu ba dag kyang lhan cig du phye ma zhib mor bya'o// phyi ma snga ma bzhin sbyar la/ chu ri lu byas pa dang / phye ma gzhan yang
269b5(rgyud): bcad do// phye ma 'di dang / pad ma chen po'i phye ma bcangs pa lhan cig bsres pa'i phye mi'i lus la bskus na/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ ri lu khar
269b6(rgyud): bcug la hUM zhes pa bsdams ste brjod na/ de'i lus la chu 'dzag cing / de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang lha rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang / lus las spos chu'i
269b7(rgyud): rigs yid du 'ongs pa du mas tshim par byed pa/ 'byung bar ni thams cad du grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi no// yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te na mkha
269b8(rgyud): la gtor // ri lu lag pas bskor na/ char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ri lu na mkha' la 'phangs na mi 'bab po// g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de
270a1(rgyud): yungs kar dang bsres te/ na mkha' la gtor la ri lu de yang khar bcug ste/ steng du bstas la hUM zhes pa'i sgras bor na/ gnam lcags/
270a2(rgyud): chen po 'bab ste/ yid mi bde ba chen po dang / sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du zhugs ste phye ma gtor la yungs kar dang / ri lu chu'i nang du bdab
270a3(rgyud): par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ de'i lus la bskos na/ klu chen po'i gzugasu snang ngo // ri lu dang yungs kar me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa
270a4(rgyud): yungs kar na mkha' la gtor na/ 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing klog chen po gsel bar snang bar 'gyuraro// chu'i nang nas byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khron pa'i
270a5(rgyud): nang du btab na/ chu lud nas phyogs kun du 'bab par 'gyuraro// rdza ma 'am/ bum pa'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ ril ba b+h+ring ga ra 'am/ ril ba phyed nas byugs te//
270a6(rgyud): de'i steng du yungs kar gyis gtor la/ chus bkang ste khrus byas na/ de chu 'bab par snang zhing / de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa mad
270a7(rgyud): po byed do// mchog tu grub pa yino// de nas rin chen po'i tshad du 'bru mar rgyal pos bya ste/ 'bru mar gzhan dang de bzhin du til las 'bru mar gyi rgyal po de
270a8(rgyud): bzhin du sbyar ro// lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bzhag pa thams cad nyam drod shes par bya ba po ni/ mar sar
270b1(rgyud): bzhin 'jam par 'gyur zhing ska cig de nyid la mtho ba dang / dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa de bzhin du dri yang 'gyur ro// snying po thur ma 'dra ba 'am/ zlum
270b2(rgyud): po 'am/ yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pa'am/ ka ba yang 'dud pa dang pa dang / ri yang dma' ba 'am/ yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed/ yungs
270b3(rgyud): kar dang pad ma chen po'i bye ma lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgo la phyog bzhi kun tu gtor na/ ri thams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon par snang
270b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ yangs na mis bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na/ seng ge dang sngags gis gang ba lcag ma dang / tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs gyis gang
270b5(rgyud): ba dang / rtsub pa dang / dum bu dang / khong stong du snang bar 'gyuraro// ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo po ta la'i gzhal
270b6(rgyud): med khang mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi'o// thug gi zas zos ste/ gtsang ma bzhin du khrus byas pa gos
270b7(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos pas ri'i gseb du zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar la/ yungs kar phye ma dang / bsres pa 'bru mar gyi
270b8(rgyud): rgyal po dang sbyar la/ 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhags bdun du dus gsum du sbyin bsregs bya'o// lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dbu lo// de
271a1(rgyud): nas rigs sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la zhagacig smyung ba byas la/ shin du khrus byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs gyis lus la bskus
271a2(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bzang po bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus la bsku phye mas lus byugs te/ mig sman gyis mig la bskus thig le byas la/ nor bus ma
271a3(rgyud): bcing zhing mgul ba dang / lag pa dang / dpung pa dang / rkyed par yang bcings la yungs kar dang / mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad ma
271a4(rgyud): chen po'i bye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor la/ rang gis lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang / pad ma bzung shing g.yas pas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang / don yo
271a5(rgyud): pa chen po'i dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya bzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ ji ltar don yod pa'i zhag pa'i mdo sde bshad pa snyan pa de
271a6(rgyud): ltar ri bo po ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyuraro// rigs sngags 'chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugasu snang bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar
271a7(rgyud): ri bo bo ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang rnams kyi ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal
271a8(rgyud): med khang snang ngo // pA la dang / ta la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi mug ta ka dang / ba ri shi ka dang / ka da ma dang / na'i la dang / ba ta lA dang / ba la
271b1(rgyud): sha dang / u dum 'bar ba dang / dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog sna tshogs dang // sna ma'i me tog dang / ta ra Na dang / na ba na li ka dang / kub
271b2(rgyud): bya ka sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang / ri dag kyi tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyur ro// tshe phyir bsdu bar byed pa
271b3(rgyud): 'dod pa de'i tshe/ gnas gzhan du 'gro bar byed// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs pa sna tshogs la/ rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o// dgos pa thams
271b4(rgyud): cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni klags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyuraro// / don yod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o//
271b5(rgyud): don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid
271b6(rgyud): ni/ pad ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon/ pad ma kha ni phyed bye ba/ phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis byung zhing brkyang nas kyang // bskum pa 'am 'dzin stang
271b7(rgyud): de nyid kyi// kun nas phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon cha phyag rgya rnams pa ni// 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
271b8(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'breng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung dang tho ba dang /
271'a1(rgyud): zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbug to dang / mu tig gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje phreng
271'a2(rgyud): bum dang / ud pa la'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyal
271'a3(rgyud): mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje'i con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang / sngags do'i phreng ba dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng zlum dang / sdigs pa dang / smyig
271'a4(rgyud): pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam snams pa dang / 'khar sil dang / lhung bzed dang /
271'a5(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyan dang / nor bu rgyus pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / me'i thab khung ngo // kun nas
271'a6(rgyud): 'bar 'phreng phyag rgya de/ sna tshogs rmad du byung bas smras// mtshon cha sna tshogs snrums pa'i/ pad ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas// ras la bris pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor ram/
271'a7(rgyud): rtsig pa 'am/ gang yang rung ba la/ mtshon rtsi rnams pa sna tshogs gyis// gang du bris pa mthong ba de/ ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni/ phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//
271'a8(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang gis tog mchog sbyin// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig nyes byas mi bzod pas/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yin/ mnar med
271'b1(rgyud): pa'i gnas dang ni/ dmyal ba dag du gzhol ba gang // phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur/ skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol/
271'b2(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'gyur// de dag skye ba phyi mar ni/ phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos ste// yang dang yang du pad ma las// brdzus ste skye ba dag du 'gyur
271'b3(rgyud): rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe dpog med// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der// skye 'gyur the tshom ma za cig/ don rnams bde bar grub par 'gyur/
271'b4(rgyud): rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar sgrub/ bde bar dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'gyur/ rtag tu mi ldog pa gnas 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub
271'b5(rgyud): dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bla med dge rtse bskyed par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// bsod nams phung po chen po thob/
271'b6(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// sdig pa thams cad mod la
271'b7(rgyud): sel// gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag/ mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yi// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni// mtho
271'b8(rgyud): ris sgo phye the tshom med// sgo bye gyur pa rnams la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyis dgongs pa// mgon po 'jig
272a1(rgyud): rten dbang phyug gis phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na/
272a2(rgyud): shi 'phros pa'i mad la ni/ bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis// gang ma thub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang
272a3(rgyud): du myur du 'jug par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor gra bzhin lham pa la// kun nas cha ni mdzes par 'gyur// grwa bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la/ sgo bzhi them sgras bzhi'i yi
272a4(rgyud): brgyan/ shin du legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam zhing gnyen la mnyam pa yi// sa'i cha dang ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab dag gis dbye// dkyil
272a5(rgyud): 'khor de nyid thig bdab la// phyag rgya bri ba rnam par bye// phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa'i// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying po yin/ gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha
272a6(rgyud): khyer gyi rnam pa dang // mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i rnam par dbye'o// gru bzhi pa'i dbusu rgyu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang /
272a7(rgyud): phyag rgyan gyis brgyan pa mtshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su// phyag rgya bri ba yang shin du 'bris par bya'o// dkyis
272a8(rgyud): 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la/ kun du yungs kar dkar po gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas
272b1(rgyud): phyogs bzhi kun du bya ba ni/ ba glang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pas/ shin tu legs par byug pa dang / ldan pa la mtshon rtsi phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang /
272b2(rgyud): kun nas pad ma chen po'i phreng ba rgyan chen po dang // mtshon cha bris la 'di yi sgo yang shin du 'bres par bri'o// ji ltar phyag rgya dang / mthun pa'i ro sna chog
272b3(rgyud): kyi gtor ma bzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo gru ba dang / bum pa dang / kham phor dang / rje'u gtor mas bkang la
272b4(rgyud): bzhag go// kun du bum pa gang ba dang / bdug spos kyi snod dag dang / me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor ma dkar po dag gis dgang // me tog naM
272b5(rgyud): par byas la// kun tu phreng ba bzhag par bya// phreng ba bzang po bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin kun du bdugs spos dbul// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang /
272b6(rgyud): du ru ka dang / sa la kiM dang / smrig ka dang / gu gul dang / sri rtsi pog dang / sgron shing dang / bla rtsi dang / ga bur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/ gtor
272b7(rgyud): ma dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbu'o// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par bya ste bskor la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag
272b8(rgyud): bya zhing / phyag rgya thams cad la bgram zhing me tog gtor to// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrubs gang dgos pa dang /
272'a1(rgyud): sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa mchog tu mdzes par byas la// byis las thams cad bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis//
272'a2(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gos ni gos la/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ dkyil 'khor du ni bzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa// de bzhin du ni las bya'o//
272'a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa/ dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis// thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i// phyi'i rigs ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bkrig
272'a4(rgyud): dang gtams rnams kyi// dam tshig du ni shes par 'gyur// phyi rigs kun gyi cho ga ni// dam tshig rjes zhugs de yin no// dkyil 'khor kun du zhugs pa dang /
272'a5(rgyud): rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i// phyag ni spyi bor 'dzegs par mdzad// chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi'i// gzi brjid mod la
272'a6(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzad gsung dkyil 'khor du// don yod dngos grub brtsol bar mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gar bzhugs pa// gang du spyi'i rig
272'a7(rgyud): rnams kyi/ don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob// sangs rgyas bye ba gang gi'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'iri de bzhin gshegs pa'i drug
272'a8(rgyud): dud dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te// yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni tshe 'di dag ni tshe 'di yi yin pa
272'b1(rgyud): khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing /
272'b2(rgyud): tshe skal ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba/ don yod pa nem par 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
272'b3(rgyud): thob ste gang tinge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi rigs de bzhin
272'b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rje su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang /
272'b5(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
272'b6(rgyud): kyis/ dkyil 'khor 'byor pa gzigs nas/ bsrung ba dang / skyab pa dang / spo bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyu da
272'b7(rgyud): mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis gcig
272'b8(rgyud): tu bla mar byed par 'gyuraro// nang thams cad med par 'gyuraro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// // mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'gro
273a1(rgyud): @kyi cho ga'o// de nas sbyin bsreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste// rigs sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ de nyid
273a2(rgyud): bsgrub pa bsgrubs pa'i phyir/ spyi'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi// cho ga zhib mo bla med yin// gang gis sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam par
273a3(rgyud): gzigs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs rnams byon 'gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rig sngags dngos grub parjesu stsol cig/ rta tu bsrung
273a4(rgyud): bar mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ the tshom med par myur du byon// mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na/ rang gi gzugasu
273a5(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol/ rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid// nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tshom med/
273a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste// dkyil 'khor grub bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni/ rgya chen ko la'i tshad tsam la// legs par byugs pa shin du 'jam pa/
273a7(rgyud): shin du gsal ba/ gru bzhi pa pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ tham skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po yang
273a8(rgyud): bya'o// me'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi nyid kyi rnams pa la/ kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang // steng du grwa ni bzhi bya ba/ rtag tu pad mi'i snying po dang /
273b1(rgyud): snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang // kun nas pad mas mdzes par bya// grwa grar pad ma'i phreng ba bya// de bzhin grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad ma dang // bcas pa bya'o//
273b2(rgyud): gsum par mdung rtse gsum pa pad ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhi par 'khor lo pad ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga pa bum pa gang ba bzhag go// sna tshogs mtshon gyis naM
273b3(rgyud): mdzes pa'i// kun nas pad ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang // me tog dang / ni phreng ba dang // phye ma pad mar bcas pa dang // de bzhin me tog rig
273b4(rgyud): dag nyid// de bzhin sna tshogs brgyan pa'o// nub kyi gnas dang gra dag du// pad ma'i 'dab ma ud pa la bcas// bum pa du ra bas gang ba bris/ rtsa ba'i bum pa
273b5(rgyud): dbus ma la// 'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdab/ de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing // sgo bzhi mdzes par byas pa ni// mtshon
273b6(rgyud): sna lnga yi skud pas gdab// me 'bar 'dog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can// grwa dang grar ni me lha bri// lus ni me 'dog 'bar ba dang / lag na me
273b7(rgyud): 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga gzhin// ba dan 'di dang sna lnga yi// skad pa bum
273b8(rgyud): pa gang bris dang // de bzhin bdug spos dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che ba'i// sna tshogs ro ni gtor ma bzhag
274a1(rgyud): rje'u kham por rnam gsum gyis// dkar pos bkang ba bzhag par bya// rje'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni// gtor mas gang ba bzhag
274a2(rgyud): bar bya// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag/ kun nas me tog bkram bya zhing // phreng ba sna tshogs bzhags par bya// 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni//
274a3(rgyud): kun du mar me 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du// dri'i phye ma lha shos dag/ dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad
274a4(rgyud): la/ blugs sar dur ba rtag tu bzhag/ shing ni arga sha mi dang // yungs skar 'bras ni so ba dang // zhun mar dang ni mar kar dang // kun du tsan dan dkar po dang /
274a5(rgyud): sbyin bsreg cho gar 'dir bzhag ste// dus gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyis// sprin bsreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// rigs pa 'dzin gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma yi ni
274a6(rgyud): gos bgos la// dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' shing // gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya
274a7(rgyud): shing // dur ba'i bstan las dkyil dkrung du// shar phyogs kha ltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag te// don yong rgyal po dran bya zhing // snga/
274a8(rgyud): dro'i dus su sbyin bsreg bya// gung la slob ma bzhugs bya shing // spyi'i rigs kyi sregs lug ni// phyir phred kyi ni su bya'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa//
274b1(rgyud): sbyin bsreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang / grub pa kun du cho ga yis// bdag nyid dbang skur mi kun gyis// sbyin bsreg byed pa'i mchog tu bshad/ kun du du gnas/
274b2(rgyud): ni thams cad na// sangs rgyas gnas mchog pa cig dang // gang gi de bzhin phur bu dang // mdun na mden m+me lha ni// sbyin bsregs byedapa 'jig rten par//
274b3(rgyud): mtshungs zhes ston pas lung ston to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa// rigs 'dzin dbang po chen po dang 16/ phyag na rdo chad pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug
274b4(rgyud): chen po dang // mnyam pa bas kyang lhag pa nyid// me'i sprin bsregs byed pa de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis brlob// gal te zhags ni dus gsum du// de nas
274b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i las rnams ni// me la sbyin bsreg byed pa dang // mod la sngon shes lnga thob ces// de skad 'jig rten 'dren pas gsung // las 'di byas nas de nas
274b6(rgyud): ni/ sbyin bsreg las 'di btsam par bya// sreg lugs sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur// lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur
274b7(rgyud): zhing / de bzhin gshegs kun dges par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni// mod la mthong bar sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa thams cad bsreg
274b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// shin du mi bzad sngon gyi las// sreg lug tsam gyi mod la bsreg/ 'bar ba'i me yis phye leb bzhin// de la sogs pa'i sdig pa ni// bsregs 'gyur
275a1(rgyud): 'di la the tshom med// sdang ba'i phyir ni dgol nyid dang // dga' zhing yid ni bde nyid dang // lus can dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed
275a2(rgyud): cing gnas// rtag tu mi'i lha nyid ni// rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yis// me lha sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis// me lha nyid ni bzhugs 'gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams
275a3(rgyud): cad mdzad// rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing / thams cad du ni mthong ba de// sgyu skar zla ba nyi ma dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang //
275a4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung bcas gzhon par bcas pa 'am// nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu ni// rjes 'brang bsrung zhing the tshom med// ces te rigs sngags 'chang
275a5(rgyud): don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bsgrub par 'dod na// rig sdug 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gtsang ma bgo bar bya// nyin zhag cig srung ba bya zhing // shing
275a6(rgyud): arga'i yams shing bsreg shing me sbar la/ pad ma dang zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin bsreg brgyad rgya byas na// sreg lug lan cig byas pas mtshams med pa
275a7(rgyud): lnga byas pas yang 'grub par 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na//
275a8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gi me sbar la// rigs spyi'i pad ma dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg
275b1(rgyud): brgyad brgya byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob te// thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin bsreg chen po'i cho gar
275b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas pha rol gyi dmag cho ga gzhom par 'dod na// rig sdug 'chang rtsang ma des shin du khrus byas la/ gos rtsang ma bgos la/ song ldeng gi me sbar la
275b3(rgyud): zho dang / zhun mar dang / yung kar dang / gu gul bsreg blugs kyi sbyin bsreg brgyad stong byas na/ dpag tshad kyi dmag tshogs bcing bar 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag
275b4(rgyud): tshogs dang / dgra bcom par 'dod pa dang / dpung zhig par 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing ka bi ra kI'i me sbar la// sbrul gyis lpags pa rjes pa dang /
275b5(rgyud): skye che'i sa bon lan tsha 'bras sa lu dang bsres pa yung kar sbar ba'i sprin bsreg byas na// dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra la ga naM
275b6(rgyud): lcug chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas/ phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba skyed par 'gyur// dgra thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro// klus char 'bebs par
275b7(rgyud): 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag cig srung ba byas nas/ shin du khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / yung kar dang
275b8(rgyud): sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg mtshan cig la dus gsuM du byas na/ klu'i rgyal po chen pos char gyis rgyun chen po 'bebs te// 'dzam bu'i
276a1(rgyud): @/ gling mtha' dag du zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par mthong bar 'dod par 'gyuraro// char de nyid ha cang ches na thal ba nam 'kha' la gtor
276a2(rgyud): na ha cang char pa 'chad par 'gyuraro// yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugasu mthong bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des/ gos gtsang ma bgos
276a3(rgyud): la/ nyin zhag cig snang ba byas par gyur pas/ shing sna ma'i me sbar la/ 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / bu ram sha kha ra dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum
276a4(rgyud): dang / sna ma'i me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin bsreg bya'o// brgyad stong chang ba dang me lha me'i nang nas/ lus byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyis pa bka'
276a5(rgyud): stsal cig/ ces zer zhing / ji ltar rig sngags 'chang gis/ cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba/ de bzhin du smra'o// thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ mchog thams cad sbyin pa
276a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i mi'i kha'i gachog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas/ gang du dbu skra byung ba dang / nus pa med
276a7(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyuraro// gang du phu zhes byas pa der me 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mun nag du dbugs phyung na/ me 'bar ste/ snang bar 'gyur ro// can dan dkar po'i sbyin
276a8(rgyud): bsregs stong rtsa brgyad byas pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// sa bon bdun gi sprin bsreg gis nad thang
276b1(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur te/ 'bras so ba'i sbyin bsreg gis ni rgyal po dbang du byed do// phug ma dang lan tsha'i sbyin bsreg gis ni zhes 'gras par byed do// 'bras yos
276b2(rgyud): dang yung kar gyi sbyin bsreg gis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yung kar dang / gu gul dang / zhum mar gyi sbyin bsreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugro//
276b3(rgyud): ka ra pi ri'i me tog dang / gu gul zhun mar dang / sbyar ba sbyin bsreg gi ni srin mo 'gugaso// de bzhin du 'dir ni las thams cad byed do// sbyin bsreg gi
276b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyis cho ga'o// ra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// kun du mthun mongs bsgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed
276b5(rgyud): ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing / bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu
276b6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dren par snang bar mdzad// mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i/ 'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba/ grub pa'i sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so
276b7(rgyud): so'i gzugasu bya ba ni// ras sam yang na dang dag la/ 'jigs pa med pas gzugs bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad tsam// yang na chang
276b8(rgyud): shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ pad ma'i mdog lta bu phyag rgya ba dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du spyan gsum pa zhi ba'i zhal du byi bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin
277a1(rgyud): pa dang / pad ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang / dbugs
277a2(rgyud): 'byin pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / me tog gi thum po 'dzin par bya'o// g.yon ni dkar po'o// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbar la dbu yid tsam mdud pa/ rgyan
277a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyan pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i thor bcug can dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis rgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyis dbu zla ba
277a4(rgyud): ches pas brgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi lpags pa snams pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa'o// nang rim du pad mi'i phreng ba
277a5(rgyud): bya'o// rim pa gnyis pa rdo rje'i phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa'o// rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dang // rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'o//
277a6(rgyud): rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'bar phreng bya'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang //
277a7(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang me tog sna tshogs thog par bya'o// gnozhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / lus ngan dang dbang phyug dang / lci'i bu
277a8(rgyud): rnams bya ba'i me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyang tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni/ khro gtam po'i gzugs 'chang ba phyag
277b1(rgyud): bzhi pa 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chad/ 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan can/ spun gsum pa g.yas pa rdza
277b2(rgyud): bas brgyan cing / ral gi 'dzin pa/ zhogs pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra d+ha 'dzin par bya'o/ dkar mo'i rgyab tu rigs sngags
277b3(rgyud): 'changs kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa phyag bzhi/ zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal po 'od dpag can thogs pa/ pad ma 'dzin pa
277b4(rgyud): dang / nor bu 'dzin par bya'o// 'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / dung can ma dang / dpal me dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma/ ral pa cig ma
277b5(rgyud): dang / pho nya mo bzhi dang / lo tog gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dkyil mo dkrung baHsa
277b6(rgyud): nga bcas sgor bzhi tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi rim pa kun du phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par
277b7(rgyud): bri'o// klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o// rigs sngags dngos grub bla na med pa'o// ri mo'i ga'i gnas 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad mod la sel/ mtshams
277b8(rgyud): med lnga po sbyong bar byed/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bcas pa dngos grub 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug par ston pa yin no// sri rigs thams cad de kho na nyid ri mo
278a1(rgyud): 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems pas kyang byin gyis brlab pa'o// don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs
278a2(rgyud): kyis ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis rlobs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid/ gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam
278a3(rgyud): par thar pa thob cing lung bstan par 'gyuraro// mthong ba tsam gyis/ cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub po// rnam snang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa snang ba bye
278a4(rgyud): ba gang ga'i bye ma brgya stong phrag dgu bcu brtsa dgu'i mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags chog bla na med// spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni// thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyi stan//
278a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang // gang yang 'dri'i de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang // rdo rje rigs gang bla med pa// spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni// ri mo mthong
278a6(rgyud): ba'i khyad par yin// spyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // dmyal ba'i ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho ris kyi ni sgo yang phye// bla na med pa'i ston pa yi// phyag rgya'i ri mo dkyil 'a
278a7(rgyud): 'di bsod nams bla na med pa yi/ ji ste don yod pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyu'i gzugs mthong bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang ba des/ tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras
278a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi sku sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam byas la/ gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shin du rnam par dbyes/ pas dbu dang / mgur dang / bskyed pa dang / pus mo dang /
278b1(rgyud): ngan lag dang zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad mnyam shing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshang shin du 'byed shing
278b2(rgyud): cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla gam can dang / zhi ba'i gzugs can dang / zhi ba'i gzugs can spun gsum ma/ phyag bzhi shin du mdzes pa dang /
278b3(rgyud): dbu skra shin du mdzes pa/ brgyan pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od pag med phyag na pad ma bsnams pa/
278b4(rgyud): phyag g.yas na mdun rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog mdzad pa// pad mi'i gdan la gzugs par bya'o// sgrol ma dang 'od dkar mo
278b5(rgyud): 'dom gang bcas pa dgos so// mgon po shin du mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig gis rgyan gyis mtshams su gser gyi brgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i cod pan
278b6(rgyud): nam da yang na spyi rtsug tu ring bsrel bzhag par byas la/ tsa na dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya// gur gum dang / bla rtsi dang / ga bur gyi mchod la/ dkyil 'khor
278b7(rgyud): gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad ma ge sar dang bcas pa/ snying po dang bcas pa/ 'dam ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ de'i dbus su 'jig pa med pa'i 'jig
278b8(rgyud): rten dbang phyug dar gyis gcod pan gyis bcing ba gzhags la/ a ka ru dang / can dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing / me tog bkram par bya/ me tog gyis phreng
279a1(rgyud): bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin du khrus byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas/ bskang ba byas pas mgon
279a2(rgyud): po 'jig rten dbang phyug la sngon du phyogs par dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la/ mchod yon dang lha shos phul la/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par
279a3(rgyud): gzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sgom mo// sems can thams cad la rtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang sgom shing / shin du yongs su sbyang pa leg
279a4(rgyud): par spyod cing / gzhan mi smra bar 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs pacig pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la/
279a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgya la dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa rgyad brtsams na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang
279a6(rgyud): 'bar ba dang / snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang byugi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag ste/ legs so legaso
279a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// bsgrub ba dam pa byaso// de bzhin shegs pa spyi'i rigs kyi 'di dang /
279a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags
279b1(rgyud): 'chang khyod kyis 'grub kyis/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung shig dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams
279b2(rgyud): cad ji ltar yid l+ya bsam pa thams cad rjes su sbyin no// 'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba'i tha ma yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa
279b3(rgyud): las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas/ bde ba can 'jig rten gyis khams su pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
279b4(rgyud): gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon du chos nyan par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du tshe'i tshad skal pa brgya stong
279b5(rgyud): dpag tu med grang med bgrang med par 'gyuraro// zhes tshigasu gsung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal pos me tog gam cod
279b6(rgyud): pan la sngon du gtor na/ des 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'gro zhing // don yod pa'i ye
279b7(rgyud): shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin thob po// yang ba chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//
279b8(rgyud): sku gzugs bsgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te/ rig sngags 'chang bskal pa chung ba mnar med par gzhol ba mtshams med pa lnga byed pas/ de lan cig
280a1(rgyud): nges par bsgrub pa tsam gyis/ mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par 'chi ba bgyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsuM
280a2(rgyud): du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la snang bas/ khrag byung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
280a3(rgyud): rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyi brlab de'i rig sngags 'chang bsgrub na/ rmi lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing / yid la
280a4(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad rjes su skul bar bgyis shing / sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o//
280a5(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la/ rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob bo// sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i
280a6(rgyud): 'os chen po cig pur 'gyuraro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/ sgo kun du dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya
280a7(rgyud): ba'i lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag gis thams cad sgrib pa bral bar 'gyur// nad thams cad dang /
280a8(rgyud): bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gdol pas kyang dad pa dang gus pas bsgrub pa/ rnams gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyi kyang nges par yid la bsaM
280b1(rgyud): pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi// rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ba brtsal bar bgyid na/ mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom mtshon can gyis lta smos
280b2(rgyud): kyang ci dgos te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la bsam pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la
280b3(rgyud): the tsom dang yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can che cig pu de la rig sngags bsgrub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal/ bdag gis
280b4(rgyud): rngo mi thogs la so// gang yang phyi mi'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can gyi semasu gya gyur pa'i gnyis su
280b5(rgyud): mi byed pa ngo bo gnyis can/ ser sna can byas pa mi bzo/ pha rol gyi rdzas la rkang chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rku ba/ gdag pa pra dog che ga
280b6(rgyud): khang pa gzhan gyi rdzas 'gro pa mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dkyil 'khor ston pa bla ma la mi gus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus
280b7(rgyud): pa rkam chag can byas pa mi bzo ba nyid 'ga' 'byung te/ sems can de dag la rkyang par bstan pa 'am/ ngos grub stan par bsngo mi thog lag so// bdag la yang
280b8(rgyud): brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu 'byung te/ bdag la yang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la yang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems dang
281a1(rgyud): sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo // bdag la yang khu ba bgyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
281a2(rgyud): dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes rjod par bya'o// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas
281a3(rgyud): 'jom par bgyid pa gdol pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang sngags kun nas 'jom pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshoshag
281a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzem par zhes rig par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshig dang / gsang
281a5(rgyud): ba dang rig sngags 'chang gyis dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun 'jom pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de dag bdag la smad pas/ sems can de dgi sdig gdol pa zhes bya'o// /
281a6(rgyud): dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni/ smad par 'os par rig par bskyi'o// tshig dka' ba tshig pa lta bur rig sngags nyam pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa/ dkyil
281a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chung gan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni
281a8(rgyud): bdag gis ma snong ste/ bdag gis yongasu spangs pa ma lagaso// de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu spang ba/ dus gsum du gsheg
281b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu spang ba/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad yongasu spang ba/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig
281b2(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongasu spang bas/ bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongasu zin par 'gyur ba/
281b3(rgyud): de dag ni bdag gis ma nong te/ bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so// de lta mod kyis rig sngags bsres pa dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig bsreg pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dag
281b4(rgyud): bcas pas bsreg pa gsang ba bsreg pa/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rig ngan par byed pa'o// sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal mang po
281b5(rgyud): rdul phrag mo bsreg pa'i bskal par bsdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi pha rol gyi bde ba can med do// de lta bas na sems can rig
281b6(rgyud): sngags kyi ched du rig sngags sems pa/ byams pa'i sems su bya'o// gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par gyur
281b7(rgyud): ba de la gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems skyed par bgyi'o// pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rab
281b8(rgyud): gi sha dang khrag dang / rkang yang gtab par bgyi/ gos dang rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / gtung ba dang / rten pa dang / bgos pas rim 'gro dang / mchod par bgyi ste/
282a1(rgyud): de la bdag gis mchod par bgyi'o// rjed pa dang bla mar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// dran pa tsam gyi kyang bdag gis gzugs
282a2(rgyud): mthong ba rjesu bstsal bar bgyi'o// rgyun du rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bdag gis rgyun du rjesu 'brang ba ni ci ltar chab kyis nang du til mar gyi thig pa stsal ba ltar/ kun du mchi
282a3(rgyud): bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus brlab bzhin du thams cad rje su mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs
282a4(rgyud): pa'i lam so sor gzhag par gyi/ stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / gzig brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad bsgrub pa dang / dngos grub mchog stsal bar bgyi'o// de na
282a5(rgyud): can dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid mthong te/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyan kho nar/
282a6(rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa'i mchod rten dang / bcas par bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus
282a7(rgyud): sum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin bshegs pa'i rnam tshig gnas pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyis gnas so// zhes rigs par bgyi'o// de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor slad du byung ba zhe
282a8(rgyud): rig par bgyi'o// lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi
282b1(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so// zhes rig par bgyi'i// sa phyogs 'di rin po
282b2(rgyud): sna bdun gyis gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas/ brgyan par bgyi'o// de la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams da du gtog
282b3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed na/ rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa sbran
282b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs sor bcu drug pa/ shin du mdzes pa/ shin du tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa de bzhin du zhal snyam pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can
282b5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa thor tshugs can/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zlas ma can no// zhal g.yas pa ni khro bo gzugs can/ gzugs
282b6(rgyud): sbyar ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral ba'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa la ni
282b7(rgyud): zhal khro gnyer can 'khros pa'i lta stang su lta ba spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu brgyan 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla gam can/
282b8(rgyud): brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ zhags pa thogs pa/ pad ma thogs pa// mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/
283a1(rgyud): dbugs 'byin pa rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad ma'i bdan la bzhugs pa'o// g.yos na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon na
283a2(rgyud): kar mo thal mo sbyar cing yid tsam 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang
283a3(rgyud): gis gser gyi brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ kha ltas nas pus mo btsugs te/ 'dug par bya'o// mtshon rtsi

283a7(rgyud): kun du ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad ma ge sar dang / dus rus ka dang / til mar dang / pra tshil dang / lhan cig spang ba'i phye ma zhib mo// shin du 'jam pa gnyen pa mchog
283a8(rgyud): 'di gtsang bas spyod pas/ thub pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin du dul ba dang / rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa shin du mdzes par bya'o// gsang sngags
283b1(rgyud): brgya stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lhan cig bsgrub pa 'di mchog yin te/ 'di yongasu rdzogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad lo mngon du gtor to// de nas rig sngag
283b2(rgyud): 'chang gi las brtsams mo// de nas rig sngagaso 'chang rtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byug pas/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin tu

283b5(rgyud): bcas pa shin tu mdzes pa/ shin du bzang ba/ tsan dan dang / gur gam gyis bri bar bya ste// der mtshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o// bum pa spos chus gang ba dang /

283b7(rgyud): ni// gnas sam/ dgon pa 'am khyim 'am/ gang du gnas par 'gyur ba deng / khru gang tshad tsam khru do 'am/ khru gsum 'am/ lhag pa bya'o// de bzhin du bdug spos
283b8(rgyud): kyang tsan ngan dang / a ka ru dang / du rus ka dang / kun du ru'o// ba ngan sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog phreng ba dkram bya zhing / dri dang byug
284a1(rgyud): ba de nyid dang / kun du mar me phreng ba'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma'i dbus
284a2(rgyud): kyis steng du gzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chang sngon du phyogs par dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pas brgyad stong brtsams par bya'o//

284a8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa sngun ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgyad rgya byas na/ dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing / ji ltar bsam pa/
284b1(rgyud): thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// de'i mdun du can dan dkar po la dkyil 'khor byas la tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa rgyang bya'o// de nas thal ba la lan brgya rtsa
284b2(rgyud): brgyad bzlas ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par ska zhing thal ba de nyid yung kar gyis byugs pa phyogs bzhir gtor na/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ji ltar 'jig rten thos
284b3(rgyud): cad kyi mngon suM du mthong te/ ji srid du phyir sdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugasu snang bar 'gyuraro// dri chu dang / yung kar gyis mngon sum tu gtor na/

284b7(rgyud): 'os chen por 'gyuraro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyuraro// don dang mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyuraro// thal bas lus la bskus te/ klu'i mchor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong
284b8(rgyud): phrag drug bcu rgyad thams can dbang du gyur nas/ gnas te/ bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing / ji srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// rang la byug te/
285a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dang 'khor du ma dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing / mdun/
285a2(rgyud): nanye bar gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen por 'gyuraro// don yod pa chen po dang / mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro//
285a3(rgyud): srid mtsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang las thal bas rig ma bgyis// de dang de'i nad thams cad dang
285a4(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur// sdig pa dang bsgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'gyur// ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad par 'gyur// mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas
285a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// byas pa mi bzong gsang bsngags la ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/ rlom sems can/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa/
285a6(rgyud): bdud kyis phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can rdzogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // /
285a7(rgyud): de dag yun ring por thar par mi rnyed pas/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
285a8(rgyud): lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba rgyud par rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa dag ni me tog te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir
285b1(rgyud): bdag gi cung zad kyang mnongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can sgrol bar rngo mi thog lagaso// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po bka' stsal
285b2(rgyud): ba'i yid la bgyis pas grol bar rngo mi thogs lag so// de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po rgyud las nyams su myong bar 'gyuraro// dngos grub ni byams pas thob te/
285b3(rgyud): byam pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha dgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thog paHsems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes shin pa la don kho na nyid bsgrub pa'i dngos
285b4(rgyud): grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjesu gsang ngo // mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyis gzugs kyis 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren
285b5(rgyud): pa rang gi gzugasu mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bye ba gi'i klung gi bye ma dang / mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho
285b6(rgyud): na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs par khong du chud par rig par bgyi te/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas 'khor los
285b7(rgyud): bsgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan
285b8(rgyud): gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsuM du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
286a1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyis lha thams cad
286a2(rgyud): mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig thams cad gyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod na/ cho ga bsgrub
286a3(rgyud): par bya ste/ bya ba dang bcas pa/ de myur ba dang / shin du myur ba dang / mgyogs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon suM du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba'i gsang ba
286a4(rgyud): rton pa mthong te/ 'di la som nyid dang / nem nur mi bya/ the tshom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi 'phags pa spyan ras
286a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam tshangs pa'i cha byad chang ba/ ral ba'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ba ste/ shin du tshad dang ldan pa/
286a6(rgyud): byed mdzes pa cha shin du rnam par 'byes pa/ phyag gnyis pa spun gsum dang / 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na bzla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon na pad
286a7(rgyud): ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs snum pa/ phyag g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga bur dang / bla rtsi dang / ring srel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo
286a8(rgyud): sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyis rkyen gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul la sgrol ma dkar mo thal sbyar te/ yid
286b1(rgyud): tsam 'dud pa pad mo'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na/ 'od dpag med dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhug pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po dkyil
286b2(rgyud): mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa bkod par bya'o// 'dom gang dang bcas pa legs par brgyan par bya zhing / gnang dang gnang shin du rnam par 'byes pa/ skra dang dpral
286b3(rgyud): ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan dang / zhal dang mgul dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma dang / rkang pa dang / baR+Ya dang pus mo dang / byin pa dang zhabs dang / phyag
286b4(rgyud): kyi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du me rdzas pa/ ska chu zhing gab cing mthon man ran pa mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po 'chang ba bya'o// las shin du yongasu rdzogs shing /
286b5(rgyud): shin du mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs zin par rig nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gyis sgyus skar bzang po'i zla ba nya ba/
286b6(rgyud): 'am/ ches brgyad dam/ bcwo lnga 'am/ bcu gsuM 'am/ bcu bzhi'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyis nyi ma dang 'thun pa rnyed nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub par bya ste
286b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shin du mdzes par bya ba ni/ gru bzhi la cha legs par bye ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them smras bzhis brgyan/ khru gsum par dbye bar bya ste/ tshungs pa dang /
286b8(rgyud): lhag par ni mi bya'o// legs par byug pa shin du 'dzem pa snyibasnyen par dbyibs legs pa la tshon ci sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab
287a1(rgyud): pa ni/ shin du rnam par 'byes bsko bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su snying por pad mi'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil
287a2(rgyud): 'khor bgyi'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu cha mnyam brgyad du che ba lho'i gra'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mtshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o// de nas
287a3(rgyud): byang gi grar bri ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba bri'o// de nas nub kyi grar bri ni/ nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtshon
287a4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi rnam par bkra ba bri'o// de nas shar gyi grar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu gsal
287a5(rgyud): bar bri'o// shar phyogs kyi ri bo po ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab kyi 6
287a6(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo kun nas dkris pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsuM ba'i rig kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor ri spos kyi ngad ldang dri zi'i chos
287a7(rgyud): kyis gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin du mdzes par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna
287a8(rgyud): tshogs mchog gis gang ba rtag tu bri'o// legs par zin nas kun du ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'bar phreng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pi rigs su de bzhin gsheg
287b1(rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid bzhag go// nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin
287b2(rgyud): pa gzhag na/ spyi'i rigs 'grub po// lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo po ta la la gzhag go/ ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o// dpe med ma'i ni ti se ri rtse mor ro// sgrol ma bdun ni
287b3(rgyud): spos kyi ngang ldan la gzhag go// shar phyogs kyi sgo pho nya mo zhi ba pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su skor ba'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor srin mo ral gcig ma srin mo rabs bdun
287b4(rgyud): gyis yongs su skor ba'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyud lu gu rgyud bdun gyis yongasu skor ba'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gnyer can gyis yongasu skor ba'o//
287b5(rgyud): de nas 'jig pa mo de bas mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyis mdog can ring srel dang ldan pa/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil
287b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi snying po// pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhags par bya'o// grar rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs blo ba gos pas/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon
287b7(rgyud): 'bar ba thogs pa gzhag par bya'o// gang zhingag thug pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa// spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam pa
287b8(rgyud): 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gacho ga sbyin pa dang / bcas pa don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ sgrub pa'i ched du sna tshogs dran par bya'o// seMs
288a1(rgyud): / can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ rnamathar dkyil 'jig 'di nyid ni/ legs par bsgrub pa mthong ngo tsam dang / klag pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur
288a2(rgyud): de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yin/ bsgrubs par byed pas mi 'gas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin du khrus bgyis pa gos rtsang bgos pa/ dar
288a3(rgyud): dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos/ snod sna tshogs legs par bkang pa dang / gser dngul gyis gnod
288a4(rgyud): du mchod yon dbul zhing / ro sna tshogs kyis gtor ma bzhag par bya// de bzhin du 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// gzugs pa sna tshogs kyi kha zas kyi
288a5(rgyud): gtor ma dbul lo// me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing / gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba 'bum pa dang / rdzing bu dang / bor zum dang / kham phor dang / dbyib
288a6(rgyud): mo dag kyang bkang ngo // kun du dri chus bsgos pa'i/ rgya chen gtor ma kun du'o// sna tshogs pa'i phog byor dang / sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni/ a ka/
288a7(rgyud): ru dang / tsan dan dang / s+phi ka dang / kun du ru dang / gu gul dang / sgron shin dang / shi biSh+Ta ka dang / ras dang / sar dza ras dung / de bzhin du ga bur dang /
288a8(rgyud): bla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sha khra ri gdug spos ni 'di dag rab tu phul/ thams cad du grub pa bla na med pa yin no// sna tshogs pa'i dri dag dag dang /
288b1(rgyud): bye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid// shes rab can gyis kun du ni/ dkyil 'khor dag la bzhag par bya/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul
288b2(rgyud): gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang / in dri ni la dag dang ni/ pad ma ra ga dag dang ni/ gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna
288b3(rgyud): bdun can yang grwa bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang yung kar dang / bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor to// kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/ rmad
288b4(rgyud): byung dkyil 'khor la gzhag cing / kun nas mar me'i phreng ba sil// dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la gzhag/ rig sngags nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas
288b5(rgyud): yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la/ cho gas bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// de nas
288b6(rgyud): slob ma bzhugs pa bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po 'am/ blo ba dpon nam ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ slob dpon chen po'i dam tshig de dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor
288b7(rgyud): gsang bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma mthong zhing / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas/ phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang / gdug spos
288b8(rgyud): dbul ba byas la bskor ba bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag ste// dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te 'dug
289a1(rgyud): la mi smra bar yang mtshan du snang ba mthong gi bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la/ dkyil 'khor kun du khro
289a2(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bkur zhing yungs kar dang chu dang me tog gi dkyil 'khor kun du lan rgya rtsa brgyad/ gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya
289a3(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing la/ dkyil 'khor kun du me tog dang / gdug spos dang / dri phul nas mgon po// 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhag
289a4(rgyud): pa mthong na/ don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o// de mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod par bya'o// de nas lha mo/
289a5(rgyud): sgrol ma dang / kun du lho sgrol thams cad la'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o// de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gas pa'i lha thams cad la'o//
289a6(rgyud): thams cad dang sgo bsrung la rtog tu mchod par bya'o// de nas phyogs bcu kun du rig sngags 'chang rtag tu mchod na/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas de 'dug la 'jigs
289a7(rgyud): pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing gsangs
289a8(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran par sgom mo// gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang /
289b1(rgyud): sems bde ba thob po// 'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnams par dkra ba byung zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la/ ngor yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/
289b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang
289b3(rgyud): lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / dkyil 'khor kun nas las so zhes bya ba'i sgra grags par 'gyur/ de nas ci ltar gser bkod
289b4(rgyud): pa ji ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo
289b5(rgyud): rje dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gi dkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur ro// skra gser gyi mdog can gzugs bzang
289b6(rgyud): pos bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ston par snang bar 'gyur// phyogs kun du rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rtag tu sems rten por bya ste/ byams pa dang
289b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i sems rten por gyur pas me tog dang / rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag
289b8(rgyud): gser gyi mdog can kyang te/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing / rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod
290a1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo'i mtha' dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba grub te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
290a2(rgyud): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan cing rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas kyi
290a3(rgyud): bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod/ rang gi ngo bo nyid phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyuraro// byos shig dkyil 'khor 'di la
290a4(rgyud): rten pa'i skyes po dge ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog
290a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ji ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der bzhugs na/ gzugs rnyen las khrag 'dzag cing / sgra mi zad pa 'byung te/
290a6(rgyud): mgon po 'di mi mthong / dkyil 'khor 'di nyid 'bar bar mi 'gyur/ sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i rig sngag
290a7(rgyud): 'chang la rmi lam du ston te/ de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing / yid la bsam pa thams cad yongasu
290a8(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur te// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis leg par rtag tu so sor btag/ sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o// grub pa'o// bden
290b1(rgyud): par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdam pa sems can thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la rtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ba/
290b2(rgyud): tshig rtag pa dad pa can gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'dzin pa/ par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog sum la mchog tu gus pa/ rtag tu bla ma la gus pa/ nyid kyi sems
290b3(rgyud): can 'di dag bzhugs par bya'o// rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu tsang zhing rtsang sbra dang / ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang /

290b5(rgyud): 'gro yang spang bar bya'o// lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste// 'di dag bsgrub pa'i cho ga dran par bya'o// lag pa 'bags pas de la reg par mi bya/ lhung zed dor
290b6(rgyud): bar mi bya'o// rtag tu kham byed byed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'phags po 'di dag gis nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// gtsang mas zas cang ma za zhing / lag
290b7(rgyud): ba'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong la sogs pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid na/ mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no// de nas rigs 'chang gis/ las
290b8(rgyud): shin du rdzogs par bya zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na/ de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyuraro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
291a1(rgyud): gi phyag rkyang nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing / shin tu dri med par
291a2(rgyud): snang ba zhes bya ba nor bu nyid kyi mgul ba nas dkrol te/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgul du mdog par mdzad do// spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing / 'di la
291a3(rgyud): sras kyi mthu bo zhes gsungaso// mgul bar nor bu cing ba tsam gyis de'i mod la na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i
291a4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang
291a5(rgyud): gi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil mkhor mngon du 'gyur zhing / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mchi
291a6(rgyud): na 'dug par 'gyuraro// rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul ba zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting 'dzin rje su thob pas/
291a7(rgyud): 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang // cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa
291a8(rgyud): dam tshig dang gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston
291b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi brlab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa thob ste/ gang dag dam tshig thob pas dus/
