291b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas rtsang mar gos rtsang ma'i gdan gshams la de'i steng du gzhags par bya'o// a'u'i gdug spos dbul zhing
291b5(rgyud): nyin zhag cig bzhin du nang par sngar bzhin mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa phul bar bya'o// de 'phags pa
291b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs rlan smra bar
291b7(rgyud): tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// da ltar gyi de bzhin du de thams cad par 'gyur te/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lta bya
291b8(rgyud): ba de thams cad smra par 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am/ tshe yongs su zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'am dgra thab pa 'am/
292a1(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs thab pa'am/ lo nyes pa 'am/ mi ngas dang / dgon pa dang / nang dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa
292a2(rgyud): dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po yis 'jig pa dang / rkun pos 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gtum po
292a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa'i 'jig pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur
292a4(rgyud): zhing / de 'thab pa thams cad kyang rab tu ston par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang la nyin cig bzhin du khyed par du rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyuraro//
292a5(rgyud): cig la stan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa/ rkan ma byas pa mi bzo ba rlang ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba 'phag
292a6(rgyud): ba'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa bslab pa mi 'dod pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa de dag gis lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rnam par bsgog par mi bgyi/ ska'i
292a7(rgyud): rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang snyan par mi gyi'o// cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bgyi/ rjesu 'jug par mi bgyi'o// de nas
292a8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par
292b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro// gang gi drung nas rig sngangs kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu thogs par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla mi'i 'dus shes skyed
292b2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyi gus par bgyi na/ bdag la gus pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa lags/ mchod pa dang / brjed par bgyis pa
292b3(rgyud): lagaso// de lta bas na dad pa'i rje su 'brang bas byams pa sgom pa/ snying rje skyed pas dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ ci ste bgyid pa'i sems can de
292b4(rgyud): la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi chad par dran pa dang / bdag 'dod pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs shin tu yongasu dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag 'dun na/ mchis
292b5(rgyud): par gyi zhing yid la re ba thams cad dang / mchog yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa la gzhan du bgyid na/ bdag gis sangs
292b6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag smras pa lagaso// rig sngags kyi mdol pa/ rkun mor gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas bzhin du smra bar mi bgyi'o// rig
292b7(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi rtag tu rtsang mar bgyi/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byam pa dang / snying rje sgom pa yid la bgyid na de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun
292b8(rgyud): sum tshogs pas thams cad thob par bgyi/ dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs chen po'i dngos grub rje su srul bar bgyi /
293a1(rgyud): sems can cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba la/ rgya mtsho'i dus rbar rlabs ltar thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o//
293a2(rgyud): ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad yongasu zad pa bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag blas kun du mchis par bgyi'o// sems can gang
293a3(rgyud): la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis/ sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa de yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de lta bas na rig
293a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis/ shin du sdom pas bsdams shing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o// yongasu gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing / yang 'dzum par mi
293a5(rgyud): bgyi te lags pa brkyang par bgyi'o// gtor ba meng bas dezhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// sngar legs par spyad par bgyi ste/
293a6(rgyud): don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad par bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o// de na bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bya'o// rang gi gzugs parnyan
293a7(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung che// kun du dngos grub thog med cing // dkyil
293a8(rgyud): 'khor kun la dbang bkur ba// sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// bdud dang bgyegs ni rnam par 'joms/ gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba yin
293b1(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// gon+da gyi rtse za skad byed cing // sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing //
293b2(rgyud): 'jig 'phos rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol te// don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gsheg
293b3(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas ston// spyi'i rigs ni rab ston pa// don yod pa'i spri'i gsang ba ni// rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid// khro bo rgyal po bla
293b4(rgyud): med pa// de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bags pa sbran
293b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang byug don yod pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i gzugasu gnas te/ sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed gyur cing / lag na zhags
293b6(rgyud): pa thogs te/ khro bo 'di smras so// na ma sarba ta thA ga ta/ ar+ya ba ro lo ki te sha ra badz+ra d+ha re b+ha/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ha ka ru ni
293b7(rgyud): ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mahA pad ma ha ste/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ka lu/ ma hA sta ma phra ba tab/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni sha tsa re she re/ e h+ye hi/
293b8(rgyud): bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ ki ni ki ni/ ba ra ma shud d+has ta/ kar ka ra/ ki ri ki ri nam hA bi ti sa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ hA hA hi hi hAM hA/ oM ka ra tha rba/ pa[ऽ]
294a1(rgyud): d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ bar ba ra/ ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa hA sra/ pra ti mad Di ti sha ri ra/ dza ya/ dza la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ su ru mu ru/ sa na
294a2(rgyud): ma ra/ ru dra ba Na b+ha sa ba/ d+ha na da/ ri Shi na ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be shang+ga ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ki sha ra/ ma h+ye shor/
294a3(rgyud): ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ tra da na ta ra dza na/ ra dza ta ska ra/ ad ni ud ka/ bi Sha Sha/ s+tha ba ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ pro d+h+yang ga/ tsa dur+ya
294a4(rgyud): r+ya/ sad tra sam/ pra sha ka/ ta ma tam/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma sa ma/ ma ha Ta mo na d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma ni/ mi li mi li/ en+te ya/ tsarma ba ri ka ra/ e he h+ye
294a5(rgyud): ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shu d+ha/ bi sha ya/ ni ba san/ ma hA ka ru ni ka/ shA ta yang nyo ga bi ta/ ran ra da na ma ku ta/ ma la da ra/ sarbad nyi shi ri pri ka ta/ ka ra bu
294a6(rgyud): ta sa ma d+hu/ pra kam b+h+ya/ Sha ba ra/ mi ta ba su ra ka/ ma hA sarba sed tA ta san ta ta ba ri ba tsa ka/ sarba ma ri Da D+hA Sh+Ta pra mar d+ha ka/ sarba sid d+ha ya/ a shasa?
294a7(rgyud): ri sU ra ko/ a b+hi shin n+ya tu man/ sarba ta thag ta/ Sh+pe ka ra b+ha ga b+han/ a mo g+ha ra dza hUM phaT/ na ma stu te swAhA// khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags po// oM bi krita
294a8(rgyud): daM Sh+NA/ a mo g+ha sa mA ye/ a bi Shin tsA man/ sarba bid d+yaM/ oM mo g+ha a bi shi ka hUM/ mi li mi li swA hA// khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// de nas 'phas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang /
294b1(rgyud): phyug gis don yod pa'i gsang sngags chen po gsungs ma thag tu de nas ri chen po ta la rnam pa drug du rab du g.yo bar brtsams te/ klu'i tshogs ni 'khrug so// lha'i tshogs thams cad
294b2(rgyud): ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bgegs dang / log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to// bdug la sogs pa sdang ba ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ngan song gi sdug bsngal
294b3(rgyud): thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thas cad ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba thas cad dang / gdon thos cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// nang tham can ni
294b4(rgyud): rab tu zhi'o// rim thams cad las ni rnam pa grol lo nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thas cad las ni yongasu grol lo// me tog gi tshar chen po rab tu phab ste// de bzhin gshegs pa la
294b5(rgyud): mchod par gyur to// sems can ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu grol lo// de nas dus gsuM gsheg pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i lha
294b6(rgyud): rnam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs byug la tshig gcig du legs so zhes byin te/ legs so lags so// snying rje chen
294b7(rgyud): po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig gcig dang / snying po dang / khro
294b8(rgyud): bo'i de kho ni nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor du smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
295a1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshes pa'i spyan sngar bshad
295a2(rgyud): do// dkyil khor gru bzhi pa shin du mdzes pa ko pa la'i tshad tsam shin du rnam par 'byes pa'i grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them smras bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i
295a3(rgyud): kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam par dag kyang byas te/ mtshon rtsi nam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa'i thig skad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdabs par bya'o//
295a4(rgyud): ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang / pi ra gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o// dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba/ dbus su legs par rnam phye la/
295a5(rgyud): kun nas pad ma'i rnam phye dang / rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbus su 'khor lo rtag bri ba// shin du lta sdug 'khor lo dgod/ dbus de ra rgyal ba bzhag bya ba/ shAkya'i rgyal
295a6(rgyud): bo de bzhin gshegs/ g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po'i// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po// g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin bzhag la/ rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs bzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'di zer
295a7(rgyud): dang ldan par bya ba ni/ ljags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta lu gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo// 'phags pa sbyar
295a8(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og du dkar sham chen po dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen po ral pa dang / dbyung ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu sbyin
295b1(rgyud): khrag gi stong yongasu 'dzin pa
295b2(rgyud): mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni/ mche ba 'jig su rung zhing mi sdug pa/ sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra ste ste/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig
295b3(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo tse to nas 'dzin pa dang / \u0f7fglang po che'i lpags pa blon pa'i stod g.yogs 'tshang ba dang / smad g.yogs
295b4(rgyud): can no// mtha'i grwar pad ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ni 'ba'i 'breng ba can shin du bzang po bzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig/ de'i sku 'bar ba'i zeng ba can
295b5(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pad ma
295b6(rgyud): chen po'i rig 'dzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni/ phyag na pad+ma thogs par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po rtse mo zhes bya ba'i tshogs rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na thogs pa'o//
295b7(rgyud): de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu gur gum dang / tha rtsi dang / ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i chu bum pa bkang ba la/ ras kar pos bkris shing / brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po
295b8(rgyud): sna bdun rtag tu bzhag par bya'o// ci snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par
295b9(rgyud): brgyan par bya'o// bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o// ji srid 'jug pa'i bar du slob ma rnams tshe
296a1(rgyud): gas srungs la/ de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing / don yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba tsam
296a2(rgyud): gyis kyang dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
296a3(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ don yod pa'i zhags bzung bar pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// gang bsams
296a4(rgyud): ba dang / gang bcol ba de dag thams cad 'byor par 'gyu ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad/ de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rje su zhugs par 'gyur/
296a5(rgyud): dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang bdug pa dang / las sgrib pa thams cad las
296a6(rgyud): rnam par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thums cad dang ldan par 'gyuraro// lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / rigs sngags 'chang
296a7(rgyud): gi gnas phyag dri me med pa dang / na mkha'i rjesu rgyu ba dang / nags dang skyed mo tshal na spyod pa'i sngags 'chang gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang bar
296a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'i yi mngag zhug par 'gyu ro// gang zhig 'di kyi la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin/
296a9(rgyud): dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sem pa de dag thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas
296b1(rgyud): dang / lus med pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ sdig pa rnams 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po// sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam bya ste/ shin du
296b2(rgyud): mdzes pa/ shin du tshad dang ldan pa zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/
296b3(rgyud): zla ba dbu la thogs pa zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs/ zhal cung zad 'dzum pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ pad ma 'dzin
296b4(rgyud): pa ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma/ me tog dbul ba/ brgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// g.yon du lha mo rigs
296b5(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rigs sngags 'chang pus
296b6(rgyud): mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog dang bgrang phreng thogs ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'o// gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing /
296b7(rgyud): gyis de'i steng du khro bo'o rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de mgul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyuraro//
296b8(rgyud): 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshigs 'byin par 'gyur// legs so zhes bya ba byin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi 'or 'jog par 'gyur yid la bsam pa dang /
296b9(rgyud): mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs sngags 'chang de yang bdag nyid la 'bar bar 'gyur// nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / don
296b10(rgyud): rgya gur guM gyis mchod pa bya'o//
297a1(rgyud): gnas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon gyi tshe rangs rjes su dran par 'gyuraro// rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas
297a2(rgyud): pa rnams dpung du 'gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ci srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// gcod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro
297a3(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po'i dbul bcings na/ nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i
297a4(rgyud): rgyal po// bam po// de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam
297a5(rgyud): mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur stir mngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
297a6(rgyud): brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ phyag 'tshal te song nas/
297a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
297a8(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa sran ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so// me tog dang / bdag spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
297b1(rgyud): gos dang / brgyan dang / lhang lhub dang / sil snyen dang / pheg slob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas lan gsum skor ba byas so// ri bo ta la'i gzhal med khang na
297b2(rgyud): gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyil
297b3(rgyud): gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so// 'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod par byaso// lhan cig gnas pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang / mngon du stong pa dang /
297b4(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yud tsam cig cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje 'gying bag dang /
297b5(rgyud): brjid bag 'gros kyi langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su song ste/ phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
297b6(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
297b7(rgyud): 'das 'phags pa sran ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i
297b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin du zab pa/ shin du rtogs par dka'/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa ri rab chen po ltar shin du mi g.yo zhing mi skul ba/
297'a1(rgyud): yod pa yangs par snang ba dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhe bya ba'i rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor lo sbyar bar 'gyur ro// /
297'a2(rgyud): rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor lo sbyar ba brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i skal khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
297'a3(rgyud): bdun bcu rtsa gnyi su 'gyuraro// skal pa'i mjug rdzogs te nyid mtshan mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can du 'jig
297'a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di gzhan med khang gis rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur zhing / tshe'i tshad skal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i
297'a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i grub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod
297'a6(rgyud): brgyad stong bya'o// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par
297'a7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang / bzhad gad dang / pur
297'a8(rgyud): pas gdabs pa dang / bsreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / bsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang /
297'a9(rgyud): mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor rgyur smra ba dang / sa bzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / na mkha' la gro ba dang / chu rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / drug
297'b1(rgyud): dang / mtshon las rgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po skyed pa dang / ro langs pa slang ba dang /
297'b2(rgyud): shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro//
297'b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dgugs pa dang // 'byung po 'gags pa dang / kA dang lga 'gegs pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bya mo 'gugs pa dang /
297'b4(rgyud): stong pa dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyu ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
297'b5(rgyud): glags tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / bsgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmigs tshegs dang / 'thab
297'b6(rgyud): pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir ldog par 'gyu ro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog du 'grub par 'gyur ste/ skal pa ngan
297'b7(rgyud): pa dang / nor chud za ba dang / mi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdigs pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog du 'grub
297'b8(rgyud): pa'i snod khro bo'i zhags la bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgya byas na/ sngon brtsams pa'i bsdod nams dang / skal pa mngon du 'gyur/ tshe'i mthar thug
297'b9(rgyud): gi bar du dpa' chen po dang / che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// zhal du ltas ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// byed pa'i
298a1(rgyud): mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin du bzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang ba dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub
298a2(rgyud): pa mang po dang / ri mo sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mang po dang / 'phags pa spu ni ras
298a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa/ klags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog du ya mtshan du gyur na/
298a4(rgyud): ji ltar sgrub par rngo thog/ ji ltar nges par bzung ba rngo thog lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras
298a5(rgyud): kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil
298a6(rgyud): dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshigs dang / khrus dang / snang ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang /
298a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod dang / sbyin bsreg dang / slar gshegasu gsol ba dang / nges par bzung ba dang / dran par bgyi ba ji ltar rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen
298a8(rgyud): pos sems can gyi spod pa rmugs par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen
298b1(rgyud): ma'am/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/ rmang rigs kyi rigs sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i
298b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di nges par bzung bar bgyi bar ji ltar rngo thog/ rig sngags 'tshang de rnams kyis ji ltar sgrub par rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya
298b3(rgyud): mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tshom gcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol// bcom ldan 'das the tshom gcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol// /
298b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje dngos grub gyis srod
298b5(rgyud): pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po// sgrub pa sgrub pa gang gi tshe/ dngos grub gyis dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe// glo chen po'i chen por 'gos par 'gyur//
298b6(rgyud): dngos grub chen po'i chen po grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po skye bar 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol tu
298b7(rgyud): phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen thob par 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis sgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur
298b8(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyis byang chub kyi sa bon gyis 'bras bu
299a1(rgyud): thob pa yod pa de ltar lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog du 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong
299a2(rgyud): dam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs saM/ dmang rigs so/ gzhan gang
299a3(rgyud): yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring srel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig thob par 'gyur la//
299a4(rgyud): des ring srel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste/ nyin cig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrus la sogs pa byed cing / bdug pa dang / dri dang /
299a5(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis mchod par byed na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos
299a6(rgyud): grub dam pa dang / mchog dang bla na med par 'gyuraro// gang dang gang du dgos pa sbyar ba/ de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog du 'gyur ro// ring srel yungs kar
299a7(rgyud): gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs so/ rje'u'i rigs dang / rlangs
299a8(rgyud): rigs so/ gzhan bud med dam/ skyes pa dang / khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i klung
299b1(rgyud): gi bye ma dang / mnyam pa la sacig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// rjed pa dang / gus pa dang / spyod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur//
299b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung nas bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
299b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong dam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang
299b4(rgyud): su yang rung ba dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs so/ rje'u'i rigs saM/ dmangs rigs saM/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de
299b5(rgyud): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung snyan par 'gyu ro// shes rab dang /
299b6(rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil
299b7(rgyud): 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// byang chub sems dpa' thos
299b8(rgyud): cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib po'i rgyal po'i chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa thob par
300a1(rgyud): / 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje de ltar ring srel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pas rnam par 'khrul
300a2(rgyud): pa'i byin gyis brlabs gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la/ byang chub
300a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
300a4(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
300a5(rgyud): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der log su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub
300a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang /
300a7(rgyud): gdong khro gnyer med pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mdun du 'dug nas/ rdo rje gsor
300a8(rgyud): zhing gdong du bltas te/ rtog cing 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag
300b1(rgyud): na rdo rje la 'di skad ces spraso// lagan rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug ste/ rdo rje gsor zhing ngal ci zhig lta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs
300b2(rgyud): par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje la spros shig/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis skabs phye na/ yongasu dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung stan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//
300b3(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sran ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//
300b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo rtogs par dka' ba/ shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par
300b5(rgyud): thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa'i yongs su smras pa 'di bcom
300b6(rgyud): ldan 'das ji ltar nges par bzung bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba na gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sab pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam par
300b7(rgyud): gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang // sgrub pa'i tshe
300b8(rgyud): ga dang / dam tshig so so tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo//
301a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por rim pa'i phye te/ rjes su bzung ba de nges par bzung ba
301a2(rgyud): ci nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tshom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thug rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// ji ltar smra'u na phyag rgya gsang sngag dang bcas pa'i
301a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par bzung ba 'gyur ba the tshom cad pa'i sradu sem dpa' chen po bka' stsal du gsol// de nas byang chub sem dpa'
301a4(rgyud): sem dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gis// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras// lag na rdo rje yun ji srid gcig nas slob pa gang zhig skyes te/
301a5(rgyud): nga la yongasu 'dri/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// gang yang phyog bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing // tham cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pu/ chos cig lnga bzhug pa/ dbyings
301a6(rgyud): dang / khams dang / snying so gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'o// gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
301a7(rgyud): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshog pa
301a8(rgyud): nad dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa rnam pa snga rdzogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshog pa zhi dang / rgan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang
301b1(rgyud): chub sem dpa' sna tshogs pa zhing dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par sheso// de lta mod kyis lag na rdo rjes de bzhin du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
301b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa/ byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid de thams cad du rjes
301b3(rgyud): 'gro'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i tinge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongasu smin par
301b4(rgyud): byed pa'i gnas bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rje su thob cing / de lta de ltar bsam pa dag par thob par 'gyur ro// de lta
301b5(rgyud): de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par thob par 'gyu ro// de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro//
301b6(rgyud): de lta de ltar byang chub sem dpa' yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lte bu'i ti nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pa 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang / ting 'dzin yongasu dag pa
301b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// rdo rje lta bu'i ti nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan rtse mo dpung brgyan gyi ting 'dzin dang / non meng ba bong ba'i ting
301b8(rgyud): dang / spyan ras gzig dbang phyug ting 'dzin dang / rnam par mthongar ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab du 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba yongs pa'i tinge 'dzin dang / stob dgong ba'i tingange 'dzin dang /
302a1(rgyud): @#chos rnam par lta ba'i ting 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang dri ma med ba'i byung gnas kyi ting 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting 'dzin dag/ nyis
302a2(rgyud): rab tu grol ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting 'jim dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ti nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron me'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs
302a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spyi rtsug la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / yulas rnam pa 'phrul pa'i kun du bkod pa'i ting 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chag pa med pa'i phyir mi ldog
302a4(rgyud): pa'i 'byung gan gyi ting 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzog pa'i ti nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ti nge 'dzin dang / shin du rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin dang / 'gro ba yongasu dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / nyi ma
302a5(rgyud): kun tu lta ba'i ti 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'jom pa'i ti nge 'dzin dang / kun du phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i tingange 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phya rgya'i mtshan nyid
302a6(rgyud): la kun du lta ba zhes bya'i tingange 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongasu dag par 'dzin pa'i tingange 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting 'dzin dang / pang ma bkod pa'i nying 'dzin dang / don yod pa kun du blta
302a7(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / don yor pa dri ma med pa'i ting dang / kun du don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin dang / brgya chen por dbug 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i tingange 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan
302a8(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ti nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lhag kyu'i ting 'dzin dang /
302b1(rgyud): pad ma khrug kyu'i tingange 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lhag gyur ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dres pa'i lcag kyu'i ting 'dzin dang / don yong ba'i 'od zer gyi lug kyu'i ting 'dzin dang / kun
302b2(rgyud): du lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ti nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa dri ma med pa'i thob pa'i ting 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba rab tu gsal ba zhes bya'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa tham cad yongasu rdzog pa'i ting 'dzin
302b3(rgyud): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyur te/ tinge 'dzin re re yang 'khor bye ba brgya stongs phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa tham cad rjesu thob par
302b4(rgyud): 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa'i de 'byin gyis rlab kyis kyang / don yong ba'i zhag pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / brjod pa dang / bsgrubs pa dang /
302b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i cing bas yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum
302b6(rgyud): mtshan lan gsum dran par byed na/ lag na rdo rje sem can de dngos grub don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phrul pa'i don yod pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa lta ba don yod
302b7(rgyud): pa dang / gcung don yad pa thob pa dang / ting 'dzin don yod pa thob pa dang / bas nas rtsig pa don yod pa thob pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa dor yod pa dang /
302b8(rgyud): byang chub sem dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i byin gyis rlab kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug yong su rdzog pa don yod pa dang
303a1(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba don yod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnasu 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo
303a2(rgyud): brgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phel ba don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongasu rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
303a3(rgyud): pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro dang / bla ma dang / gus par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du bdags
303a4(rgyud): par mdzad na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs par skye bar 'gyur// sems 'khrugs par 'gyur/ dran pa dang / blo gros rmongs
303a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur te// de'i gnas ni mi snang na/ su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang
303a6(rgyud): yin pa de don yod pa'i zhag pa'i ming du dmigaso// byang chub sem dpa' rnam kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhag pa'i
303a7(rgyud): ming du dmigs// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzir byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa te/
303a8(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i don gang yin pa de der yod pa'i zhag pa'o// yis gang yin pa de zhag pa'o// de'i snying po'o// snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub
303b1(rgyud): sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhag pa'i ming du dmigaso// gang yid la sem dpa' dang / gang don du gnod
303b2(rgyud): ba de tham cad 'dren par 'gyur// 'gag par 'gyur// len par 'gyur ste/ shin du ring po nas ye shes kyi zhag pas 'gug par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de bas na/ don yod
303b3(rgyud): ba'i zhag pa'i snying po ming du dmigaso// lag na rdo rje gang gis ti nge 'dzin thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te/ gnas 'di ni
303b4(rgyud): mi sna // lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzud kyi sgo du ma thob ste/ gang gis gzung thob pa des/ don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yi gsang sngag 'don
303b5(rgyud): pa dang / gsang sngag rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha don nyid du gnas ste/ tham cad so so yang dag par sheso// 'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i brgya mtsho zhes
303b6(rgyud): bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa'i pad ma'i lcug kyu zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa'i rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod par rnam par snang
303b7(rgyud): mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa'i lhan pa'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad ma zhes bya ba'i gzung
303b8(rgyud): dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od
304a1(rgyud): zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rab
304a2(rgyud): tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa yangs par snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i dngas grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / dor yod
304a3(rgyud): ba'i dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yang ba 'bar ba'i phya rgya zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / don yod pa'i
304a4(rgyud): nyi ming snying po zhes bya ba'i gzung dang / de bzhin gshegs dang / byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzung thob ste/ gang gi bzung
304a5(rgyud): de rnam thob pa tsam gyis/ don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po byang chub sem dpa' tham cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rbaM par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phya rgya dang / bsang sngag
304a6(rgyud): rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha don du gan shing / tham cad so sor yang dag par shes te/
304a7(rgyud): gang gis mthu 'di rab du thob pa la/ rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa rnams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa chug par mi 'gyur// dran pa
304a8(rgyud): 'khrul par mi 'gyur// dran pa mi rtag par mi 'gyur// dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyu ro// 'dod chag dang // zhes sdud dang / gti mug dang / da rgyal dang // ser sna
304b1(rgyud): dang / zla dog gi rje su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sgrib pa phan du mi 'gyur// dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur// dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba skyed
304b2(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur// rtag tu blo yang shing / rab tu gsal bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i dran dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur//
304b3(rgyud): rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho bsag pa lta bur 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po'i gzud kyi cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po de ltar go skabs
304b4(rgyud): yang ba la/ gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa dang / lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par mi 'gyur// bzhin yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus
304b5(rgyud): yong su dag pa dang / yid yong su dag pa dang / sem yong su dag pa dang / dmangs yong su dag pa dang / mig yongasu dag pa dang / rna ba yong su dag pa dang / sna
304b6(rgyud): yong su dag pa dang / lce yong su dag pa dang / dbang po yong su dag pa thob par 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po'i 'di klags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa
304b7(rgyud): tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis de rnam yon tan gyi phan yon chen po 'di thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la
304b8(rgyud): lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur// de lta mod kyi lag ni rdo rje yud tsam gcig stong cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus
305a1(rgyud): / ji ltar mngon sum du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o// don yod bzhag pa'i snying po'i byang chub sem dpa' tham
305a2(rgyud): cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstan par bya'o// de nas gnod
305a3(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi drung nas/ don yod pa'i yon tan bkod
305a4(rgyud): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ti nge 'dzin 'di dag dang / gzud kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid
305a5(rgyud): bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sem shin tu sbyangs pas/ ya drasu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par
305a6(rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dag pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / sam nid gyur pa dang / bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gan par bgyi'o//
305a7(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po'i
305a8(rgyud): muthu yis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mchog du rnyed par dka'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpe na chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phags
305b1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gcig dbang phyug la/ dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyis dga' bar phul nas/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ste/ lan
305b2(rgyud): gsum du skor ba byas nas/ song ste ched du rjed pa ched du brjod cing / 'gying bag dang / brjid bag 'gros kyis song nas/ rang gi snyan la 'dug ste/ bzhin 'dzum
305b3(rgyud): pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal du bltas nas/ snying yo su dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug// de nas byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa'
305b4(rgyud): chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pas/ dmig pas sem can bsgral ba'i
305b5(rgyud): phyir/ 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyog bcu'i de bzhin gsheg pa tham cad la phul te/ nam mkha' la 'phang so// byang chub sems dpa' sem
305b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phag rab spyan ras gzi gis/ nor bu rin po che chen po de nam mkha'i dkyil nu 'phangs ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher
305b7(rgyud): g.yos par gyur to// 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po ni ma bye ba brgya steng bas lhag pa'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sem can tham cad/
305b8(rgyud): lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thas cad dang / dmyal ba thams cad dang / yid dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan sang du 'grob las
306a1(rgyud): yongasu grol bar gyur te/ gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang / dmyal ba de dag pa yang / snang ba des snang bar gyur pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba
306a2(rgyud): rnam kyis rtsub pa med par gyur te/ sem can de dag kyang yongasu thar nas/ bde ba can du 'jig rten gyi khamasu skal pa mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongasu dag
306a3(rgyud): bar gyur to// gang yang mnar med pa la thug pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas/ dmyal ba de dag thams cad du ba
306a4(rgyud): mi'i mtsho 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / sem can de dag kyang yongasu thar nas/ brgyan tham cad kyi yongasu brgya nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su skal pa mnyam
306a5(rgyud): par pa me la rdzu te skyeso// grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tham cad
306a6(rgyud): kyang bsil bar gyur cing / reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dag par gyur to// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i ri dag dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / ka sbrang dag kyang 'od zer
306a7(rgyud): des reg pas/ dung gro'i skye gan su song ba de dag tham cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso// sem can gang dag bcing bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer nges reg pas/ sem
306a8(rgyud): can rnam bcing pa las yongasu grol bar gyur to// su mi 'dod pa dang / lcag sgrog dang / lcag kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur gyur te/ gang snod ma yin pa
306b1(rgyud): yang 'od zer des reg pas mthong bas yongasu dga' ba thob po// gang sha bkra dang mdze nad kyi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sA ma chang ba yang 'od zer des phog
306b2(rgyud): bas lus yong su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongasu dag par gyu to// gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa yongasu skam par gyur pa yang / 'od zer des
306b3(rgyud): reg pas me tog dang 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu 'byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtog pa gang du 'od zer bab par sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtog pa de na yang / sangs
306b4(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing du sa sa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khri brgya ste nga phrag gang ga'i glang gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgur
306b5(rgyud): bzhags// de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin pa che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng ge'i khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar gyur to//
306b6(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil gang du'od zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam kha'i dkyil der yang / phyog bcu rnam pa kun tu rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin gyi sprin rtse ga pas kheng par gyur te/ lha rdzas
306b7(rgyud): kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpu rgyan dang / gdub bu dang / do shal dang / sa ma do dang / rna brgyan dang / gser gyi
306b8(rgyud): skung ba sna tshags kyi char rang du phab po// tshen kha rog rnam pa sna chog pa'i lha rdzas gyi gos mang byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rang du phab bo// bla rdzas kyi dri sna chos kyi char rab tu bcab/
307a1(rgyud): / lga rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu bab bo// sgra rdzas kyi bdug pa sna chog dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu phab po// tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i
307a2(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi gos dang / ba dan sna tshog gyi char rab tu phab po/ b+ha rdzas kyi me tog sna cho gA pad ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / b+hi ri shi ka dang /
307a3(rgyud): tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi mug ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / smra snar dang / ka da ma pa dang / man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu pha ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
307a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi yang khang pa rtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/
307a5(rgyud): gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ shin du 'bar ga lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan gyis yongasu skor cing / mu tig gi dra ba sna tshog gyis brgyan pa/ gser
307a6(rgyud): gyi gol bu sna chog 'phyang gagos sna tshog kyi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu shing kyi rgyal mtshan sna chog sgreng gnor bu rin po che sna tshog bkram pa/ grwar lga rdzas
307a7(rgyud): kyi rnga yab sna tshog kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo // nam mkha' dkyil na yang lha rdzas kyi
307a8(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug sbas dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol ma'i sgra sna tshog dang /
307b1(rgyud): sil sman dang / thes rngub pas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul la mchod pa byed cing 'khod do// de ltar rngan yang ba'i tshe 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlas
307b2(rgyud): kyis rmang du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu ston cing / ya mtshan rmang du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sngar stan to// de nas byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po
307b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi
307b4(rgyud): stan las la ngos te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la
307b5(rgyud): mngon du ltas te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo gsams pa'i lgang sa la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs thal ma sbyar ba btud nas/
307b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don yod pa zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sem
307b7(rgyud): dpa' tham cad gyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ga gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ga ri sdug kyi rgyal ba chen po// bdag gi snying
307b8(rgyud): be gsang ba/ rig sdug kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lugs kyu dang / ngan yang ba'i khro bo lpags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren gnor bu rin pa
308a1(rgyud): / 1tshe gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongasu skrag par bgyi'o// gang gis
308a2(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par
308a3(rgyud): mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ tha ma cang so so nyid du gnaso// gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas tham cad 'dun na gan so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
308a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzig
308a5(rgyud): dbang phyug gis snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lkug kyu smras pa leg so leg so// rigs sngag 'chang tham cad kyi don dang / sem can tham cad kyi don
308a6(rgyud): chen po'i phyir/ sem can dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab por shes na smros shig/ de nas byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzis
308a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skul bar rig nas/ bzhin 'dzum zhing mis mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de mag su mngon du phyog te/ bcom ldan 'das
308a8(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa span ras gzig dbang phyug gis snying po'i lcag kyi don yod pa'i zhag pa swAs so// dus gsum du gshegs
308b1(rgyud): shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sem dpa' tham cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang ba chen
308b2(rgyud): ba 'khor gyi cho ga dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngag kyi lha tham cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib ma thas cad la phyag 'tshal//
308b3(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags 'byam pa la sogs pa dga'
308b4(rgyud): ldan gyi byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi cho ga la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i
308b5(rgyud): byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tsha lo// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshes
308b6(rgyud): pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngag dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa tham cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
308b7(rgyud): 'tshalo// byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor tham cad kyi sku/
308b8(rgyud): sem can tham cad la byam pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sdig kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// bgeg dang log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sog pa tham
309a1(rgyud): // cad rad da zhi bar mdzad pa'i sem dpa' chen po mchog sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ o a ka sha ya/ pad ma hasta/ maha a mo g+ha/ ang ku shI/
309a2(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ san tsa re/ sa man tre na/ ma ha pa sha/ ang gu sha/ b+hu dza ba ra da/ b+hu dza ang ku sha/ pa sha da ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man tA mu tra/ man tra/ man Da la pa Ta ga d+ha ra ad ku sha
309a3(rgyud): bA she nAd d+ha ra ya hUM hUM/ ma hA shram b+ha be sha d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha ru pa/ ang ku sha d+ha ra/ ta ra ha ra ta ra san tA ra ya/ ma hA mung dra man Da la/ a ma g+ha/ ang ku sha ba ra da/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka/
309a4(rgyud): tri lo tsa na/ kha shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ i shwa ra/ ma he sha ra/ ba ra ma ka ru Ni ka/ ma ha bu twe shwa ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ na ma s+thi ta/ ku ma ra/ ku bI re/ tre log kya ba ra d+ha/ d+ha ma ka sha ma ta/
309a5(rgyud): sha sa ka ra k+Sha ka/ ma ha byid N+ya/ a mo ga man DA la pu dzi ta/ rang na ma ku ta/ ma la d+ha ra/ d+hA ru hu ru/ ma hA ang ku sha/ a ga Sha/ d+ha ra/ hUM hAM/ b+ha ra b+hA ra/ sam b+ha ra/ sa man tra mu tra/
309a6(rgyud): man tra man Da/ la ma pu ra ya/ hUM hUM/ hrid ya ang ku shi/ a ba lo ka ya/ mAn sad+d+ha yi sad d+hing / a kar sha ya/ mung drA man tra man Da la/ pa tA la/ sa ma ya/ big sbyin pa sa da ra ya/
309a7(rgyud): ma raH/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba pas ki la bi tra ma la/ mang sa d+ya/ hu ru hu ru/ mahA ang ku shi/ hUM hUM/ b+hud d+ha b+hud d+ha/ b+ho d+ha ya b+ho d+ha ye/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA b+ho d+hi sad ta/ ang ku shaM/ rang na pa6
309a8(rgyud): rna ra/ nan b+hid tra tsing tA a b+ha ra ti b+hI bu shid ta/ a mikab+h+ri dza na/ ma hA ku tra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad ma spa sha ang ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bid d+hA man tA/ mu tra man ta la pra ba ra/ sang+ga ya
309b1(rgyud): sa d+ha ga bi sha ru ba d+ha ra/ sa ha sa b+hu dza sa ha sa ned tra/ soT mya mu kha ba ra ma ku ru Ni ka/ sad ta sa la sarba man/ tra mud tra pra sa d+hag+ha/ ma hA ba ra da tra na ma sta ste/ a mo g+ha ang /
309b2(rgyud): gu sha/ pad ma b+hu dza swA hA// byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'di smras ma thag tu ri bo ta la chen po stong phrag dang / nas tshal
309b3(rgyud): dang / skyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po phab po// don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po// byang chub
309b4(rgyud): sem dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sdug dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khar rim par phye ba'i tshe ga zhi ba mo 'di yang se sar
309b5(rgyud): le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnaso// gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru dang gser la be dUr+yas yi ge ra bris pa na sbyin gyi rim par snang ste/ yi ge'i phreng
309b6(rgyud): ba mnam zhing / gsal la zur phyin par bris la/ thig gi phreng ba gshi bA par brgyan par snang // gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang pad mi'i nang nas byung ga phyag rgya bcing ba
309b7(rgyud): sna tshog 'od zer 'bar ba na mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rgyan rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma la rab tu gnas ga/ namakha' la gnas par gyur to// gang ngas
309b8(rgyud): kyi ri mo sku gzug rnam pa sna tshog 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba cho ga dang yo byad dang bcas pa/ rim par phye ba bris pa yang na mkha' la gan so// gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de/
310a1(rgyud): @/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshog gru bzhi pa/ gru bzhi cha mnyam pa rnam par phye ba dkyil 'khor shin du spras shing / brgyan pa gzugs rnam pa sna tshog gyis
310a2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang na mkha' la gnas so// dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngag kyi lha pho nya mo dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes rgyu ba dag kyang
310a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// phyog so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya sdod gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / phyog
310a4(rgyud): bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku bzhug par gyur to// de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku de dag tham cad kyang // byang chub sem dpa' sam dpa' chen po 'phags
310a5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg se zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legaso leg so// rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa don yod pa'i lcag kyu'i rig sngags
310a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa gang gis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo gsang sngag dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sdug
310a7(rgyud): rim par phye ba de thams cad don yod pa'i lcag kyu'i gsang sngag kyi zhag pas kun nas drang so// 'khor 'di yi nang na na mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi mi'i dus na/ ris kyi bu
310a8(rgyud): 'am/ rig kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge snyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs/
310b1(rgyud): gzhan gang yang ga bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu ma rig 'dzin pa tham cad kyis phyag byas pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i rnam par thar
310b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad so sor de la kha don nyid du gnas// de dag thams cad rim kyis dran
310b3(rgyud): pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsag pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro// nam yang bro dpan par mi
310b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / nam yang rjed ngas par mi 'gyuraro// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phags pa spun ras gzig dbang
310b5(rgyud): phyug la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad mo mchog du snying rje can khyod kyis mchog rgya chen po smras pa legs lag so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
310b6(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas/ dbug phyin par 'gyur zhing / mchog du dga' ba thob po// de nas
310b7(rgyud): byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
310b8(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
311a1(rgyud): @phyug gi snying pa don tu yod pa'i zhag pa/ byang chub sem dpa' tham cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub par 'chal ba dang / gang
311a2(rgyud): yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/
311a3(rgyud): dmang rigs ma/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu ma ngon yang pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog par mtshal ba dang / bstan par 'chal ba dang /
311a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub par 'tshal ba des/ sngon pha rol du phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyog su kha
311a5(rgyud): lhas te/ mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcug kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par ba gyi zhing / yang thal mo spang te phyag bgyi'o// de dran pa tsam gyis med la byang chub
311a6(rgyud): sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs da bang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri bo ta pa'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang /
311a7(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bcas pa bkug par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i chog
311a8(rgyud): zhib mo'i rgyal ba/ bam po// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// byang chub sem dpa' tham cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya
311b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ gsang sngag rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' dge rdzogs pa 'di yang dgug par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rig sngags
311b2(rgyud): kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur bas/ dngos grub dam pa rje su rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
311b3(rgyud): snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin du rgya chen yid la bgyis pa de ltar 'grub par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyen zhing
311b4(rgyud): rgya che ba dang blo dang 'dangs dri ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mong la lce pad ming 'dab ma lta bur 'dzam par 'gyur te/ kha nas ud pa li'
311b5(rgyud): dri 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang / tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang /
311b6(rgyud): dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangasu 'gyur zhing / ka la ping ki'i dbyangasu 'gyur ro// ci ste dus gsum du lan gsum par dran par bgyid na/ bsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil
311b7(rgyud): 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs spying dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / spyod par 'gyur//
311b8(rgyud): bgyegs dang / los 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchis pa'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral
312a1(rgyud): @#bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi snying po// rigs sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yong pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam
312a2(rgyud): gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mdado la bdag rang dang / rang gi gnas gyi khang pa dang / slob ma dang / sten bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa migatsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyuraro// yongasu ma
312a3(rgyud): dag pa yang shin du yong su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bcas pa yang shin du dri ma ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang zheng sdad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug
312a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa yang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang 'dod chag dang bral bar 'gyur ro// slob pa dang bcas pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar
312a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bgegs dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis yongasu zin pa yang bgegs dang / lag 'dren dang / bdung la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sem kyi sdig
312a6(rgyud): pa ya sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thun meng ma mchis pa yang thun mong du gyur cing bsrung bar 'gyur ro// mi smra ba'i brtul zhug ma mchis pa yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs
312a7(rgyud): chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ro// srung ba ma byas pa yang srung ba bgyis par 'gyur// rigs sngags kyi gnas dang / yul 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par ma spyod
312a8(rgyud): pa yang tshangs par spyod par chen por 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro// dge ba mi spyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ro// sa mi spyod pa
312b1(rgyud): yang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bsod nams mi bgyid pa yang bsod nams dgying phung pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis pa yang
312b2(rgyud): dul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags ma 'thong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang / dkyil 'khor dang // phyag
312b3(rgyud): rgya dang / gsang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags kyi gnas dang / dkyil 'khor tham cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal
312b4(rgyud): ba yang byang chub dang / chos dang dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsam pa yang byang chub sem dpa' tham cad kyis bsams
312b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du ma gyur pa yang byang chub kyis sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pha rol du phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing / pha rol du phyin pa
312b6(rgyud): drug yong su rdzog par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// tshul khrim dang mi 'bral zhing / ti nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang yongasu gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / sbyin pa
312b7(rgyud): dang yongasu gtong ba dang sbyin pa'i cho ga chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ro// bzod pa dang mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjesu spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral
312b8(rgyud): zhing / brtson 'grus kyi sgo ba chen po'i go cha brtan par bgos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po thob pa dang / ting 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyuro//
313a1(rgyud): / shes rab dang thab la mkhas pas zhan pa'ang / zhes rab dang thab mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// rig sdug dang / gsang sngag rnam pa yang gsang sngag
313a2(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya yongasu 'chang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur// dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang bral ba yang / dge ba'i ga shes gnyen chen po'i lam la gnas pa
313a3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten tham cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / bla mar bgyis par 'gyur sem can tham cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyuraro//
313a4(rgyud): tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// bsam pa yong su dag par 'gyuraro// de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni tham cad du dngos grub don yod pa mchog du
313a5(rgyud): rnyed par dka' ga/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lhag kyus 'dren par bgyidado// dngos grub thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin
313a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i stob bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin nyid
313a7(rgyud): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don ngas pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di 'dren par 'gyuraro// yang par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren
313a8(rgyud): par bgyid do// de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen po rjod pas/ bsod nas kyi 'bras bu chen po brtsol bar bgyi'o// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing // kun du
313b1(rgyud): bsag par bgyis pas/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal ba rngan yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying pa ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags// de nas rig

313b7(rgyud): gzhan gang yang dung ba dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steg bu gru bzhi pa/ shin du rnam par phye ba khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la/ 'phang du sor brgyad gyi tshad tsam kunas

314a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni khru gang gi tshad la gru bzhi pa/ rnam par phye ba/ shin du mdzes pa gru bzhi pa kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o// dbus su pad ma byi ste/
314a2(rgyud): 'dab mya brgyad pa/ 'dab ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing / dbus su snying po ge sar dang bcas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan par bgyi'o// 'od kyi phreng ba zlum po
314a3(rgyud): tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o// snying po dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir lcags kyu dang / zhags pa kun nas zlum po yang bgyi'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor
314a4(rgyud): kun du mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir rnam par 'byes par rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi

314b5(rgyud): bzhag go/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug du sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i sdong bum pa yongasu bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang /

314b8(rgyud): kun du gtong bar bgyi'o// yungs kar dang / dri chab la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor zhing / dkyil 'gro
