315b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du don par bgyi'o// de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas/ gtor
315b6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dbul ba
315b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// ri lu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i dadug spos dbul bar bgyi'o// yung kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la snying po dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o//
315b8(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nam langs kar gya nom pa yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang / rab du dga' bar bgyid par bgyid par g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /
316a1(rgyud): sgra brnyan pa dang / snyan cing mdzes pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab pa dang / ka la bing ka dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar
316a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ k+Sha rig sngags 'chang gis sems brten por bgyi zhing / mchog tu dga' ba yid la bgyis pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor snying po nas
316a3(rgyud): 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing / phyogs mtshams kun du mchis zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ na mkha'i dkyil na brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od
316a4(rgyud): zer gyi gdug su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lha'i tsan dan dang / gor shing sha'i tsad dan
316a5(rgyud): dang / can dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ga pur dang bla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug du dri gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi bdugs spos kyi dri
316a6(rgyud): zhim po sngon ma byung ba rmad du byung ba bai dUr+ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i/ bdugs spos kyi sprin na mkha'i dkyil na gnas par gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug
316a7(rgyud): spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyuraro// de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid rang gis gzugs gis 'byung //
316a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i thor tshugs gyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi pa/ pad ma
316b1(rgyud): dang zhags pa thogs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med pa'i dbu ngargyan can/ dbu brgyan zla ba ches pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin
316b2(rgyud): pa brgyan thams cad gyi brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byed bzang pos brgyan pa/ rang gis 'od gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar ba bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
316b3(rgyud): zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam gyi lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad ma'i sman las langs te/ na mkha' la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can
316b4(rgyud): byams pa'i sems dang snyin rje chen po yid la bgyis pas/ dkyil 'khor kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes
316b5(rgyud): bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so lagaso// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag 'thil shin du bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya phrag stong gi legs pa
316b6(rgyud): brgyan pa'i lag pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas rig sdug
316b7(rgyud): 'chang de na mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lcag kyu rgya chen po 'od zer snang ba bkod pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil
316b8(rgyud): 'khor zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin thob ste/ tingange 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed thob bo// kun tu don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grag pa/
317a1(rgyud): don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs thob
317a2(rgyud): pa'i mod la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par tha
317a3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa kha don nyid du gnaso// gzhan yang pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i rigs
317a4(rgyud): dang / nor bu'i rig dang / glang po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang sngags chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa
317a5(rgyud): gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnaso// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba bye ba khra khrig brgya stong phrag
317a6(rgyud): gang gi'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyi tso bo dang / mchog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spun
317a7(rgyud): ras gzig dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la bgyis pa dang / bsams pa smos shig dang / mchog de thams cad sbyin pa
317a8(rgyud): byed de/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing / mchog yid la byed pa thams cad smra zhing /
317b1(rgyud): mchog yid la byed pa thams cad byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing / 'das pa
317b2(rgyud): dang / ma 'ong pa dang / da ltar byung ba smra'o// lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang / 'jig pa dang / lhag par 'jig pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag cho ga dang /
317b3(rgyud): rang gi dmag cho ga dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / yas kyi nad dang / mi ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / bza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
317b4(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / char ches pa dang / char rkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang /
317b5(rgyud): tshe yongasu zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'geg pa dang / 'grub pa dang / mi 'grub
317b6(rgyud): ba dang / bgeg dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba dang / nad mang ba dang / nad dang / 'bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa
317b7(rgyud): de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal ba dang /
317b8(rgyud): yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
318a1(rgyud): mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / ri dgas dang / byir skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing / de dag gi thabs/
318a2(rgyud): thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro// lhar skyes pa dang / klur skyes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud med dang / skyes pa nyid dang /
318a3(rgyud): rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// bram ze'i ris su skyes pa dang / rgyal rigasu skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skye ba de thams cad smra ba
318a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad ba'i rigasu skye ba sna tshogs pa de thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar
318a5(rgyud): bsams pa'i don de thams cad/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon gsum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zeraro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna
318a6(rgyud): tshogs dang / grub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de la rtsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste/ nor sgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / mig sman gyi dngos grub dang / mi snang
318a7(rgyud): ba dang / mig 'phrul dang / gter smra ba dang / phug du 'jug pa dang / nag su 'jug pa dang / sba ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs spang ba dang / nang
318a8(rgyud): zhi bar bya ba dang / gos thob pa dang / grong thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klung chen po rgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i
318b1(rgyud): dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / 'gugs pa dang / drang ba de thams cad rtsol bar bgyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thos
318b2(rgyud): cad smra zhing thams cad gsol bar bgyid do// de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing / don yod pa'i
318b3(rgyud): zhags pas bcing bar 'gyur ro// don du gnyer ba dang / yid la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin du ring po nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pas bcing nas drangs ste
318b4(rgyud): lag du thob par 'gyuraro// sgrub pa'i mchog gis dngos grub de kho na nyid thams cad grub par snang bar 'gyuraro// rigs sngags 'chang na mkha' la mchi par 'gyu ro//
318b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang du mchi 'tshal ba de dang de thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du gtso bor 'gyur/ thams
318b6(rgyud): cad du mchod par 'gyur ro// ji ste rmi laM mthong bar 'tshal na/ gu gul ldan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas/ nyal kar 'phags pa sban ras gzigs dbang phyug
318b7(rgyud): la 'dug spos phul te nyal na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byed du mthong ba stsol cing / gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba dang /
318b8(rgyud): gang dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog rtsol cing / sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson
319a1(rgyud): @#/ 'grus dang / dmangs 'jug par 'gyuraro// tshangs pa dgug par mtshal zhing mthong bar 'chal na/ de'i tshe shing rga'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya
319a2(rgyud): skyegs ril lur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos phul na/ tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing mchog
319a3(rgyud): thams cad rjesu gsol lo// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thugs gi bar du/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa'i gzugs
319a4(rgyud): cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog brtsol bar 'gyuraro// lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yino zhes mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i
319a5(rgyud): gling ba'i mi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs de thams cad tshangs pa'o zhes
319a6(rgyud): sems par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas par mchod pa'i sprin chen po'i chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshal na
319a7(rgyud): des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye bar sbyin bsregs kyi cho ga bgyis ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa/ shin tu khrus bgyis
319a8(rgyud): pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ s+tha ma dang / shing ar ka'i yam bsreg shing gi me sbar ba la/ gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / spring rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa
319b1(rgyud): sbyin bsreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing / rig sngags 'chang leg so zhes smras so//
319b2(rgyud): sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i 'gags shing / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na/ rig sngags 'chang ci bya/ dgos pa ni ci
319b3(rgyud): zhig yod/ mchog tu ni ci zhig gnyer ba de smros shig dang / thams cad rje su sbyin par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis don gang yin la bsams ste smras pa de thos
319b4(rgyud): cad rtsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang / rje su stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog gtse bo// dgos pa'i las sgrub
319b5(rgyud): pa'i mchog rje su stsal bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma dgos pa/ des
319b6(rgyud): lha'i gnas su mchis la/ lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad ma'i phye ma dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sprin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang /
319b7(rgyud): lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas ga po chen po dgag par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma
319b8(rgyud): bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba mAr gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag cig skung ba bgyis pas/ pad ma sar pa'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra khrag dang /
320a1(rgyud): yung kar dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod bgyis/ dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
320a2(rgyud): ra khrag gi gtor me dang / 'bras thug po che'i chen gyi lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongasu rdzogs par bgyis na/ nag po chen po ma
320a3(rgyud): mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na mchis shing / rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes gsol te/ rig sngags 'chang leg so legaso// sgrub pa'i cho ga bzang
320a4(rgyud): po 'dis bdag yongasu mgu/ rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang / mchog rjesu sbyin par bya'o// mchog 'dod pa thams cad long shig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa'i re
320a5(rgyud): ba de thams cad rjesu sbyin par bgyi'o// khyod la bsrung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i don du/ bdag rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs 'chang gis mchod yo
320a6(rgyud): dang / zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bsam pa de mngon sum du smras pa/ gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'thob cing / thams cad bgying bar 'gyuraro//
320a7(rgyud): dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing / nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu blta zhing sbyor ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa
320a8(rgyud): sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par
320b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do// thams cad rje su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can dgug par 'tshal na/
320b2(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas shin du dri zhim pos dris lus lhag par bsgos la// gang na me tog gi shing ljon
320b3(rgyud): pa der mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bgyis pashin du dri zhim po'i shing gi me sbar la/ pu shel tse dang ta ga ra dang / spang spos dang / yung
320b4(rgyud): kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg lan stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// bla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / tsan dan gyi chus yongasu bsgos pa'i 'bras
320b5(rgyud): yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa sar pa brgya rtsal lo// kar gsum gyi gtor ma kar ba ga phur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsuM
320b6(rgyud): bstsa lo// me tog shin du dri zhim po bstsal bar bgyi zhing / bla rtsi dang / can dan dang / ga bur dang / kun du ru bdag spos stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas las rdzogs pa
320b7(rgyud): dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de/ lha'i gzhal med khang dang / mchi zhing 'dun na mchis ste/ de mthong nas ma 'am/ sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ las
320b8(rgyud): byed pa 'am mngag bzhugs pa 'am/ pho nya mo rnam pa ji lta bur/ ji ltar tshig su brjod pa de smros shig dang / ci ste mar gyur na de'i che bu bzhin du snying nas yongasu skyob
321a1(rgyud): bar bgyid do// nor dang 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang gos dang / rgyan dang / lbab lbub dang / mal chas yongasu skyong bar bgyid do// ci ste
321a2(rgyud): sring mor gyur na ti de'i 'ong spyod thams cad kyis yongasu skyong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas bkug ste/ yongasu long spyod
321a3(rgyud): par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyi do// ci ste chung mar gyur na de dang lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongasu longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang
321a4(rgyud): mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / long spyod stsol bar bgyid do// ro bro ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par da 'phags pa'i long spyod stsol
321a5(rgyud): bar bgyid do// mchogs tu dgra' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i long spyod la yongasu spyod par bgyid do// lha rdzas dri dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
321a6(rgyud): byug pa dang lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub gyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyuraro// nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang bang ba yang su gang zhing mchis
321a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser phye ma dang / shang ka shi la dang / bye ru dang snang ngul rgod dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter
321a8(rgyud): rtsol bar bgyid do// ba glang dang / ma he dang / byugs dang / bran po dang / bran mo rab tu mang po 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// mal chi'i long spyong sna tshog rtsol
321a9(rgyud): dul / sa le sbram da
321b1(rgyud): bar bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi chung mi'i lo spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs 'khor brgya dang / ldan pa nyin cig bzhin du gnas par 'gyuraro// yo byas thams cad bun
321b2(rgyud): sum tshogs pas/ ji srid ma'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// che lha'i lo sbyong thub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyi ste// dkon mchog gsuM
321b3(rgyud): la mchog du gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par 'gyur ro// rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi
321b4(rgyud): zhing sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o// gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe/ rgyal po la bgyid pa bzhin du las thos
321b5(rgyud): cad bgyid de// shin du yongasasu rdzogs kyi bar du/ las la mngon par brtson par 'gyuraro// ci ste mngag bzhug par gyur na/ gnas gang du mngag pa de'i gnas thams
321b6(rgyud): cad du mchis ste/ dpag tshad stong gi pha rol du/ mchi zhing skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid/ 'dren par bgyi do// dpag
321b7(rgyud): tshad stong gi pha rol na bud med 'gug par bgyid cing / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / rta yang 'gag par bgyid/ slar yang gtong bar bgyido//
321b8(rgyud): bag yod pas sgo bar bgyi ba de/ bdag nyid shin du ring po'i yul dang / gnas su phyin par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gnas
322a1(rgyud): su 'dren par bgyid/ der srog gi bar chad du 'gyur bar dgyid// ci ste pho nya mor gyur na/ phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchis ste/
322a2(rgyud): klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten du mchi'o// nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o// mi 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas su
322a3(rgyud): mchi'o// 'byung ba'i gnasu mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya bya ba bgyis nas/ slar yang mchi'o// skad gcig gis dpag tshad stong du mchis zhing slor ska cig gis dpag tshad stong
322a4(rgyud): du thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin nas/ pho nyi bya ba bgyi'o// ji srid sa 'og gi bar du/ 'jug cing slar yang mchi'o// bya ba shin du yongasu rdzogs par bgyis nas/
322a5(rgyud): bag yod pas las thams cad bgyis ste/ nyin cig bzhin du mchod yon dang / rkang pa bkrug brtsal bar bgyi'o// thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba
322a6(rgyud): grub par bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa la/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod
322a7(rgyud): sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing / gnas dben zhing khrug pa mchis par gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma
322a8(rgyud): shin du khrus bgyis pa/ gos gcang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma rtsal bar bgyi'o// shing ka ra bi ribi me sbar la/ yungs kar dang gu
322b1(rgyud): gul dang / ro'i khrag dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po rtsal na/ gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi
322b2(rgyud): gzugs kyis mdun na mchis ste/ rig sngags 'chang mchog slang cig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yino// nga'i las
322b3(rgyud): thams cad byed par yino// nga la mig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo de ltar leg so zhes smras nas/ mi snang bar 'gyuraro//
322b4(rgyud): gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ yungs kar dang / gu gul la yongasu bzlas nas mer gtor na/ der mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// dbyig
322b5(rgyud): rdo rtsol bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyu ro// rtag tu ci bgyid pa'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rireg sngags
322b6(rgyud): 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang /
322b7(rgyud): sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnasu bzhag par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad pa bgyis la/ de'i
322b8(rgyud): mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis la/ gu gul gyi bdug spros stsal/ dkar gsuM gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod yungs
322'a1(rgyud): @kar la bzlas pas/ bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad 'degs par bgyi'o// las yongasu rdzogs pa dang // de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs
322'a2(rgyud): gyis mchi zhing rang gi mdun du mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang / der dgos pa'i rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// thams
322'a3(rgyud): cang du mchi bar 'gyur/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// ci ste srin po dang / srin mo 'gug par 'tshal na/ gu gul dang / ba glang gi sha skam po dang / lhan cig
322'a4(rgyud): bsres pa la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas/ dur khrod du mtshan thog tag bdags na/ srin mo'i gnas thams
322'a5(rgyud): cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang / srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyi bzhin
322'a6(rgyud): 'brang zhing ci srid mtsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// bdugs gcig bzhin du dngul srang khri stsal bar bgyid do// de nas ribasngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye
322'a7(rgyud): bar bgyi ste/ cha gcig ni dkon mchog gsum mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par btang ngo // srin mo rnams la zan dang chod sngon rlon
322'a8(rgyud): gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// des na srin mo 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams shin du mgyog par 'gyur te/
322'b1(rgyud): shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad bsgrub cing / nams kyang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// gtor ma gtsang ma brtsal bar bgyi'o// ci ste sha za dang / sha zi dang dbug
322'b2(rgyud): par 'tshal na/ ba glang gi 'khris pa dang / de'i so ba dang / gu gul dang / shing arga'i 'o mar sbyar ste/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par gyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'bag
322'b3(rgyud): pa'i gtor ma stsal na sha za mo de mchis zhing / rig sngags 'chang gis mdun du mchis te/ ci bgyid pa'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur te/ las thams cad bgyid pa
322'b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol du mchis zhing ska cig gis slar yang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyid/ dus gsum du gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar
322'b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// nyin cig bzhin du gser gyi dong rtse brgya sngas su 'jogs par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par bgyis na phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur// ci ste rgyal po'i btsun mo
322'b6(rgyud): dgug par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po dang / skye tse sa bon dang / ge'u wang dang /
322'b7(rgyud): pad mi 'dab ma dang / rgya tshwa dang / lan tshwa bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas/ phye mi'i rdzas su bgyis la/ yungs kar dang / skye tse'i sa bon dang / sbrang /
322'b8(rgyud): rtsi lhan cig mnyes la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te// rgyal po'i sgo 'am lam gyi gzhi mdo dang / lam po che dang / grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na/ gang der gom
323a1(rgyud): gas/ ra da
323a2(rgyud): pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do// rgyal po'i btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du ci 'gyu ro//
323a3(rgyud): thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid cing / bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang bslangs pa de ster cing / dngul dang / gos dang / brgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang /
323a4(rgyud): gzhon pa dang / 'bru la sogs pa stsol bar bgyi 'o// gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba de bgyid par bgyid do// de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis
323a5(rgyud): mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du dbang bskur ro// de nas bram ze dgug par 'tshal nas/ rig sngags 'chang des nas dang / til dang / 'bras sa lu dang /
323a6(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro// thos
323a7(rgyud): cad du mchod pa bgyi bar 'gyur zhing / bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi dar 'tshal nartil dang / 'bras
323a8(rgyud): thug po che dang / sran ma mud kha dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg bgyi ste/ sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na/ thams cad la
323a9(rgyud): dbang sgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchi ste/ bgyi ba bgyid cing sgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro//
323b1(rgyud): de nas rmangs rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ lan tshwa dang / 'bras sa lu'i phub pa dang / su mu kha'i sa bon dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin
323b2(rgyud): bsreg brgya stong bgyis na/ dmangs rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thas
323b3(rgyud): cad bzlog par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des shing mngar gyi me sbar la sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg brgyad stong
323b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / dgra sta dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phyas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyu ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par
323b5(rgyud): 'tshal na/ shing tsher ma can gyi me sbar ba la/ 'bras yos kar dang kau zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sprin bsreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs
323b6(rgyud): na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlogs par 'gyuraro// g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na/ skye ci'i sa bon dang / gu gul dang / b+hang ga'i sa bon dang / zho
323b7(rgyud): ga chu dang / zhum+bAr dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg bgyed stong bgyis na/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i nad du song ba'i sems can slar bzlog par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du
323b8(rgyud): rgyal ba thob par 'gyuraro// de nas gdon thams cad las thar par bgyid par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des 'dug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyi ste/ kr-I ma ka dang / shing
324a1(rgyud): ngang dang / tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang / mu ra yak+Sha mu ra dang / b+hu ta ke shi mnyam par sbyar/ phug ma dang ni ba la kaM/ khyim bya'i sgong nga'i shun lpag
324a2(rgyud): dang / sbrul lpags dang ni yung rnam gnyis// b+ha na ga'i sa bon sa lang 'khris// nya dang legs par sbyar bgyi ste/ ra'i gcin gyis bsgos pa la// lcags kyu'i gsang
324a3(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa yis// bdug pa de nyid rab tu sbyar// bdug pa dam pa gtso bo 'di// thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi'i gdon// gang dag steng
324a4(rgyud): na gnas pa rnams// bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jigs 'gyur zhing // mi bzang gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs bcu ru ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // sum bcu'i lha dang ri
324a5(rgyud): rab g.yo// gnod sprin srin po'i gnas dag dang // sdang ba'i srog chags chen po'i tshig/ gzhan yang sna tshogs dug bcas pa'i// srogs chags thams cad 'jig 'byung
324a6(rgyud): bad dri tsam gyis ni bsgom pa med// bdug pa 'dis ni bdag byas nas// der ni rims nad mi gnas ste// nyin cig pa'i rims dang ni// nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i
324a7(rgyud): rims// gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug rims// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // ska cig gcig gis gtan nas 'joms// 'phags pa ras gzigs dbang

324b1(rgyud): rab khrid dang
324b2(rgyud): 'joms pa// gang gis mig la bskus pa tsam gyis// gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur ro// ro stod kyi nad 'jom par 'gyur ste// mig la bskus pa tsam gyis de dag zas
324b3(rgyud): cad med par 'gyur te// dgos par mi bya'o// mig gi nad kyi ling tog dang / skya bor gyur pa dang // chu bur can dang / chu zag pa dang / tshag po dang / hang sa ra dza dang / byis pa'i mchis
324b4(rgyud): ma dang / mig tu rme ba byung ba dang / khrag dang / rlung dang / bad kan dang / 'khris pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / 'brum bu dang / g.ya' ba dang / mig skam pa dang / mdongs pa dang /
324b5(rgyud): glad pa na ba dang / glad pa'i gzhogs byed na ba dang / kha nad dang / dpral ba na ba de dag thams cad 'jom par 'gyuraro// mig sman gyis mig la bskas pa tsam gyis/ rims nang
324b6(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / nad thams cad sel ba dang / modo la nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jom par 'gyuraro// de ltar mig sman
324b7(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa dang / bgegs thams cad sel ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed la/ sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed
324b8(rgyud): kha mig sman mchog tu dkon pa// gsad pa la thug pa thar par byed pa/ btson ra nas thar bar byed pa// rgyal po dag gang las 'khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyuraro//
324b9(rgyud): nam mtsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin skyong zhing gnas gdug thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni mig sman mchog yin no// bsam pa ngan cing sdang ba'i sems can dang /
325a1(rgyud): mi ga sman gyi
325a2(rgyud): dgra phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyod pa dag gis mig sman gyis mig la bskus pa mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang /
325a3(rgyud): rlung dang ser ba dang / mkhar mthon po nas g.yang du ltung ba dang / me'i phung po che bo dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig la bskus pa rnams mthong na

325b7(rgyud): bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'dir byis pa bsod pa mi 'gyu ro// sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis/ khyim der dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / na ba thams cad la yongs su grol

326a8(rgyud): dang bcas pa na thams cad du dug med par 'gyur te// dgos pa med par bya'o// nad thams cad dang // mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nang dang / lo nyes thams
326b1(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can dmyal ba la gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa ci
326b2(rgyud): gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyu ro// gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po thob cing / thams cad

326b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / sgrub pa bsgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub pa don yod pa chen po rnam
327a1(rgyud): par 'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi dam tshig grub pa yino// gang gis pad ma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag/
327a2(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / bde bar bsgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi'i thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rje su 'jug pa 'grub pa
327a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / dkyil 'khor 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po'i cho ga dang /
327a4(rgyud): po rdo rje rin po che/ rtse mo'i mchog dang po dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la thams cad rje su zhugs shing / dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams du byin gyis brlabs par
327a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la rjesu brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis/ com ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar

327a7(rgyud): par bzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang dag par rjesu skul bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa
327a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin du
327b1(rgyud): yongasu dag pa yin te/ legs so leg so// rigs sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams da dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal ribs dang / rje'u
327b2(rgyud): rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba shod cig/ de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyis sban ras gzi
327b3(rgyud): dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs grub pa dam tshig gi rje su 'jug par byin gyis brlabaso// ngas kyang de ga byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpe
327b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod 'i

327b8(rgyud): las dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o// pad ma kha bye ba'i dbu su zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang / pad ma gnas
328a1(rgyud): par bya ba ni/ klu mgo'i bdengs ka 'dra ba dang / lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas bad ma'i lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang /
328a2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyi bri'o// pad ma kha bye ba'i phyir rol gyi sgal bu ni/ lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sgal bu bya'o// nad dang byi
328a3(rgyud): bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi sgo brgyan par bya'o// lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o// zla ba yid du 'ong
328a4(rgyud): ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi rgal bu ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi rgang bu ni stegs bu phyag rgya phyag na thogs
328a5(rgyud): ba bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / me tog rnams so// kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi
328a6(rgyud): rol gyi sgal bu ni/ stegs bu sra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi ril gyi sgal bu'i 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyis grar ni/ rgyal po
328a7(rgyud): chen po bzhi go bgos pa lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse cig pa thogs pa// 'bar ba ni nang na bzhugs pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo dkrung byed du bcas
328a8(rgyud): te pad ma'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad bad ma la 'dug pa bri bar
328b1(rgyud): bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su bad mi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni/ shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje// lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje lcag sgrog ma/ byang du
328b2(rgyud): bo nya mo dang / rigs sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni me tog gi stegs bu 'dri bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor
328b3(rgyud): ni kun du lci bas bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nas phyes bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba dang / dar 'dags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod dkang
328b4(rgyud): bas brgyan cing chus bkang ba dang / bdug pa'i snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dri chab dang / mchod yon gyi chab dang / 'bras
328b5(rgyud): dang yon che ba dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi med gyis 'jigs pa med pas brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang / byi ru dang / rin
328b6(rgyud): po che be dur sngon po dang / mar gang dang / pad mar ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan te/ dkyil 'khor kun du dung dang / bil ba dang / rtsa dur ba dang / gser dang /
328b7(rgyud): dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dang
328b8(rgyud): gyi brgyan te bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog zag tu/ ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhags pa dang / bum bu dang / bya ma bum dang / bum pa dang /
329a1(rgyud): d+he gu dang / kham por dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te bzhag go// pog bor dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs
329a2(rgyud): bkram pa dang / phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bdags/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa seng ldeng gi bur ba la sogs pa la gdags pas gzug
329a3(rgyud): par bya/ kun du mar me'i phreng ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan
329a4(rgyud): dang / du rus ka dang / sbri ka rnams kyi bdag pa ga bur dang / bla rtsi bsgos pas bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang / sa la ki ki dang /
329a5(rgyud): kun du bdug pa dngul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos sar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas na sa ma Na Dal gyi las bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i
329a6(rgyud): rigs sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas pa dang / slob ma bzhugs cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya
329a7(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags brjod cing / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rigs sngags chen po ni/ thams cad la sbyar bar bya ni/ 'tshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi
329a8(rgyud): gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad sbyar bar bya'o// sbyin/
329b1(rgyud): bsreg dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegasu gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag bskul
329b2(rgyud): dang / las thams cad rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du de sbyar na/ myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang zhing des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro// bgrang breng dang / 'khrig
329b3(rgyud): ma'i gdu bu dang / srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtsa dur ba dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsres pa dang / rtsa dur ba'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te/ dkyil mo krung
329b4(rgyud): bcas nas las bya zhing / pad ma dang / mchod yon dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad nges par bya'o// don yod pa'i lhag
329b5(rgyud): kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub pa'i mchog dang las thams cad grub pa dang / gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o// gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gabye
329b6(rgyud): su gsolo// gsang sngags gzhan dang bsres par mi bya sde/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' ba cig pu klags pas grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas
329b7(rgyud): thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag
329b8(rgyud): par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yino// don yod pa'i lcag kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rnams par dag cing /
330a1(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi zad pa sngar bsags pa rnams zhig par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang /
330a2(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol du 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ bde ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang / khe don
330a3(rgyud): byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chang ba ni de bzhin gshes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dag
330a4(rgyud): cing gang du 'don pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thams kyis rnam par gzigs shing spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbug 'byin par mdzad cing / dus kun du bla na
330a5(rgyud): med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur// 'dir ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du yin gyi/
330a6(rgyud): gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing / bla ma dang mchos can dang / nor gyis mchod pa dang / sems can kun gyis mchod par
330a7(rgyud): 'os pa ni/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur// nor dang 'bru 'bel ba dang / gos pa dang / gos dang brgyan zla dang / rgyal po dang btsun por bcas
330a8(rgyud): pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyuraro// 'di ngan 'gror
330b1(rgyud): 6wa tham cad kyi lus can shin du bsrungs par 'gyuraro//
330b2(rgyud): yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar dang byams par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
330b3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sdug cing
330b4(rgyud): bzang ba mchog tu ltar 'os par 'gyur ro// dpal gyi rtag tu 'bar zhing shin du rgyas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis
330b5(rgyud): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen
330b6(rgyud): po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog dbul ba dang / ril lu gcig tsam
330b7(rgyud): gyi bdug pa 'bul ba'i sems can de dag ni/ gang gi'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog sna tshogs
330b8(rgyud): kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis zhing re rer yang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi/ de bzhin
330b9(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// bdug pa mang po rim par bye ba'i sprin las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shir shi'i bdug
331a1(rgyud): re ba ro/
331a2(rgyud): pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin rim par bye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyuraro// de la sangs rgyas
331a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad// rigs kyi bu legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni//
331a4(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yino// de dag gis me tog dang bdag pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba chen po yongasu rdzog dang
331a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// bsgrub pa chen po grub par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mthong bar bzhed
331a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu don yod pa/ lcags kyu'i sgrub pa grub par 'gyuraro// tshig bzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzhin 'dzu
331a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// rgyal sgo bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lnga dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhan dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu bsung ba dang sbed pa dang /
331a8(rgyud): skyob pa'i phyir rjes 'brang ba chen por 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing / byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de'i sa phyogs
331a9(rgyud): kyang mchod rten mnyam du sems shing / mchod rten ring srel can du 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir/ sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib
331a10(rgyud): pha rol tu rtse la drug yang su rdzog
331b1(rgyud): na dang bral bar 'gyu
331b2(rgyud): pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /
331b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bla mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba
331b4(rgyud): cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yong su thar par 'gyur ro// 'di nas bde
331b5(rgyud): pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dag gnas de'i phyog su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon
331b6(rgyud): gyi las tshe la yongasu bsags pa de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan
331b7(rgyud): song dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jig rten med par mtha' byang chub la thug gi bar du 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya/
331b8(rgyud): ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa grub pa 'di ni/ sdig pa thams med la sreg par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du dug
331b9(rgyud): thams cad 'phag pa sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya 'i phyir
332a1(rgyud): gang dkyil 'khor chen por lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa yid la re ba thams cad 'bral du yongasu rdzogs pa
332a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bkra shis thams cad bsgrub pa/ bsod nams thams cad bsogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa// sgrub pa yang dag par bya ba'i phyir//
332a3(rgyud): gsang sngags grub pa dang / bzlas brjod grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par grub pa/ pha rol du phyin pa bcu yongasu rdzogs pa/ de kho
332a4(rgyud): na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya'i bsod nams chen po mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// nam byang chub yang dag par thob
332a5(rgyud): kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni/
332a6(rgyud): phyes ngan 'gro'i gnasu mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad
332a7(rgyud): rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi bzad pa rnams las thar par
332a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun du bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dkon pa lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyuraro// bkren pa yang longs spyod dang phyug po mtshung
332b1(rgyud): pa med pa'i mchog tu mod la thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal thob par 'gyuraro// 'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyuraro// rgyal po rnams kyi bla mar bya zhing / rtag tu dus
332b2(rgyud): thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro// dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / rtag tu dbang
332b3(rgyud): du byas te 'dum cing / thams cad snyen bkur bya zhing 'dug pa ni/ ras kyi sku gzugs la/ mchod pa bla na med pa yino// ras khru bzhi khyon kun khrum
332b4(rgyud): dam/ khru do ma legs par stegs pa ras 'jam po// thag ran bzang po mnyen po shin du dag par bkrus pa/ gtsang mar byas pa'am/ yang na dar
332b5(rgyud): yu ga gam/ yang na mon dang shun lpags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bac+doMs lnga tshangs pa'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// snod gtsang ma sar pa'i nang du
332b6(rgyud): tshon sar pa lhag ma yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri ba ni/ tshen sna tshogs kyis rnams par dbye bar bya'o// dbusu 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
332b7(rgyud): dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa zhal gsum pa mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu skra
332b8(rgyud): lcang lo dang thor tshugs kyi brgyan pa/ cod paN la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o// me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o// phreng ba'i gong du 'os
333a1(rgyud): kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o//
333a2(rgyud): dpag med bya'o// cod paN la zla ba phyed pa dang / 'od 'dom gang bya'o// kun du lcags kyu bya'o// / phyag bzhi la g.yon na pad ma'i lcags kyu/
333a3(rgyud): g.yon na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcag kyu/ ga yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdam
333a4(rgyud): seng ge'i pad mo bya'o// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// ga ya su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal du lta ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
333a5(rgyud): pa/ pad ma la bzhugs pa 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa bya'o// 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcag phran dang / yal ka dang bcas pa
333a6(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs kyi spras pa bya'o// ne tsho dang ri skyegs dang / shang shang ti'u dang / rma bya dang / bya ka la bing ka dang / rin po che'i gseb na rgyu ba bya'o// shing gi gong sgra
333a7(rgyud): bo la khang bu rtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal mod khang gi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsu rgyan thams kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs
333a8(rgyud): dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su phyag na rdo rje 'khros pa'i gang mo 'byin pa'i gzug mche ba brtsigs pa/ skra gyen du rdzas pa/ lcang lo dang
333a9(rgyud): cod pan gyis brgyan pa// rdo rje rje gsor ba na mkha' la lta bar bya'o// smad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / zho nu dang / rgyal po chen po zhi bya'o// god
333b1(rgyud): du dbang po dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po
333b2(rgyud): rnams btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod byed par bya'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang / nyer dga'o klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// gas
333b3(rgyud): kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drang du/ pus mo gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me tog
333b4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang / pog phor dang bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi ngos kun du ris skor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs kyis gang ba shing sna chog
333b5(rgyud): me tog dang lcag ma can bya'o// rdzing bu chu zags pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis shing dang lcug ma bya'o// gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang grul bum gyi shing bya'o//
333b6(rgyud): tshul de lta bur don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la bris ste/ gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhags la// rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod pa chen
333b7(rgyud): pos mchod par bya'o// a ga ru dang / du r+ya ka dang / tsan dan gyi 'dug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas
333b8(rgyud): brjod bya'o// nyi ma re re ras la skra gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par
334a1(rgyud): gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongasu dag cing zad par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug
334a2(rgyud): bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongasasu zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/
334a3(rgyud): ser sna dang pra dog dang bral bar 'gyuraro// gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po snyed pa rgya chen po
334a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
334a5(rgyud): dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams kyi rtag tu bsrung zhing rjes su bzung bar 'gyuraro// ras kyi ska gzug 'di'i 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis/
334a6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o// gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis
334a7(rgyud): bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bskur byed pa de ni/ phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
334a8(rgyud): gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
334b1(rgyud): pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu bzung bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi
334b2(rgyud): ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bsams pa yong su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman ras
334b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyis pa'i phyir
334b4(rgyud): dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang / bde ba bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgri ba thams cad las yongasu grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir// don
334b5(rgyud): yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams ston pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni/ don yod pa'i lcags
334b6(rgyud): kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro bo'i las grub pa mchogs te 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thas
334b7(rgyud): cad yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa/ rtse ba'i bsam pa med pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / lga
334b8(rgyud): ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / ma 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad zag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i 'gyegs dang / log
335a1(rgyud): 'dren thams cad rab tu 'dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / bung bar byed pa'i sems can
335a2(rgyud): ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad mchi ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs pa dang / brdung ba dang / gtong ba dang /
335a3(rgyud): lus rnam par bzhig par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis pad mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil
335a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi skabasu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spu sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo thams
335a5(rgyud): cad srung bar byed pa chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa gnas thams cad la rjes su skyo ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub pa'i mchog de bcom ldan
335a6(rgyud): 'das kyis thugs rtse ba chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlabs cing rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang / rigs sngags thams cad
335a7(rgyud): mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas
335a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po 'phags spyan gzigs dbang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan
335b1(rgyud): ngas gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgyas btab ste/ ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas
335b2(rgyud): btab cing / byin gyis smros shig/ gsang ba lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dang / dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
335b3(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs sngags 'chang
335b4(rgyud): thams cad kyis bsams yongs su rdzogs par go skabs dang mchog 'grub por byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
335b5(rgyud): dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sgo zhing dbugs dbyung ba thos nas dga' smin ma skams/ dpral ba phyed 'khros par byas/ gdong khro gnyer du byas/ mchi ba rtsigs pa'i
335b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan raM sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum
335b7(rgyud): du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tsha'o/
335b8(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la
336a1(rgyud): / phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// drang song chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
336a2(rgyud): rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po'i chen po'i ma mo'i tshogs kyis
336a3(rgyud): yongs su skor ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalo// khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
336a4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA
336a5(rgyud): oM bi kri ti ba da na/ ma ha kro ta ra dzu/ b+ha yang ka ra/ maha b+hang wa ad ta hA sa/ dza la dza la/ ma hA dza lA ma la/ ma ha ro'u da/ ru pa b+ha yang ka ra na/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Ti nan/
336a6(rgyud): da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Ta gla nan/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duSh+Ta/ sarba du bi g+han/ bI na yA kan pA ta ya ba ha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta/ sa twa na/ b+ho b+ho/ ma ha kro d+ha ra badz+ra/ ma Ni ka na ka/ badz+ra be dur+ya/
336a7(rgyud): a lang kri ta/ sha ri ran/ badz+ra ba ra shu/ sa sha sha sta ya/ ma ha pad ma aM ku sha/ b+ha dza ya/ ma ha pad ma/ A sa na ya/ ma ha pad ma bi ka tsa/ gan+d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha/ a pra ti ha ta/
336a8(rgyud): ba la ba ra/ kra ma ya/ ma hA sra/ bA hra ya/ sarba b+ha ta yang ka ra ya/ sarba de ba b+ha ma na/ kam pa/ ud b+ha bA ya/ na ma ha bi kri ta pa da na ya/ nar sin hA/ mu khA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra
336b1(rgyud): dza la d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsa na Ta be ga d+ha ra/ tsa ri tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni sha tsa ra/ ni sha tsa ra/ i shwa ra/ b+hI ku Ti mu kha/ hUM hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/
336b2(rgyud): sarba pA paM/ ki la bi kha ha ra/ ma ha Ni ti/ dza d+ha ra/ pad ma ha ste/ oM pad ma/ aM ku shi/ b+hu dze ha ra ya/ mAn tra sa ya/ bi g+ha sha sa ya/ tu Sh+Ta Ta/ Na sha ya/ sarba pA baM ra Na/
336b3(rgyud): hUM phaT swAhA/ ba sha ha ta ya swA hA/ pad ma d+ha ra ya sA hA/ sa ma ShA sa ka ya sA hA/ sa mo g+ha ba ra d+ha yA sAhA/ kro d+ha ra dza b+ha yang ka ra ya swA hA/ pra ha be sha d+ha ra ya sAhA/ tre leg
336b4(rgyud): kya du dzi Ta yA sA hA/ ya ma ba ru na ku be ra na ma s+thi ta yA sA hA/ badz+ra d+ha ra bu dza ta ya swA hA/ ma ha ka la ma Ti ga Na/ ban Ti gan/ khan Ti ta b+hu dza ta ya sA hA/ nag a ra ya sAhA/
336b5(rgyud): oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+ha ru/ sarba man ta la/ a tiSh+Tha te/ sa ma yA sA hA/ sarba mu tra/ a tiSh+Thi ta mu tra ya sA hA/ oM a mo g+ha/ ba ra de/ ma ha daMSh+Ta/ aM ku sha/ badz+ra hUM/
336b6(rgyud): ma ha pad ma A shA sa da ra/ na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha/ aM ku sha hUM phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang
336b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal med khang rnams kun du 'gul to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam drug tu g.yos so// ma rungs pa
336b8(rgyud): klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha/
337a1(rgyud): sgrub tu 'gyel to// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun du tshig te 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing sregs pa dang / du zhing 'dre ldog ste/
337a2(rgyud): tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // lha thams cad shin du 'khrugs shing skrag go// bdud kyi rigs rnams brad khas brtags so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams
337a3(rgyud): cad kun du 'khrugaso// rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / snyan dga' bo dag kyang kun du 'khrugs shing shin du skrag ste snying 'dar ro// gzhan
337a4(rgyud): yang sa'i steng na/ klu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang / brgya mtshon chu'i klu gang dag dang / ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs pa/ ska cig tu 'bar bar
337a5(rgyud): gyur cing dungs so// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go/ nag po chen po dag/ tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'o tshogs kyis skor ba de dag thams
337a6(rgyud): cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro// gnas la rten pa'i bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'dar ro// 'bar kun du 'bar ro// gnas dang bcas par bsregs so// de nas 'khor de'i nang
337a7(rgyud): gi lha dang / klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rnams brgyan srung ba sna tshogs dang /
337a8(rgyud): chos gos kyi char pa 'babs so// mchod pa'i las byed cing / tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas/ sa la chags chag 'dres so// lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dang //
337b1(rgyud): rin chen sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chang pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing gsor te/ shin tu 'gying zhig
337b2(rgyud): tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste/ nye bar phyin ci nas/ byang chub
337b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri me med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs
337b4(rgyud): kyis spras pa'i phreng ba/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad mo la phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs gi spras pa'i de la dbul longs spyod
337b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol// gang gis yun ring po phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// khro bo chen po'o yang chen po/
337b6(rgyud): bshad cing gang dran pa tsam nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams pa drug tu g.yos pa gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang /
337b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log dran ma rungs pa khyim dang bcas te lus tshig cing / rab tu rgyal nas khas srub tu 'gyel cing bsreg/
337b8(rgyud): shi la thug pa dang / srog skams par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ dus thams cad du mgo bo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// bcang ngo // sgom mo// mchod do//
338a1(rgyud): rgyal bar bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'char ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / slong dang / de nga
338a2(rgyud): dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal sku dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thog pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ lta ba 'am/
338a3(rgyud): 'dri ba 'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o// spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// srung bar bgyi'o// yongs su sbyang
338a4(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// bsams pa dang yod la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad
338a5(rgyud): so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su rtsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun
338a6(rgyud): mi chad par yod byed thams cad kyis mi 'brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bskyed cing / bsod nams dang /
338a7(rgyud): ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru dang / bzang ba dang / bai tung ba dang / gos dang / skud pa dang / rgyas rjes su stsal bar
338a8(rgyud): bgyi'o// bu gcig 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar rjes bgyi'o// dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun du mchog tu mos par byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
338b1(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rjes la/ 'di skad ces lag na rdo rjes khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang
338b2(rgyud): po byas pa/ 'di legs legs so// zhes smras so// lag pa g.yas brkyang nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa blang te/
338b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la rjes su rtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su
338b4(rgyud): longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa/
338b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor gang yin pa 'dir 'dug cing / dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir/ ci lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
338b6(rgyud): dbu'i gong du gtor ro// de nas phreng ba de nam mkha' la gtor ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi dbu'i steng du/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i
338b7(rgyud): me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ 'od 'tsher ba ka ba bzhin/ sgo bzhi legs par rnam par dbyes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa chu zheng rgya che ba shin
338b8(rgyud): du yangs pa/ me tog ka ta li dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal yas khang sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ yongs su gyur te gnas so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i steng du/
339a1(rgyud): zad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po ches spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang shin du gnas so// de lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i/
339a2(rgyud): steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog gi dru brtsegs par shin du gnas so// de nas 'phags pa ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng thog tu yang / zla ba
339a3(rgyud): yid 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khung bu rtsegs pa nor bu ron po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ me tog ka ta lis mdzes par byas te gnas so// khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang
339a4(rgyud): ce kor kun yang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug blo'i lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
339a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su skor ste/ mdun du byas ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi rig
339a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i lha deg thams cad kyang / na mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i
339a7(rgyud): nang na/ 'khod pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog dang / sba ba bzhin dang / nam mkha' la zla ba nya ba ni rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su skor ba/
339a8(rgyud): sba ba bzhin du sra bar gnas so// me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du du 'ong ba'i rI ma med pa'i me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang //
339b1(rgyud): man d+ha ra ba dang / ma ha man d+ha ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma ha ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tra la dang / me tog ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mug ta ka dang / me tog a
339b2(rgyud): sho ka dang / me tog pa la dang / me tog ni la dang / ma ha ni la dang / me tog g+han pa sha ka dang / me tog su mun dan dang / ta ra na dang / ku s+tha ka'i me tog gis char gyis rgyun
339b3(rgyud): 'bab po// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi chos gos sdud pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du 'bab cing /
339b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do// de ltar na rdza 'phrul chen pa'i che ba bdag snang ngo // rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par
339b5(rgyud): nam mkha' la sgra byung ngo // 'phags don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po// // de bzhin gshegs pa bcom
339b6(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pA ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen
339b7(rgyud): po mchog tu dkon pa'i rgyal po 'di smras te// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir/ ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad
339b8(rgyud): sreg par bshad pa/ legs so legs so// 'di ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos par thams cad byed par 'gyur//
340a1(rgyud): yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i
340a2(rgyud): grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang rnams kyis yangs shing rgya chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig
340a3(rgyud): bu mchog tu grub par 'gyur te/ las grub pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas 'khros pa'i gad brgyangs spyi btsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
340a4(rgyud): stong phrag brgya po stobs che ba dpung che ba/ stobs kyi pha rol gnon po chen po gang gis lag 'thil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po skul bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal med
340a5(rgyud): khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa drag po dang gzigs brjid chen po stobs che ba pha rol gyi dpung rab tu 'joms par byed pa de bstan las
340a6(rgyud): langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de/ 'di skad
340a7(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags blangs gzigs dbang phyug gis/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rigs sngags kyi
340a8(rgyud): rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pI/ gsang sngags bshad pas ni/ bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang gnas dang bcas te bsregs so// gnod srin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig
340b1(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te sregs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ci zhig te tshig cing zhu bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi//
340b2(rgyud): bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srogs rnam par zhig go// dus kyi zhags pas bcings/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
340b3(rgyud): la phan bdag su gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skyab tu gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsug
340b4(rgyud): 'bar bas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro bo rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi
340b5(rgyud): rjes su song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sban ras gzigs dbang phyug skyabasu nye bar song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
340b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang // dpung gnyen dang // skyeb pa dang // rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas
340b7(rgyud): pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no// kye gnod sbyin chen po myur bar myur bar song ste/ skyabs su 'gro bar byos shig/ de nas khros pa'i gang
340b8(rgyud): rgyangs spyi rtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbugs phyung ba rtog nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
341a1(rgyud): dbang phyug ga la ba de log su song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing lag pa brkyang ste/
341a2(rgyud): zhabs la banyud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyabs tu gsol/ thugs rje chen pos bdag la skyabs tu gsol/ bdag la srog rtsal bar mdzad gsol/
341a3(rgyud): bdag ni sreg shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros
341a4(rgyud): pa'i gang brgyangs spyi rtsug tu 'bar ba'i gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig/ ngas ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam
341a5(rgyud): cig sdod cig/ gnod ci sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par 'tsho bar byas/ khyod kyis bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khyed 'u dang / bu mo mang po ni/

341b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad la khyod nag dang // rnam par 'jig par rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan 'gro thams cad ni spel/ khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i/

341b3(rgyud): skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas/ kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslab pa dang / sdom pa khas blangs par bya dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig/

341b5(rgyud): yongs su thar bar bya'o// mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o// de nas 'khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi phyug 'bar ba'i gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

341b7(rgyud): gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bla na chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis

342a7(rgyud): 'byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang / sad dang / than pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so

342b1(rgyud): pa sbyar bar bgyi'o// sems can dge ba spyod pa'i rnams pa kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bgyi'o// yang dag par dad pas rjes su bsgrub par bgyi'o// bud med dang /

342b8(rgyud): sbyin chen po skyabs gsum la shing / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i srab tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu thams cad kyi dam

346a2(rgyud): 'gyed pa na/ bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rigs sngags lan cig dran par byas na/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dgos par mi bya'o// gang zhig

346b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba 'am/ gzhan yang gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / bkren pa sdug 'phongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo'i don du ri lu/

346b3(rgyud): dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ ril lu gcig ni skyed par gdags na/ thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa grub par 'gyur/ bsam
346b4(rgyud): pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// rgung pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyu ro// ma dang / nyams chung ba dang / de bzhin du chags grugs dang / bgyegs kyis zin pa dang / gad
346b5(rgyud): za yag smas zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ dogs par mi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags bI
346b6(rgyud): sleb pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdug pa byas pas dogs par mi bya'o// man pa sgra'i mi bzad pa'i
346b7(rgyud): sdig pa dang / dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyuraro// mes phye ma leb bzhin du rtag tu sreg par 'gyuraro// thams
346b8(rgyud): cad du sbyar ba la dogs par mi bya'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i thams cad kyis khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi sdug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang sgo chen por nam lang kar dang /
346b9(rgyud): gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing // bdug pa 'dul ba 'dis bdugs na// dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur zhing // mes bye ma leb bzhin du rtag tu sreg par 'gyuraro//
347a1(rgyud): sros kar bdug cig gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas nas/ khyim gyi nang gang mi snang bar bdag par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /
347a2(rgyud): sha za dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon ma rung ba dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du/ phyir bzhin 'byung zhing dus te/ kyi hung zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// khyim
347a3(rgyud): gang yin pa 'gul pa dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal ba'i srungs ma mi bzad pa bzad pa thams cad phyogs sred par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang /
347a4(rgyud): srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad 'dug pa'i dri za na med pas skrag par
347a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bsams pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus sreg pa dang / phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams 'khrul pa dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus/
347a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad ba tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad la smra rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing // /
347a7(rgyud): rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs par rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du dpal 'thob par 'gyuraro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri ba dang / sbyin dang / srin po dang /
347a8(rgyud): klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir/ nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rjes su skyong dang / dus thams cad du bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i lcags
347b1(rgyud): kyu'i bla na med pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lha bu ni/ lha'i nyi ma bzhin du spa/ nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang tshungs// bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar/ mun khrod sgron/
347b2(rgyud): chen 'od bzhin du/ mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes pa ni/ skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin/ bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang / dpag tshad gzhal
347b3(rgyud): du med pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur// mkha' la rin chen mchod sdod ltar/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ri lu sten par byas nas ni/ lus ni bsod
347b4(rgyud): nams mchogs gis brgyan/ gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang / shin du bzang po kho nar 'gyur/ 'jig rten mgon pos dus rtag tu/ phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad//
347b5(rgyud): rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang / kun du bla na med par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi/ rim par phye
347b6(rgyud): ba 'grub 'gyur te/ kun du grub pa bla na med/ 'ge'u wa nga dang gur gum dang // ru sga cha snyams ste/ sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/
347b7(rgyud): tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par bzhag pa khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing / gtsang ma zla ba yar gyi tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshes/ zhib tu btag
