347b9(rgyud): brgya shug gi 'brum tsam byas te/ grib ma la skams la gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom de'i tshe/ kho bo'i lcags kyu'i lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'azlam brjod bya ste/ sgribatshamasa~M su thig le bye/
348a1(rgyud): smin 'tsham su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa// mtshan nyid bzhin du lde byas te/ byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mad la/
348a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug gtor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang / mnyam par 'tshungs par brgyan par bya'o// thams cad du mchod par byas pa dang /
348a3(rgyud): rtag tu bra ma la gus pas nyan par bya ba dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro//
348a4(rgyud): sems can gus pa dang / dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la byas pa bzhin no// nor dang 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dbang po dang /
348a5(rgyud): tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen po 'os par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang //
348a6(rgyud): dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson
348a7(rgyud): 'grus dang / tshes 'phel bar 'gyuraro// nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar dang / nyon mong
348a8(rgyud): ba'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyod pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyuraro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnam
348b1(rgyud): las gnas thams cad du kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyuraro// lde de lta bu byas ste/ khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la/ yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas
348b2(rgyud): ste// phug gi sgor gtor na/ phug thams cad sgo bdangs par 'gyu ro// ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par bya'o// lan gsum zhugs gi bar du sgo gtan bzhug pa'i gnas su/ khro bo
348b3(rgyud): lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha'i bu mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang zhing mdzes pa/ lta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang /
348b4(rgyud): ldan pa// dpal gyis shin tu sba zhing 'bar ba bzhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha ltar byed pa 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po ches
348b5(rgyud): bkang ba thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang la dbul bar byed do rigs sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o// sngags 'ba' zhig dran
348b6(rgyud): bar bya zhing / yungs kar gyis gzhon ma la brdeg par bya'o// ci ste gzhonu ma de drug pa 'byin cing bzhin sbyar ba/ khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/ mche ba rtsigs ga ska ral pa
348b7(rgyud): ser ga gyem du mdzes pa/ ral pa gcod pan gyis brgyan par ston na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o// khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs
348b8(rgyud): kar gyis mgo ba'i spyi bor rtag cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing / kye rigs sngags 'chang rje btsun khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab
349a1(rgyud): @/ 'jug gi gzugs can gung mo gum mo zhes sgra chen po 'byin to// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas rje su rtags ste/ gal te kha dbu ba byung na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas de
349a2(rgyud): blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa la skas na/ rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te/ na mkha' las 'gro bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sdug
349a3(rgyud): 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro// skad cig tu sgong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing / slar yang 'ong bar 'gyuraro//
349a4(rgyud): gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu lon pa 'dra zhing / skra yid tsam 'khyil zhing 'khyil ba/ rna cha grad bu dri med cing / gcod pan me tog 'chang ba dang / 'khris ma gdu bus rgyan pa lus
349a5(rgyud): pad ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyuraro// tshe skal pa stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'kha'i los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis
349a6(rgyud): 'khor gyis skor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// lag te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim
349a7(rgyud): sgo phye skye 'dug par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad babye ba ci mtsho zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug// mngags pa'i
349a8(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// khyim thams cad der yang dpon po dang / bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyu ro// gal te mgo bo'i mtshogs mar thig le byas na// brgya byin dang //
349b1(rgyud): lha ma yin rnams kyi dbang po// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyis bdag po'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gyi ris kyis lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchi zhes dbang du 'gyuraro// rig sngag
349b2(rgyud): 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis snyen bkur byed par 'gyur// shin tu mthong ba'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun tu spyod par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong
349b3(rgyud): thub par 'gyuraro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas nas/ klu'i mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa chung ma dang / bu mo gzho nu 'am/
349b4(rgyud): thams cad 'dun na 'dug cing 'di skad ces smras te/ rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang / bgyi ba dang dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing / nam mtsho'i bar du nye bar gnas
349b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// yo byad thams cad kyis mi 'brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// klu'i lha mo longs spyod mchog tu longs spyod pas rtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas
349b6(rgyud): par 'gyi'o// nor thams cad du rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin po che rnam pa du sna tshogs gser dang / dngul dang / bai d+yAr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang /
349b7(rgyud): gser dang / mu tig dang / in tra ni la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / pad ma ra ga da/ byed d+ya dang / shin du bzang po rnams rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang /
349b8(rgyud): lha rdzas nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu bkang bar bgyi'o// shin tu char ches pa bcad par bgyi'o// char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa
350a1(rgyud): char bcad par bgyi'o// dus su char dbab pa dang / dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs
350a2(rgyud): nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam mtsho'i bar du gnas te snyen bkur bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba de'i rkang pa spyis blang bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig
350a3(rgyud): bsams pa rjes su sbyang bar 'gyuraro// dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na// glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad kyi stobs
350a4(rgyud): kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// 'chag cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i spobs thogs pa med de// rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyu ro// lha
350a5(rgyud): ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad 'di las bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang /
350a6(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / dngogs 'byis pa dang / 'tshang 'dra ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// lto bar thig le byas ste/ khro bo'i lcags
350a7(rgyud): kyi'i rigs sngags lan gcig dran par byas la/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin byas na/ ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas
350a8(rgyud): ji tsam 'dod pa thob par 'gyu ro// skyer thig le byas ste/ khro bo'i lcags kyu lan gcig bzlas par byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ ci tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang /
350b1(rgyud): skud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur/ rtag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyuraro// dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa grub par
350b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lag 'thil du l+ye byas te bya zlas brjod byas na/ gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas
350b3(rgyud): ba la bskus la/ lan cig bzlas brjod byas ste/ grong khyer gyi bsgo la brdabs na/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// mdun na gnas
350b4(rgyud): shing de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// grong khyer de na skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bya mo de dag thams cad dbang du gyur
350b5(rgyud): cing 'dug ste/ ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod cing de srid du thams cad ci bya ba de thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang / mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la/
350b6(rgyud): bskus te rgyal po'i sgo la rdabs na/ ji srid 'dag pa 'dod na/ de srid du thams cad dbang du sbyin par 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskas zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas ste/
350b7(rgyud): phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab par byas na/ gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste/ 'dug cing khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'dug/ rkang pa gnyis

351a1(rgyud): @#/ gnas shing / dbang du gyur pa dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad bye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyuraro// bla gnyis la bskus te nag tshal gyi nang du zhugs na/ zhugs/
351a2(rgyud): ba tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing / khyim sgo thams cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyuraro// sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / rdza dang / shing gel ba'i sman dang / rtsa dang /

351a4(rgyud): gsang sngags lan gcig bzlas brjod bya zhing / gu gul la bzlas brjod bya ste/ bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzum par bltas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo bka' rtsol cing /

351a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// nam mtsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// mi'i 'o ma dang / lhan cig tu bdar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ mig la bskus na/ gtor thams cad mthong
351a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// mtshan mo yang nyin par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyuraro// chu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing / lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ gang la smras pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang 'dod
351a8(rgyud): ba de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshig bzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro// kha nas ud ba la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro// gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bad par
351b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gon thams cad la thig le bya zhing / lan gcig gsang sngags dran par byas na/ mod la tshangs pa'i srin mo la sogs pa'i bar du/ thams cad ngu zhing bros par 'gyu ro//

351b4(rgyud): gsum dran par byas te/ phu zhes byas nas me 'bar bar 'gyur ro// ci tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na/ dbugs rgyu ba rnams me
351b5(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag la sku zhing / gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na/ lus mtha' dag la 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu dang yungs dkar gyis skad nas bum pa dang /
351b6(rgyud): byam bu zhi ba'i thig le byas ste/ dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na/ phyir yang gnas par 'gyuraro// gri ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse
351b7(rgyud): gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' dang / mda' bo che dang / dung la sku zhing rjesu dran par byas zhing skad cig du 'bar bar 'gyu ro// lhung zed la skus na 'bar bar 'gyuraro//
351b8(rgyud): mgo la smras na 'bar bar 'gyuraro// dung la skus te de nas mthon por bus na/ sgra gang du thos pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi kho bo thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad rab zhi bar 'gyur//
352a1(rgyud): ngan pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// sprin logs su bus na/ rlung sprin dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhing bus na/
352a2(rgyud): byung dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar
352a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skye ma byed dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad
352a4(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ro// g+hasmang+ga sdugasmra dang / byad dang / skrod gtong dang / dug gis 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor bus na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
352a5(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// ba lang mchi ba dang / phyug mchi ba dang /
352a6(rgyud): mi 'chi dang / rta mchi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byung dang lo nyes pa dang / nad dang / mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po byung ba la/ khang pa'i steng du
352a7(rgyud): skad drag bor lan cig sgra bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// char mi 'bab pi tshe/ klu'i gan mtsho 'gram du bus na/ mod klu'i rgya lo rnams
352a8(rgyud): char pa'i rgyun gtong ba 'gyur ro// char ches pi tshe srin sogasu bus nas/ shin tu char ches pa zhi bar 'gyuraro// lan 'ga' ya mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shi pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur// mtshas chen po bcad nas/
352b1(rgyud): ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ tsi tsa du dung sgra thos pa de tsaM tshun chad/ 'tsham chen po byed pa byas pa 'gyuraro// dkyil 'kho gyi mtshas bcad na/ bskor zhing bus pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mtsham bcad pa byas/
352b2(rgyud): bA 'gyu ro/ de nas khro bo rgyal po yi sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bsgrub pa/ bla na med pa thas cad bya ba la/ seMs can zhi bar bya ni/ nas dang yung kar mar dang bsres la shing ar ka'i me bus te/ lan
352b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tso gyis/ dpag tshad kyi nang du zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// yis kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thas cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuro//
352b4(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ dpag tshad stong kun du zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyu ro// rgyas pa bya na/ yung kar dang / 'bras sa lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres te
352b5(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya ba ni/ lan bdun sbyin bsreg bya na/ dpag tshad kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyuraro// shalan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/ dpag tshad brgya kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro//
352b6(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ dpag tshad stong kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur// shing dri mi zhim pa'i me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / yung mar dang / shing bsres te/
352b7(rgyud): tshor ba can gyi yam shing gis me sbar te/ sbyin bsreg lan bdun nam/ si shu rtsa gcig gas/ brgya rtsa brgyad bya nas/ yid la ji ltar sem shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyil rnaMs
352b8(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// gsang snga grub par byed 'dod na/ 'bras yos dang / yung kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing mchi'i yam bsreg shing la me sbar te/ sbyin bsreg lan bdun byan/
353a1(rgyud): #// rang gi khro bo'i gsang gi sngag bsgrub pa grub par 'gyuro// lan bcu bzhi byas na/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyuraro// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang / sbyin bsreg byas na/ don/
353a2(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub par 'gyuraro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste//
353a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje rigs dang / gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag rgya/ mchog tu 'grub pa chen por gyur ro// til dang /
353a4(rgyud): 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar te/ tshangs pa bdun sbyin byas na/ bram zer thams cad du 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sprin bsreg byas na/ brgya byin la sogs
353a5(rgyud): pa lha thams cad/ lha'i tshogs dang / bcas pa yang 'ong zhing / rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing / dbang du 'gyuraro// nyi ma dang / zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyuraro//
353a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du bya na/ 'bras sa lu/ nyil dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang
353a7(rgyud): bsres te/ sbyin bsreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyuraro// klu char 'bebs par bya na/ 'bras yos dang / yungs
353a8(rgyud): kar dang / nag pus pa dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/ de nas klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'babs par 'gyur/ ci tsam 'dod par
353b1(rgyud): char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so// shin du char che ba bcad pa ni/ de nyid kyi thal ba na mkha' la gtor na/ shin du char pa chad par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyis g.yul zlog par
353b2(rgyud): 'dod na/ skye tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ sbyin bsreg byas na/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed cing tshang 'bru ba thams cad la/ pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
353b3(rgyud): zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// 'thab rtsod dang / 'gyed pa rnams kyi lha thebs par 'gyuraro// nad
353b4(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar bya ba la/ sran kun la sogs pa dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ sbyin bsreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//
353b5(rgyud): bud med dbang du bya na/ su ma na'i me tog gis ldan zhi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/ bud med thams cad mchog du dbang byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing / nad thams cad mchog 'grub
353b6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang ba des 'bras sa lu/ til dang / yungs kar dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnam
353b7(rgyud): mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te khro bo'i rgyal po bsgrub par 'dod na//
353b8(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te d+ma sreg byas na/ thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags sgrub pa grub par 'gyur zhing
354a1(rgyud): nga ma mas na kun dus pa 'gyu
354a2(rgyud): ma @
354a3(rgyud): sarba maMg+ha laM/
